stunt-dirt-bike.name: Stunt Dirt Bike
stunt-dirt-bike.description: Stunt Dirt Bike is a game that lets you play in different obstacle courses with a variety of vehicles, some of which you'll unlock later in the game. The goal is to reach the end without flipping over with the best time possible. It will take skill to keep your balance while driving through these obstacles, while also doing your best to beat levels as fast as you can. You can send in your time to see if you can beat the high scores of other players across the world too!
stunt-dirt-bike.controls:

street-fighter-2.name: Street Fighter 2
street-fighter-2.description: Street Fighter 2 is a classic fighting game featuring the epic Ryu vs Sagat fight. Use a combination of hadoukens and shoryukens to beat Sagat into submission.

gold-miner.name: Gold Miner
gold-miner.description: Gold Miner is a classic casual mining game that has captivated players for years. In this timeless adventure, you'll look to collect gold, stones, and minerals to reach your daily goal and accumulate wealth beyond your wildest dreams. With each successful mining expedition, you'll earn money that can be used to purchase valuable upgrades, including explosives that allow you to mine more efficiently than ever before. And now, thanks to its HTML5 port, you can enjoy the game on both your desktop and in your browser, anytime and anywhere you please!
gold-miner.faq:
How do you play Gold Miner?

Your main task in Gold Miner is to collect gold, stones, and minerals to reach your daily monetary goal.

When did Gold Miner come out?

Gold Miner came out in December 2007.
gold-miner.controls:
• Down arrow key = drop claw
  • Up arrow key = toss dynamite (when dragging an item)
  • Left mouse button = interact in-game UI
  • (Since this is a Flash game, some UI buttons aren't working as intended, please click "Play Again" at every end of the game instead)
gold-miner.how_to_play:
Each level of this game is more or less the same, but what varies greatly is the difficulty level. You are a gold miner and are positioned at the top of the game with a crane and hook to grab as many valuable objects as possible. Some of the objects you will want to target are gold chunks, diamonds, animals carrying diamonds, money bags, and more. There are also nonprecious metals surrounding the gold and diamonds - that's where your skill comes into play. You will need to avoid them either or capture them strategically -- yes, you can get these too, though they are of very little value, so they are mostly obstacles and time wasters.

Not All That Glimmers Is Gold

Well, in this case, all that glimmers is pretty much gold, but not all gold chunks have the same value. Some of the heavier pieces may be worth $500 or more, but some of the same size may be worth significantly less. This is why you need to grab as much as possible to meet your target. When in doubt -- go for the diamonds. You can't go (too) wrong with diamonds.

Every Level Has A Monetary Goal

Each level has a monetary goal. The first round goal is to collect $650 worth of precious stones and metals. This is easy enough if you keep your eye on the prize, but as the levels increase, the amount of money you need to make from gold and precious stones to complete the level keeps increasing, so a bit of skill is necessary.

The Shop In Between Levels

Between each level, you will be met with a shopkeeper trying to sell you different items to help you at the next level. Prices vary significantly. Sometimes, a high price can indicate that you may need to use the item in the next round. Sometimes, the shopkeeper is just scamming you with jacked-up prices.

Monetary rewards are cumulative, so you carry over what you made in the previous round to the next round. If you have plenty of money to spare and have reached or nearly reached your goal for the next round, splurge on some of the higher-priced items. You may be able to increase your earnings significantly.

Some shop items include:

  • Rock collectors book: Rocks will be worth three times as much in the round you use this ointment. It is only good for one level.
  • Lucky clover: This will increase the chances of getting something good out of the grab bags to the next level. This is only good for one level.
  • Strength drink: Gives the miner more strength to pull up objects.
  • Dynamite: After you've grabbed onto something with your claw, press the up key to throw a piece of dynamite at it to blow it up.
  • Diamond polish: Diamonds are worth more when buying this at the next level.

This game can be addictive, so be warned!

happy-wheels.description: Happy Wheels is a side-scrolling ragdoll physics game. Navigate through the levels using one of several unique characters without being torn limb from limb. Sound easy? Do I need to download Happy Wheels to play it?

happy-wheels.how_to_play:
Happy Wheels emerged in 2010, taking the browser gaming world by storm with its wild mechanics, bizarre characters, and elaborate user-created levels. Still available in its original form today, you can explore the ingenious levels created by players and try out various characters in the game.

Levels

You can play through various original and user-created levels in Happy Wheels. There are countless selections to choose from, some of which are easier to play through with certain characters. Depending on the level, you could find yourself riding your wheelchair through someone's stomach or plowing through a forest on an angry cat.

The goal of each level varies, from reaching the end to collecting all the tokens. Some levels are entirely aimless. You can also design your own tracks and share them with the rest of the world for testing.

Happy Wheels Characters

The Original 4

The characters in Happy Wheels are far from conventional in a platformer. Instead of having superpowers, you're pretty much a regular guy. The first character is Wheelchair Guy, a slightly ragged-looking older man in a jet-powered wheelchair. As you can imagine, a jet-powered wheelchair is pretty tough to control without causing severe injury.

Segway Guy, on the other hand, is a bit more manageable and a common choice among seasoned Happy Wheels gamers. The other two original game characters are Irresponsible Dad (who rather irresponsibly has his kid on the back seat) and Effective Shopper, who rides a mobility scooter.

Each character in Happy Wheels has an ability unique to them. Segway Guy can jump, and Wheelchair Guy can turbo-boost his jet thrusters to move faster. Learn more about the Happy Wheels character abilities.

Newer Characters

As Happy Wheels continued to provide endless gory entertainment for the gaming world, several new characters were released. These include the creatively named Moped Couple, Lawnmower Man, Explorer Guy, Santa Claus, Pogo Stick Man, Irresponsible Mom, and Helicopter Man.

papas-wingeria.name: Papa's Wingeria
papas-wingeria.description: Papa’s Wingeria is a casual restaurant game where you cook delicious wings for customers. Learn to serve the perfect plate of wings and purchase upgrades to improve the customer experience. The days only get busier at Papa’s Wingeria, so work fast to deliver all the orders on time!
papas-wingeria.faq:
Can you still play Papa's games online?

Yes, you can play Papa's games online at CrazyGames.

Which Papa's game is free?

You can play the Papa's series for free at CrazyGames. Games include Papa's Wingeria, Papa's Freezeria, Papa's Scooperia, Papa's Donuteria and many more.

How long does it take to finish Papa's Wingeria?

With solid gameplay, you may be able to finish Papa's Wingeria in 10 - 12 hours.
papas-wingeria.controls: Use the left mouse button to cook the wings.
papas-wingeria.how_to_play:
Accept your place in the pecking order.

Take… These broken wings… And throw them in the fryer. We have customers to serve. Papa Louie has scammed you into working at one of his restaurants. You are now contractually obligated to fry tasty wings for Papa’s Wingeria. He’ll start you with the basic skills, and you’ll work your way up from there.

Add a tasteful amount of sauce.

Fry the requested amount of wings until they reach the line. Place the wings into the wing-spinner 3000 and load up the requested sauce. There are various sauces Wingeria patrons love, so it’s essential to time your saucing and wing-whizzing precisely. There’s nothing worse than not having enough sauce.

Spread your wings.

This is the final stage. Spread your wings neatly around the plate and add all the required extras! Some customers like to convince themselves that having a few celery sticks makes it a healthy meal. Serve it with a chef’s kiss, but not literally. That could land you in trouble.

Unwind after a day in the chicken shop.

After each day’s shift, you’ll get 3 tickets to play in one of the various minigames. You could be shooting targets, catching burgers, or any of the other minigames. If you succeed at the challenge, you’ll be rewarded with something to help you in the game. You can also use your tips to buy new items for the restaurant.

From Wingeria to Bling-eria.

Decorative items like tables and posters help improve customer waiting time, while upgrades to the equipment can make the food prep process easier and faster. Eventually, the shop floor will be kitted entirely with new furniture, flooring, walls, all the bells and whistles. You have to earn them first, though!

Features

  • Pick a character or build your own
  • Fry wings and serve them in a presentable fashion
  • Play fun minigames to unlock items after a hard day’s work
  • Upgrade Papa’s Wingeria with all of the finest furnishings

Release Date

  • June 2012 (Flash)
  • August 2014 (iOS)
  • February 2019 (Android)

Developer

Flipline Studios made Papa's Wingeria. We have many more of their Papa's games to play. Other popular choices are Papa's Cheeseria and Papa's Freezeria.

Platform

  • Web browser (desktop and mobile)
  • Android
  • iOS

Use your sword to battle different enemies and learn magic from wizards to aid you on your quest. Level up and increase your stats - you'll need it to battle the bigger enemies and bosses. The kingdom is in your hands now, so do your best to keep it safe!

strike-force-heroes.name: Strike Force Heroes

Every single detail in this game –which spawned an equally acclaimed series of sequels- has been designed with extreme care, from its fabulous storyline to the engaging RPG elements that allow you to customize and improve your squad.

gun-mayhem-2.faq:
How can I avoid getting shot off the platform in Gun Mayhem 2?

Can I play Gun Mayhem 2 multiplayer?

papas-hotdoggeria.name: Papa's Hot Doggeria
papas-hotdoggeria.description: Papa’s Hot Doggeria is a casual restaurant game in which you serve hotdogs to baseball game spectators. Does that sound exciting? We thought so. Keep up with your customers' orders and deliver delicious dogs on time with various extras and toppings. Upgrade your doghouse to get higher scores.
papas-hotdoggeria.faq:
Why is Papa's Hot Doggeria not working?

There could be many reasons why the game isn't working.

  • To play Papa's Hot Doggeria, you must have a desktop PC and a supported web browser like Google Chrome or Firefox.
  • Clearing your browser cache and disabling any AdBlock software could help resolve issues.
  • Contact CrazyGames if Papa's Hot Doggeria still doesn't work for you.

How many ranks are there in Papa’s Hot Doggeria?

There are 59 ranks in Papa’s Hot Doggeria, compared to 44 in most other Papa’s games, except Papa's Cheeseria.

Where can I play Papa’s Hot Doggeria without Flash?

Thanks to emulation technologies, you can play Papa’s Hot Doggeria without Flash at CrazyGames.com. You do not need to download anything for it to work.
papas-hotdoggeria.controls: Use the left mouse button to interact.
papas-hotdoggeria.how_to_play:
The best seats in the house, they said

Well, hot diggity hotdog, they lied! Season tickets are sold out, but there’s still a way to get into the baseball game - working at Papa’s Hot Doggeria! However, in this case, you won’t keep your eyes on the ball. You’ll be keeping your eyes on the sausages. Sorry.

Grill those weiners

You might not have the view you envisioned when you took this job. But hey, grilling hotdogs can be fun, too. Grill your dogs perfectly and add any associated extras with style and grace.

The best creations will earn you the biggest tips and the highest scores across all your duties. You can use your earnings to purchase upgrades that improve your score and make the hotdog-turning lifestyle easier.

Sauce up that dog.

Don’t be afraid to cover your customer’s hotdog with a generous helping of sauce. There may also be other toppings requested, so make sure you don’t muck it up. There are particularly picky customers known as ‘closers’ who always show up one minute before closing time and make your life tricky. We all know the type.

Serve it with a chef’s kiss.

It’s a miracle you’ve successfully placed the dog in the bun. Now it’s time to serve any extra popcorn or beverages your customer ordered. The sounds in this game will make you feel baseball nostalgia or remind you of nights out at the movies. However, you are actually sitting at your computer playing Papa’s Hot Doggeria.

mine-blocks.name: Mine Blocks
mine-blocks.description: Mine Blocks is a 2D Minecraft fan action game originally released in Flash. You can now play the game again, as it’s been rebuilt in HTML5 and features regular updates from the development team. Explore, craft, and create a world of your imaginings in this open-world playground!
mine-blocks.faq:
Does Mine Blocks have multiplayer?

Yes, the game offers multiplayer mode. Team up with friends online to compete in a scavenger hunt, racing to find all 10 items in just 8 minutes before anyone else!

When did Mine Blocks come out?

Mine Blocks was released by Zanzlanz in November 2021.
mine-blocks.controls:
• Move your character with the WASD keys. Sprint by double-tapping A or D
  • Collect resources by clicking and holding on to nearby blocks or creatures. Use the right tools for the right job
  • Place blocks by selecting a block in your Hotbar and right-clicking on an empty space in the world
  • Open your inventory by pressing E. Here, you can craft items and equip armor
  • Use an item or eat food by selecting the item in your Hotbar and right-clicking and holding. You can review and change your controls in the settings menu.
mine-blocks.how_to_play:
Mine Blocks shares many features with Minecraft, including the cool pixelated visual style. However, the game also introduces entirely new ideas. Mine Blocks has two principal game modes: survival and creative. More recently, the "minigames" tab was added to feature new game modes.

Survival

Collect various materials to craft shelter, weapons, and sustenance. The materials combine with others to create new items. For example, using wood and stone to craft a wooden axe. See the crafting recipes on the official wiki for more. Shelter and weapons are necessary to fight hostile mobs such as creepers, spiders, and zombies.

Creative

Creative mode is a sandbox where you’re free to roam and have unlimited resources at your disposal. You won’t lose health or die, and you can fly around the map by double-tapping ‘W’ or ‘Space’ to place blocks, items, and mobs wherever you please. In this mode, you can use your imagination to build epic structures, cities, worlds, and everything else.

Join the scavenger hunt!

As of update 1.31, you can join your friends in online multiplayer and complete the scavenger hunt to find all 10 items in 8 minutes before someone else does!

madness-project-nexus.name: Madness Project Nexus
madness-project-nexus.description: To defeat Project Nexus and the Nexus Training Program, the first step is to break your agents out of jail in this stylish and violent shoot-and-hack 'em-up. Use the keyboard to move and the mouse to aim.

medieval-shark.name: Medieval Shark
medieval-shark.description: You are a shark back in medieval times, and your mission is to destroy everything! Cause havoc to all around you and take on the giant sea monster using keyboard controls.
medieval-shark.controls:
• Arrow keys to move
  • Ctrl or A to bite

scale-of-the-universe-2.name: Scale of the Universe 2
scale-of-the-universe-2.description: The Scale of the Universe 2 is an educational game in which you are shown the sizes of different things in our universe in relation to other different things. Slide your way into the largest objects that our universe has to offer, or into the smallest things that exist in our known universe. There are a lot of things to discover in this game, and you can click each one of them to find out more info about that specific object.
scale-of-the-universe-2.controls: Tap and hold/drag the bar at the bottom to either the left (to show smaller objects) or right (to show larger objects). You can also click/tap each object to reveal more info about them.

wonder-rocket.name: Wonder Rocket
wonder-rocket.description: Wonder Rocket is a rocket launching game to fly as high as possible. Try to beat your own height record and earn money to upgrade.
wonder-rocket.controls: Launch your rocket and use WASD or arrow keys to pick up bonuses before you run out of fuel.

sushi-go-round.name: Sushi Go Round
sushi-go-round.description: Sushi Go Round is an arcade game where you play as the chef at a sushi bar. Keep customers happy by serving the dishes they want. Each day has different goals, and remember, if customers start to get angry a little sake can help!
sushi-go-round.controls: Use the left mouse button to make some sushi.

feed-us-5.name: Feed Us 5
feed-us-5.description: Help the piranha escape! Eat victims down to the bone for more blood, solve puzzles, and try not to spend too much time out of water in this original and fun, mouse controlled eat-em-up with lots of gore!

run-ninja-run.name: Run Ninja Run
run-ninja-run.description: Escape your enemies by jumping and sliding over and under obstacles with the arrow keys, as you sprint along the 2D landscape, collecting gold to buy upgrades with on the way.

papas-cupcakeria.name: Papas Cupcakeria
papas-cupcakeria.description: Papa’s Cupcakeria is a casual restaurant game in which you work for Papa Louie, making tasty cupcakes for customers. Impress customers with your decorative cake-making skills and stay on top of orders as they increase daily. Help Papa turn this place into the hottest cupcake establishment in town!
papas-cupcakeria.faq:
Is Papa's Cupcakeria actually hard?

Papa's Cupcakeria is one of the easiest of all the Papa Louie Flipline Studios series. There are fewer moves to make in the baking station, which makes it substantially easier than other cooking stations.

Is there an online version of Papa's Cupcakeria?

Papa's Cupcakeria can be played online at CrazyGames.

How old is Papa's Cupcakeria?

Papa's Cupcakeria was announced on June 25, 2013, and officially released on August 7, 2013.
papas-cupcakeria.controls: Use the left mouse button to make a cupcake.

battalion-commander-2.name: Battalion Commander 2
battalion-commander-2.description: Battalion Commander 2 is an action shooting game where you must shoot your enemy and survive till the end of the stage to win the game. Complete all the missions and save your friends that are being captured by your enemy. Recruit them to help you in the battle. Good luck, soldier!
battalion-commander-2.controls: Move the mouse to control the soldiers and use the left mouse button to interact with the in-game UI.

raze-3.name: Raze 3
raze-3.description: Raze 3 is an action-packed game set in a post-apocalyptic world where humanity has taken to the skies after an alien invasion devastated Earth. Utilizing Express Training Programs, you must train soldiers to fight against various enemies, including aliens, robots, and zombies. With a wide range of weapons at your disposal, engage in intense battles and save the world from impending doom. Choose from different game modes, customize your character, and complete daily challenges for additional rewards. Upgrade your skills and equipment to enhance your chances of success. Experience the thrilling continuation of the beloved Raze series and determine the fate of Earth!
raze-3.controls:
• WASD / arrow keys = move character
  • Mouse = aim your weapon
  • Left click = shoot your weapon
  • 1-0 keys = toggle through weapons

super-smash-flash.name: Super Smash Flash
super-smash-flash.description: Super Smash Flash is based on the awesome Super Mario Bros series and allows you to compete in a variety of intense and fun fights with your favourite Super Mario World characters such as Mario, Luigi and Wario (plus some other Nintendo legends!). There are several different game modes including solo, online and group - you can fight alone, with friends, or even online against other players!
super-smash-flash.controls:
• WASD keys to move your character
  • UIOP keys to perform moves

run-3.name: Run 3
run-3.description: Explore outer space in Run 3. Run 3 is an incredibly addicting, endless runner-type action/platforming game in which you play as a little grey alien. The little alien is trespassing in an architecturally challenged area that is floating in space. After trespassing in the prohibited zone which is full of increasing amounts of dangerous holes, you run. If you fall into one of the holes, you will find yourself lost in space so make sure to watch your step!
run-3.controls:
• SPACE or UP Arrow = Jump
  • A or LEFT Arrow = Left
  • D or RIGHT Arrow = Right

spider-solitaire-2-suits.name: Spider Solitaire 2 Suits
spider-solitaire-2-suits.description: Spider Solitaire 2 Suits is a challenging Solitaire game limited to two suits and two decks of cards. Move the cards around the tableau so they are in order by suit and number. Take more cards from the pile if you get stuck. See if you can win at this tricky game!
spider-solitaire-2-suits.faq:
How difficult is Spider Solitaire 2 Suits?

It is one of the trickiest variations of Solitaire, as it features two decks of cards and two suits only.

How often can you win at Spider Solitaire 2 Suits?

It’s estimated you can win around only 1 in 3 games, with hardcore professional players winning about 50% of the time.

zombo-buster-rising.name: Zombo Buster Rising Remastered
zombo-buster-rising.description: Zombo Buster Rising is a remastered shooting defense game for modern browsers. As hordes of zombies continue to terrorize survivors, your mission is to protect the entrance by shooting them down. In contrast to the previous strategy, there is no need for complicated techniques - aim and fire. Join the fight against the undead and prove your shooting skills.
zombo-buster-rising.controls: Use the left mouse button to select the level, upgrade the items, and shoot the zombies.

papas-donuteria.name: Papa's Donuteria
papas-donuteria.description: Papa’s Donuteria is a casual restaurant game in which you build delicious donuts for customers. Learn how to roll and cut the dough, fry it, and serve the donuts with a variety of sweet and tasty toppings. The days only get busier, so learn to work fast without sacrificing quality!
papas-donuteria.faq:
Where can I play Papa's Donuteria for free?

You can play Papa's Donuteria for free at CrazyGames.

Does Papa's Donuteria end?

Yes, Papa Donuteria game does end at Rank 61.

Can you still play Papa's games?

Yes, you can! You can play Papa's Donuteria, along with numerous other Papa's games online for free at CrazyGames.
papas-donuteria.controls: Use the left mouse button to make the donut.

kitten-cannon.name: Kitten Cannon
kitten-cannon.description: Kitten Cannon is a casual game where you aim your cannon and launch the kitty as far as you can. There are many deadly objects along the way, so hopefully, it can land safely!
kitten-cannon.controls:
• Up or down arrow key = aim
  • Space = fire

clicker-heroes.name: Clicker Heroes
clicker-heroes.description: Clicker Heroes is an originalidle clicker game. Go on an epic adventure and slay monsters, upgrade heroes with the gold you collect, find treasures, and kill bosses. Clicker Heroes is a game that helped propel clicker games into the mainstream alongside other classics likeIdle Breakout.
clicker-heroes.faq:
Clicker Heroes guide

Clicker Heroes is an extensive clicker game with plenty to learn. You can find out about all the characters and bosses, as well as how to ascend and transcend by reading the guides on the Clicker Heroes wiki.

Features

  • Click to take down enemies
  • More than 1,000 zones to explore
  • Hire various warriors and buy unique upgrades
  • The original Clicker Heroes - back on the web

time-to-park.name: Time to Park
time-to-park.description: Time to Park is a fun and interesting car parking game. In this game, you must take control of a car from a top-down point of view and try to park it in a myriad of different spots. Your driving must be precise and you must line up in the parking spot perfectly! As you start out, the levels are easy, but the parking challenges become increasingly difficult.

kuja.name: Kuja
kuja.description: The guy in this game had too much to drink and wants to start a big fight in the Kuja club. Help him to swing his fists to knock down opponents.
kuja.controls:
• Player 1: Arrows keys to punch and jump.
  • Player 2: WAD keys to punch and jump.

speed-cards.name: Speed Cards
speed-cards.description: Speed Cards is the online card game in which you need to quickly organize a deck of cards into sequence order being higher or lower. In this game you are competing against the computer in a race. You will have a pile of cards in the middle of the screen and so will the AI.

skywire.name: Skywire
skywire.description: Skywire is an arcade game to help navigate the passenger's sky train through obstacles-filled tracks successfully.
skywire.controls:
Up arrow key = move forward

Down arrow key = move backward

bubble-spinner.name: Bubble Spinner
bubble-spinner.description: Bubble Spinner is a match-3 bubble shooter game with a twist. The bubbles are attached to a spinner that rotates when you fire bubbles at it. This adds a dimension of creativity to the gameplay that requires a different approach.
bubble-spinner.controls: Press the left mouse button to shoot the bubble.

scary-maze.name: Scary Maze
scary-maze.description: Scary Maze is the original, iconic Scary Maze game. Move masterfully around the retro maze levels being extra careful not to touch the edges. It requires great precision and skill. As with any maze, you never know what’s coming around the corner. This game might change your life.
scary-maze.faq:
What is the scary maze game called?

The original scary maze game developed by Jeremy Winterrowd in October 2004 and released in 2005 is called The Maze but is commonly referred to as the Scary Maze game.

Can you actually beat the Scary Maze game?

You can beat the Scary Maze game if you complete all levels. If you touch the walls at any level or take too long to complete a level, you will not get to the next round.

Who is the girl in the Scary Maze game?

The terrifying photo that appears when you touch a wall in Scary Maze is actress Linda Blair, who depicts the character Regan McNeil in the 1973 horror film The Exorcist.
scary-maze.how_to_play:
There’s nothing more terrifying than a maze. That’s why this game is called Scary Maze. The best way to play the game is to relax and slow it around the levels. That way, you’ll be able to advance quickly through the game.

Move the small square across the maze, and make sure you don't touch the walls. This is easy at first, but as the game progresses, the walls will get narrower. It's best to concentrate on level 3. It's a tough one.

We recommend turning the sound on for the best experience. You'll also get bonus points if you record a video of yourself or your friends playing the game.

More Maze Games

Are you wandering around aimlessly? Well, jump into a maze game from our casual collection and aim for the exit. Not all maze games have sinister undertones; most are quite satisfying. Maze Planet 3D features a complex labyrinth set to a beautiful backdrop. Nothing scary about that.

If you want to try some other popular games from our casual collection, have a go at House of Hazards, Snow Rider 3D, and Blob Opera.

Platform

Web browser

the-impossible-game.name: The Impossible Game
the-impossible-game.description: The Impossible Game is exactly what you would expect - a challenging game of skill, timing and precision in which you must control a square and attempt to jump over various objects at high speeds. Your square moves automatically and you simply control the jumping motion - you must time your jumps perfectly to avoid the various obstacles on each level.

rally-point-4.name: Rally Point 4
rally-point-4.description: Rally Point 4 is an offroad time-attack car racing game with unlimited nitro!

murder.name: Murder
murder.description: MURDER is a fun game of assassination. You wish to assassinate the king and take his place to rule over the kingdom. To start with, you must creep up behind the king and choose the opportune moment to strike and kill him. Once he is dispatched, you must quickly take his clothes and become the king yourself!
murder.controls: Hold the space bar to charge your stab and press the space bar to look behind.

keeper-of-the-grove-2.name: Keeper of the Grove 2
keeper-of-the-grove-2.description: Keeper of the Grove 2 is a tower defense game to protect your protons from being stolen by the enemies.
keeper-of-the-grove-2.controls: Use the left mouse button to interact.

boomerang-chang.name: Boomerang Chang
boomerang-chang.description: Standing on top of the famous Little Ninja Hill, Chang has been under attack for decades. But he is getting tired and now, he needs your help to survive... So let's help Chang by throwing boomerangs, a skill he masters like no one else does. But take care, because the biggest threat is... you! Try to take down as many enemies and survive as long as possible.
boomerang-chang.controls:
• Up arrow to jump
  • Right arrow to throw boomerang

minecraft-tower-defense.name: Minecraft Tower Defense
minecraft-tower-defense.description: How long can you survive against the hoard in Minecraft Tower Defense, a minecraft-inspired tower defense game?

mister-mine.name: Mr. Mine
mister-mine.description: Mr. Mine is an addictive idle mining clicker arcade game that puts you in charge of building a mining empire from the ground up! Start by drilling deep into the Earth’s crust, extracting valuable minerals and hidden treasures. With each click, you’ll uncover riches that can be sold to fund the expansion and upgrading of your mining operations. As your business grows, you’ll be able to unlock new technologies and hire workers to dig even deeper, inching ever closer to the Earth’s core.
mister-mine.faq:
How do I get tickets in Mr. Mine?

You can get tickets from the following places:

  • Caves (x1)
  • Quests
  • Trading (x1, x2)
  • Gold treasure chests
  • Excavations
  • Donating

How can I get building materials in Mr. Mine?

The main source for building materials is caves. You can get up to 10x BM per treasure, and there are multiple BM treasure spots per cave. You will also find building materials in chests and excavations.

swords-and-sandals-1.name: Swords and Sandals
swords-and-sandals-1.description: Swords and Sandals is a first-rate action game that you can play here on CrazyGames.com, free of charge. Swords and Sandals is unblocked. The game is built with HTML5 to work flawlessly in all modern browsers. One of the many features about playing Swords and Sandals on CrazyGames is that you can play it in full-screen. This page has a detailed controls section to get you started. That way, you can see how to play this game. It was developed by eGames. Did you like playing this action game? Then also play our otheraction gamesorSwords and Sandals 2andSpace Waves.
swords-and-sandals-1.faq:
Can you still play Swords and Sandals?

You can play Swords and Sandals for free in your web browser, no downloads required.

Where can I play the full version of Swords and Sandals?

You can play the full version for free at CrazyGames.

Do I need Flash to play Swords and Sandals?

Not anymore, our version is HTML5 and works in any modern web browser.

solitaire-frvr.name: Solitaire FRVR
solitaire-frvr.description: Solitaire FRVR is a great HTML5 solitaire game developed by Chris Benjaminsen.
solitaire-frvr.controls: Use your mouse to play Solitaire FRVR.

curveball.name: Curveball
curveball.description: This is a fabulous casual game. Check it out here in your browser, free of charge. You can play Curveball unblocked on CrazyGames. It has a detailed controls section to make it easier to play. That way, it is easy to see how to play this game. The game uses HTML5 technology to run smoothly in most browsers. You can play this game in full-screen mode to avoid any distractions. Did you like playing this game? Then also try our other casual games orSpace WavesandBloxd.io.

armed-with-wings-2.name: Armed With Wings 2
armed-with-wings-2.description: Armed With Wings 2 is the second episode of the fast-paced side-scrolling fighting game, Armed With Wings.

bloons.name: Bloons
bloons.description: Bloons is a fun arcade game in which you need to help the monkey to pop the balloons with its darts.

endless-war.name: Endless War
endless-war.description: Endless War is a top down shooter that puts you in the middle of World War II. You can play as some of the different countries that were part of the war, and experience it through different campaign missions. You have only one job - to win the war for your country.
endless-war.controls:
• WASD = Move
  • R = Reload
  • Q = Give order
  • G = Drop gun
  • Left mouse button = Shoot

free-rider.name: Free Rider
free-rider.description: Free Rider is a track-drawing and bike riding game.
free-rider.controls:
• Arrow keys to ride
  • X to to turn

swords-souls.name: Swords & Souls
swords-souls.description: Swords & Souls is an action game where you'll embark on a journey of heroism. Customize your hero's appearance and name before training them for battle. Engage in thrilling arena fights against other heroes, earning money to upgrade your skills and weapons. As you progress, you can enhance your hero's strength, defense, accuracy, and agility through various mini-games. Level up to unlock new abilities and moves. While battles involve automatic attacks, you have control over special and defensive skills. Can you rise as a legendary hero and conquer formidable magical creatures? Prepare for epic challenges and forge your path to greatness in Swords & Souls!
swords-souls.controls: Use the left mouse button and follow in-game instructions.

html5-lemmings.name: HTML5 Lemmings
html5-lemmings.description: HTML5 Lemmings is the up to date version of this classic retro arcade game that so many people loved. Lemmings are cute and lovable animals that unfortunately have suicidal tendencies! You must help these adorable creatures avoid an early grave and direct them safely through each level - stop them from falling to their doom and create a safe path for them.
html5-lemmings.controls: Use the left mouse button to assign an ability.

donut-vs-donut.name: Donut vs Donut
donut-vs-donut.description: Donut vs Donut is a fast paced local multiplayer game featuring explosive donuts. It can be played with up to 4 players and the goal is to survive as the last donut in the ring. The game is made by Antti Salama, and if you like it you should consider buying the iOS version (see the button below). Good luck!
donut-vs-donut.controls: Press the associated character's button or left-click on it to move forward.

la-shark.name: LA Shark
la-shark.description: Our blood-thirsty shark has come to the West Coast. Help him on his rampage off the coast in LA Shark, in places such as Malibu, Santa Monica, Muscle Beach, and more.

i-dont-even-know.name: I Don't Even Know
i-dont-even-know.description: Which men stole the cookie? It is up to you to find out in this crazy but hilarious adventure game!
i-dont-even-know.controls: Use your mouse to play I Don't Even Know.

geometry-dash-online.name: Geometry Game
geometry-dash-online.description: Geometry Dash Online is a free side-scrollingplatformerplayed in sync withmusical rhythms. Groove your way over and under obstacles to keep the musical momentum alive. If you slip up, it’s back to the beginning!
geometry-dash-online.faq:
Where can I play Geometry Dash for free?

You can play a free web version of Geometry Dash on this page at CrazyGames.com.

When did Geometry Dash come out?

The first Geometry Dash game was released on 13 August 2013 for mobile devices.
geometry-dash-online.controls:
• SPACE/UP Arrow = Jump
  • HOLD DOWN SPACE/UP Arrow = Multi-jump
  • UP Arrow = Steer vehicle up
  • DOWN Arrow = Steer vehicle down
  • Don't touch the spikes, or you will have to restart!

smarty-bubbles.name: Smarty Bubbles
smarty-bubbles.description: Smarty Bubbles is a match-3 bubble shooting game with fun and relaxing gameplay. Shoot the bubbles at the matching colors and enjoy popping them all away. Your urge to pop bubbles will be satisfied by playing this game for free, here.
smarty-bubbles.faq:
What kind of game is Smarty Bubbles?

Smarty Bubbles can be considered a classic bubble shooter game which adheres to familiar puzzle rules.

Can I play Smarty Bubbles on my phone?

Yes, you can! Smarty Bubbles is available to play on mobile and desktop.

Is Smarty Bubbles free?

Yes, you can play Smarty Bubbles for free at CrazyGames.
smarty-bubbles.how_to_play:
Shoot Bubbles

You’re given a bubble. You aim that bubble. You fire. Preferably, you fire the bubble towards bubbles that look the same. That's what you need to do in order to pop the bubbles. Match 3, and you get the sweet satisfaction of removing a group of same-colored bubbles all at once. It's especially magical when you pop a big group of them.

Enjoy the Ambiance

The sound effects and music work together to create the ideal experience for a bubble-shooting enthusiast. You can choose from a selection of four musical tracks any time you want to shift the mood.

Play Endlessly

Some bubble shooting games feature a multitude of easy levels. Not Smarty Bubbles. This game is the classic ‘endless’ type and is quite challenging compared to similar games.

Tips

The bubbles move further down the screen, so you have to pop faster and not allow one side to be overwhelmed with a high quantity of multi-colored bubbles. Try to pop evenly and go for the biggest clusters. You can also bounce the bubbles off the walls to get into hard-to-reach locations, often referred to as bubble ravines.

More Games Like This

There’s an array of casual games to choose from on CrazyGames. Some fun games worth a play are Eggy Car and Good Doggo and if you're in the mood for some Friday dance fun, try Friday Night Funkin.

Features

  • Relaxing gameplay and aesthetic
  • A choice of four pieces of music
  • Challenging gameplay format
  • Detailed stats on your completed games

Platform

Web browser (desktop and mobile)

Developer

Smarty Bubbles was developed by Famobi.

Platform

Web browser (desktop and mobile)

speed-racing-pro-2.name: Speed Racing Pro 2
speed-racing-pro-2.description: Choose your favorite racing car (a LaFerrari, anyone?) and get ready to race your opponents. Either directly in a regular race, or in an elimination race. You can also choose Time Attack mode. Have fun with this amazing car racing game!
speed-racing-pro-2.controls: Use the arrow keys to drive your car, and spacebar to use the hand brake.

google-feud.name: Google Feud
google-feud.description: Google Feud is a casual game where you must guess part of a Google query. There are 10 answers for each question, presented in a quiz format similar to Family Feud. Like the hit quiz show, you have 3 guesses, so use them wisely!
google-feud.faq:
How do you play Google Feud?

Think about what the most likely search phrases are and take a guess at finishing the query.

What is Google Feud?

Google Feud is a Google guessing game where you guess the ten most commonly searched phrases. Much like Family Feud, you're allowed 3 incorrect guesses.

Does Google Feud have an app?

There is no official app for Google Feud. It can easily be played in your web browser on desktop or mobile.

Is Google Feud multiplayer?

There is currently no online multiplayer mode in Google Feud.
google-feud.controls: Use your mouse and keyboard to play.
google-feud.how_to_play:
The challenge

If you think you know people - think again. Google Feud is a challenging quiz game that’s easy to play but difficult to master. Many answers will surprise, shock, and amuse you as you determine what people are searching for and why.

Choose a category

Google Feud features four categories: culture, people, names, and questions. One round consists of one query and three guesses. After that, you can pick a new category or stick with the existing one.

Play the game

Each correct guess is awarded with several points between 1,000 - 9,000. If you make 3 incorrect guesses, the round is over, and you don’t score any points. Think carefully about your choices.

Google Feud answers

If you’re looking for answers to Google Feud, searching the partial phrase in Google and looking at the autocomplete options can give you several hints.

stickman-army-the-defenders.name: Stickman Army: The Defenders
stickman-army-the-defenders.description: The green army is fighting the red army in an epic battle... Defend the White House at all costs and become victorious!

moto-x3m-4.name: Moto X3M 4 Winter
moto-x3m-4.description: Moto X3M 4 Winter is a driving game, the fourth trial bike game in the addictive Moto X3M series. In this installment ofMoto X3M, you’ll be venturing through an icy road packed with 15+ new levels. Do stunts, break records, and enjoy the scenery in this fuel-soaked winter wonderland!
moto-x3m-4.faq:
Is there a Moto X3M 4?

Moto X3M 4, also known as Moto X3M Winter, was developed by MadPuffers and released in November 2018.

What is the latest game in Moto X3M?

The latest game in Moto X3M is Moto X3M 6: Spooky Land.

How long has the Moto X3M been around?

The first Moto X3M game was released in 2016 by MadPuffers.

How many levels are in Moto X3M Winter?

There are 25 levels in Moto X3M Winter.
moto-x3m-4.controls:
W or up arrow to accelerate

S or down arrow to brake

A or left arrow to tilt left

D or right arrow to tilt right

Space bar to continue race
moto-x3m-4.how_to_play:
Tackle obstacles

To play Moto X3M 4 Winter, use the arrow keys to accelerate and brake. Drive your stunt bike through a series of ramps, loops, and obstacles. The game is based on trial and error, but the fewer mistakes you make, the better your score will be. Play cautiously but move quickly.

Time your stunts

Time your flips and knock 0.5 seconds off your time with each flip. Avoid crashing to get the most stars. If you crash, you can easily restart the track using the arrow in the top left of the screen.

Unlock more levels

There are 25 winter-themed tracks to enjoy in Moto X3M 4 Winter. With each track comes new challenges and more complex tracks to navigate through that will test your ability to complete the track in good time. Due to this, the levels are very replayable!

Buy new bikes

The faster you complete a track, the more stars you’ll earn. You can then use those stars to buy new motorbikes in the bike store!

slenderina-must-die.name: Slendrina Must Die: The Cellar
slenderina-must-die.description: You searched the house and found 8 pieces of painting. But then Slenderman knocked you out. You now know the secret of Slendrina, and you can't leave the house... If you want to leave this place alive, you will need to find 8 books. Good luck in Slenderina Must Die: The Cellar Room.

nail-doctor.name: Nail Doctor
nail-doctor.description: Those feet are in terrible shape... Fix them in Nail Doctor!

3d-moto-simulator-2.name: 3D Moto Simulator 2
3d-moto-simulator-2.description: 3D Moto Simulator 2 is an awesome and fast-paced motorbike racing game in which you can test your driving skills on a series of cool cross and trials bikes. Choose your motorbike and then jump on and enter the map! Different bikes available include cross bikes, trials bikes, or even a powerful police bike!
3d-moto-simulator-2.controls:
• 123 to change bike
  • Space bar to use handbrake
  • WASD or arrow keys to drive
  • C to change camera
  • Shift to use nitro
  • R to reset game
  • G to reset bike
  • E to use police lights

classic-bowling.name: Classic Bowling
classic-bowling.description: Enjoy yourself with this classic bowling game. Try to hit as many pins as you can!

3d-car-simulator.name: 3D Car Simulator
3d-car-simulator.description: 3D Car Simulator is a very fun, fast-paced car driving simulator that allows you to test and show off your driving skills. Choose from one of three maps and select a rally car, a police car or an old car and hit the roads at breakneck speeds! Explore the highly detailed 3D environments in fast, exciting cars and put your driving skills to the ultimate test! Buckle up and prepare to dominate the roads!
3d-car-simulator.controls:
• WASD or arrow keys to drive
  • Space bar to use handbrake
  • C to change camera
  • Shift to change car
  • R to reset car
  • E to turn on/off police car's lights

pinturillo.name: Pinturillo 2
pinturillo.description: Pinturillo 2 is a free online drawing game inspired by Pictionary. In the game, you draw a picture based on the word that is given to you, or you guess what the other player is drawing. Draw your best picture to give others a chance to guess correctly!
pinturillo.faq:
Do I need to be good at drawing to play Pinturillo?

You can play Pinturillo no matter your skill level! Drawing on a computer can be tricky.

How do I remove someone from my game in Pinturillo?

You can vote another player out of the game if they are not playing by the rules.

basket-champs.name: Basket Champs
basket-champs.description: Basket Champs is a fun basketball game! Pick your favorite team and compete in the tournament by scoring more points than your opponents.

algerian-solitaire.name: Algerian Solitaire
algerian-solitaire.description: Algerian Solitaire is a variation on the classic Solitaire (or Patience, as it is also known) card game. It is played using two decks of card, and the rules are quite complex. You can find themon Wikipedia. This game was developed by Ravalmatic.

jewel-academy.name: Jewel Academy
jewel-academy.description: Jewel Academy is a fun puzzle game withmatch-threeelements – this is a classic match-three game and offers simple gameplay, cool graphics, and challenging tasks. In each different level you are presented with a grid of colored gems – you must match three or more of the same colored gem together to make them disappear and to continue the flow and to increase your score.

rooftop-snipers.name: Rooftop Snipers
rooftop-snipers.description: Rooftop Snipers is a chaotic two-button action sniper game where you can only shoot and jump. You can play the game with a friend or on the computer. It’s one of our many amazing two-player games you can play with friends!
rooftop-snipers.faq:
Can I play Rooftop Snipers on mobile?

Currently the game is only available to play on desktop via your web browser.

Can I play Rooftop Snipers with another person?

Yes, the game supports local 2-player gameplay.

Who created Rooftop Snipers?

Rooftop Snipers was created by New Eich Games, along with other popular titles like Getaway Shootout and Ping Pong Chaos.
rooftop-snipers.controls:
Player 1 Controls

  • W to jump
  • E to shoot

Player 2 Controls

  • I to jump
  • O to shoot
rooftop-snipers.how_to_play:
Knock your opponent off the ledge

Find a friend to play with, or practice by playing against the computer. The game is simple but frustrating due to the limited movement, which makes it fun to play. To win the round, you have to push your opponent off by shooting them.

Play in various environments

Rooftop Snipers features a range of environments, many of which incorporate other physical elements to add more chaos to the gameplay.

Instructions

Jump with W to dodge shots. Hold E to raise your weapon and let go of it to shoot. The player who first reaches 5 wins the game.

basketball-frvr.name: Basketball FRVR
basketball-frvr.description: Basketball FRVR is a great new basketball game that you can play on any device. This Basketball Hoop Shooter is simple to learn but a lot of fun. There is no time limit in the game, but the moving basket is a challenge even for experienced players! This means that you can play Basketball FRVR for as long as you want. There are bonus points if you don't hit the rim. The game is made by Chris Benjaminsen. Have fun!

love-tester-3.name: Love Tester
love-tester-3.description: Love Tester is an online game that analyses how compatible you and your crush are. Just fill out your name and your crush's name and get your score. Will you and your crush match 100%? There is only one way to find out.
love-tester-3.faq:
Is Love Tester game real?

The Love Tester game is not real; it's just fun and entertaining, not a genuine measure of love or compatibility.

Does Love Tester matter if you want a relationship to form?

Like any game, Love Tester is meant to be a fun way to pass the time. It does not contribute to relationship development and should not be considered. Healthy relationships require much more than a Love Tester high score.

Are there any matches in Love Tester that get 100%?

Yes, there are. Exploring what they are is all part of the fun. One 100% match to test is Alsa and Alsa, the others you will have to uncover as you go.
love-tester-3.controls: Use the left mouse button to select the name field and start the calculation. Use your keyboard to write the names.
love-tester-3.how_to_play:
Forget about feelings; true love is a numbers game. Just pop your name into the box, then enter your crush’s name, and you’ll see if you really were made for each other!

This is one of those casual games you can spend hours on without even realizing it. At first, you're likely to add your crush's name, then your ex's name, then the person who works at the coffee shop's name, until you realize you've exhausted all real options. Now that you know you and the barista are meant to be, the game gets fun.

Try adding celebrity names. Were Brad and Jen really meant to be? Love Tester knows. Are Taylor and Travis going to last? Love Tester knows. Once you've exhausted all celebrities, be creative.

You don't have to use proper names to test love. See if your neighbor and muffins are a match; if so, you know what to surprise them with next time you meet.

100% Matches

You may be wondering if any matches truly are a match made in heaven with a score of 100%. Yes, there are. Just like love, you need to search for it. A few names worth trying to match Heartbreaker with Hearthealer and, oddly, Asla and Asla. You may find that perfect match.

drift-hunters.name: Drift Hunters
drift-hunters.description: Drift Hunters is a free-to-play car 3D game that lets you experience the art of drifting with an impressive range of tuned-up cars and dynamic tracks. Choose from a wide selection of customizable rides, fine-tune your engine, and hit the gas as you glide around corners and perfect your drift technique in 10 unique and challenging locations. Get ready to leave your mark on the asphalt, literally!
drift-hunters.faq:
How to change gears in Drift Hunters?

To change gears in Drift Hunters, use the left shift key to shift up and the left control keys to shift down gears.

What is the most expensive car on Drift Hunters?

The most expensive car in Drift Hunters is the Porsche 911 GT (993).

What is the fastest car on Drift Hunters?

The Nissan GT-R (R25) is the fastest car on Drift Hunters.

Is Drift Hunters free-to-play?

Drift Hunters is fully free-to-play on desktop, Android and iOS. It can be found on CrazyGames.
drift-hunters.controls:
• Use the WASD or arrows keys to steer the car
  • Use the space as the handbrake
  • Use C to change the camera position
  • Use left shift to shift up gears
  • Use left Ctrl to shift down gears
drift-hunters.how_to_play:
You start Drift Hunters by choosing your car and type of ride. You can upgrade the performance, including the brakes, weight, gearbox, turbo, and engine, with superior parts. You can also finish off your car in any color and enjoy a selection of rims on the house.

Race Tracks: Drift through diverse circuits like Nishuri, Stadium, Tyshen, and more. Each track offers a unique layout with varied curves and turns, challenging your drifting skills to the max.

Cars: Rack up at least 8,500 points to start unlocking cars, with the top model costing over 134k points. Every drift and upgrade gets you closer to that dream ride!

Drift Hunters available cars

  • BMW M3
  • Toyota Supra
  • Honda S2000
  • Ford Fiesta ST
  • Nissan 370Z coupe
  • Dodge Challenger Hellcat
  • Nissan GTR
  • Porsche 911 GT
  • And 18 more cars...

Parts & Upgrades: Customize your vehicle’s performance with upgrades to brakes, weight, gearbox, turbo, and engine.

Tuning: Adjust your car’s fine-tuning settings—including front and rear camber, offset, brake balance, height, and brake pressure—to perfect your drift style even without additional upgrades.

Visuals: Express your style by changing the color of your car’s body and rims, and choose from a variety of rim designs to complete your look. Every car you buy can be fully tuned — turbo, brake balance, front camber, rear offset, and more. You can fully modify these values to find the best tuning for your drift performance.

Some tracks allow you to keep drifting much easier than others. The best tracks for drifting in Drift Hunters 2 are Emashi and Forest because of their long corners and lack of too many sharp turns. The Forest track has the longest corners for the most prolonged drifts.

The longer you drift, the more your points multiplier increases. You can use the points to buy exotic motors like the high-performance Porsche 911 GT. There are 26 fully customizable cars available to buy in total. 

Drift Hunters has a smooth arcade-racer feel but isn’t constrained to a racing format. Instead, you can blaze your own trail in several locations, racking up points to buy new cars and upgrades. The graphics are great for the web, but you can play the game on low-spec devices without a hiccup. It’s a must-play for drift enthusiasts!

Tips

  • Use acceleration cautiously when approaching corners mid-drift
  • Drift from side to side on straight roads to keep the drift alive
  • Tune up your vehicles to find the sweet spot for maximum drift
  • Drive on maps with plenty of space for long, uninterrupted drifting

clash-of-vikings.name: Clash of Vikings
clash-of-vikings.description: Clash of Vikings is a strategic battle game where you summon Vikings to fight a single enemy. Place your units tactically using your elixir points and try to destroy the enemy’s towers before they bring you down.
clash-of-vikings.controls:
Instructions

Use the left mouse button to drag troops into position.

kogama-world-racing.name: Kogama: World Racing
kogama-world-racing.description: The Kogama series is back with a thrilling racing game. Choose your vehicle and compete against other players on a very challenging blocky 3D track. You can go as fast as you want, but be careful of the sharp turns and jumping platforms; if you land with a very high speed, your vehicle can be destroyed and you will need to continue on foot! There are side games to be played as well, including a PvP battle where you can choose different weapons to eliminate other players. Have fun with Kogama: World Racing!

battleship.name: Battleship
battleship.description: Battleship is a classic two-player naval strategy game that you can play for free in your web browser. You are the commanding officer of an elite fleet of battleships at war with an equally capable enemy. Take turns to fire on your opponent's territory using an array of ranged weaponry.
battleship.faq:
When was the game Battleship invented?

The official board game was released in 1967. However, it has been played as a pad-and-pencil game since the 1930s.

Where can I play Battleship online?

You can play Battleship for free on the web at CrazyGames. No board game required!
battleship.controls: Use the left mouse button to play.

burnout-drift.name: Burnout Drift
burnout-drift.description: Burnout Drift is a drifting game in our driving category featuring a range of custom cars and tracks. Choose your ride, take it to the streets, and earn money for your drifting skills. Use your cash to customize your car and buy epic new motors to take around the tracks.
burnout-drift.faq:
Is this the original Burnout Drift?

BoneCracker Game's Burnout Drift is the original web game. However, there are other classic games with the same name.

How many cars are in Burnout Drift?

There are 12 customizable cars ranging from muscle cars to supercars!
burnout-drift.controls:
• W or up arrow to gas
  • S or down arrow to brake
  • AD or left/right arrow to steer
  • Left shift/left ctrl to gear up/down
  • Space bar to handbrake
  • F to use NOS
  • G to enter slow motion
  • I to start/stop the engine
  • L to use low-beam headlights
  • K to use high-beam headlights
  • C to change the camera
burnout-drift.how_to_play:
The first car you start with is a Ford Mustang, but there are drifting classics like the Nissan 350z to pick-ups and supercars like the Bugatti Veyron. You can buy these powerhouse vehicles when you earn enough. You can use the money you earn from doing awesome drifts to buy new cars.

Manage your speed and steering to keep your car drifting. Balancing acceleration and braking helps maintain longer drifts, which earn more points.

There are three excellent tracks to zoom your latest set of wheels around in Burnout Drift.

  • Rocky Pass is a typical mountain track with plenty of tricky turns and long corners — it’s a great middle-ground track.
  • Ridge is a wide city road - probably the best track for drifting once you get into it.
  • Winter Pass is a little tougher, featuring snow that slows you down and causes additional sliding.

Tips

  • The easiest track to drift and earn money on is Ridge
  • The longer you keep up the same drift, the quicker you’ll earn points
  • Crashing will cause you to lose all your drift points, so be careful!
  • The cars all have unique characteristics, some better than others

Features

  • Earn money for drifting your whip
  • Adjust the tuning of your vehicle to find the perfect balance
  • Buy from a range of supercars, streetcars, and trucks
  • Kit up your vehicle with new wheels and colors

abobos-big-adventure.name: Abobo's Big Adventure
abobos-big-adventure.description: Abobo is possibly the angriest 8-bit character on the internet, and he is truly enraged when his son, Aboboy is kidnapped by evil gangsters! Can you help Abobo rescue his son and destroy practically everything in his path? Throughout this fun and exciting game, you will bump into various Nintendo characters such as Donkey Kong and Goomba, and Abobo truly is a fantastic piece of nostalgia.

drift-runner-3d.name: Drift Runner 3D
drift-runner-3d.description: Drift Runner 3D is a fast-paced and car drifting simulation game! You control a car and can freely explore a big city. When you get tired of driving in the city you can escape to the nearby hills. Do awesome drifts in sharp turns and let that green smoke come out! The game doesn't have races or missions, so it's just about practicing your drifting skills and having fun. You can change the camera to get a different view. So, what are you waiting for? Tighten that seatbelt and start the engines!

space-company.name: Space Company
space-company.description: For years man has dreamed of returning to space. As the head of a space exploration company, you must help realize this dream! At the foundation of your business is the collection of metal, gems, and wood. These three materials will help build your spaceship. You can manually collect these materials, but you can also buy auto-miners that periodically collect each item.

monster-hospital.name: Monster Hospital
monster-hospital.description: You are a doctor, but you do not treat humans… your patients are monsters! You must cure them of various ailments such as broken teeth and infected organs. You can choose which sickness you cure first, and you cure your patients by completing various mini-games.

offroad-dirt-racing-3d.name: Offroad Dirt Racing 3D
offroad-dirt-racing-3d.description: Forget about Formula 1 or Motorbike racing, jump inside your dirt buggy instead and race around the track at break-neck speeds! Offroad 3D Dirt Racing is a fun racing simulator that lets you compete against three other opponents in 3 laps of fun filled and action packed racing.
offroad-dirt-racing-3d.controls:
• WASD or arrow keys to drive
  • C to rotate camera

doge-miner-2.name: Doge Miner 2
doge-miner-2.description: Doge Mineris back in this fantastic sequel – Doge Miner 2! The mission remains the same: to purchase a spaceship and blast off to the moon, but you now have an increase amount of tools, upgrades and options at your disposal. Doge Miner 2 builds upon the fun mechanisms and gameplay of the original title and adds extras features for your enjoyment.
doge-miner-2.controls: Left click to mine and buy upgrade.

little-alchemy-2.name: Little Alchemy 2
little-alchemy-2.description: Little Alchemy 2 is an intuitive online crafting game developed by Recloak. The aim is to combine elements to create new ones. Start by mixing Earth, air, fire, and water to produce new elements. Discover over 700 items and unlock the recipes to time, matter, and the Universe!
little-alchemy-2.faq:
Alchemy Combinations

  • Fire + Mist = Air
  • Earth + Air = Dust
  • Earth + Fire = Lava
  • Earth + Lava = Volcano
  • Fire + Stone = Metal

Little Alchemy Tips

  • Click the "hints" button in-game to get Little Alchemy tips
  • Check out the Fandom page for more in-depth knowledge
  • Combine elements creatively - some combos make more sense than others!
little-alchemy-2.how_to_play:
Combine the elements

Simply drag items you want to combine from the menu on the right into the middle screen. Then, drag one object onto the other to try and combine them both.

Track your recipes

A valid combination rewards you with new items and provides the recipe in the encyclopedia. You can use the encyclopedia to track your progress and read about the items you've discovered.

Clean your canvas

Being an alchemist will start to get messy, thankfully there's also a "clean up" button located in the top left to clear your canvas. The search feature in the top right is also handy when you're losing track of your creations!

Alchemy Combinations

Recloak is constantly updating Little Alchemy 2 with new items to craft. There are currently over 700 items.

Some combinations will be more evident than others, and there are often more ways than one to create a new item. Some combinations rely on logic and others require more creative, out-of-the-box thinking. Here are some basic creations so you understand how Little Alchemy works:

  • Fire + Mist = Air
  • Earth + Air = Dust
  • Earth + Fire = Lava
  • Earth + Lava = Volcano
  • Fire + Stone = Metal

These are all logical combinations. However, some combos don't seem as obvious, like water + horse creating a hippo. Sometimes you have to think outside the box and mix elements you wouldn't expect to create anything.

Little Alchemy Tips

  • Click the 'hints' button in-game to get Little Alchemy tips
  • Check out the Fandom page for more in-depth knowledge
  • Combine elements creatively - some combos make more sense than others!

Similar Games

If you enjoy combining materials and mixing ingredients, check out our Science and Logic games for more challenging titles to occupy your intellect.

Features

  • Over 700 items to craft
  • Unique discoveries to be made
  • Logical and creative solutions
  • Relaxing gameplay with chill music

Developer

Recloak develops Little Alchemy 2. Check out the original Little Alchemy, for more creative challenges!

Available Game Platforms

This game is developed in HTML5 and is available in your browser, on all your devices (including mobile devices and tablets!).

duck-life-space.name: Duck Life: Space
duck-life-space.description: Duck Life: Space is a duckracing gamewith a galactic story and theme. An alien from outer space has nabbed your trophy, and you need to go on a quest through space to get it back! Enjoy a plethora of new mini-games and races along the way.

free-rally.name: Free Rally
free-rally.description: Free Rally game - exciting rally driving experience. Free Rally is an intense and frantic 3D car driving game in which you have the freedom to explore an immense cityscape in a variety of different vehicles. You can choose from eight different vehicles including a Bus, a Sedan, a BMW, and a Dune Buggy. Each vehicle has different controls and handles in a different manner so choose one to your liking, or indeed try out everyone!
free-rally.controls:
• WASD or arrow keys to drive
  • F to use nitro
  • C to change camera
  • R to use horn
  • Space bar to use handbrake
  • I to start or turn off engine
  • QEZ to use turn lights
  • K and L to control headlights

rocking-sky-trip.name: Rocking Sky Trip
rocking-sky-trip.description: Rocking Sky Trip is an exciting endless running game in which you must control a rolling ball through a series of platforms and obstacles. This might sound easy, but the gameplay is fast-paced and the obstacles come thick and fast. If you hit any obstacle on the level then you have to restart – your reactions have to be really quick and you have to keep moving and swerving at all times!
rocking-sky-trip.controls:
• Press anything to start rolling
  • AD or left and right arrow keys to move the ball

bus-and-subway-runner.name: Bus and Subway Runner
bus-and-subway-runner.description: Bus and Subway Runner is a cool endless runner game in which you run through… wait for it… a subway while avoiding buses! You are enjoying a beautiful sunny day in the city on your hoverboard, but a police car spots you and starts to chase you! You have one option – to flee to the subway to avoid being captured!
bus-and-subway-runner.controls:
• Press left arrow or A to move left
  • Press right arrow or D to move right
  • Press up arrow or W to jump
  • Press down arrow or S to slide
  • Press left mouse button twice to use a hoverboard

basket-monsterz.name: Basket Monsterz
basket-monsterz.description: Basket Monsterz is an awesome basketball shooting game with fun cartoon monster characters! You can play as a wide range of monsters including Satan and Bigfoot. Get in the game and see if you can win.
basket-monsterz.controls: Move your mouse to aim, left click to shoot.

defend-your-castle.name: Defend Your Castle
defend-your-castle.description: Defend your castle is a brilliant stickman defense game brought to you by XGenStudios who are also responsible for Stick Arena Dimensions. You own a castle and must defend it from attacking soldiers – you must pick up a soldier and drop them from the sky or throw them through the air to kill them. You must move quickly, click carefully and keep throwing your enemies away!
defend-your-castle.controls: Hold left mouse button to pick up a stickman, move them higher, and release to drop.

stickman-army-the-resistance.name: Stickman Army: The Resistance
stickman-army-the-resistance.description: Stickman Army: The Resistance is a cool fighting defense game in which you must control two stickmen soldiers and try to survive for as long as possible. Each stickman character covers one side of their defensive tower and you must switch between both defenders to prevent your position from being overrun. You start with basic weapons and defenses and you must unlock new equipment as you progress.

grand-action-simulator-new-york-car-gang.name: Grand Action Simulator: New York
grand-action-simulator-new-york-car-gang.description: Grand Action Simulator: New York Car Gang is an awesome open world crime game with similarities to the popular GTA series. You must take the role of a ruthless criminal with city-wide aspirations – he wants to rule a crime empire and take over NYC using any means necessary. Explore the cityscape and collect money using whatever methods you feel are appropriate.
grand-action-simulator-new-york-car-gang.controls:
• WASD or arrow keys: move
  • T: open nearby garage
  • Left click: shoot or punch
  • Space bar: jump
  • Left shift: run
  • X: switch weapon
  • F: open car
  • R: open nearby shop
  • G: grenade
  • Z: switch grenade
  • C: switch vehicle camera

Garbage truck controls

  • Pitchfork up: Z
  • Pitchfork down: X
  • Dump start: Q
  • Dump end: E
  • Lift container: space bar

crazy-pig-simulator.name: Crazy Pig Simulator
crazy-pig-simulator.description: Crazy Pig Simulator is an epic game of havoc in which you must control a crazed pig and try to cause as much devastation and destruction in the city as possible! Your pig has super strength and can easily destroy objects and throw them out of his way! Monitor your pigs health bar carefully however as he will take damage from people and vehicles. Don’t forget to use the pig’s jetpack to move around the city quickly!
crazy-pig-simulator.controls:
• WASD or arrow keys to move
  • Space bar to jump
  • Left click to attack

virtual-piano.name: Virtual Online Piano
virtual-piano.description: Virtual Online Piano is exactly what you would expect - a virtual representation of a full-sized digital keyboard that you can play to your heart's content. This is a great way to learn music and to have some fun trying out different songs.Can't play piano? We've got you covered. Check outFriday Night Funkin'and put your keyboarding skills to the test!.
virtual-piano.controls:
• Keyboard and mouse
  • White tiles: caps lock, A, S, D, F, G, H, J, K, L, ;, ', and left arrow key
  • Black tiles: Q, W, R, T, Y, I, O, [, ], and enter key

License

MIT License

slightly-annoying-traffic.name: Slightly Annoying Traffic
slightly-annoying-traffic.description: Slightly Annoying Traffic is a fun and exciting traffic management game (yes traffic management can be fun!). You must take up the role of a traffic manager and take care of an intersection of traffic and ensure that all vehicles can cross the intersection safely without crashing! To control the traffic you must click on individual vehicles to stop them in their tracks.
slightly-annoying-traffic.controls: Left click to make a vehicle stop.

the-idiot-test.name: The Idiot Test
the-idiot-test.description: The Idiot Test is the first instalment of this fun and entertaining game. In this game, you must progress through various levels of idiocy and prove that you actually have some mental brain power! Answer a range of logical and tricky questions to progress through the game and reach higher and more prestigious levels of idiot!

moto-rider-3d.name: Moto Rider 3D
moto-rider-3d.description: Moto Rider 3D is an awesome free-roaming motorbike game in which you can explore a vast 3D world in a range of different cool and powerful bikes. This game breaks the mould of usual motorbike games in which you race against other competitors or against the clock and instead allows you to free ride.
moto-rider-3d.controls:
• WASD or arrow keys to ride
  • Shift to use nitro
  • C to change camera
  • Space bar to use handbrake

robot-unicorn-attack-heavy-metal.name: Robot Unicorn Attack: Heavy Metal
robot-unicorn-attack-heavy-metal.description: Robot Unicorn Attack: Heavy Metal is an awesome and intense game in which you must control an epic robot unicorn and guide it through the hellish fantasy land. Your unicorn moves forward automatically – you must simply control the creatures jumping ability and power dashes. You must time your jump and dashes perfectly and avoid crashing into any objects or falling off of the platforms.
robot-unicorn-attack-heavy-metal.controls:
• Z to jump, click twice to double jump
  • X to use Dash of Death

city-car-driving-simulator-2.name: City Car Driving Simulator 2
city-car-driving-simulator-2.description: City Car Driving Simulator 2 is the second instalment of this fantastic 3D driving game. If you love racing and unlimited driving, you will surely enjoy this title! Before you start racing you can choose your vehicle – choose from a range of different super cars and sports cars – all with powerful engines and awesome controls.
city-car-driving-simulator-2.controls:
• WASD or arrow keys to drive
  • Space bar to handbrake
  • F to use nitro
  • Hold G to enter slow motion view
  • C to change camera

bowmaster-prelude.name: Bowmaster Prelude
bowmaster-prelude.description: Bowmaster Prelude is one of the original browser games and was released over 10 years ago! This title is still as awesome as it was back then and the gameplay is addictive and fun. You must defend your castle from waves of incoming enemies and also try to attack the enemy castle. You control a brave Bowmaster and you must manually fire arrows at the incoming knights and warriors. Take into consideration the angle and power of your bow shots and also the movement of the enemies.

fl-tron.name: FL Tron
fl-tron.description: FL Tron is an awesome arcade game that combines aspects of the iconic snake game together with the iconic Tron movies and games. During each level you must control your very own Tron style snake and try to outwite your opponent and box them in - you must try and surround them and force them to crash!

fox-simulator-3d.name: Fox Simulator 3D
fox-simulator-3d.description: Fox Simulator 3D is an awesome simulation game in which you can take control of a beautiful 3D fox! You are free to roam the island as you see fit and explore to your hearts content. You must try and complete various tasks however, collect food and build up your strength.
fox-simulator-3d.controls:
• WASD or arrow keys to move
  • Left click to attack
  • Space bar to jump
  • Shift to run

doodieman-voodoo.name: Doodieman Voodoo
doodieman-voodoo.description: Doodieman Voodoo is an awesome and hilarious arcade game in which you must help the Doodieman (yes there is a character called this) shoot poop at a voodoo doll... Yes this is a real game! If this hasn't peaked your interest yet, we don't know what will.

highway-racer.name: Highway Racer
highway-racer.description: Highway Racer is a 3D racing game where you speed down a highway dodging cars. Build up your speed and avoid hitting traffic while taking risks like near misses and driving on the wrong side for bonus points.
highway-racer.controls:
• W or up arrow to accelerate
  • AD or left/right arrow to steer the car
  • Space to use handbrake

wolf-simulator-wild-animals-3d.name: Wolf Simulator: Wild Animals 3D
wolf-simulator-wild-animals-3d.description: Wolf Simulator: Wild Animals is a fun and interesting animal simulation game in which you take control of a lone wolf. You must help the wolf survive against the harsh realities of the wild and try to find food and shelter. Move around this open world and hunt for prey - tackle other animals such as deer, bears and foxes - you must show your power and prove your strength as a hunter!
wolf-simulator-wild-animals-3d.controls:
• WASD or arrow keys to move
  • Left click to attack
  • Space bar to jump
  • Shift to sprint

clashed-metal-drifting-wars.name: Clashed Metal Drifting Wars
clashed-metal-drifting-wars.description: Clashed Metal Drifting Wars is an awesome racing and fighting game in which you must race against other players and try to destroy them with a variety of weapons! Your car is equipped with a deadly machine gun and you must use this to try and eliminate the other players. You can also fire a deadly missile that does massive impact damage on explosion!
clashed-metal-drifting-wars.controls:
• WASD or arrow keys to drive
  • Left click to shoot
  • Right click or X to shoot a missile
  • Space bar to use handbrake
  • Esc to open menu

samurai-showdown.name: Samurai Showdown
samurai-showdown.description: Samurai Showdown is a unique and engaging fighting game involving legendary Samurais. An evil group of Samurais has emerged who want to overthrow the kingdom and cause havoc throughout the land. It is your duty as a true Samurai to uphold the Bushido Code and bring them to justice!
samurai-showdown.controls:
• WASD or arrow keys to move
  • Left or right click to attack
  • E to interact
  • F to roll
  • P to open menu

color-pixel-art-classic.name: Color Pixel Art Classic
color-pixel-art-classic.description: Color Pixel Art Classic is a cool pixel-based casual art drawing game where precision and creativity meet. Choose from a wide selection of images to fill them in to become colorful masterpieces! Select the right hues, and aim to recreate each image with perfect accuracy. Whether you're working on a beginner-friendly design with just a few colors or tackling a more advanced piece with a wide range of shades, Color Pixel Art Classic is a perfect way to hone in on your digital art skills, perfect for all levels.
color-pixel-art-classic.faq:
What is the game where you color pixels?

Color Pixel Art Classic is an online game where you get to color your way through a series of images and show off your artist skills.

Is pixel art a free game?

Color Pixel Art Classic is a free online game available at CrazyGames.
color-pixel-art-classic.controls:
• Left click to choose and apply a pixel color
  • Mouse scroll to zoom-in and out
  • Drag left mouse button to move around
color-pixel-art-classic.how_to_play:
In Color Pixel Art Classic, you can explore a collection of 152 unique designs featuring charming themes like dogs, parrots, koalas, dinosaurs, fish, foxes, cats, kittens, and bears. Each design is set within a paint-by-number grid, allowing you to bring vibrant artwork to life with clicks.

Each design is equipped with an appropriate color palette that is easy to navigate—simply drag it from right to left to reveal all the colors you need. This is, in essence, a digital paint-by-numbers game where you match a numbered color with a numbered cell on a design grid.

You will need to zoom in to see the intricate details and small numbers that guide your coloring. With each cell you click, you'll fill in the grid and gradually unveil your masterpiece. But be warned that your creativity does not have complete free rein. Clicking the wrong cell will result in a playful error sound, adding a touch of challenge to your creative process.

Whether you're an experienced artist or just starting, this game is really just a fun and engaging way to express your digital creativity through cute and fun designs.

The soothing nature of the gameplay makes it an ideal choice for those idle evenings when you want to relax and unwind.

galactic-grind.name: Galactic Grind
galactic-grind.description: Galactic Grind is an awesome clicked game in which you must try to create a thriving production facility and generate resources to reach space.
