You must start by simply clicking on the earth and picking a production building to create. Once you have created your initial building, you can click on it to boost the resource generation rate. Each building has a range of different abilities and can boost your production in a variety of ways.

tap-tap-shots.name: Tap-Tap Shots
tap-tap-shots.description: Tap-Tap Shots is an addictive sports game in which you continuously tap to make your basketball jump. It is an endless basketball practice where you aim to get your ball in the net in one shot, so the goal is to keep playing until you can't anymore, so you may want to cancel all plans for the evening. Perfectly time your taps to score before the clock runs out, and keep going as long as you can!
tap-tap-shots.faq:
What is the best device to play Tap-Tap Shots on?

Since the game features simple one-click mechanics, it works just as well on mobile and desktop devices.

How many lives do you have in Tap-Tap Shots?

You have unlimited lives, but each shot is timed. If you run out of time without scoring, it's game over.
tap-tap-shots.how_to_play:
The gameplay in Tap-Tap Shots is fairly easy. It is a one-button game where each click propels your ball. Depending on your tap, your ball may or may not make the shot.

The net moves to a different height and location each time you make the shot. This will test your click skill. The game is, in essence, an endless series of rounds of practice shots. Your best scores are tallied, incentivizing you to be better than you were in the last round.

The key to the game is to find the right rhythm when tapping, hence the name tap-tap. How many taps do you need to make every shot?

Tap-Tap Tips

Keep tapping to move the ball slightly until it reaches the net. If you miss, the ball will come back from the other side.

When you score, another net is created in a new location—an endless cycle until you run out of time!

Time your shots carefully and think fast before you run out of time. If you miss, it’s best to click quickly to get back around and try for another shot, but make sure you don’t overshoot again!

crazy-stunt-cars-2.name: Crazy Stunt Cars 2
crazy-stunt-cars-2.description: Crazy Stunt Cars 2 is the superb sequel to the original 3D stunt driving gameCrazy Stunt Cars. In this second installment you can explore a new open world and immense city scape with improved graphics and a larger range of streets, roads and twists and turns to drive through.
crazy-stunt-cars-2.controls:
• WASD or arrow keys to drive the car
  • Space bar to use handbrake
  • GH to change car
  • MN to change map
  • R to magically repair damaged car

spider-hero-street-fight.name: Spider Hero Street Fight
spider-hero-street-fight.description: Spider Hero Street Fight is an epic platform game featuring everyone's favourite superhero Spiderman! Spiderman is patrolling the streets as usual and trying to keep the civilians safe but there are plenty of bad guys on the loose and he must do whatever he can to stop them!
spider-hero-street-fight.controls:
• Arrow keys to move
  • Z to punch
  • X to kick
  • C to block
  • Space bar to jump

burnout-drift-seaport-max.name: Burnout Drift 3: Seaport Max
burnout-drift-seaport-max.description: Burnout Drift 3: Seaport Max is the third installment of this awesome car racing game. In this episode, you must test your driving skill in an immense and busy seaport. The port is packed full of containers, ships, cranes and other obstacles that you must try and avoid. Before you start racing through the port however you can customize your vehicle – change its color and also fine-tune its handling to suit your driving style.
burnout-drift-seaport-max.controls:
• WASD or arrow keys to drive
  • Space bar to use handbrake
  • C to change camera view

stunt-mania-3d.name: Stunt Mania 3D
stunt-mania-3d.description: Stunt Mania 3D is an epic stunt game in which you take control of a female motorbike stunt racer! You can play two different game modes - simulation mode in which you can simple explore the vast 3D city and try out different tricks. Alternatively you can play race mode in which you must try and race as far and quickly as possible through crowded streets full of traffic.
stunt-mania-3d.controls:
• WASD or arrow keys to ride
  • 2 to accelerate with more power
  • C to toggle reverse
  • P to pause

10-more-bullets-html5.name: 10 More Bullets
10-more-bullets-html5.description: So, how many ships can you destroy with 10 more bullets ? In this sequel of 10 Bullets, the objective remains the same: wait for the perfect situation and shoot to trigger massive chain reactions. And this time, upgrading your hero and collecting in-game boosters will make it a total destruction.

car-tuning-simulator.name: Car Tuning Simulator
car-tuning-simulator.description: Car Tuning Simulator is a fun and unique game in which you must test your skills as a car mechanic and car tuner. You have complete freedom to build the car of your dreams and design it from scratch. You must take care of all the individual parts such as the engine, frame, wheels, breaks and gear shaft etc.
car-tuning-simulator.controls:
• Left click to interact
  • Hold right mouse button to move around the camera
  • Mouse scroll to zoom in/out camera
  • WASD or arrow keys to drive

good-doggo.name: Good Doggo
good-doggo.description: Good Doggo is a fun game that is perfect for animal lovers and those who own a cute dog! Every dog deserves treats if they are well behaved and our cute doggo is no exception! You must help our dog balance treats on his nose – try to balance as many as possible in the given time-frame. Once you have balanced as many as possible, the dog will then throw the treats and attempt to catch them all in his mouth.

shooterz.name: ShooterZ
shooterz.description: ShooterZ is an awesome first person shooter game set in the blocky and pixelated world of Minecraft! You can choose any one of the fun characters in the game to play is and try to survive against hordes of pixelated zombies! You must find food and water to keep your energy levels up and replenish your health, and you must also mine materials so you can craft tools and weapons.
shooterz.controls:
• WASD or arrow keys to move
  • Left click to attack/shoot
  • R to reload
  • E to open craft menu
  • F to pick-up an item
  • Esc to open menu

idle-chopper.name: Idle Chopper
idle-chopper.description: Idle Chopper is a superb game all about chopping trees! This is a fantastic idle game that you can play at your leisure – you can leave your computer and come back to the game when you wish! You control a simple lumberjack and your job is to chop down as many trees as possible. You can chop any of the trees you want and you must click on them to cut them down.

master-chess.name: Master Chess
master-chess.description: Master Chess is an online casual chess game with single and multiplayer options. If you want to show off your chess skills, try out this digital tabletop online browser version. In this title, you can play three different game modes and test your skills against other chess players.
master-chess.faq:
Can you play Master Chess online?

Yes, you can play against the computer or other players.

I'm a beginner at Chess. How should I play Master Chess?

We recommend starting on the easiest difficulty setting and playing against AI. You should also choose the "no time limit" option so you have enough time to think carefully about your moves.
master-chess.controls: Use the left mouse button to select a unit and move it.
master-chess.how_to_play:
Test your chess skills

Master Chess may not have official endorsement from the chess federation, but its AI opponents are highly skilled. Test your mettle against global adversaries in intense online multiplayer games. Choose from various game modes for maximum flexibility, but be warned—the AI opponent presents a significant challenge that may catch you off guard.

Enjoy dynamic online chess battles

Master Chess excels in providing seamless online gameplay with its swift and effective matchmaking system. Whether opting for a quick match or organizing custom games and tournaments with friends, Master Chess ensures an enjoyable experience. Each piece's possible moves are highlighted for ease of play, although turns are timed, requiring quick thinking.

Learn the basics

There are three difficulty settings for the AI opponent. If you are starting out, we recommend the easiest setting. You should have a good grasp of the basics before playing online to avoid disappointment.

Game modes

  • Engage in 1on1 same device matches
  • Face off against an online opponent
  • Challenge an AI opponent

finger-soccer-world-cup-multiplayer.name: Soccer Challenge
finger-soccer-world-cup-multiplayer.description: Football Challenge is the perfect way to get your soccer fix as the world cup season is upon us. In this arcade style game based on the traditional coin soccer game in which you must take turns positioning your counters in defense and making passes and shots to win the game.
finger-soccer-world-cup-multiplayer.controls: Drag left mouse button on a desired coin to aim, release to shoot.

fish-eat-fishes.name: Fish Eat Fishes
fish-eat-fishes.description: Fish Eat Fishes is a simple game that is inspired by the classic Fish Eat Fish 3 Players game. In the game, we need to avoid bigger fishes and eat smaller fishes to finally become the biggest fish in the sea. If we find ourselves near a fish and we can eat it, that fish will become transparent, otherwise, we will become transparent.

chrome-dino.name: Dinosaur Game
chrome-dino.description: Dinosaur Game is a simple T-Rex casual game in which you avoid obstacles while running for as long as possible. It was originally built into Google Chrome in 2014 and can be played without an internet connection.
chrome-dino.faq:
What’s the highest score on the Dinosaur Game?

The highest score is 99999, after reaching this the score resets to 0.

Why is there a dinosaur in Google Chrome?

The dinosaur game was added to Chrome for users to play without an internet connection. The dinosaur theme is intended as a humorous reference to the game’s function of working offline, suggesting having no internet is like the “prehistoric ages.”

Can you still play Dino Run?

Dino Run, or Dinosaur Game, can be played online for free at CrazyGames.

What happens after 99999 in Dino Game?

After reaching a score of 99999 in Dino Game, your score resets, and you begin again at zero.
chrome-dino.controls:
• Space or up arrow key = jump
  • Down arrow key = duck
chrome-dino.how_to_play:
The objective of Dinosaur Game is to avoid obstacles and survive for as long as possible. The game speeds up the more you advance, making it increasingly challenging. Gameplay controls are simple - press the spacebar to start moving and click the space bar to jump over obstacles. This side-scrolling game is reminiscent of arcade games. Your movements are limited, and success depends on avoiding obstacles, getting especially difficult as speed increases.

As the speed increases, the further you get, you will need to factor that into your jumps. You’ll also come across cactus, birds, and more - don’t attempt to jump over the highest-flying bird. If the object is high, you can go under it.

About the Original Dino Game

The original Dino Game was made by Google UX developers Sebastien Gabriel, Alan Bettes, and Edward Jung in 2014. The game is built into Google Chrome and appears as an error page when the web browser is offline. The Chrome Dinosaur game has seen widespread recognition, with the creators revealing in 2018 that it was played around 270 million times monthly.

A Dinosaur Game with Many Names

The game is also commonly known as T-Rex Runner, Chrome Dino, and Dino Run, among many other titles.

dragon-vice-city.name: Dragon Vice City
dragon-vice-city.description: Dragon Vice City is the ultimate simulator game in which you get to control none other than a ferocious dragon! This is your chance to wreak havoc upon a city, fly from street to street leaving a trail of burning destruction your wake.
dragon-vice-city.controls:
• WASD or arrow keys to control the movement
  • Left click to shoot a fireball
  • Right click to breathe fire
  • 123 to change from walk to run
  • F to interact

getaway-shootout.name: Getaway Shootout
getaway-shootout.description: Getaway Shooter is a chaotictwo-player gamewhere you race three others to the finish line. Your moves are limited, and you can only move by jumping left or right, making the race tricky! Pick up guns and other weapons along the way to use against the others. May the best player win!
getaway-shootout.faq:
How do I unlock characters in Getaway Shootout?

Use the coins you earn in-game to unlock new characters.

How do I play Getaway Shootout?

Master the physics by practicing. Collect power-ups to make it easier.

Is Getaway Shootout available on mobile?

Getaway shootout can be played in web browser or on iOS.

Who made Getaway Shootout?

Getaway Shootout is developed by New Eich Games, a developer that has made a multitude of crazy physics-based games.
getaway-shootout.controls:
Player 1 Controls

  • W to jump left
  • E to jump right
  • R to use a power-up

Player 2 Controls

  • I to jump left
  • O to jump right
  • P to use a power-up
getaway-shootout.how_to_play:
Play solo or with a friend

This 2 player game created double the fun when you team up with a friend using the same keyboard. Don't have a partner to play with? The game is available in one-player mode. Choose one of the characters at the beginning of the game and jump right in.

Jump to move

You will literally be "jumping" in the game. Gameplay dynamics are liminted to left and right ragdoll-like jumps making it difficult to race to the finish. You will soon see that jumping left or right creates quite a chaotic scene! The degree at which you move depends on how long you hold in either direction.

Anything goes

There are multiple rounds in the race, each taking place in a different location. Race to the finish line and pick up weapons and upgrades as you come across them. Use your weapons to attack the other racers on your way to the end!

Character and weapons

There are multiple characters to choose from, over 30 to be more precise. Characters will be equipped with weapons such as sniper guns, shotguns, bombs, etc., to protect themselves from opponents and obstacles - you are after all on the lam!

Features

  • Goofy ‘jump to move’ mechanics
  • Weapons and power-ups
  • Multiple race locations
  • Unlockable characters

More Games Like This

Check out our vast category for more 2 player games, or choose from popular action titles such as Jacksmith or Cuphead. Other titles worth a play by the same developer include a hilarious game of House of Hazards, where you try to save your character from everyday mishaps, or Rooftop Snipers, where you aim to kill your enemy.

Release Date

August 2018

Developer

Getaway Shootout is made by New Eich Games, who also made other challenging physics-based games: Rooftop Snipers, House of Hazards, and Ping Pong Chaos.

Platforms

  • Web browser
  • iOS

snakes-and-ladders.name: Snakes and Ladders
snakes-and-ladders.description: Snakes and Ladders is a casual online game adapted from the English board game of the same name, which influenced the American version of Chutes and Ladders. This much-loved classic board game is free to play single-player or locally with friends. Roll the dice and make your way to the top. Hopefully, you don’t land on a snake!
snakes-and-ladders.faq:
Is there skill to Snakes and Ladders?

Your fate in Snakes and Ladders is determined by the role of dice based on random chance. This game is based more on luck than skill.

Can I play Snakes and Ladders with friends?

Yes, you can play the game locally with up to six other players.

Can I play Snakes and Ladders on mobile?

Yes, Snakes and Ladders is available on mobile, desktop, and tablet, so you can play from most devices.

Where can I play Snakes and Ladders?

You can play Snakes and Ladders online for free at CrazyGames.

Why did Snakes and Ladders change to chutes and ladders?

Snakes and Ladders became a popular Milton Bradley game in the United States under the name of Chutes and Ladders in 1943.
snakes-and-ladders.controls: Use the left mouse button to roll the dice.
snakes-and-ladders.how_to_play:
You can play with up to six players; each gets to select a color. Roll the dice and move your piece. If you roll a 6, you get another roll for free. You can play Snakes and Ladders with up to 6 friends or AI opponents.

Climb ladders - dodge snakes

There are ladders and snakes of varying lengths scattered around the board. Landing on a snake causes you to slide down the board, while you can climb up ladders you land at the foot of.

Chutes and Ladders

This game also includes Chutes and Ladders. It's the same game, but there are chutes instead of snakes. This is a great kid-friendly version of the game and is the most popular version in the US.

About Snakes and Ladders

Snakes and Ladders is a chance-based board game featuring 100 squares. Players must get to the top while dealing with the consequences of every dice roll.

Historically, the game was used to teach children basic moral values. The ladders represented virtues, while the snakes represented vice. Today, it could be seen as a metaphor for life’s journey with all of its ups and downs.

Features

  • Fun, upbeat music
  • The ultimate game of chance
  • Play against up to 6 friends or AI
  • Also includes Chutes and Ladders

Release Date

March 2018 and was updated in January 2019

Developer

Code This Lab made Snakes and Ladders.

Platforms

Web browser (desktop and mobile)

russian-car-driver-zil-130.name: Russian Car Driver ZIL 130
russian-car-driver-zil-130.description: Russian Car Driver ZIL 130 is an awesome premium truck driving simulation game in which you get to control the legendary ZIL 130 soviet truck. This realistic simulation game gives you a real feel into how the truck handles and how you have to master the controls to keep this beast moving.
russian-car-driver-zil-130.controls:
• WASD or arrow keys to drive
  • C to change camera view
  • Space bar to use handbrake
  • H to horn
  • Esc to open the menu
  • Q and E to use turn signals
  • T to use windshield washer (dashboard view)
  • Tab to use windshield wiper
  • L to use headlights
  • R to use radio
  • J to use radio set

rcc-stunt-cars.name: RCC Stunt Cars
rcc-stunt-cars.description: RCC Stunt Cars allows you to take control in a crazy driving game in which you are able to jump behind the wheel of an RCC stunt car and perform crazy tricks. You can speed around a city with pedal to the metal whilst back flipping through the sky. There are plenty of ramps and loops for you to test your driving skills on.
rcc-stunt-cars.controls:
• Arrow keys to drive
  • Space bar to use handbrake
  • C to change camera

crazy-moto-stunts.name: Crazy Moto Stunts
crazy-moto-stunts.description: Crazy Moto Stunts is the intense motorbike riding game in which you get to ride a super-fast motorbike on the highways and perform crazy stunts and tricks. Perform freestyle stuns on these crazy tracks and land them in style to continue your run. There are 4 awesome different bikes to push to the limit, fly through the air performing as many radical tricks as possible.
crazy-moto-stunts.controls:
• WASD or arrows to ride
  • 1, 2, 3, and 4 to change the bike
  • Space bar: handbrake
  • Shift : shift the bike
  • R: reset the game
  • G: reset bike
  • E: police siren

papa-s-scooperia.name: Papa's Scooperia
papa-s-scooperia.description: Papa's Scooperia is a casual time management game where you embark on a journey to run your ice cream shop by taking, making, and serving orders. The restaurant can be slow but gets increasingly crowded as the days go by. The more crowded it gets, the more the pressure is on. Do a good job, and you won’t only earn the satisfaction of a hard day’s work, but you will also have earned a winning in tips!
papa-s-scooperia.faq:
Is Papa's Scooperia available on mobile devices?

Yes, in addition to being available on desktop, Papa's Scooperia can be played on iOS and Android.

How do you win in Papa's Scooperia?

Papa's Scooperia is a game of timing, memory and precision. Players are meant to take orders from customers and make the sundae just as ordered. That is how you are scored.

How do you make sundaes in Papa's Scooperia?

Most of the movement in Papa's Scooperia is controlled by a left mouse click and drag.
papa-s-scooperia.controls: Use the left mouse button to make an ice cream.
papa-s-scooperia.how_to_play:
After losing your belongings in Oniontown, you find yourself in a tight spot and must earn money to return home. Papa Louie proposes an exciting alternative: stay in the bustling city and open an ice cream shop! Bake delicious cookies and craft delectable sundaes with various ice cream flavors. Get ready for a delightful adventure in Papa's Scooperia!

Papa’s Scooperia is a classic time management game with friendly graphics and an enjoyable, familiar storyline - you’re working at an ice cream shop trying to impress customers and make tips.

You start your job at the ice cream shop with a training day. You run through the motions of taking orders, scooping cookie dough onto baking sheets, baking to perfection, adding ice cream and toppings, and serving. It's simple as that… until more and more customers come into the shop.

There are four different stations in Papa’s Scooperia.

Order Station

This is where customers come in and place their ice cream orders. The typical order is a scoop of ice cream on a freshly baked cookie with toppings of choice.

Dough Station

This is where you will make the cookies from fresh dough. Scoop up the dough and dip it in chocolate, vanilla, or color chips.

Bake Station

Now that you have your cookie dough ready put it in the oven. Make sure you don’t burn any of the cookies. When the green bars by your cookie begin blinking, you’re nearly ready to serve. Plate your cookies, click the check, and send it out to the Build Station.

Build Station

Now that you have your base, the cookie, put it all together. Add your ice cream, toppings, and whatever else your customer ordered. Send the ticket and ice cream out.

Customers will score you on how well you put the order together. They will also score you on how long customers have waited for their order, how well the cookie was baked, whether the toppings are right, and how well the dish is put together.

At the end of the day, you get to rest, then return and do it all over again.

Bonus rounds

In between baking and cooking, you’ll get the option to play some mini-rounds to gain points. Choose to skip or play.

Tip 

When the shop is closed, you still get some last-minute customers coming in. They’re called closers. Use your skills to impress them because they can be quite critical in their scoring.

Release Date

  • July 2018 (Flash & Android)
  • August 2018 (iOS)

Developer

Flipline Studios developed Papa's Scooperia.

Features

  • 116 customers to unlock
  • 7 fun mini-games with prizes
  • Unlock more than 120 sundae ingredients
  • Manage your time in the Papa Louie cooking style
  • Add syrups and toppings to the sundae
  • Customize your chef and waiter with millions of clothing items
  • Earn colorful stickers by completing unique tasks
  • Use stickers to unlock new outfits for your customers
  • Master 40 unique Special Recipes
  • Play through 4 seasons and 12 holidays
  • Strategically send coupons to lure customers back

Platforms

  • Web browser (desktop and mobile)
  • Android
  • iOS

free-rally-2.name: Free Rally 2
free-rally-2.description: Free Rally 2 is a high-action 3D driving game and sequel toFree Rally. This multiplayer game allows you to drive vehicles in a multiplayer environment where you can travel around the city and do as you please.
free-rally-2.faq:
Can I play a car game for free?

At CrazyGames, you can play car and driving games for free.

Can we play Free Rally 2 with friends?

Free Rally 2 is a multiplayer online game where you can play with other drivers.
free-rally-2.controls:
• WASD, arrows to drive
  • space to use the handbrake
  • mouse to lock cursor
  • f, right mouse to fire on helicopter, buggy and Sofy
  • v to seek rocket on helicopter, buggy and Sofy
  • e to enable/disable police alert on moto police
  • f to stop car on moto police
  • shift to use nitro on moto
  • r to signal
  • g to let the vehicle go up
  • l to use the light on the car
  • l to start/stop engine on the helicopter
  • c to change camera view
  • esc to return to the menu
free-rally-2.how_to_play:
There are nine different vehicles to choose from, one of which is a buggy and plenty of others, including a helicopter, police car, sedan, and supercar. If you choose the police car, you can use the capture feature, which allows you to begin pursuits of other vehicles and pull them over like an officer of the law.

Release Date

August 2018. The game was updated in June 2020 with improved graphics and the ability to explore on foot.

Developer

oneru220 made this game.

Features

  • 9 different vehicles to use, including a cool helicopter
  • 3D multiplayer vehicle battle game
  • Cool effects
  • A unique feature on each vehicle

Platform

This game is a web browser game.

crazy-stunt-cars-multiplayer.name: Crazy Stunt Cars Multiplayer
crazy-stunt-cars-multiplayer.description: Crazy Stunt Cars Multiplayer is an online multiplayer car driving game where you put your pedal to the metal and speed to unleash your inner daredevils. Hit the gas and tear across massive open maps filled with ramps, loops, and obstacles designed for challenging stunts. Whether racing at breakneck speeds or launching into mid-air tricks, the world is your playground—so buckle up and prepare for high-octane, multiplayer stunt action.
crazy-stunt-cars-multiplayer.faq:
Can you drift in Crazy Stunt Cars Multiplayer?

Yes, you can drift in Crazy Stunt Cars Multiplayer. There are several modes to play in, one of which is drift mode.

Is there single player mode in Crazy Stunt Cars Multiplayer?

Yes, you can play Crazy Stunt Cars Multiplayer solo in single-player mode or with a friend in multiplayer mode.

  • R to repair
  • C to change the camera angle
crazy-stunt-cars-multiplayer.how_to_play:
In Crazy Stunt Cars Multiplayer, you can either race solo or challenge others in an action-packed multiplayer mode. The game lets you fully customize your car to match your style, starting with fine-tuning the wheels and suspension. Adjust the front or rear chamber, tweak the spring force, and dial in the suspension settings to optimize your car’s performance.

For better handling, you can control steering assist features like TCS, ABS, ESP, or use the steering helper. You’ll also have fun customizing the appearance, choosing headlight colors and wheel smoke in striking red, green, or blue. Preview your car's smoke and flames for that extra flash as you pull off crazy stunts.

You have a large selection of cars to choose from, each car has a different unique ability to select your favorite and hit the roads. Show your friends that you are the ultimate driver with the best stunts in their arsenal.

When it comes to power, you’re in control of your car’s speed, torque, and brake settings. You can fine-tune the gear-shifting and clutch thresholds to ensure your car performs at its peak in every race.

Choose between three exciting modes—drift, racing, or arcade—to suit your playstyle. As you race across the map and perform outrageous stunts, you can change your car’s camera angle with the C key, offering multiple views, including aerial, side, front, or rear shots. These angles give you an edge in perfecting your stunts or lining up your next move.

With nine customizable cars, you can challenge your friends to out-drift and out-stunt your opponents. Or, kick things up a notch with wild stunts where the adrenaline reaches new heights!

There are certain moves that will get you stuck—it happens to the best of us. Just click the next or previous car to get out of that jam.

solitr-com.name: Solitr
solitr-com.description: Solitr is a puzzle card game, the online version of the classic solitaire game ideal for endless hours of fun—the perfect way to unwind after a busy day! Solitr lets you focus on strategy and relaxation as you lose yourself in the addictive simplicity of this beloved card game. And the best part is there is no clean up since it's all digital!
solitr-com.faq:
What is the objective of solitaire?

The goal of Solitaire is to get rid of all your cards by placing them in ascending order from King to Ace in the stockpile.

How do you play solitaire?

To play solitaire, move all cards to the foundation piles by stacking them in ascending order from Ace to King while following specific building rules for the tableau. To win, you must prioritize moving cards from the tableau to the foundations whenever possible, as this opens up space for more moves and helps reveal hidden cards.
solitr-com.how_to_play:
The objective of the Solitr game is similar to that of the tabletop card version of Solitaire—you must move all your cards to the four foundation piles located in the upper right corner of the screen, leaving none on the board.

The rules are straightforward—stack each pile of cards in ascending order from King to Ace of the same suit. Once you have a complete ascending order, you can place these cards in the upper right corner. There is a hidden stockpile at the top left of the screen, which you can choose to display one or three cards, but only one will be available for movement at a time.

You will want to strategically move the uncovered stockpile card onto one of the seven tableau columns, depending on whether it can be placed in ascending order. You can drag cards to move them onto the seven tableau columns or to the four foundations. Remember that the seven columns only allow for alternating colors to be placed in ascending order.

For building rules, cards in the foundations must be stacked by the same suit in ascending order, from Ace to King. In the tableau, cards need to be stacked in alternating colors, from high rank (King) to low rank (Ace). Additionally, any empty spots in the tableau can be filled with a King of any suit.

As the deck is shuffled in random order, you must carefully strategize to find the correct moves as you reveal cards one by one. This is the essence of the solitaire challenge.

You can move either single cards or piles of cards within the tableau, but you can only move cards from the waste pile. Whenever you expose a face-down card in a tableau column, that card will automatically turn face-up for you.

classic-backgammon.faq:
What is the best free online backgammon?

Backgammon Online at CrazyGames is a free version of the original classic, featuring tabletop-like graphics and sounds that simulate the in-person game.

Is there online backgammon?

You can play backgammon online, along with other classic board games at CrazyGames.

How do you play backgammon on the internet?

Backgammon Online can be played with a simple mouse click, which controls all moves, including dice rolls and moving your pieces across the board.

Is backgammon luck or skill?

There is always a bit of luck involved in dice games, but backgammon requires skill to win, even when you get a bad dice roll.
classic-backgammon.how_to_play:
Backgammon is an ancient game with modernized versions for online gameplay. Your board may be virtual, but the rules and goals are identical. The objective of backgammon is to move all your checkers into your home board and then remove them from the board completely before your opponent does.

The Backgammon Online board has been set up for you from the beginning. All you have to do is concentrate on strategy.

Each player has 15 checker pieces placed across the board. Your "home" board is directly opposite your opponent's "home" board. Keep your eye on this area; it is key to winning the game.

Each player rolls the dice on every turn. You move the checkers across the board to your home board based on the dice count. You can move one checker to the total of both dice or split the moves between two different checkers. If you roll doubles, stakes are raised as you get the double gameplay moves, meaning you can move one piece of the total of both dice multiplied by two, or you can move four different checkers, the total of one dice.

Move your checkers to open spots

Checkers can only be moved to the following spots:

  • Spots with no occupying checkers
  • Spots that your pieces currently occupy
  • Spots that are occupied by your opponent with only one checker

Checkers cannot be moved to spots where your opponent has two or more checkers.

Capturing your opponent's checker

If you move your checker to a spot where an opponent has only one checker, you capture your opponent's piece, and they will be removed from the board until they can get back in on a dice roll and begin at the beginning of the board again.

How to win the game

The first person to get all their checkers to the home board and remove each checker via dice rolls wins the game.

Try out your Backgammon skills today and challenge people from all around the world!

house-of-celestina.name: House of Celestina
house-of-celestina.description: House of Celestina is a 3D survival horror game that can keep you on the edge of your chair, but not for too long because the game's objective is to find the key to escape. The game is designed to explore the House of Celestina and find clues or keys to help you figure out where you are and how to get out.
house-of-celestina.faq:
Can I play House of Celestina on mobile devices?

Yes, House of Celestina is compatible with most desktop web browsers and mobile devices.

What is the objective of House of Celestina?

The objective of the game is to escape from the House of Celestina and uncover the mysteries of Celestina's house along the way.

How do I play House of Celestina?

Find your way out of the House of Celestina unlocking doors with keys you find. You can use:

  • WASD to move
  • Space bar to interact
house-of-celestina.controls:
• WASD to move
  • Space to interact
  • E to open doors
  • Left mouse button to pick up the key
house-of-celestina.how_to_play:
You have been kidnapped and find yourself in the house of the evil Celestina. Why are you there, and what are her plans? There is no time to think it through, or she is likely to sneak up on you.

You must move around the house and scour every dark corridor, room, and corner, all in the dark, with only the narrow light from a flashlight to guide you.

Each level is a different puzzle to solve. You will get clues along the way, sometimes from past victims of Celestina who didn’t make it out to help you find what you are ultimately looking for - the keys to get out of this house of ghouls.

Be wary as Celestina and her spooky companions will pop up when you least expect it, and when she does, your blood pressure will go through the roof! To lower your blood pressure, you need to press the space bar like your life depends on it because it does. If you don’t lower your blood pressure on time, it’s game over for you.

See if you can survive this creepy game and escape with your life!

Tip

Press the letter Q to edit sensitivity and speed to give you more time to solve the puzzles.

Release Date

April 2019

Developer

Ricreator developed House of Celestina.

Features

  • Dark and scary environment
  • Creepy music
  • Puzzles to solve
  • A demonic pet and Celestina herself as the main ghosts
  • You can play it in fullscreen

Platforms

Web browser. We also have the Android version.

go-chicken-go.name: Go Chicken Go!
go-chicken-go.description: Go Chicken Go! is a fun arcade casual game in which you need to help a bunch of chickens cross a road and river safely without getting run over. Can you try to save all the chickens and bring them to safety?
go-chicken-go.faq:
Is it possible to get all chickens across the road in Go Chicken Go!?

It is possible but not easy. Caution, speed, and precision will help you get your chickens across the road safely.

How many chickens are in Go Chicken Go!?

There are 25 chickens in Go Chicken Go! who are looking for a way to cross the road.
go-chicken-go.controls:
• Arrow keys to move the chicken
  • Space bar to jump
go-chicken-go.how_to_play:
The objective of Go Chicken Go! is fairly simple. You must get a flock of chickens across two three-lane highways and a river with moving logs. Well, perhaps not so simple after all. An arrow will point at the chicken you will be tasked to help across the road. The arrow keys help move the chicken up, down, left, and right, and the space bar lets the chicken jump.

Cars are coming at all speeds, so the key to the game is to avoid these very threatening obstacles. There is no space to sit idle on the highway, so timing and speed are crucial. Once you've passed the three-lane highway, you have almost no time to jump to safety on the river. Jumping is necessary when you get to the river -- you will need to jump on the moving logs. If you land in the water, your chicken drowns. These chickens can't swim.

What's your reward for getting your chicken safely onto a log? Another three-lane highway with cars once again colliding with you at high speeds that will kill your chicken.

How did the chicken cross the road?

Safe and fast. You can use the strategy of walking your chicken from the furthest point of traffic so they cross over safely before oncoming cars get a chance to hit the chicken, but you need to time it perfectly so they can jump on a river log. If you get too close to the end of the road, you risk no log appearing in time.

How Go Chicken Go! Is Scored

Your score will depend on the time you spend crossing along with other factors such as:

  • Successful crosses
  • Total deaths
  • Close calls
  • Longest streaks

Tips

  • Caution is key, but don’t take too long. Jumping at the right moment could mean the difference between life and death.
  • Feathers will give you a speed boost for a short time.
  • Cars go fast and will change lanes without warning, so you may think you are safe in a lane with no cars in sight, but you can easily be swerved into by a car merging from another lane.
  • If you stand too close to the edge as you wait to cross, you run the risk of being hit even if you think you’re out of reach. The chicken beek sticking out too much can lead to disaster.

derbycrash.name: Derby Crash
derbycrash.description: Derby Crash is a 3D car driving game inspired by the world of demolition derbies. In this motorsport, multiple drivers compete by crashing their vehicles into each other. The last driver whose car is still functional wins the competition! Derby Crash is a take on this sport. The game lets you perform amazing stunts by jumping on the ramps. It also features portals that can teleport you to other locations in the game. Have fun and cause some destruction to your cars!

derby-crash-2.name: Derby Crash 2
derby-crash-2.description: Derby Crash 2 is an amazing 3D car driving game. If you loved the original Derby Crash, you will enjoy this superb sequel. In game number 2, you jump into many new destruction derby cars and monster trucks to unleash damage and mayhem in an open-world.
derby-crash-2.faq:
Is Derby Crash 2 multiplayer?

Derby Crash 2 is multiplayer or single-player.

Is Derby Crash 2 available on mobile?

Derby Crash 2 can be played on a desktop only.

What kind of cars can you drive in Derby Crash 2?

There are multiple cars to choose from in Derby Crash 2, including sports cars, battle tanks, and more.
derby-crash-2.how_to_play:
You are not limited to race tracks; instead, you can roam through vast deserts and explore in your demolition derbies vehicle. As far as car games go, the 3D graphics of this title are amazing - you feel immersed in the game as you drive through the gorgeous landscapes.

What makes this title so much fun is the myriad of vehicles you can choose. A game inspired by destruction, of course, has some epic vehicles to jump into. You can drive a range of beautiful sports cars. Alternatively, you can jump into a huge battle tank. This tank has a working turret and cannon, and you can blast your enemies away in a hail of destruction.

Derby Crash 2 builds upon what made the first game fun and adds more features, such as two-player multiplayer action. Remember to unleash as much devastation as possible and try to smash the opposing drivers to pieces.

You start as a nobody within this large city and you must buy weapons and drive your way to success. downtown-1930s-mafia.name: Downtown 1930s Mafia
downtown-1930s-mafia.description: Downtown 1930s Mafia is a third-person shooting mafia game where gangs fight for their territories. Picture it: you’re in the middle of a city, surrounded by brick buildings with long streets that lead to harbor views. Black market, bank robbery, smuggling, illegal alcohol, and raids are all part of your everyday doings. It’s you against them.
downtown-1930s-mafia.faq:
What is downtown 1930s Mafia?

Downtown 1930s is a multiplayer third-person shooter where you control gangs, cars, and weapons in Empire City.

Can I play Downtown 1930s Mafia on my phone?

Downtown 1930s Mafia is not available on mobile. It is available to play on desktop-only.
downtown-1930s-mafia.controls:
• WASD or arrow keys = walk / drive
  • H = open the help panel with all these controls
  • F = enter / exit car, sit anywhere
  • R = repair car
  • U = car upside reset
  • T = reset stuck car
  • E = crouch
  • G = greetings, wave friendly
  • Return / enter = focus chat
  • To get a coffee in the game type /coffee
  • To get a bottle of starry's type /bottle
  • - = go to the lobby
  • I = ignore/unignore panel
  • K = invite friends
  • Ctrl + L = dancing a little swing
downtown-1930s-mafia.how_to_play:
Downtown 1930s is an action-packed multiplayer third-person shooter where you choose your weapon color, car, and character to take control of the streets in the fictional Empire City. Equipped with a vintage car, a powerful weapon, and a tailored suit, your goal is to lead your gang to survival, dominate the city, and maintain respect in this ever-evolving world. With gameplay influenced by community feedback, Downtown 1930s is constantly being improved, offering a dynamic experience where the action never stops.

Features include an open world, intense gunfights, and high-speed driving. You can engage in epic gang drive-bys, choose your character, and even shoot at gas station pumps for explosive splash damage. Plus, the game includes a filter for bad words, ensuring a fun and friendly environment. Invite friends to play together in the same room, whether you're fighting in the streets or strategizing your next move.

The game offers two types of rooms: the Full Fight room, where no admin controls the action, and anyone can challenge you to a fight: just be ready for tough gameplay; and the Admin room, where a player manages the room and enforces rules. If the admin leaves, the room turns into a Full Fight room, so make sure to respect the rules and other players for the best experience. Empire City. It is a third-person shooter under permanent development driven by advice and ideas of the community.

Features

  • OpenWorld
  • Guns
  • Driving
  • Gang drive-by
  • Choose Character
  • Bad words filter
  • Gas station pumps can be shot and make a nice splash damage
  • Room invitation to play together with friends in the same room

Rooms

There are two kinds of rooms:

  • Full Fight room, the room has no admin, anyone can fight you. Do not complain about tough gameplay. Still respect every player.
  • Admin room. The room has a player admin. Follow the rules of that room, or you might be removed from it. If you are the admin and leave the room, the admin functionality for that room is gone, and it converts into a Full Fight room.

wrongway.name: Wrong Way
wrongway.description: Wrong Way is a thrilling driving game where you can create your own race track! Customize vehicles and build your own routes using an inventory with various objects. A great innovation is the ability to save the created routes and be able to reuse or share them with other users via forums or other download channels.
wrongway.faq:
Can I play Wrong Way on my phone?

Unfortunately, Wrong Way can only be enjoyed on desktop.

Can I choose my own car in Wrong Way?

Yes, there are a number of cars you can choose from in Wrong Way, including the Mercedes AMG, Porsche 911, Aston Martin, and more.
wrongway.controls:
• WASD or arrow keys = drive or move building camera
  • Mouse = camera interction
  • Enter = reset car
  • R = repair car
  • T = slow time
  • C = change camera
  • Space bar = handbrake
wrongway.how_to_play:
The gameplay and driving mechanisms of this wrong-way driver game remain the same, and the graphics and game engine used are also unchanged. Try out the other games first to understand how the cars handle and how to detect a wrong turn that could potentially derail your track design.

Available objects

Players start with a completely blank map. The only object is the parking garages and repair center. The parking lots and repair center can be moved anywhere on the map but this is the starting point of the race. Other objects available to place include:

  • Ramps
  • Warehouse units
  • Straight road sections
  • Corner road sections
  • Crossroad sections
  • T-Junction sections
  • Barrels
  • Crash barriers
  • Trees

As you can see there is a fantastic range of objects to place - the only thing missing is a police officer to chase you whilst racing! Players can design their track safely, to create fun racing circuits. Alternatively, they can develop a course designed for mayhem and creating a range of head on collisions using the ramps.

The landscapes used are reminiscent of Southern California and driving through your creation feels like you have spent years in the United States. Next, we look at the game controls.

Using the in-game controls

At first, the game controls may feel difficult to use. The WASD keys are used to move the camera view. Moreover, use the right-click mouse button to rotate the camera.

To select an object simply click it from the toolbar menu and click it again to place it on the map. To rotate an object, first click on it - the object will turn red and a rotate and remove icon will appear.

Each item can be placed and rotated individually. Road sections automatically join together which can help prevent wrong tracks being created. Ensure the road sections create a logical circuit to prevent vehicles headed in the wrong direction from crashing.

Available vehicles

Once a player has created their map, they can test it out or share it with others. Pulling off some awesome wrong way crashes or close race finishes is a great thrill, especially on your own map. The following vehicles are available for players to drive in:

  • Mercedes AMG
  • Porsche 911
  • Aston Martin
  • Nissan GT
  • Pick-up truck

The cars all have fantastic detail and look superb. Furthermore, they handle realistically and attain some scary top speeds. If the national highway traffic safety administration saw how you can drive with these cars, they would be outraged!

Give Wrong Way driving game a try today. See what amazing creations you can make and what daring and challenging track designs your mind can produce. Become a driving legend today and make your own dream course!

Release Date

October 2019

Developer

Wrong Way is made by Roberto Mulas (Ciorbyn). He has also made another cool car game, Derby Crash 2.

Features

  • Multiple amazing cars to drive
  • Customizable car's appearance
  • Create your own tracks
  • Save and load of the created tracks
  • Fullscreen available

Platform

Web browser

More Games Like

For more fun driving games, don't miss Drift Boss and Drift Hunters.

tower-crush-3d.name: Tower Crash 3D

Strategize to collapse towers using the given balls, targeting shapes with matching colors to your ball. Unleash the power of earthquake or shotgun power-ups to trigger massive chain reactions, ultimately bringing the towers to their destruction.

build-and-crush.faq:
Is Build and Crush a game?

Yes, Build and Crush is a multiplayer action game where you get to build your own world, but be ready to watch them go down as your opponents will destroy them if you don’t destroy theirs first.

What is the game where you build stuff?

Build and Crush is an action game where you build your structures… and then destroy them.

Can I play Build and Crush on mobile?

Build and Crush is available on desktop only.

Can I play Build and Crush for free?

Yes, you can play Build and Crush and many more similar games for free at CrazyGames.
build-and-crush.how_to_play:
Build

Place blocks or animals to build something cool. There are normal blocks (bricks, granite, glass, wood, leaves, etc.) and color blocks. Each block can have multiple variations: column, stair, and triangle. Don't forget to save what you build, and when you are happy with it, you can make your creation public with a single click on the "Make public" button.

Crush

This is where the fun begins. Select a random creation, and use the various weapons to blow everything up. Explode everything with TNT, shoot it with a cannon, trigger an earthquake, or put everything on fire! Pst, if you want a 1-click annihilation, use the atomic bomb ;) A real-time multiplayer mode will also arrive soon, where you can compete against other players, defend from zombies, and do other cool stuff!

Multiplayer: Work together with other players in various game modes.

Release Date

November 2019

Developer

Ctrl4ltDel made Build and Crush.

Platform

Web browser

derby-crash-3.name: Derby Crash 3
derby-crash-3.description: Derby Crash 3 is a driving game and has become a popular demolition driver title! The third chapter of the series is about the typology of the famous rally car,Derby Crash. The renewed graphics are much more realistic thanks to the large playing field with an open horizon where you can speed through the various secondary streets and drive a mighty tank!
derby-crash-3.faq:
What is Derby Crash 3?

Derby Crash 3 is a driving game with realistic rally car graphics where you get to race your car on open terrain, do spectacular car stunts, and cause slo-mo crashes.

Is Derby Crash 3 online?

Derby Crash 3 can be played online for free at CrazyGames. It is a desktop-only compatible game.
derby-crash-3.controls:
• WASD or arrows keys = drive
  • Space bar = handbrake
  • Enter= unflip
  • C = change camera
  • R = repair
  • T = time frame
derby-crash-3.how_to_play:
As with previous versions of this driving game, you are given free rein to explore the beautiful open world and test your driving skills. The main aim of demolition derbies is to smash up your car and cause chaos - you can do this in this stunning game!

Realistic driving controls and handling

This game provides users with a realistic driving experience. The cars look superb, and the open world is detailed and rendered in beautiful 3D graphics using the Unity game engine. In addition, the driving controls are easy to learn - use the WASD keys to control the steering and acceleration and the mouse to change the camera view.

To build on these realistic controls, the cars handle exceptionally well. The driving is realistic, and the brakes and steering are responsive. Once you get used to how the car handles, you can pull off some amazing drifts and stunts.

Choose from a range of epic vehicles

Another brilliant point about Derby Crash 3 is the range of cool vehicles you can drive. To start, there is a selection of ultra-fast sports cars modeled after modern cars like Porsches and Ferraris. In addition, you can drive an awesome armored box and a huge battle tank, complete with a working canon!

Whichever vehicle you choose, be sure to have fun driving and explore every inch of the huge open world. Remember that as you play, your vehicle will suffer increased damage - you can see wear and tear on the bodywork and frame. Be careful, as the vehicle may explode!

Have fun and improve your demolition derby driving skills today in the third installment of this amazing driving game!

What does it mean to “steal a card” in Social Solitaire?

How do I change the background theme in Social Solitaire?

golf-solitaire.name: Golf Solitaire
golf-solitaire.description: Golf Solitaire is a fun and challenging solo card game. Clear all the cards by placing them in order and returning them to the pile until there are none remaining. This game uses a regular 52-card deck, but the rules differ from regular Solitaire.
golf-solitaire.how_to_play:
The objective of Golf Solitaire is to get all cards from the seven columns into the single face-up pile at the bottom. Cards can be moved to this pile if they are one number higher or lower than the top card.

When there are no cards to play, you can flip a card from the face-down pile until you get one that can be played.

How do I win?

You win the game when you successfully move all the cards from the seven columns into your face-up pile. The game is lost when you get stuck with no more cards left to play.

However, there are hints and a "card steal" button for when you're stuck. Steal takes a card from one of the columns at random, regardless of what it is. The hint button will show you the best move when there are moves available.

More Solitaire Games

Solo card games are a popular way to pass the time and stimulate the mind when at home. Try out something popular like Uno Online. You could also try Pyramid Solitaire Ancient Egypt - clear the pyramid of cards by pairing cards which add up to 13.

Release Date

April 2020

Developer

DrMop made Golf Solitaire. You should check the developer's other Solitaire variation games, such as Solitaire Social and Australian Patience.

Platform

Web browser (desktop and mobile)

basket-random.description: Basket Random is a chaotic 2-player arcade sports game with unpredictable physics. Bounce and battle for the ball across wild courts, with each dunk launching you to the next level!
basket-random.faq:
What devices can I play Basket Random on?

You can play this game on the web on most desktop and mobile devices.

Are there any other games like Basket Random?

Yes, you can also find the same wacky physics in Soccer Random.
basket-random.how_to_play:
This two-player basketball game has the same concept as your typical basketball game—shoot the ball into the net—but with a few odd and hilarious twists. There are two teams, and each team consists of two players. Controls guide both your players, but be warned that their actions may not coincide with exactly how you expected them to move. Slam dunks are still very possible!

Use the W key to control player one and the up arrow to control player two. Fight frantically over the basketball, bouncing and spinning in the air, trying to make the shot. Whatever team scores first wins that round. The player to reach 5 wins the game!

After each Basket Random goal, you’re transported to a new place where the physics and attire may differ, shaking up each new round with random changes! Bobble around shooting hoops and have fun in this wacky take on basketball.

Features

  • Strange bouncy basketball players
  • Levels and physics change randomly
  • Play the game with a friend
  • Fun basketball game with a twist

kings-and-queens-solitaire-tripeaks.faq:
How to play Kings and Queens Solitaire TriPeaks?

Kings and Queens Solitaire TriPeaks combines solitaire gameplay but with some twists—you need to rank cards in descending or ascending order, and suits don't count!

Do you have to match suits in Kings and Queens Solitaire TriPeaks?

You do not need to match suits in Kings and Queens Solitaire TriPeaks.
kings-and-queens-solitaire-tripeaks.how_to_play:
The aim of the game is to match cards by rank. Tap a card that is either one rank higher or lower than the card you are working from. For example, if you have a 5, you can play a 6 or a 4. This sequence can continue in either direction (e.g., 4 → 5 → 6 or 6 → 5 → 4).

The Table Setup

The game begins with a dynamic layout of cards on the table, blending uncovered cards. You can play with covered cards waiting to be revealed. Your objective is to build sequences using only the uncovered cards, so strategize carefully to unlock new possibilities.

At the bottom of the game board, you’ll find your home base card, the foundation of your sequences. Every move you make starts here, guiding your progress through the game. Next to your home base is the deck of cards, your lifeline when you run out of moves on the table. Draw from this deck to refresh your strategy and keep the game moving forward.

Pay close attention to how the cards are arranged, and start planning your moves to reveal hidden opportunities and outsmart the deck!

Suits don’t matter, so you can match cards regardless of their suit, focusing solely on their numerical value.

The key to winning is to strategize your moves. It’s often best to start with a lower-numbered card so you have more flexibility to build sequences. Aim to clear as many cards as possible with each move by carefully planning increases and decreases (e.g., a sequence like 4 → 5 → 4 → 6 removes multiple cards).

If no moves are available, you will be prompted to draw a card from the deck. The card you draw becomes the new card you must build from. If no uncovered cards are playable, you’ll also need to draw from the deck.

The game becomes more challenging as you go. Occasionally, you may receive prompts to add five more cards to the table, increasing the difficulty. If you make a move you regret, use the Undo button to revise your strategy.

Kings and Queens Solitaire TriPeaks Tip

If you have several sequence options, prioritize moves that remove the most cards from the table or deck. For example, a sequence like 4 → 5 → 4 → 6 can clear more cards than a straight increase like 4 → 5 → 6.

Start your career as a professional racer and climb the ranks through thrilling campaign races, upgrading your car to enhance performance along the way. With simple controls that let you navigate sharp corners effortlessly, stunning 3D graphics, realistic engine sounds, and customizable camera views, the game offers an immersive and adrenaline-packed experience.
super-star-car.faq:
Can I play Super Star Car on my phone?

Unfortunately, Super Star Car is currently available to play only on desktop.

Is Super Star Car free to play?

Super Star Car is free to play on desktop and can be found on CrazyGames.

How to play Super Star Car?

  • W or up arrow to accelerate
  • AD or left and right arrow keys to steer
  • C to change camera view
  • Spacebar to respawn position

Can I use my Xbox controller to play Super Star Car?

Yes, Super Star Car is Xbox Controller supported.

What is the no. 1 racing game?

There are too many racing games to choose from. The best way to find out which is the number one racing game is to play them all!
super-star-car.controls:
• W or up arrow to accelerate
  • AD or left and right arrow keys to steer
  • C to change camera view
  • Spacebar to respawn position

Xbox Controller supported
super-star-car.how_to_play:
Super Star Car is all about speed, precision, and strategy as you race through an exciting career mode. Every time you finish a race in this mode, you’ll earn stars and money, helping you climb the leaderboard and unlock new opportunities. Use your winnings to upgrade your car strategically, boosting its performance and ensuring that every race feels fresh and thrilling.

The game features several tracks, each with its own unique challenges. You can select from iconic maps such as Arcport Circuit, Yafield Park, Riverside Circuit, and many more. Each track will test your skills, particularly when it comes to navigating those sharp curves. As expected, corners are the most challenging part of the game: you’ll need to hold your steering steady to maintain control. If you find yourself off the track, simply press the space bar to reset and get back into the action.

To aid your racing strategy, there’s a mini-map in the bottom-left corner of your screen, giving you a sneak peek at upcoming turns and obstacles so you can prepare ahead. Keep an eye on your speedometer, located at the bottom-right corner, to adjust your pace and avoid spinning out on tight bends.

One of the standout features of Super Star Car is its multiple view modes. You can race from a bird' s-eye view, chase your car from behind, or fully immerse yourself in the action by switching to the driver’s seat view. This versatility lets you experience the game from different perspectives, adding to its excitement and variety.

The heart of the game lies in its career mode, where every win brings you closer to the coveted championship trophy. It’s not just about crossing the finish line first; it’s also about improving your car with carefully chosen upgrades. A better-performing car will help you dominate tougher races as you progress through the campaign.

Get ready to tackle adrenaline-pumping tracks and outmaneuver your rivals.
