parkour-go-gly.name: Parkour GO
parkour-go-gly.description: Parkour: Go is a 3Dparkour gamewhere you tackle various obstacles on foot using acrobatic abilities. Scale them quickly and skillfully to reach the finish line.
parkour-go-gly.controls:
• Move: WASD
  • Jump: spacebar
  • Pause: ESC
  • Slide: C
  • Switch between 3rd person and 1st person views: V

school-war.name: School Wars
school-war.description: School Wars is a real time strategy game that pits 4 different schools against each other in a huge turf war. You'll be playing as the gray school, and you'll attempt to take over by letting your units sit on the card face tiles until it changes to your school's color. The more tiles you control, the faster you'll get extra fighters. You win the game by taking over all of the tiles on screen.

nextdoor.name: NextDoor
nextdoor.description: NextDoor is a side-scrolling horror cinematic game. This game is inspired and based on Junji Ito's manga, Mimi's Ghost Stories.
nextdoor.controls:
• Move: left and right arrow keys
  • Interact: spacebar

clicker-knights-vs-dragons.name: Clicker Knights vs Dragons
clicker-knights-vs-dragons.description: Clicker Knights vs Dragons is a fast-paced clicker game in which you assemble a team of heroes to defeat the evil monsters, as well as the dragons!

become-a-nurse.name: Become a Nurse
become-a-nurse.description: Become a Nurse is a game in which you become a nurse to treat various conditions of your patients.

hanafuda-flash.name: Hanafuda Flash
hanafuda-flash.description: Hanafuda Flash is exactly as the title suggests - it's a flash version of a classic Japanese card game, Hanafuda. This card game involves 2 players throwing and taking cards to/from each other to create a set of cards from a "suit". There are multiple suits with different points depending on the cards you've collected. This game will need a bit of studying, but once you get the hang of it, this game is super fun because of how fast the game starts and ends.

colorful-city-of-cards.name: Colorful City of Cards
colorful-city-of-cards.description: Colorful City of Cards is a clicker-idle game with a goal to develop the most prosperous and colorful city. Use cards to construct buildings and paint the city with flora and fauna. Thicken and upgrade your deck via Research and invite new people to your city.

castle-wars-middle-ages.name: Castle Wars: Middle Ages
castle-wars-middle-ages.description: Castle Wars: Middle Ages is a 2-player castle-based battle game that sets in the Middle Ages era.

tiktok-trends-boyfriend-fashion.name: Boyfriend Fashion Trends
tiktok-trends-boyfriend-fashion.description: Boyfriend Fashion Trends is a makeup and dress-up game to have the coolest boyish style.

chainsaw-dance.name: Chainsaw Dance
chainsaw-dance.description: Chainsaw dance is a free rhythm game inspired by the Chainsaw Man manga series. Button-bash your way through a range of tricky tunes and keep your health bar topped up to survive! Chainsaw Dance is inspired by the viral gameFriday Night Funkin’, and also shares some music in common.
chainsaw-dance.controls:
• Default: D F J K
  • You can customize the buttons in the Settings

idle-football-manager.name: Idle Soccer Manager
idle-football-manager.description: Idle Soccer Manager is an incremental game in which you manage your own soccer team. Buy players with exponentially growing stats, climb up the Ladder of Divisions, and go to new countries. This game is infinite. Later in the game, you can build a Stadium, train your players, and contract TV channels to earn even more money!

appel.name: Appel
appel.description: Appel is a simple and cute platforming game with a goal to collect all the golden apples.
appel.controls:
• AD or left and right arrow keys = move left and right
  • W or up arrow key or space = jump
  • S or down arrow key = crouch

real-cars-extreme-racing.name: Real Cars Extreme Racing
real-cars-extreme-racing.description: Real Cars Extreme Racing is an exciting and action-packed 3D car driving game with various game modes.

planet-miner-frvr.name: Planet Miner FRVR
planet-miner-frvr.description: Planet Miner FRVR is a clicker game where your goal is to amass tons and tons of gold from different planets, so you can get enough gold to access more planets where you can mine more gold, and so on. Don't let that description fool you though, this is not a boring game. There are a lot of things to do, like clearing up meteors, digging up for treasure, and continuously upgrading your planets, miners, and mining materials so you can optimize your farming.

stickman-world-war.name: Stickman World War
stickman-world-war.description: Stickman World War is a 2D strategy game with an action-packed campaign that progresses through various themes. The game features modern weaponry, units, and structures. As well as the campaign mode, you can take the battle online!

fish-merge-frvr.name: Fish Merge FRVR
fish-merge-frvr.description: Fish Merge FRVR is a clicker  that is both fun and addicting once you get the hang of it. The game revolves around feeding and merging fish to get better fish that'll net you more gold. You'll start with a few empty fish bowls, and dropping in fish feed will attract the most basic fish. Once you have 2 of the same fish type, you can merge them to create a better fish. You'll keep repeating this to unlock all of the higher tier fish as you go. There are a couple of things to help make things easier along the way as well, like a shop to get better fish instantly, and a roulette that'll give you high tier fish every 3 minutes.

kogama-the-elevator.name: Kogama: The Elevator
kogama-the-elevator.description: The Elevator is a fun multiplayer game from Kogama with an objective to collect all the stars in each floor.
kogama-the-elevator.controls:
• Move: WASD or arrow keys
  • Jump: spacebar
  • Attack: left click

slope-car.name: Slope Car
slope-car.description: Slope Car is an arcade game to drive your car on a randomized slope and go as far as possible. This game is a combination ofCrazy Roll 3Dand driving a car.
slope-car.controls:
• AD / left and right arrow keys = steer
  • W / up arrow key = boost

parking-panic.name: Parking Panic
parking-panic.description: Parking Panic is a puzzle game to unblock the crowded parked car and make a way for the red car to escape.
parking-panic.controls: Drag the left mouse button to move the cars.

pinball-clash.name: Pinball Clash
pinball-clash.description: Pinball Clash is a dynamic two-player pinball game. Win tournaments against the AI or a human opponent on the same device. Enjoy the classic pinball features - bumpers, slingshots, ramps, spinners - and more.

paparazzi-diva-the-mermaid-princess.name: Paparazzi Diva: The Mermaid Princess
paparazzi-diva-the-mermaid-princess.description: Paparazzi Diva: The Mermaid Princess is a fashion game about becoming the cover of photo-shooting magazines.
paparazzi-diva-the-mermaid-princess.controls: Use your mouse to play this game.

yummy-super-burger.name: Yummy Super Burger
yummy-super-burger.description: Yummy Super Burger is a cooking game to make your own delicious burgers for the consumers!
yummy-super-burger.controls: Use mouse to click and use items.

yummy-super-pizza.name: Yummy Super Pizza
yummy-super-pizza.description: Yummy Super Pizza is a fun cooking game to make delicious pizzas. Making pizza has never been more fun! This game lets you make delicious pizzas by adding the ingredients for the dough, cooking the sauce, adding various toppings, and baking them. The best part is after you make a pizza, you can serve it to your customers, don't let them wait too long!

super-robo-adventure.name: Super Robo - Adventure
super-robo-adventure.description: Super Robo - Adventure is a 2 player Mario-style platformer game to explore wonderful worlds full of dangers.

candy-clicker-2.name: Candy Clicker 2
candy-clicker-2.description: Candy Clicker 2 is an incremental clicker game where you make candies by clicking. Keep clicking to generate more candies and upgrade the candy production equipment for faster results. Become an extraordinary sweet treat producer in Candy Clicker 2!

quantum-god.name: Quantum God
quantum-god.description: Quantum God is a clicker game where the game concept is based on the universe expansion theory. The main mechanic is to increase the size of your universe. In this game you will buy various physical objects and thereby increase your income. Also, you can upgrade your buildings by resetting their number to one. When you will gather enough size, you will be able to gain prestige points named "U-Coins". There are also several achievements in the game, and you will receive various rewards for completing them. You will go from the size of neutrinos to the size of humans, stars, galaxies, and even much larger objects!
quantum-god.controls:
PC Controls

Use the left mouse button to play the game.

Mobile Controls

Tap on the screen to play the game.

limitless.name: Limitless
limitless.description: Limitless is a 3D 2-player radio-controlled car racing game. Collect power-ups, shoot opponents, and be the first in the race. Unlock 12 unique cars and 10 challenging tracks. You can play with your friend too using a split-screen Versus mode.

funny-camping-day.name: Funny Camping Day
funny-camping-day.description: Funny Camping Day is an exciting camping adventure game. Do you want to take part in a summer camp?! Go outdoor with your forest-loving friends. Help them to do amazing camp activities: clean up the camp, set up your tents, enjoy fishing, and light the campfire. Play the role of your friends in different activities. Have fun with the game!

n-game.name: N Game
n-game.description: N Game is a platformer that lets you play as a dude who has the athletic ability of a ninja and can do almost anything, but it's accompanied by a very short lifespan - like, 15-minute short. You need to finish a set amount of levels before your 15-minute timer goes down to 0, or you will die. You need to finish each level by pushing a button to open a door, and heading to that door to exit it. A lot of gold can also be scattered in each level, so getting them would be really helpful too.
n-game.controls:
• Left / Right arrow = Run left / right
  • Z / Shift = Jump

Tip

Make sure to also read the tips under Help in the main menu to find different maneuvers that'll help you get around each level more efficiently

dragon-fist-3.name: Dragon Fist 3
dragon-fist-3.description: Dragon Fist 3 is a fighting game filled with characters that are masters of different martial arts, as well as masters of different weapon types. You can choose one of those fighters to go through a gauntlet of the remaining masters on the single-player mode or play against a friend in two-player mode. There's also a character creation mode where you can enjoy making your own fighter with your own unique look, fighting style, and weapon.
dragon-fist-3.controls:
For the first player

  • A = Move left
  • D = Move right
  • W = Jump
  • S = Block
  • T = Punch
  • Y = Kick
  • U = Draw/Throw weapon

For the second player

  • Left arrow key = Move left
  • Right arrow key = Move right
  • Up arrow key = Jump
  • Down arrow key = Block
  • Num 4 = Punch
  • Num 5 = Kick
  • Num 6 = Draw/Throw weapon

Tips

You can combine buttons to do different moves, like pressing punch while blocking will result in a grab, or pressing punch and kick at the same time will release a special move (you'll need to have your power gauge under your HP to be red)

load-up-and-kill.name: Load Up and Kill
load-up-and-kill.description: Load Up and Kill is a killing simulation game in which your only goal is to kill a prisoner with whatever weapon you desire. You will be shown some weapons, and after choosing one, you have to load it up (if it needs ammo). Each weapon is filled differently, so you have to find out what you need to do to load them (like first releasing the magazine on a handgun, or pressing the on switch on a chainsaw). Once you're done with loading your weapon, you're taken to the prisoner's cell to do the job. You can keep doing this until you've had your fill, so try out all the different weapons available and see how each of them works!
load-up-and-kill.controls: Click on a weapon you'd like to use, then click on the part of the weapon you need to interact with, or follow the prompts for some weapons.

doggo-clicker.name: Doggo Clicker
doggo-clicker.description: Doggo Clicker is a fun clicker game that lets you click your cute dog. His mood becomes better when you click him. There are 50 different upgrades and 21 accessories; make him look more cool and nice. Level up, spend your stat points, and progress faster. Also, there are 2 layers of prestige and a house to built, have fun!

funny-throat-surgery-2.name: Funny Throat Surgery 2
funny-throat-surgery-2.description: Funny Throat Surgery 2 is a sequel to the cartoonish dentist game. Have you ever wanted to be a dentist? Play and you can experience becoming a dentist that needs to help our patient, including cleaning her teeth, removing germs from her mouth, fixing her voice by doing polyp surgery, and finally doing some cute and funny dress-up to complete the task.

cookie-delivery.name: Cookie Delivery
cookie-delivery.description: Cookie Delivery is an action game about being a cookie deliveryman. This work is dangerous and difficult; in addition to obstacles on the road, you have to shoot back the animals who want to steal the cookies.
cookie-delivery.controls: Press the left mouse button or up arrow key to jump. Press twice to do a double jump.

treasure-of-cutlass-reef.name: Treasure of Cutlass Reef
treasure-of-cutlass-reef.description: Treasure of Cutlass Reef is a game in which you play as the captain of a pirate ship. You go around the seas to do what pirates do best, collect treasure! You won't be the only ones trying to get treasure though, so you need to fight through the other pirates as well. This is advantageous for you because beating them not only decreases your rivals for treasure, you can also ransack their ships for loot.
treasure-of-cutlass-reef.controls:
• A / D or Left / Right arrow keys = Rotate ship left or right
  • W or Up arrow key = Move forward
  • S or Down arrow key = Move backward
  • F, CTRL, or Space bar = Fire cannons

multitask.name: Multitask
multitask.description: Multitask is a skill-based arcade game to really test your multitasking ability. You start with a simple objective, but as the goes, new challenges appear.
multitask.controls: Press arrow keys and WASD and space bar (follow the on-screen instructions).

penguin-wars.name: Penguin Wars
penguin-wars.description: Penguin Wars is a game in which you play as a penguin trying to conquer Antarctica. You are going to do this by pushing all of the other penguins off of their icebergs. You have to go through all of the areas armed with nothing but your bazooka filled with snowballs, as well as your knowledge in spacing your shots.
penguin-wars.controls: Tap and hold / Click and drag the bar with the "Drag" label on the top left.

the-farmer.name: The Farmer
the-farmer.description: The Farmer is a farm management game that lets you take care of a farm by planting different fruits and vegetables, as well as taking care of chickens for their eggs. You make money off of the land, and you use that money to make the land prosper - which in turn makes more money for you.
the-farmer.controls:
• Left mouse button = Use item/Accept/Choose item
  • Mouse cursor = Aim

bed-and-breakfast-3.name: Bed and Breakfast 3
bed-and-breakfast-3.description: Bed and Breakfast 3 is a hotel management game that lets you run your own little hotel and make money off of it. Use your hospitality skills to give your customers the best hotel experience of their life. Cook the best food, prepare the best beds, and keep your hotel in tip top shape so everyone can enjoy it, and in return, you get more money to make your hotel even better!
bed-and-breakfast-3.controls: Click/tap on the services/areas you need to go to, and your manager will automatically work it for you

mortal-kombat-karnage.name: Mortal Kombat Karnage
mortal-kombat-karnage.description: Mortal Kombat Karnage is a fighting game filled with blood and violence, as well as a lot of fun. Take control of one of the fighters from the Mortal Kombat universe and duke it out with all the other characters to reach the top. Use every move in your arsenal to defeat everyone in the ring and leave them as a bloody pulp!
mortal-kombat-karnage.controls:
• Up arrow key = jump
  • Left/right arrow key = move left/right
  • Down arrow key = crouch
  • A = punch
  • D = kick
  • S = guard
  • Left click = confirm

madness-regent.name: Madness Regent
madness-regent.description: Madness Regent is a shooting game with platforming elements that lets you play as a cool dude as he guns down everything in his way. Survive through a gauntlet of enemies to activate the final boss so you can beat the stuffing out of him.
madness-regent.controls:
• Left and right arrow keys = move left and right
  • Up arrow key = aim gun upward
  • S = jump (can be double-tapped for a double jump)
  • A = shoot

drama.name: DRAMA
drama.description: DRAMA is a tricky platformer game with various puzzles to overcome. Think outside the box to complete the game with the most lives spared. Sometimes you have to find hidden objects, other times you have to use your skill, and in some cases, you have to put all your skills to the test.
drama.controls:
• UP or "W" = jump and climb rope or ladder
  • DOWN or "S" = go down rope or ladder
  • RIGHT or "D" = move right
  • LEFT or "A" = move left
  • SPACE = jump off the rope or ladder

papa-s-burgeria.name: Papa's Burgeria
papa-s-burgeria.description: Papa's Burgeria is a casual game in which you work at a burger shop and are in charge! You must take orders, fry the burgers, and build the burgers! Be a good burger flipper and make Papa Louie proud.
papa-s-burgeria.faq:
Can you still play Papa's Burgeria?

Yes, at CrazyGames you can play Papa's Burgeria in your web browser without Flash.

Where can I play Papa's Burgeria for free?

At CrazyGames, you can play the game for free on your web browser.

Who made Papa's Burgeria?

Flipline Studios developed Papa's Burgeria along with many other Papa's Games.

Where can I still play Papa's games for free?

CrazyGames has a full collection of Papa Louie games, including Papa's Burgeria, Papa's Pizzeria, Papa's Sushiria, Papa's Cupcakeria, Papa's Hot Doggeria, and many more.
papa-s-burgeria.how_to_play:
Flip the burgers with passion

Papa's Burgeria guides you through the basics of flipping burgers and making a buck. Take your first order and follow the instructions on-screen. You'll start by taking the order and frying up the patty before finalizing the burger with tomatoes, onions, sauces, seeded buns, and other cherished burger ingredients.

Manage your time

As the levels progress, you'll be introduced to new customers with more complex orders. The number of customers will also increase. That means you'll need to balance your responsibilities and learn the timings to get the best scores and tips from your customers.

Buy upgrades

Papa demands that you use the tips to buy restaurant upgrades rather than on your own leisurely activities. You have the option to buy upgrades after each level is completed. The shop features items to help improve customer waiting times (like a television), lamps that keep burgers warm, and many other items to spend your hard-earned cash on.

Snoop on your clientele

Papa keeps a profile on all of his most prized customers. You can look in the customer book to see the detailed preferences of your returning customers.

eliza-mall-mania.name: Eliza Mall Mania
eliza-mall-mania.description: Eliza Mall Mania is a dress-up game to mix-and-match outfits style in a shopping mall.
eliza-mall-mania.controls: Use your mouse to play this game.

donkey-kong-returns.name: Donkey Kong Returns
donkey-kong-returns.description: Donkey Kong Returns is an arcade platformer that is a faithful recreation of the original Donkey Kong arcade game from the 80s! Jump and weave your way through barrels and flames as you try to rescue your girlfriend Pauline from Donkey Kong, an ape that took her hostage.
donkey-kong-returns.controls:
• Left / right arrow keys = move
  • Up / down arrow keys = climb up / down ladder
  • Space = jump

racehorse-tycoon.name: Racehorse Tycoon
racehorse-tycoon.description: Racehorse Tycoon is a management game that lets you try out the life of owning a racehorse and making money off of it! Choose between various horses with different stats that can be used in different situations, as well as the food they eat, the stable they stay in, their trainer, and the jock that'll ride them in races.

drift-parking.name: Drift Parking
drift-parking.description: Drift Parking is a drifting and parking game with a different mission at each level.
drift-parking.controls: AD / left and right arrow keys / left and right mouse button = drift

castel-wars-new-era.name: Castle Wars: New Era
castel-wars-new-era.description: New Era is a more modernized version with industrial weapons and equipment episode of the Castle Wars series, a 2-player castle battle game.
castel-wars-new-era.controls:
Player 1 Controls

  • AD = move
  • W = jump
  • E = attack
  • S = place blocks
  • Q = switch weapons

Player 2 Controls

  • Left and right arrow keys = move
  • Up arrow key = jump
  • Space = attack
  • Down arrow key = place block
  • M = switch weapons

falling-fruits.name: Falling Fruits
falling-fruits.description: Falling Fruits is an incremental clicker game where you destroy falling fruit using attack towers. Earn cash from splattering the fruit to buy various upgrades and new towers.

torturomatic-2.name: Torturomatic 2
torturomatic-2.description: Torturomatic 2 is a stickman game where you play as the executioner of multiple criminals. Choose the punishment they get for the atrocious crimes they have committed in a torture chamber filled with devices that were made to inflict as much pain as possible. Don't kill them just yet though, as you'll need to inflict as much pain as you can to get a higher score from each criminal. Some of them will have bonuses by giving them the correct punishment for what they've done.

kung-fu-grandpa.name: Kung Fu Grandpa
kung-fu-grandpa.description: Kung Fu Grandpa is a side-scrolling beat-em-up game where you play as a grandpa who's just tired of the fighting going on outside his home, and is now taking matters into his own hands. Punch and kick everything and everyone in your way as you try to bring peace back to your neighborhood. Pickup money you can use to upgrade your fighting skills, as well as weapons you can use to further beat up anything that walks into your general direction. You may be old, but that doesn't mean you don't pack a mean punch behind your fists!
kung-fu-grandpa.controls:
• Arrow keys = move
  • Z = punch
  • X = kick
  • C = special power
  • Space = jump

funny-kitty-dressup.name: Funny Kitty Dress Up
funny-kitty-dressup.description: Funny Kitty Dressup is a kitty dress-up game where you need to play the mini-games first to unlock new accessories.

super-billy-boy.name: Super Billy Boy
super-billy-boy.description: Super Billy Boy is a 2D side-scrolling platformer game to save an abducted friend from an Alien Robot.
super-billy-boy.controls:
• Move = AD or left and right arrow keys
  • Jump or fly = W or up arrow key
  • Shoot = X or J

kill-the-spartan.name: Kill The Spartan
kill-the-spartan.description: Kill The Spartan is a game where you choose ways how the Spartan will die.
kill-the-spartan.controls: Use your mouse to choose how the Spartan will die.

the-waitress.name: The Waitress
the-waitress.description: The Waitress is a classic arcade game where you play as a waitress in a distinctly average cafe. Take orders from customers and do it fast to keep them happy!
the-waitress.controls: Use the mouse to interact with the objects.

idle-miner.name: Idle Miner
idle-miner.description: Idle Miner is an idle game about a cat who loves mining and getting different resources. There are 25 different resources; you can sell them or use them for crafting better pickaxes. Craft better and better pickaxes and mine into the depths of Earth. Also, there are 9 upgrades that will help you get better materials and craft better pickaxes. After level 50 you can prestige to make your cat stronger!

stick-animator.name: Stick Animator
stick-animator.description: Stick Animator is a stickman game that lets you create stick figures. When done, you can share it with your friends.
stick-animator.controls: Left-click to interact with the stick figure.

thing-thing-4.name: Thing Thing 4
thing-thing-4.description: Thing-Thing 4 is the fourth episode of Thing-Thing Saga, an action shooting game where you can also create your own character style. Get your gun and prepare for the battle!
thing-thing-4.controls:
• WASD = move
  • Shift = run
  • Q or mouse wheel button = melee weapon
  • E or mouse wheel = switch weapon
  • P = pause
  • Space = swap / throw weapon
  • Left-click = shoot

gold-miner-special-edition.name: Gold Miner: Special Edition
gold-miner-special-edition.description: Gold Miner Special Edition is a mining game where you must get the gold to achieve your goal. You can also buy things to make your mining easier.
gold-miner-special-edition.controls:
• Down arrow key or left-click on dirt = drop the claw
  • Up arrow key or left-click on the dynamite = toss the dynamite

xeno-tactic.name: Xeno Tactic
xeno-tactic.description: Xeno Tactic is a tower defense game where you must not let your opponents walk across your base. Build some walls and towers to defend your base.

rock-hard-coliseum.name: Rock Hard Coliseum
rock-hard-coliseum.description: Rock Hard Coliseum is an action game where you choose your fight and see who's going to win!
rock-hard-coliseum.controls: Use A + D or left + right arrow keys to interact with the battle.

replaying-the-game.name: Replaying The Game
replaying-the-game.description: Replaying The Game is a sequel game from The Game. It's a funny random meme game where you can unlock funny animation in each level.
replaying-the-game.controls:
• Left and right arrow = move
  • Up arrow = jump
  • Down arrow = duck
  • Left-click = interact with the buttons

squid-game-online.name: Squid Game Online
squid-game-online.description: Squid Game Online is a free multiplayer survival game. Compete in 7 minigames with 30 players based on the viral Netflix show Squid Game. If you fail any of the challenges, you will be eliminated by the Pink Soldiers.
squid-game-online.faq:
What is the best Squid Game?

Squid Game Online created by Dimofan is one of the most popular new games inspired by Squid Game.

Can you play Squid Game with other players?

Yes! Squid Game Online features multiplayer mini-games with other players via the internet.

Is Squid Game Online free?

Yes, you can play this game for free in your web browser - no download required.
squid-game-online.controls:
• WASD or arrow keys = move
  • Space = jump
  • LMB = scratch cookie / drag rope / hit
  • E = pickup weapon
  • G = drop weapon
  • T = chat

kingdom-of-pixels.name: Kingdom of Pixels
kingdom-of-pixels.description: Kingdom of Pixels is a 2D multiplayer side-scrolling MOBA and platformer game. It is similar to the style of other MOBAs like League of Legends and DOTA 2. The game's theme is pixel-like, bringing a nostalgic and simplistic feel to it.
kingdom-of-pixels.controls:
• WASD / arrow keys = move
  • Space = jump
  • J / left-click = basic attack
  • K / Ctrl = 1st Ability
  • L / Alt = 2nd Ability
  • B = recall back to spawn
  • [1, 2, 3, 4, 5] = item actives
  • Right-click = sell items
  • (There is an option to enable / disable mouse support at the right side of the screen)

tri-achnid.name: Tri-Achnid
tri-achnid.description: Tri-Achnid is an action game about guiding a three-legged creature who wants to save its egg sack and larvae after its mate has been eaten by a large monster.
tri-achnid.controls:
• WASD = position its head to balance its body
  • Drag the left mouse button on the feet = move

madness-deathwish.name: Madness Deathwish
madness-deathwish.description: Madness Deathwish is an animation killing game where you can choose any possible mad ways to die.

duo-with-friends.name: DUO With Friends
duo-with-friends.description: DUO With Friends is an advanced variation ofUNOwith new tournaments, rules, gameplay modes, special cards, and much more. Unlike UNO, DUO With Friends allows space for up to 8 players in an online game.
duo-with-friends.faq:
What is DUO With Friends?

It is a card game based on UNO, and follows most of the same rules.

How many people can I play DUO With Friends with?

You can play online with up to 8 players.
duo-with-friends.how_to_play:
Much like UNO, DUO has special cards of its own. These are:

  • Wild 'Find 0': The next player has to keep drawing until they find a card featuring the number zero.
  • Wild 'Switch Cards': The player swaps all their cards with the next player.
  • Wild 'Double': The next player draws as many cards as they have in their hand.
  • Wild 'Number Shuffle': Randomizes the numbers on all number cards.
  • Wild 'Watcher': All player cards are uncovered for 5 turns.

Features

  • Set up a custom match with your own flexible rules

Developer

Platform

polybusiness.controls: Use the left mouse button to play the game.

oiligarchy.name: Oiligarchy

oiligarchy.controls: Use the left mouse button to select different actions.

sandbox-city---cars-zombies-ragdolls.name: Sandbox City
sandbox-city---cars-zombies-ragdolls.description: Sandbox City - Cars, Zombies, Ragdolls! is a zombie game where you can explore freely and drive around the city, but, be careful of the zombie's infection! Find the zombies and kill them before the infection spreads around and the city.
sandbox-city---cars-zombies-ragdolls.controls:

  • T = enter and exit Slo-Mo mode

slime-farm-remake.name: Slime Farm Remake
slime-farm-remake.description: Slime Farm Remake is a clicker game in which you have to breed slimes that bring you money. There are eight types of different slimes that you can breed. You can also dress them up in different hats to make them look fancy, buy flowers for them, build a monument or even put up a music center. There are also exciting events waiting for you during the game.
slime-farm-remake.controls: Use the left mouse button to interact with the buttons.

painter-s-voyage-idle.name: Painter's Voyage Idle
painter-s-voyage-idle.description: Painter's Voyage Idle is an idle game about an artist who paints things and creatures on his travel journey. Acquire new tools, develop skills and fill up your gallery to become the best painter!
painter-s-voyage-idle.controls: Press the left mouse button to interact.

yummy-cupcake.name: Yummy Cupcake
yummy-cupcake.description: Yummy Cupcake is a simulation game to become the best cupcake chef. Bake the dough, choose the right paper cups, and decorate each cupcake with different kinds of toppings, frosting, and many more! Then sell all the cupcakes to your customers.
yummy-cupcake.controls: Use the left mouse button to play the game.

stone-idle.name: Stone Idle
stone-idle.description: Stone Idle is an incremental clicker game in which you need to gather stones. You can upgrade your stone production equipment with the stone you make, and later collect more valuable and rare resources! Become the best stone miner in the world of Stone Idle!
stone-idle.controls: Use the left mouse button or space to hit the stone.

tap-n-cut.name: Tap 'n Cut
tap-n-cut.description: Tap 'n Cut is a fun arcade game where you can upgrade your weapon and use power-ups to slice everything around.
tap-n-cut.controls: Use the left mouse button or space to swing your weapon.

yummy-chocolate-factory.name: Yummy Chocolate Factory
yummy-chocolate-factory.description: Yummy Chocolate Factory is a cooking game, especially for chocolate lovers like you! Finish the tasks to make some delicious and yummy chocolate, and lastly, dress up this little girl to make her look pretty to bring the chocolate with her!
yummy-chocolate-factory.controls: Use the left mouse button to play the game.

cupcake-clicker.name: Cupcake Clicker
cupcake-clicker.description: Cupcake Clicker is a clicker game where you must give as many clicks as possible to get many cupcakes and get large amounts of money. Improve your skills to prepare and ship cupcakes in less time.
cupcake-clicker.controls: Use the left mouse button or A to click the cupcake.

more-ore.name: More Ore
more-ore.description: More Ore is an incremental idle game with RPG elements. Destroy the ore, buy buildings for workers, and unlock new technologies to enhance ore production.
more-ore.faq:
How can I make the most ore from weak spots?

You can zoom in on your web browser to get the weak spots!

Can I play More Ore on mobile?

More Ore is a desktop browser game only! You can play it for free at CrazyGames.
more-ore.how_to_play:
Smash rocks to earn ore

Click on the rock repeatedly to earn ore. One of the first upgrades you should buy is the fragility spectacles. This highlights weak spots on the rock and gives you combos that increase the effect multiplier.

Collect loot from bags

There’s a chance for loot to drop from every rock you destroy. This is normally pickaxes that help you mine faster. You’ll also find gold nuggets that fall from the rock, collect these to earn more ores. Click the gold gift icon on the left for a random reward that may significantly boost your progress.

Build a mining society

You can use the ore to buy new buildings like stone huts, schools, farms, quarries, churches, and factories. All of these buildings automate ore production and give you various buff options to increase their output. The factory allows you to create refined ore.

Research new technologies

There are various new technologies to help you along. You can select how much mining power you want to utilize on research. A good upgrade to start with is the research power-up, which allows you to increase the research power, getting you new technology faster.

Features

  • Mine ore from rocks and use it to buy upgrades
  • Unlock new technologies using your research power
  • Build a society of mining-enthusiasts who put in the work for you
  • Random loot drops with the chance of finding rare items

More Games Like This

Idle games are highly engaging and addictive, which is why they’re so popular. Check out Planet Clicker 2 and dominate the solar system with the power of idling and clicking. Idle Breakout and Idle Mining Empire are two other great games like this too.

Release Date

May 2021

Developer

More Ore is developed by Syn.

Platform

Web browser

Is this the second Big Tower Tiny Square game?

How long does it take to beat Big Tower Tiny Square?

At least one hour if you're looking to do it all in one.

laser-lizard.controls:
Keyboard

  • Z = smash attack
  • X = ground smash attack
  • Hold Space = jump and stomp

  • Right arrow key / D: Move right

Gamepad (Xbox / PS)

  • X / square = smash attack
  • Y / triangle = ground smash attack
  • Hold A / cross = jump and stomp
  • Hold B / circle = laser (up and down / D-pad to set the angle)
  • Left and right (D-pad) = move and trample

Laser Lizard also supports touchscreen, if you are on mobile you should see virtual buttons with the same layout as the gamepads.

solar-system-scope.name: Solar System Scope

warlords-2-rise-of-demonds.name: Warlords 2: Rise of Demons
warlords-2-rise-of-demonds.description: Warlords 2: Rise of Demons is a battle game to choose a race in the land of Beneril, buy upgrades, and take over the world by defeating all the enemies.
warlords-2-rise-of-demonds.controls: Use arrow keys to choose and place your selected troops. Press space to spawn your troops.

fashion-box-glam-diva.name: Fashion Box: Glam Diva

fashion-box-glam-diva.controls: Use the left mouse button to choose makeup and clothes.

funny-battle-simulator-2.name: Funny Battle Simulator 2
funny-battle-simulator-2.description: Funny Battle Simulator 2 is a battle simulation game where you tactically place an army and take them into battle. Add a variety of units to fight for your side, from cavemen to bears with miniguns.
funny-battle-simulator-2.faq:
How can I maximize my power in Funny Battle Simulator 2?

You can watch a rewarded ad to earn a special unit or increase your "P".

Is Funny Battle Simulator 2 a difficult game?

It's more of a fun casual game than a serious strategy title.

What are some other games like Funny Battle Simulator 2?

There are hundreds more battle games on CrazyGames. If you want to take the battle online and play something different, try out Diep.io and Agar.io.
funny-battle-simulator-2.controls:
• Left mouse button = create a unit
  • Right mouse button + CTRL = delete unit
  • WASD = standard movement
  • WASD + Right mouse button (Hold) = alternative move
  • Shift = speed up movement
  • Q / E = rotate the camera

princess-lovely-fashion.name: Princess Lovely Fashion
princess-lovely-fashion.description: Princess Lovely Fashion is a dress-up game to choose an outfit, hairstyle, and make-up to make the princesses look stunning!
princess-lovely-fashion.controls: Use the left mouse button to play the game.

chipuzik-s-evolution.name: Chipuzik's Evolution
chipuzik-s-evolution.description: Chipuzik's Evolution is a merge game to combine two identical chipuziks and discover a new cooler one. Buy upgrades in the store to earn more coins. Try to open all 4 worlds and 24 chipuziks. Good luck!
chipuzik-s-evolution.controls: Hold and drag the left mouse button to combine the chipuziks.

bounce-blocku-golf.description: Bounce Blocku Golf is an arcade game to throw the golf ball into the hole. Avoid obstacles to complete each challenging level.
bounce-blocku-golf.controls: Drag the left mouse button to throw and release the ball.

hard-game-2.name: Hard Game 2
hard-game-2.description: Hard Game 2 is a platform game where you must reach the finish point by passing through the obstacles. You need to jump around, dash, and slide to avoid obstacles; otherwise, you'll need to start over. Always know that you can take a break in this challenging game.
hard-game-2.controls:

  • D / right arrow key = move to the right

fabby-golf.controls:
• Drag the left mouse button to adjust power and aim, release it to shoot
  • Press R to restart

riot-escape.name: Riot Escape
riot-escape.description: Riot Escape is an action game where you play as part of an escapee mob or a cop. Escapees must reach the end of the map without being stopped by the police. If you’re a cop, then you stop the mob from escaping!
riot-escape.faq:
Is Riot Escape a tricky game?

No, the game is a free-to-play casual game which are typically very easy to learn.

Can I play Riot Escape on mobile?

Yes, you can play it in your web browser on any device.
riot-escape.how_to_play:
Run, climb and dodge authority

When you’re playing as an escapee, run through the map dodging cops and other unfortunate obstacles. Climb up buildings and avoid traps to outsmart law enforcement and reach the finish line.

Stop the mob from escaping

If you’re a cop, prepare for the rioters and swing your bat to knock them down and bring immediate justice. If too many mob members get through, you’ll have to try again.

Unleash your temporary upgrades

At the beginning of each round, you’re offered a choice between two temporary buffs. These can range from extra speed to getting a quad bike, flying, and becoming a giant! Keep your eyes peeled for these super powerful enhancements.

More Games Like This

When you've finished playing Riot Escape, try out some more of our fun and free casual games. There are other popular titles in this category that you can play instantly, like 12 MiniBattles and Helix Jump.

Release Date

  • February 2021 (iOS)
  • March 2021 (Android)
  • March 2022 (WebGL)

Developer

Riot Escape was made by Yso Corp. Their other popular games include Wood Farmer and Hide N Seek.

Platforms

  • Web browser
  • Android
  • iOS

lazy-jumper.name: Lazy Jumper
lazy-jumper.description: Lazy Jumper is an arcade game to make the lazy guy jump around and enter the swimming pool. Destroy everything in front of your way to get stars.
lazy-jumper.controls: Use space or the left mouse button to make the lazy guy jump.

merge-army.name: Merge Army
merge-army.description: Merge Army is a merge battle game where you build up a mighty army for battle. Merge your units to create stronger fighters and take them into the arena. Earn gold for your victories and prepare your military for more brutal battles.
merge-army.faq:
How do I increase my power quickly in Merge Army?

Use the rewarded ads to get 3x the gold bonus and quickly accelerate your manpower after each round.

How do I defeat the bosses in Merge Army?

Save your asteroid for the boss battles. If you have one available, you will see a button for it during the fight.
merge-army.controls: Drag the left mouse button to merge the units.
merge-army.how_to_play:
Buy and merge warriors to make them more powerful

Purchase units with your available money, then take them into the arena! When you have the same unit in equal numbers on separate squares, you can combine them together to level them up and gain space for more military might.

Unlock more classes as you progress

Various fighters are available; you’ll get more as you level up. There are javelins, giants, catapults, and more, all with merge capabilities. Each unit has multiple stages of progression.

Build the ultimate Merge Army

Fight evermore ferocious battles and unleash fireballs on your enemies as your army grows bigger and reaches new levels of evolution.

haste-miner-2.name: Haste-Miner 2

Use your money to upgrade your pickaxe as well as travel to new mines. Find and open treasures, buy and upgrade idle generators, and also purchase and use pickaxe skins.

hyperspace-racers-3.name: Hyperspace Racers 3

Complete the Mission Mode to unlock new worlds and new vehicles. Keep track of your health! If it goes down to zero, it's game over. Run over the green healing pads to regain health and boost.

haunted-school---horror-game.name: Haunted School

drawer-super-racer.description: Drawer Super Racer is an arcade game to draw your shape of legs and win the race. Collect superpowers (Boost, Speed-up Engine, and Big jump) when it appears by holding onto them!

sharkosaurus-rampage.name: Sharkosaurus Rampage

How many levels are there in Sharkosaurus Rampage?

There are 16 levels in total in the game.

Is Sharkosaurus Rampage suitable for kids?

The game features mild violence. There is a setting to turn off blood in the options menu. It's best to try the game yourself and judge whether it is suitable.

shape-shooter-2.faq:
What are some survival tips for Shape Shooter 2?

Once you lose your shield, work quickly to regain it by collecting blue orbs. Always take the special upgrades when they are offered i.e. shotgun conversion. These dramatically increase the power of your weapon in only one upgrade.

Is there an end to Shape Shooter?

What kind of game is Ball Blast?

Is Ninja Hands an easy game to play?

Yes, it's a fun casual game that anyone can play. Nothing too serious!

Can I play Ninja Hands on mobile?

Yes, but you have to download the dedicated app for Android or iOS depending on your device.

Can I play Ninja Hands for free

You can play Ninja Hands and other action games entirely free at CrazyGames.

ninja-hands.how_to_play:
Become the ultimate ninja

Use different button combos to initiate various skillful attacks. You can shoot fireballs, throw shurikens, use a samurai sword, and much more! This is your time to prove yourself as a ninja warrior.

Upgrade your abilities

You can make your Ninja Hands more powerful in the skills menu by leveling up your moves. Your upgraded skills come with new animations and more ferocious firepower.

Use bonuses for a temporary buff

At the start of each round, you’re offered two choices for a bonus. These in-game boosts can be anything from a TNT-carrying turkey to a guardian bear who helps fight away the bad guys. They offer a great variety of entertainment, so try using them as much as possible.

incremental-epic-hero-2.name: Incremental Epic Hero 2

incremental-epic-hero-2.controls: Use the left mouse button to interact with the in-game UI.

oneline.name: One Line
oneline.description: One Line is a casual art drawing game where your mission is to use a single line to protect an innocent man from a series of unfortunate events. From shielding him against heavy rain to fending off aggressive bees and even angry giants, each level presents a new challenge. Get creative and use the power of One Line to ensure he stays safe, all while enjoying the simple yet satisfying drawing mechanics. The more you play, the more you'll need to think outside the box to keep him protected!
oneline.faq:
What can I do if I get stuck in One Line?

There is a hint button that you can use if you're stuck on a level.

Is One Line an easy game?

There is a mixture of easy and tricky levels in One Line. Generally, the levels get harder as you progress.

How to play the line game?

To play One Line, you need to draw lines to escape a variety of scary scenarios like boulders, bullets, giants, bees, and many more elements that are just a second away.
oneline.controls: Drag the left mouse button to draw.
oneline.how_to_play:
In One Line, your mission is to protect an oblivious man from a variety of threats by drawing a single line. From falling boulders to aggressive bees and even bullets, dangers are constantly looming. The puzzles start simple, but as you progress, the challenges become more complex with new elements to consider. Your line can block, divert, or shield the man, but it’s up to your creativity to figure out the best way to keep him safe.

You only need to protect the man for 3 seconds to complete each level, but how you do it is where the challenge lies. There are often multiple ways to draw the line effectively, so think outside the box and experiment with different strategies. As you advance, you’ll face more difficult scenarios that require quick thinking and precision to ensure your safety.

If you find yourself stuck, don’t hesitate to use the hints. They’ll show you the ideal line for each level, offering a helpful guide when you’re unsure how to proceed.

Game Tips

  • There is often more than one way to draw a line good enough to save the character
  • You only need to keep the man safe for 3 seconds to complete the level
  • Think creatively about how you can protect the man using a single line
  • Use the hints when you’re stuck - they will show you the ideal line

cube-gun.name: Cube Gun
cube-gun.description: Cube Gun (Pixel 3D) is a multiplayer game where you can be creative to build amazing voxel structures. The best part of the game is that you can build using strange materials that you won't find in any other game. Create your imaginative structures and start building!
cube-gun.controls:
• WSAD = move
  • Space = jump
  • K = respawn
  • Left-click = shoot
  • Hold left-click + Cubegun = remove block
  • V = drop weapon
  • E = use item
  • Q = holster weapon
  • Esc / M = menu

fruit-clicker.name: Fruit Clicker
fruit-clicker.description: Fruit Clicker is anidle gamewhere you develop your fruit farm, buy dozens of unique upgrades, unlock new fruits, juice production, laboratory, and more! You can also create juice and get gold to expand production and become the main fruit maker in the world.
fruit-clicker.controls: Use the left mouse button to play.

bloons-player-pack-1.name: Bloons Player Pack 1
bloons-player-pack-1.description: Bloons Player Pack 1 is a fun arcade game where you must help the monkey to pop all the balloons with its darts.
bloons-player-pack-1.controls: Hold the left mouse button to set power and release it to shoot the dart.

magic-hands.name: Magic Hands
magic-hands.description: Magic Hands is a funcasual gamewhere you cast spells on the approaching enemies. Use different key combos tocreate magic spellsand clear the enemies from each level!
magic-hands.controls:
• Left mouse button = move the camera
  • Keyboard = use special elements

more-bloons.name: More Bloons
more-bloons.description: More Bloons is an arcade game where you must help this little monkey to pop all the balloons to finish the level.
more-bloons.controls: Hold the left mouse button to set power and release to shoot the dart.

tictoc-paris-fashion.name: Tictoc Paris Fashion
tictoc-paris-fashion.description: Tictoc Paris Fashion is a beauty game where you help the girl become a Tictoc star by making her fashionable in Paris. Follow the hint to choose the right make-up, clothes, hairstyles, and accessories. Make her look stylish on every reel and get many likes, and earn money to buy new items.

fly-for-fly.name: Fly for Fly
fly-for-fly.description: Fly for Fly is an action game to fill the nerve bar by annoying the students. Can you complete the objective successfully?
fly-for-fly.controls: WASD or arrow keys to move the fly.

math-duck.name: Math Duck
math-duck.description: Math Duck is a unique and addicting math-puzzle platformer game where you must help the duck to answer the math quiz correctly in the right order. Take the key to the exit door that appears after you answer all the math quizzes, and go to the exit door fast! You only got 10 seconds on each level, so take the quickest route possible.

biomons-island-3d.name: Biomons Island 3D
biomons-island-3d.description: Biomons Island 3D is a funcasual gamewhere you manage your own pet shop. Go catch the fox, penguin, polar bear, and more to expand your mini mart and attract more visitors. Become the best zoo tycoon in the idle animal park! Discover new mystery biomons in your idle animal park and collect them. There is a customer for every biomon!
biomons-island-3d.controls:
• WASD or arrow keys or drag left mouse button = move
  • Left mouse button = interact with the in-game buttons

idle-noob-lumberjack.name: Idle Noob Lumberjack
idle-noob-lumberjack.description: Idle Noob Lumberjack is an arcade game where you can collect and sell resources, build houses, and discover new lands. The more land you discover, the more resources you can collect. Hire small minions who can help you to collect resources while you are resting.
idle-noob-lumberjack.controls:
• WASD / arrow keys = move
  • Left-click = interact with the in-game UI

launch-idle-3d.name: Launch Idle 3D
launch-idle-3d.description: Launch idle is a clicker game where you need to launch various objects at a distance and the further the object flies, the more coins you get!
launch-idle-3d.controls: Use the left mouse button to launch the objects.

dress-up---games-for-girls.name: Princess Dress Up
dress-up---games-for-girls.description: Dress Up - Games for Girls is a beauty game where you can dress up 12 princesses in fancy outfits. These gorgeous princesses are waiting for amazing makeovers and new fabulous dress up. Use your fashion sense and your internal fashionista talent to create the best outfit for each princess girl. Choose a hairstyle, dress, gloves, shoes, wings, and other accessories for your princess girls. This game lets young fashionistas develop their taste and fashion designer skills.
dress-up---games-for-girls.controls: Use the left mouse button to choose the outfit.

derby-crash-5.name: Derby Crash 5
derby-crash-5.description: Derby Crash 5 is a driving game where you can drive your car freely. There are two large islands separated by the sea through which a military aircraft carrier sails through. It is possible to jump onto the track with vehicles from the headlands of each island.
derby-crash-5.controls:
• WASD / arrow keys = drive
  • Space = hand brake
  • Enter = unflip
  • C = change camera
  • R = repair
  • T = time frame

basketball-serial-shooter.name: Basketball Serial Shooter
basketball-serial-shooter.description: Basketball Serial Shooter is an arcade basketball game where you must throw the ball into the basket before the time runs out. Try to make as many points as you can on each play. Good luck!
basketball-serial-shooter.controls: Use the left mouse button to throw the ball.

let-me-eat-big-fish-eat-smaller.name: Let Me Eat: Big Fish Eat Smaller
let-me-eat-big-fish-eat-smaller.description: Let Me Eat: Big Fish Eat Smaller is an arcade game where you start the game as a small angelfish and you should try to become bigger by eating smaller fish. The ocean is big and full of surprises, so, try not to come across big fish that could bite you immediately. Be patient while growing up, and you can take down the bigger fish!
let-me-eat-big-fish-eat-smaller.controls:
• Hold left-click and move the mouse / WASD = control the fish
  • Space = dash

bounce-out.name: Bounce Out
bounce-out.description: Bounce Out is a casual game where you play as a monster who must eat all the humans in the area. Play by dragging and aiming toward the enemies. Each enemy will give you lore force, and every single enemy will be more powerful the further you go. So be careful and choose whom to eat first.
bounce-out.controls: Drag the left mouse button to aim and release it to jump.

relic-splatter.name: Relic Splatter
relic-splatter.description: Relic Splatter is a platform game where you must collect three gold relics to be able to open the door. The relics may hide behind the walls, so find the secret walls and destroy them using a bazooka. You can also collect additional red relics if you feel more adventurous! Avoid traps and kill enemies that interfere with your mission.
relic-splatter.controls:
• WASD / arrow keys = move
  • Space = change weapon
  • Enter = enter the door
  • Left-click = shoot
  • Move mouse = aim

escape-the-dog.name: Escape the Dog
escape-the-dog.description: Escape the Dog is anarcade gamewhere a big dog chases whoever has its bone. Be fast to get rid of the bone before the dog eats you! It's like a Hot Potato game, but with bigger stakes.
escape-the-dog.controls:
• WASD / arrow keys = move around
  • X = attack (when playing as the dog)
  • Left-click = interact with in-game UI

spooky-tripeaks.name: Spooky Tripeaks
spooky-tripeaks.description: Spooky Tripeaks is a Halloween variation of the Solitaire card game. You need to pass all 100 levels. Use jokers and other bonus cards to simplify the process. You can get the bonus cards by clicking on the ghosts and other spooky characters.
spooky-tripeaks.controls: Use the left mouse button to select the card.

time-control.name: Time Control!
time-control.description: Time Control! is a casual game where you can manipulate time. Use your time control skill to dodge the obstacles and complete the missions.
time-control.controls: Use the left mouse button to control time.

berzingue.name: Berzingue
berzingue.description: Berzingue is a minimalist 3D racing game where you drive at full speed on the vertiginous roads of the 6 circuits to try to finish first and accumulate enough points. You have to control your speed to avoid going off the track during turns and especially jumps. A division is made up of 3 drivers who will compete for over 6 races and 2 laps per race. The best times are recorded but are not decisive for victory. The game offers 2 profiles, 6 circuits, 4 divisions, 11 opponents, a limited turbo, a replay after each race, and a table of the best times achieved per race and per lap.
berzingue.controls:
• Up arrow key = accelerate
  • Down arrow key = brake
  • Left or right arrow keys = turn
  • Control = turbo
  • Esc = exit fullscreen
  • (on mobile you only have to control the speed with your thumbs to stay on the track by going as fast as possible)

shape-crusher.name: Shape Crusher
shape-crusher.description: Shape Crusher is an arcade-style shooter where you shoot various shapes and build your score. Upgrade your weapons progressively and unlock new ships with greater starting power. Jump into the chaotic shooting action!

castle-keeper.name: Castle Keeper
castle-keeper.description: Castle Keeper is a defense game where you fight the enemy and protect the castle. Use your archer skills to shoot at the troops and throw ladders or fire barrels to do more damage. Upgrade your character, unlock new abilities, and become stronger!
castle-keeper.controls: Use WASD / arrow keys / drag the left mouse button to move the stickman.

chibi-doll-dress-up-coloring.name: Chibi Doll Dress Up & Coloring
chibi-doll-dress-up-coloring.description: Chibi Doll Dress Up & Coloring is a beauty game where you need to create and paint your doll in a new anime character. Become a real doll designer, create and makeover adorable anime characters with a baby doll!
chibi-doll-dress-up-coloring.controls: Use the left mouse button to dress up and color.

nubik-vs-herobrin-s-army.name: Nubik vs Herobrin's Army
nubik-vs-herobrin-s-army.description: Nubik vs Herobrin's Army is an arcade game where you hordes of monsters. Craft weapons, upgrade them, and use them to defeat enemies. Become a hero and save your brother!
nubik-vs-herobrin-s-army.controls:
• WASD or arrow keys = move
  • Left mouse button = attack
  • Drag the weapons in the inventory to the same weapon to get an upgrade.
  • (on mobile control takes place through the on-screen joystick)

void-scrappers.name: Void Scrappers
void-scrappers.description: Void Scrappers is an action game where you blast hordes of alien ships into junk. Collect the scrap to upgrade your ship into an unstoppable force of destruction. Unlock new characters and weapons and upgrade your stats between runs.

halloween-chainsaw-massacre.name: Halloween Chainsaw Massacre
halloween-chainsaw-massacre.description: Halloween Chainsaw Massacre is an action game where the city was filled with magical monster pumpkins. Use your chainsaw and destroy all enemies! Saw them apart. Make a long-range throw at the enemy and tear him apart. Use a circular attack and take down all the pumpkins around. Free the city and become a hero!
halloween-chainsaw-massacre.controls:
• Left mouse button (hold) = chainsaw attack
  • Right mouse button = spin attack
  • F = jump attack
  • Mouse = look around
  • WASD = movement
  • Space = jump
  • Shift = run
  • (on mobile, tap the screen for the in-game controls)

dinosaurs-merge-master.name: Dinosaurs Merge Master
dinosaurs-merge-master.description: Dinosaurs Merge Master is a casual, cute animal game where you merge powerful dinosaurs and warriors to create a pretty unstoppable army. Carefully combine your characters to unlock stronger animals and put your creation to the test on the battlefield! As your army grows, so do the challenges—take on increasingly tough opponents, refine your tactics, and dominate the battlefield with your fearsome forces.
dinosaurs-merge-master.faq:
How do I create new units in Dinosaurs Merge Master?

Simply merge together two of the same unit to create a new more powerful unit.

Is Dinosaurs Merge Master available on mobile?

Yes, you can play this game on the web using desktop, Android, and iOS devices.

What is the game where you merge dinosaurs?

Dinosaurs Merge Master is a casual game where you merge dinosaurs and warriors to build a robust army.
dinosaurs-merge-master.controls: Drag the left mouse button to merge.
dinosaurs-merge-master.how_to_play:
The main goal in Dinosaurs Merge Master is to strategically merge your dinosaurs, evolving them into even more powerful creatures. As you merge them together, your newly created dinosaurs gain greater strength, ready to face off against increasingly tougher enemy dinosaurs on the battlefield.

Build a prehistoric army

Place your dinosaurs and human warriors on the battlefield and see how they fare against your foes. Spend the gold coinage earned from the battle on buying more units.

Merge like a master

Merge to create powerful new characters with more attacking power and health. Keep merging to concentrate all your power into one super unit. The cost of a new piece increases with every purchase, so merging gets tougher over time.

Unlock new dinosaurs

Every time you merge two new dinosaurs together, you unlock a stronger dinosaur. The same goes for the human warriors! You can see your collection so far by clicking the cards icon.

Travel to new lands

You’ll soon be on your way to conquering new lands as you unlock more exotic and beastly dinosaurs with an insatiable appetite for your enemies' bones.

draw-my-way.name: Draw My Way
draw-my-way.description: Draw My Way is a puzzle-based driving game where you need to reach the finish zone by drawing your own path. There will be obstacles so build your strategy to complete the level. You can drive three different vehicles and upgrade your car features. Levels get harder as you make progress!
draw-my-way.controls:
• A = move left
  • D = move right
  • Drag the left mouse button = draw

space-survivor.name: Space Survivor
space-survivor.description: Space Survivor is a 2D action game where you must survive by killing the aliens. Start the game with one skill of your choice and progress by filling your experience bar to get new skills and upgrades. Avoid touching the enemies, and stay alive!
space-survivor.controls: Use WASD / arrow keys / drag the left mouse button to move.

mussoumano-game.name: Mussoumano Game
mussoumano-game.description: Mussoumano is an arcade game where you must control the Brazilian rapper Mussoumano in an endless running adventure to save latifas. Choose between different transports and millions of possible visual customization, unlock achievements, and discover different game scenarios and challenges.
mussoumano-game.controls: Hold the right mouse button or left Ctrl to jump or dive.

makeup-studio---halloween.name: Makeup Studio: Halloween
makeup-studio---halloween.description: Makeup Studio: Halloween is a beauty game to create Halloween makeup looks for girls. Be a professional makeup artist and help out to create the most unique sassy and witchy looks. Bring you the spookiest Halloween looks from villains to Monster High!
makeup-studio---halloween.controls: Use the left mouse button to play this game.

infection-z.name: Infection Z
infection-z.description: Infection Z is an action game where after the unsuccessful experiment to create genetically modified soldiers, a terrible virus infected people. Some cities were attacked by this virus, and their inhabitants have turned into scary monsters. You and a detachment of elite fighters are sent to the center of the epidemic, where the bunker is located, in which the experiments were carried out. You will have to make your way through the crowd of zombies to get to your goal. Along the way, you will find a lot of different weapons that you can use to kill the monsters. You can also experience your power in the arena.
infection-z.controls:
• WASD or arrow keys = move
  • Scroll = select weapon
  • Space = jump
  • R = reload
  • P = pause
  • Left mouse button = fire
  • Right mouse button = weapon zoom
  • Shift = run
  • F = pick-up item
  • L = lock or unlock mouse

fantasy-madness.name: Fantasy Madness
fantasy-madness.description: Fantasy Madness is a roguelike action-survival game set in a wildpunk World of Fantasy. Your goal is to stand against evil forces who want to destroy the natural order. Use a wide arsenal of arcane powers granted by beloved Mother Nature to smash down orcs from the Clan of Aluminum Helmets and other cunning foes.
fantasy-madness.faq:
How can I survive the longest in Fantasy Madness?

Experiment with upgrade stacks to find combinations that work best for your character.

What kind of game is Fantasy Madness?

It is a roguelike game similar to other titles like 20 Minutes Til Dawn, Vampire Survivors, and Hades.

ninja-escape.name: Ninja Escape
ninja-escape.description: Ninja Escape is an action ninja game where you dodge obstacles and battle samurai. Jump, slide, and dash through each level and tackle all obstacles to proceed to the next level. Unlock new ninja skills as you progress.
ninja-escape.faq:
How do I unlock new ninjas in Ninja Escape?

Play more levels to unlock ninjas. Watch a short ad to claim the reward.

Can I play Ninja Escape on mobile?

Yes, the game works in web browsers on desktop and mobile devices.

How do you play Ninja Escape game?

To play Ninja Escape, you navigate through levels by dodging obstacles and fighting samurai. You'll need to jump, slide, and dash to overcome challenges and advance to the next stage. As you progress, you'll unlock new ninja skills to help you in your quest.

The key to a successful game is to use your ninja skills with the up / W and down / S keys. Your ninja moves fast, so you need to use all your ninja prowess.
ninja-escape.controls:
• W / up arrow key = use ninja skill
  • S / down arrow key = use ninja skill
  • A / left arrow key = move left
  • D / right arrow key = move right
  • Space / left-click = jump
ninja-escape.how_to_play:
Think fast like a ninja to ensure your escape! The levels get harder as you progress, so you must make your own moves quickly to succeed.

To survive, throw shuriken stars at the enemy samurai warriors and avoid falling to your death in any of the traps. Every few levels, you’ll have the option to unlock a new ninja with different abilities.

loot-box-hero.name: Loot Box Hero
loot-box-hero.description: Loot Box Hero is a clicker game where you earn coins by defeating enemies. Use coins for varieties of upgrades. You will also snowball your power by opening a loot box and collecting items. Challenge yourself on how further you can get!
loot-box-hero.controls: Use the left mouse button to play the game.

startup-fever.name: StartUp Fever
startup-fever.description: StartUp Fever is a fun idle game where you hire workers, give them projects, collect the cash and grow your business. You will start with the paper business. As you progress, the company will grow into an IT and logistics business. Keep hiring workers for more cash. Unlock new office areas, upgrade machines and increase production to earn more money. As you progress, you will discover new ways to make money! With enough money grow your team, stack more papers, upgrade machines, boost productivity, and more. Keep a watch on your workers. Don't let them sleep! This is your boss' life!
startup-fever.controls:
• WASD / arrow keys / drag left mouse button = move
  • Left-click = interact with the in-game buttons

bubble-pop-classic.name: Bubble Pop Classic
bubble-pop-classic.description: Bubble Pop Classic is a fascinating bubble shooter game with a stage-based style, each with its challenge!
bubble-pop-classic.controls:
• Drag or use the left mouse button to aim your shot and blast bubbles
  • Swap the bubbles with the right mouse or tap on your shooter
  • Click items to use and blast through levels

mini-golf-18.name: Mini Golf 18
mini-golf-18.description: Mini Golf 18 is a casual golf game where you avoid obstacles and find the shortest and easiest path to the hole. Can you complete all 18 holes and get the best score?
mini-golf-18.controls: Drag the left mouse button to adjust and aim, release to shoot.

noob-tower-defense.name: Noob Tower Defense
noob-tower-defense.description: Noob Tower defense is an action game where you build towers and traps for zombie monsters. Get coins after killing zombies and upgrade heroes to take revenge!
noob-tower-defense.controls:
• WASD or arrow keys = aim
  • Left mouse button = shoot zombies
  • (Tap the in-game controls on mobile)

chess-master.name: Chess Master
chess-master.description: Chess Master is a casual 3D chess game where you need logic and smart strategies to challenge your friends or AI bots and become a true Chess Master!
chess-master.controls:
• Use the left mouse button to move the pieces.
  • (Tap on mobile)

construction-idle.name: Construction Idle
construction-idle.description: Construction Idle is a clicker game where you must construct as many and more stylish buildings as possible! Simply click on the brick to build. Buy tools and workers to help you out and complete the building faster!
construction-idle.controls: Use the left mouse button to play the game.

capybara-clicker.name: Capybara Clicker
capybara-clicker.description: Capybara Clicker is aclicker gamewhere you multiply the capybara population by clicking. You can buy various upgrades to increase the output of capybaras, change the weather, and unlock new skins to make you the coolest capybara in town.
capybara-clicker.controls: Use the left mouse button to interact with the in-game UI.

pencil-rush.name: Pencil Rush
pencil-rush.description: Pencil Rush is a casual game where you pick up your tool – a colored pencil and start the challenge. Swipe pencils, trace, and race your way along the obstacle course. (You gotta avoid those obstacles. Hit them, and it’s game over!) Add to your color collection by picking up more pencils along the run. Run and make it to the finish line where you can color an amazing picture.
pencil-rush.controls: Drag the left mouse button or use AD to move the pencils.

office-dress-up-games.name: Office Dress Up
office-dress-up-games.description: Office Dress-Up is a dress-up game where you choose clothes for a professional woman to work in an office. Business clothing style is usually pretty conservative, especially in accounting and finance, but can be more relaxed in places like IT or the games industry. If you like dress-up and makeover games for girls, give it a try as a stylist and fashion designer for adult women who work in an office. They are beautiful, successful, and have a busy schedule because they are making a career in a large company. But their wardrobe is impeccable, and they are fashionistas in their soul. Business style includes skirts, trousers, shirts, jackets, dresses, shoes, and other items. Also choose hairstyles, fancy handbags, jewelry, and trendy accessories to dress up these virtual dolls. Design the outfits for the girls according to the company's dress code! A great makeover will make the professional woman stand out among her colleagues, make her more confident and raise her spirits.
office-dress-up-games.controls: Use the left mouse button to choose clothes.

santacraft.name: SantaCraft
santacraft.description: SantaCraft is a 3D action shooter game in which you must survive the zombies and try to reach the portal. Enjoy an intense shootout against the zombies in a vast blocky world. You are the only person alive, and your mission is to build the portal as soon as you can and use different types of weapons to shoot all the approaching zombies. Eliminate zombies in the world of Minecraft! You will have to be attentive and prepare your weapon to defend yourself from evil zombies.
santacraft.controls:
• WASD = move
  • LMB = shoot
  • RMB = aim
  • Space = jump
  • Left shift = run
  • (Tap the in-game menu on mobile)

crazy-grand-prix.name: Crazy Grand Prix
crazy-grand-prix.description: Crazy Grand Prix is a Formula 1 racing game where you play as a professional racer. You can play the career mode, practice mode, and even play with other people in multiplayer mode. Recruit a teammate, be the champion in the race, get the money prize, and use it to upgrade your racing car!
crazy-grand-prix.controls:
• W / up arrow key = accelerate
  • A / left arrow key = turn left
  • D / right arrow key = turn right
  • S / down arrow key = brake
  • B = look back
  • C = change camera view
  • Left-click = interact with the in-game UI

click-n-heroes.name: Click 'n' Heroes
click-n-heroes.description: Click 'n' Heroes is a clicker game in which you will have an exciting journey into the world of endless upgrading of the main character and allies.
click-n-heroes.controls: Use the left mouse button to attack the monsters and interact with the in-game UI.

tntcraft.name: TNTcraft
tntcraft.description: TNTcraft is a Bomberman-like game in a Minecraft world where your mission is to explode the zombie spawner using TNT. Make a team with an AI or play with your friend locally. Make tactics and explode zombies, but beware, some of the zombies can explode and may hurt you. There are four different maps available. Fight against zombies with your friend, make tactics, and blast your TNTs!
tntcraft.controls:
Player 1

  • WASD = move
  • T = place TNT

Player 2

  • Arrow keys = move
  • P = place TNT

puppet-fighter-2-player.name: Puppet Fighter 2 Player
puppet-fighter-2-player.description: Puppet Fighter 2 Player is a game you can play with your friend locally. Challenge your friends in this fun game with minimalistic graphics.

haste-miner-3-eternamine.name: Haste-Miner 3: Eternamine
haste-miner-3-eternamine.description: Haste-Miner 3: Eternamine is a Haste-Miner sequel with lots of gameplay! Mine to earn tokens, money, and gems. Upgrade and buy items to increase your gains, and venture into the dungeons and fight enemies to explore the infinitely deep mines.
haste-miner-3-eternamine.controls:
• WASD or arrow keys = move
  • Space = jump
  • Left mouse button = mine
  • Right mouse button = use item in hand
  • R = reset mine
  • E = interact
  • Tab = open inventory
  • Esc = pause

infinite-heroes.name: Infinite Heroes
infinite-heroes.description: Infinite Heroes is a board card game where you must join the magical world of adventure. Challenge the monster army and defeat the demon. Simple at first glance, the game will present you with complex challenges. Creatures, artifacts, portals, spells, and heroes. Play as a tireless adventurer, a powerful magician, a great warlock, or any of the eight heroes! Get loot and treasure to win. As you progress, the strength of your opponents will also grow, and to win, you need to think through every step.
infinite-heroes.controls: Drag the left mouse button to move the card.

brother-wake-up.name: Brother Wake Up
brother-wake-up.description: Brother Wake Up is a horror game where you must save your little brother from his deep sleep. The watchmaker put your little brother to sleep and broke the clock. If you don't fix the clock, your brother's sleep will last forever. To wake up your brother, you need to find all the clock's details and fix the clock. Only then will the watchmaker's spell break, and your brother will wake up. Beware of watchmaker assistants since they will also chase you. Don't be fooled that they look so cute. They will make you tremble with fear. This game is filled with horror, nightmares, and heartbreaking sounds. Fear and horror will be waiting for you around every corner. Take courage if you want to reach the end. Look for details and hidden passages. Solve riddles and hide from the enemy. You can hide from monsters in closets and under the bed. Monsters have good hearing. Move on your haunches, and they won't hear you. Monsters react differently to the flashlight, some can be driven away, but others will attack you instead.
brother-wake-up.controls:
• WASD or arrow keys = move
  • Space = jump
  • F = pick up / release item
  • E = interact with an object
  • 1,2,3 = inventory
  • Right-click = turn on / off the flashlight

dwarves-glory-death-and-loot.name: Dwarves: Glory, Death, and Loot
dwarves-glory-death-and-loot.description: Dwarves: Glory, Death, and Loot is an action game where you lead an army of dwarves to victory through various battles. In this auto-battle RPG, you can decimate orcs, fight trolls, and battle dragons. You’ll discover glory, death, and humongous scores of loot!
dwarves-glory-death-and-loot.controls:
• Use the left mouse button to choose your battle
  • Press the M button to open the menu

stick-archers-battle.name: Stick Archers Battle
stick-archers-battle.description: Stick Archers Battle is a fun archery game you can play by yourself or with your friend locally. Try to shoot arrows at your opponent by adapting to the changing environments and physics. Guess the right angles and distance so your arrows can get to your friend accurately. The one who reaches five scores first will win the game.
stick-archers-battle.controls:
Blue Player:

Hold W and release it to shoot.

Red Player:

Hold the up arrow key and release it to shoot.

flipper-dunk-3d.name: Flipper Dunk 3D
flipper-dunk-3d.description: Flipper Dunk 3D is a challenging single-tap pinball-basketball game. You'll need the patience of a monk and the precision of a master to dunk. See if you have what it takes to be a master dunker. The game is simple to learn but difficult to master, but it will be highly satisfying when you finally dunk that ball! Check outTap Tap Shotsfor a similar game.
flipper-dunk-3d.controls: Use the left mouse button to use the flap.

train-adventure.name: Train Adventure
train-adventure.description: Train Adventure is a casual game where you arm a train with weapons and seek out resources. Shoot down enemies along the way and collect as much as possible!
train-adventure.controls: Use the left mouse button to start the wave.

fantasy-idle-tycoon.name: Fantasy Idle Tycoon
fantasy-idle-tycoon.description: Fantasy Idle Tycoon is an idle game where you must build yourself a blacksmith empire by managing your blacksmiths in this fantasy universe! Expand your empire by managing your investors.
fantasy-idle-tycoon.controls: Use the left mouse button to interact with the in-game UI.

shepherd-farm.name: Shepherd Farm
shepherd-farm.description: Shepherd Farm is a business game where you play as a loyal shepherd's dog who helps to run the sheep farm. The customers want wool yarns, and the demand is increasing! Shepherd your herd, shear that fluffy wool, and process them into wool skeins to grow your business! A shepherd's life was never that easy! Grow your own fluffy business!
shepherd-farm.controls: Use the WASD / arrow keys / drag the left mouse button to move around.

save-my-pets.name: Save My Pets
save-my-pets.description: Save My Pets is a casualpuzzle gamefor people looking for something addictive, fun, and challenging with simple gameplay! Simply draw lines to create walls that protect the dog from attacks by angry bees. Use yourlogicto save the pets and enjoy the game!
save-my-pets.controls: Drag the left mouse button to draw.

clickermon.name: Clickermon
clickermon.description: Clickermon is aclicker gamewhere you collect, upgrade, and evolve a monster for battle. Embark on an incredible adventure through a fantastic world of creatures, battling against wild monsters and improving your strength as you progress.

funny-angela-haircut.name: Funny Angela Haircut
funny-angela-haircut.description: Funny Angela Haircut is a simulation game where you play as a hairdresser. Give Angela the best hairstyle ever! Enjoy tons of professional tools like curling irons, blow dryers, scissors, magic hair-growing spray, and so much more! Dye her hair in a variety of colors. Complete the makeover with a stylish outfit. Mix and match cute clothes and dress up Angela to become more fashionable!
funny-angela-haircut.controls: Use the left mouse button to stye Angela's hair.

live-avatar-maker-girls.name: Live Avatar Maker: Girls
live-avatar-maker-girls.description: Live Avatar Maker: Girls is a beauty game where you can create your character. Meet cute avatar creator & fashion OC maker with many functions. All facial features are animated and highly customizable. Choose the size and shape of the eyes, lips, ears, nose, and customize your hairstyle.
