Clothes and accessories are stylish and perfect to combine. Mix, match, and have fun!
live-avatar-maker-girls.controls: Use the left mouse button to change face settings and clothes.

tag-2-3-4-players.name: Tag 2 3 4 Players
tag-2-3-4-players.description: Tag 2 3 4 Players is a casual multiplayer game that allows up to four friends to compete in a fast-paced game of tag, all on the same device! With various unique environments to explore, each filled with interactive elements, you can use clever strategies and quick reflexes to outmaneuver and catch your friends.
tag-2-3-4-players.faq:
How do I teleport in Tag 2 3 4 players?

Look out for the small portals scattered around the level. They are one-time use only.

Does Tag 2 3 4 players feature online gameplay?

No, however you can play locally with up to four players!
tag-2-3-4-players.controls:
PC

Red Player

WAD / Q

Blue Player

Arrow keys / C

Yellow Player

IJL / Y

Green Player

TFH / M

Mobile

Use the buttons in the corner of the screen to control. Tap on the button to move the player. Hold on to the buttons to jump.
tag-2-3-4-players.how_to_play:
There are 3 locations to play in. These are forest, desert, and taiga. Each level has a totally unique theme! Play with a friend or up to 4 players locally and see who the master at playing tag is. You can choose between two control schemes when selecting your characters.

Each level features an interactive environment. There are trampolines, teleports, and buffs to give each player an edge when interacting with them. Run around and do your best to catch and dodge your friends.

From dodging obstacles to setting traps, every match offers endless fun and opportunities for creative gameplay. Whether you're evading capture or closing in on your target, the game keeps you on your toes with its energetic and unpredictable action. Gather your friends, choose your favorite setting, and begin the fun. Tag, you're it!

idle-coffee-business-xmi.name: Idle Coffee Business
idle-coffee-business-xmi.description: Idle Coffee Business is a clicker game where you grow your coffee shop from a tiny plot to a multi-zillionaire conglomerate empire. Serve different kinds of coffee to earn coins. Unlock different coffee recipes to generate more coins and upgrade your recipes to improve profits. Going offline? No worries, the coffee business works for you! Generate idle income while you are away, and come back to see how much you earned.
idle-coffee-business-xmi.controls: Drag the left mouse button to grow your coffee shop empire.

eggy-car.name: Eggy Car
eggy-car.description: Eggy Car is a casual game where you drive a car containing a loose egg over hilly roads. When the egg falls out of your vehicle, it breaks and the game ends. RIP! Collect power-ups to help you get further. Good luck and godspeed egg soldier.
eggy-car.controls:
• A / left arrow key = go backward
  • D / right arrow key = go forward

break-it---brick-breaker.name: Break it - Brick Breaker
break-it---brick-breaker.description: Break it - Brick Breaker is a casual game where you need to hit the bricks to break it. Are you up to the challenge?
break-it---brick-breaker.controls: Drag the left mouse button to hit the bricks.

noob-miner-escape-from-prison.name: Noob Miner: Escape From Prison
noob-miner-escape-from-prison.description: Noob Miner: Escape From Prison is a casual game where you play as a prisoner and mine for resources. Get resources, buy new picks, eat cakes, blow up everything with dynamite, and find a way to escape prison. How soon will you be able to escape?
noob-miner-escape-from-prison.faq:
How do you place things in Noob Miner on Chromebook?

Left-click is used to mine blocks, and right-click is used to place blocks in Noob Miner: Escape From Prison.

What is the game about breaking out of prison?

Noob Minder: Escape From Prison is a casual game where you play a prisoner looking for a way to escape.

Is Noob Miner mobile friendly?

Yes, you can play Noob Miner: Escape From Prison on mobile, desktop, and tablet, so you can enjoy the game on most devices.
noob-miner-escape-from-prison.controls:
Keyboard

  • WASD / arrow keys = move
  • Left-click = mine blocks / items
  • Right-click = place blocks / items
  • E = inventory / interact
  • Esc / left-click on the pause button = pause

Mobile

  • Left joystick = Move
  • Right joystick = mine blocks / items
  • Tap on the screen on an empty place = place blocks / items
noob-miner-escape-from-prison.how_to_play:
Learn the basics

You’re trapped in a prison, and you need to escape! The prison director is suspiciously helpful and will walk you through the basics of the game to start. You’ll discover the pick shop where you can buy new picks, the food shop, and the director’s office, and you’ll notice a mysterious elevator at the end that you can access with gold.

Explore the world

Complete the quests given in the top right of your screen. Scavenge the 2D pixelated world for resources and use them to craft new items or sell them for gold. You’ll find new and interesting places to explore in this vast world as you progress.

Survive

Like Minecraft and other survival games, you must consume food to survive. If you let the food bar deplete, you die pretty quickly. When you die, you lose all your stuff, so stay fed!

Escape

Ultimately the goal in Noob Miner: Escape From Prison is to break out of jail. You need to work hard to get out, and there are two ways to escape.

Features

  • Several types of traders who buy and sell resources
  • A large map with hidden resources
  • The ability to upgrade your noob character
  • 2 unique endings (2 escape options)
  • Mine generator, pump it up, and extract more resources.

Release Date

September 2022

Developer

Platonov Developer developed this game.

Platform

Web browser (desktop and mobile)

More Games Like This

Once you've escaped prison, you will be free to play more games! Browse our casual category for similar games or try popular titles like Eggy Car, Super Auto Pets, or Snow Rider 3D.

zombie-defense.name: Zombie Survival
zombie-defense.description: Zombie Survival is a survival game where you must protect your home from the zombie's attack at all costs! Shoot the zombies through your home windows and repair the broken ones to slow down the invaders. Unlock new rooms to enhance your defense area, and don't forget to upgrade your weapon to handle the increasing number of zombies at each wave. Avoid getting stuck in the corners, or the zombie will eat your brain!
zombie-defense.controls: Use WASD / arrow keys / drag left-click to move.

where-s-my-pizza.name: Where's My Pizza?
where-s-my-pizza.description: Where's My Pizza? is a fun casual game where your job is to create, cook and deliver pizzas to your hungry patrons! The journey is not always an easy one. Try not to lose any pizzas (or your head!) If you make a safe delivery, you'll get handsomely rewarded. Customers love to give big tips if the pizzas are cooked to their high expectations. Once your revenue is flowing, it's time to buy new ingredients, bigger ovens, and more pizza trailers for your bike so you can be the biggest pizza powerhouse in town!
where-s-my-pizza.controls:
• Left-click / space / up arrow key / right arrow key / W / D = accelerate
  • Release left-click / button = brake

iza-s-supermarket.name: Iza's Supermarket
iza-s-supermarket.description: Iza's Supermarket is a simulation game where you must help Iza to manage the supermarket. Stock the goods, hire employees, upgrade the store, and make the customers satisfied!
iza-s-supermarket.controls: Use WASD / arrow keys / drag mouse to move around.

avatar-make-up.name: Avatar Make Up
avatar-make-up.description: Avatar Make Up is a beauty game where you must help Olivia, Rose, and Ashley to do their make-up to attend the premiere of Avatar's new movie tonight. They want to get their make-up look inspired by this film's vibe. Come and help them with their stunning make-up!
avatar-make-up.controls: Use the mouse to play the game.

wednesday-clicker.name: Wednesday Clicker
wednesday-clicker.description: Wednesday Clicker is a clicker game with a bunch of Wednesday's movie elements in it. Follow certain actions to give you income in various ways. Increase your income and open all the activities!
wednesday-clicker.controls: Use the left mouse button to interact with the in-game UI.

creeper-army-defense.name: Creeper Army Defense
creeper-army-defense.description: Creeper Army Defense is an action game where you must survive and save yourself from the zombie hordes! They're coming to get you, and there are so many of them it's not even possible to count them! The only way out is to wipe them all out! The world is teeming with Creepers, and apparently, you're the only one who can solve it. Trying to escape is simply an impossible task, and if you try, nothing good will happen to you. You have no choice but to become an exceptional Creeper hunter. You'll need super weapons to detonate this army of zombies! Find new areas in this zombie game, unlock new weapons, and do some upgrades to make you even stronger than ever and be able to defeat and stop this army from hell! Shoot them while they are running toward you! They won't give up until they find you, run away or fight them all!
creeper-army-defense.controls:
• WASD / arrow keys / drag the left mouse button = move
  • Left-click = interact with in-game UI

monster-duel.name: Monster Duel
monster-duel.description: Monster Duel is a competition of monsters where you must win the battle to get the body parts of your opponent. Merge the best body parts to become fearsome, unlock combinations of overpowering spells, fight more incredible bosses, and become the most feared animal in the world!
monster-duel.controls:
• WASD / arrow keys / drag left-click = move
  • QERF = use skills

infinite-launch.name: Infinite Launch
infinite-launch.description: Infinite Launch is an action game where you can explore space and colonize planets. Create satellites so you can collect stars and use them to get a new planet. Fight with the aliens and conquer the universe!
infinite-launch.controls:
• Space = launch / stop rocket
  • A / left arrow key = tilt to the left
  • D / right arrow key = tilt to the right
  • S = create satellite
  • Left-click / X = shoot

draw-line.name: Draw Line
draw-line.description: Draw Line is an addicting puzzle game where you need to draw a path for your hero to reach the castle. It may seem easy at first, but watch out for upcoming obstacles. You can pass the level if your hero still holds the bar and touches the castle's flag, even if you touch obstacles. You can try again if you want a perfect pass with three stars! Drawing speed is also important, so plan well!
draw-line.controls: Drag the left mouse button to draw a line.

slime-clicker.name: Slime Clicker
slime-clicker.description: Slime Clicker is the ultimate clicker game where you make the slime multiply by clicking and buy upgrades to increase the rate of slime production. Unlock achievements, complete quests, and discover new types of slimes and environments to make a perfect cool-looking combo. Unlock all possible slimes and get billions of slime. Unlock achievements and be the best slime farmer. Feed your slime to make him happy to produce even more slime. You can also use the rebirth button to start the game over with an epic permanent slime bonus.
slime-clicker.controls: Use the left mouse button to click on the slime.

new-year-s-glitter-fest.name: New Year's Glitter Fest
new-year-s-glitter-fest.description: New Year's Glitter Fest is a dress-up game where you help the girls ready to celebrate New Year's Eve! The theme for this year’s celebration is glitter – perfect for the five Disney princesses who plan to get all dressed in glittery gowns and sequined dresses. Come and help them choose their best looks in the New Year’s Glitter Fest!
new-year-s-glitter-fest.controls: Use your mouse to play this game

haste-clicker.name: Haste-Clicker
haste-clicker.description: Haste-Clicker is an idle game where you click ores to break them. Clicking will earn you money to upgrade your clicking power, idle income, and unlock new ores. The game also has a rebirth system where you sacrifice your progress to increase your gains.
haste-clicker.controls: Use the left mouse button to interact with the in-game UI.

you-are-being-watched---horror-game.name: You Are Being Watched
you-are-being-watched---horror-game.description: You Are Being Watched is a survival game where you explore all the rooms, solve puzzles, unlock areas of the map, interact, and try to collect everything you find. If you want to survive in the game you will need to look for essential items and manage them properly. How long can you survive?
you-are-being-watched---horror-game.controls:
• WASD = move
  • LMB = shoot
  • RMB = throw
  • E = use / pick
  • Q = grab / examine
  • Space = jump
  • C = crouch
  • M = menu
  • Tab = inventory
  • 1234 = shortcuts

cats-and-bees.name: Cats and Bees
cats-and-bees.description: Cats and Bees is a casual game where you draw a line to create a wall to protect the cat from bees.
cats-and-bees.controls: Use the left mouse button to draw a wall.

doc-honeyberry-kitty-surgery.name: Doc HoneyBerry Kitty Surgery
doc-honeyberry-kitty-surgery.description: Doc HoneyBerry Kitty Surgery is a simulation game where you play as Doc HoneyBerry to help this cute little kitty from the crash. Take care of the injuries and heal the broken bones. After recovery, dress up the kitty with many styles and colors of clothes, pants, shoes, hats, and different pattern skins. Give the kitty a cute makeover!
doc-honeyberry-kitty-surgery.controls: Use the left mouse button to play the game.

ant-colony-new-war.name: Ant Colony: New War
ant-colony-new-war.description: Ant Colony: New War is an action clicker idle game where you are tasked to grow an ant colony. What fun! Explore a vast array of territories and engage in fierce battles with rival colonies as you strive for total dominance. Gather valuable resources to strengthen your forces and challenge other players in intense PvP combat. Strategically build and expand your colony, assembling the ultimate ant army capable of conquering any opposition.
ant-colony-new-war.faq:
How do I aquire new unit types in Ant Colony?

Defeat other colonies to recruit new units into the ranks.

How do I see my rank in Ant Colony?

Click the 'top players' button. Your rank and score will be at the bottom of this screen.
ant-colony-new-war.controls: Use the left mouse button to interact with the in-game UI.
ant-colony-new-war.how_to_play:
Start your first fight

How do you claim dominance as the leader of an Ant Colony? War. Starting with a small colony, you’ll fight your first battle of many. Battles are passive, you just need to ensure you have a solid army behind you before committing to the fight. You’re rewarded with resources for winning a battle.

Collect resources

A growing ant colony needs to be fed well. After your first battle, you can buy worker ants to collect mushrooms, leaves, and berries to feed this growing insect population. The more resources you gather, the faster you can grow your army of super ant soldiers! You should prioritize resource collecting, especially at the start.

Clash creatures in PvP

Ant Colony: New War features battles with other ant colonies controlled by players around the world. Prepare your forces and go on an ant hill raiding rampage to claim resources and powerful units from your enemies. All your battles affect your global rating in the ranking system. You can see the top players on the leaderboard!

garden-idle.name: Garden Idle
garden-idle.description: Garden Idle is anidle gamewhere you buy seeds, plant them, and manage your garden. Just hover your mouse over the ripe plants to collect them. Unlock a wide variety of plants as you progress. Purchase upgrades to help you with your garden and don't forget to expand your farm by buying a new plot of land!
garden-idle.controls: Move the mouse over the plants to collect them, and use the left mouse button to click on the in-game UI.

bubble-blast-pwd.name: Bubble Blast
bubble-blast-pwd.description: Bubble Blast is a fun casual bubble shooter game where you pop bubbles and complete quests. This is the classic game you find yourself and those around you playing on your morning commute to work. Progress through the levels, earning coins and perfecting your skills. Use boosters to help you reach three stars and return for daily rewards!
bubble-blast-pwd.faq:
How can I clear more bubbles in Bubble Blast?

Aim for the bubbles higher up. If the bubbles below are hanging from those bubbles, they will all fall at once.

How can I earn more points and achieve 3 stars in Bubble Blast?

Make sure every bubble you fire hits its intended target. Get streaks and combos to earn more points.
bubble-blast-pwd.controls: Drag the left mouse button to aim and shoot the bubbles.
bubble-blast-pwd.how_to_play:
Pop until you drop!

Shoot at bubbles with the same color as the one loaded in your bubble blaster to pop them. You can switch the bubble with one of another color if the one currently loaded isn’t useful.

Use various boosters

Bubble Blast features various boosters to help you destroy all the bubbles. You get to try the bomb and fireball for free when starting. Later in the game, you can use your gold coins to purchase other boosters, like improved accuracy. You can equip up to 3 boosters at once!

Complete various quests

Bubble Blast has various challenges to keep you playing your A-game. The objective in many levels is to pop all the bubbles, but there are other quests, like collecting crowns, as you progress through the game. There are various rewards like piggy banks to break and chests full of goodies to pop open.

Uncover hidden mysteries

Not only are there different base quests, but there are also sidequests to keep you engaged. For example, you gain magical petals every time you reach three stars in a level. You can open the secret garden when you earn 20 of these petals. Who knows what mysteries await you there?

planet-evolution-idle-clicker.name: Planet Evolution: Idle Clicker
planet-evolution-idle-clicker.description: Planet Evolution: Idle Clicker is an idle game where you build your own planet the way you like! It is an easy-to-learn, simple, and relaxing idle game in which you can decorate and build your own unique planets in different areas of the universe with beautiful objects.
planet-evolution-idle-clicker.controls: Use the left mouse button or space to click on the planet and collect gravity.

donut-clicker.name: Donut Clicker
donut-clicker.description: Donut Clicker is aclicker gamewhere you bake donuts by clicking. You can spend your donuts to upgrade your clicking power, idle income, and buy auto-clickers. The game has lots of features and an online leaderboard where players compete to be the biggest earners!
donut-clicker.controls: Use the left mouse button to interact with the in-game UI.

toilet-rush---draw-puzzle.name: Toilet Rush - Draw Puzzle
toilet-rush---draw-puzzle.description: Toilet Rush - Draw Puzzle is acasual gamewhere the objective is to reach the toilet first. Your mission, should you choose to accept it, is to connect the boy and girl with the porcelain throne using your amazing line-drawing skills. Look out for obstacles along the way!
toilet-rush---draw-puzzle.controls: Use the left mouse button to draw.

herobrine-vs-monster-school.name: Herobrine vs Monster School
herobrine-vs-monster-school.description: Herobrine vs Monster School is an archery game where you play as Herobrine who finally gets angry at all of the students of the Monster School who behaved terribly. Therefore, Herobrine decided to destroy Monster School and everything connected with it with his crossbow, wooden arrows, and TNT! Shoot zombies, slugs, skeletons, and bosses!
herobrine-vs-monster-school.controls: Move the mouse while pressing the left mouse button to aim, and release it to shoot.

yummy-pancake-factory.name: Yummy Pancake Factory
yummy-pancake-factory.description: Yummy Pancake Factory is a simulation game where you mix your pancake and pour it into the pan. Once your pancake is fluffy and golden brown, top it with various yummy toppings. Make each pancake perfect! Yummy tummy! Nothing better than a sweet, tasty pancake for your breakfast.

dino-defense.name: Dino Defense
dino-defense.description: Dino Defense is a casual game where you survive, make money, recruit workers, and build a bigger base to defeat the dinosaurs and survive. Let's drive these dinosaurs back to extinction to ensure our survival in this hostile world.
dino-defense.controls:
• WASD / arrow keys = move around
  • Hold left-click and move the mouse = move around / aim while using the machine gun

trial-bike-epic-stunts.name: Trial Bike Epic Stunts
trial-bike-epic-stunts.description: Trial Bike Epic Stunts is amotorbike gamewhere you ride your bike in various dangerous situations. Climb perilous mountains, blaze through industrial landscapes, and go underwater on your bike.
trial-bike-epic-stunts.controls:
• W / up arrow key = accelerate
  • S / down arrow key = brake
  • A / left arrow key = tilt to the left
  • D / right arrow key = tilt to the right

night-city-racing.name: Night City Racing
night-city-racing.description: Night City Racing is a car-driving game with fantastic races, epic stunts, and awesome supercars. Gear up for heart-pounding races and wild challenges that will test your skills! Rack up cash as you speed through the tracks and use it to upgrade to flashy, jaw-dropping cars. Whether you’re showing off your racing skills in epic two-player mode or going for solo glory, the trophy is yours for the taking. So buckle up, race hard, and let everyone know you’re the ultimate speed demon!
night-city-racing.faq:
How many cars are there in Night City Racing?

There are 10 cars to drive. You already own two - the other 8 you can buy with in-game money.

Is it worth completing the challenges in Night City Racing?

Yes, the challenges aren't too tricky and you earn good money for finishing them successfully.

Is there a free racing game?

There are plenty of racing games to play online in your browser. Some popular games include Night City Racing.
night-city-racing.controls:
If playing one-player

  • WASD / arrow keys = move
  • R-Shift / L-Shift = NOS
  • R = restart car position
  • T = look back
  • C = change camera view

If playing two-player

Player 1

  • Arrow keys = move
  • M = NOS
  • O = restart car position
  • L = look back
  • K = change camera view

Player 2

  • WASD = move
  • L-Shift = NOS
  • R = restart car position
  • T = look back
  • C = change camera view
night-city-racing.how_to_play:
Race against the competition

Get in the driver’s seat and tackle some of the world’s best sports cars head-on. As you progress, there are 16 racing challenges to complete that increase in difficulty. Take on anything from the tricky corners of city streets to the open landscapes of an airfield in these thrilling races.

Complete various challenges

Earn some extra cash by completing five fun challenges. You’ll race against an airplane and the clock to the finish line on a range of obstacle-laced tracks. If you’re successful, the money flows into your account.

Go for a spin in the free drive

Go stunt crazy in the open-world free-drive game mode. Rack up some cash doing epic stunts and speed around without limits in an open arena filled with ramps and other stunt-worthy objects.

Buy and upgrade your supercar

Use all that gold coinage you’ve earned as a reckless steering-wheel protagonist to expand your supercar collection. Tune up the engine and brakes, wear flashy new wheels, and treat yourself to a two-toned paint job. Night City Racing puts you in the driver’s seat.

ultimate-flying-car.name: Ultimate Flying Car
ultimate-flying-car.description: Ultimate Flying Car is a simulation car game where you take fast rides and flights on the long streets of the city. Explore the sky with stylish flying cars, or unlock new cars by participating in races. You can play all of these game modes either 1-player or 2-player.
ultimate-flying-car.controls:
Player 1:

  • WASD = control car
  • Shift = nitro
  • T = look back
  • R = fix car position
  • Space = handbrake

Player 2:

  • Arrow keys = control car
  • M = nitro
  • L = look back
  • U = fix car position
  • K = handbrake

eraze-that.name: Eraze That!
eraze-that.description: Eraze That! is a unique platform game with a hand-drawn experience in it. Draw a platform for you to run on it and wipe out all the dangerous ink stains that block you ahead. Overcome obstacles and increasingly tougher enemies. You have to act directly on the environment with your trusty pencil and the inseparable eraser.
eraze-that.controls: Drag the left mouse button to draw a platform and also to erase the enemies.

commit-battery-2.name: Commit Battery 2
commit-battery-2.description: Commit Battery 2 is an incremental clicker game where you fill your battery and unlock various powerful upgrades to keep the cash and electrons flowing. Can you reach the top and become the ultimate power source?
commit-battery-2.controls: Use the left mouse button to interact.

random-cards-tower-defense.name: Random Cards: Tower Defense
random-cards-tower-defense.description: Random Cards: Tower Defense is a tower defense game where you must use your strategy to decide which cards you will use for the battle. Each card has its own strength and its own power. Keep in mind that in order to win, you will need to calculate all the actions. Play out different tower defense scenarios, make wise decisions, and improve your cards.
random-cards-tower-defense.controls: Use the left mouse button to interact with the in-game UI.

mike-and-mia-1st-day-at-school.name: Mike And Mia 1st Day At School
mike-and-mia-1st-day-at-school.description: Mike And Mia 1st Day At School is a casual game where you must help both of them to get prepared for their first day of school. Help them to clean their room and make a delicious snack box. Get dressed up in various cute clothes. Enjoy the first day at school with fun and loving playful activities!
mike-and-mia-1st-day-at-school.controls: Use the left mouse button to play the game.

north-kingdom---siege-castle.name: North Kingdom: Siege Castle
north-kingdom---siege-castle.description: North Kingdom: Siege Castle is a 3D tower defense game where you defend your castle from an unrelenting siege. You need to restrain hordes of enemies by building a powerful wall, extracting resources, build defenses to survive. Become the most powerful force of the northern kingdom!
north-kingdom---siege-castle.controls:
• Mouse wheel = zoom in / out
  • Drag left-click = place tower
  • Drag right-click = camera movement

mx-offroad-master.name: MX Offroad Master
mx-offroad-master.description: MX Offroad Master is a driving bike game where you cycle down steep mountain slopes. Hop on any of the four mountain bikes and get ready for high-octane stunts. You can play either free ride or mountain ride game modes, and there is the option to play locally with a friend or solo.
mx-offroad-master.faq:
What does MX stand for dirt bike?

MX stands for motocross, a type of off-road racing on gravel, grass, mud and other closed circuits.

How can I earn more currency in MX Offroad Master?

The fastest way to earn coins and rubies is to play free ride and complete stunts.

How do I switch to first-person in MX Offroad Master?

You can switch to first-person by pressing "O" on your keyboard.
mx-offroad-master.controls:
Player 1

  • WASD = move
  • Space = front brake
  • S = rear brake
  • C = camera switch
  • R = restart position

Player 2

  • Arrow keys = move
  • R-shift = front brake
  • Down arrow key = rear brake
  • O= camera switch
  • P = restart position
mx-offroad-master.how_to_play:
Tackle the mountains

Ready, set, go! This fantastic downhill bike adventure features puts you on daring tracks high up in the hills and features retro PS1-era vibes. Tackle various terrains skilfully without crashing your bike.

Kit out your character

What is all this in-game currency for? Well, head over to the shop to find out. You can use the gold coins and the rarer rubies to buy all your biker gear. Buy new bikes, helmets, costumes, and chains to swag out your character fully.

Invite a friend to play

MX Offroad Master features a local two-player in both of the available game modes. That means you can challenge your friend to downhill races on choppy mountains or have fun in the stunt arena doing crazy moves on your bikes.

MX Offroad Master game modes

Mountain ride

The mountain ride mode times you as you progress down the track. Once you reach the end, you earn in-game currency and can move to the next mountain course.

Free ride

What if you want to practice your stunts and movement skills? That’s where free rides can help. In free ride mode, you can tackle obstacles at your leisure while earning in-game currency for doing various stunts.

grab-and-run.name: Grab and Run
grab-and-run.description: Grab and Run is a funny casual game where you must grab the most expensive things and carry them to the truck. Your time is limited, so choose what to take wisely. Use boosts and traps to slow down your opponents. Earn money to customize your hero.
grab-and-run.controls: Use WASD / arrow keys / drag the left mouse button to move around.

connect-idle.name: Connect idle
connect-idle.description: Connect idle is a casual game where you have to create your own road system. There will be different buildings in each block, draw roads between buildings to get profit in different currencies. Complete buildings to increase the number of cars. Improve the system with other currencies and expand your boundaries!

jelly-snake.name: Jelly Snake
jelly-snake.description: Jelly Snake is a unique snake game where only 1% of the super hand can go above level 100! From cute & simple levels to very difficult levels that developers have retried hundreds of times! Collect all the candies with Jelly Snakes that rotate left and right each time you touch them. Be careful not to hit wall, obstacles, and even monsters! You can reach higher levels only with your skills. Exchange the candies for cute snake decorations. Earn new jelly snakes with coins which you gain every time you clear a stage. Make the longest jelly snake in the world in challenge mode that will unlock at level 10. Win medals in challenge mode and get special exclusive Jelly Snakes. Try out various bizarre stages with brilliant ideas!
jelly-snake.controls: Use the left mouse button to change the snake rotation.

neon-swing.name: Neon Swing
neon-swing.description: Neon Swing is an arcade game where you must swing as fast as you can to avoid the red wall which is slowly moving toward you. Swing from point to point and try to get as far as you can while using trampolins to get even further. The trampolins in your way can also make your life a bit more difficult, so use them to your advantage. Make clever use of the game mechanics and be the best neon swing player out there!
neon-swing.controls: Use the left mouse button to swing.

love-in-style.name: Love In Style
love-in-style.description: Love In Style is a beauty dress-up game where you must prepare yourself for Valentine's day! Get creative and help the girls to pick the perfect kitchen outfits for baking a sweet treat for her boo. Afterward, get her ready for her big date with lots of fashionable options!
love-in-style.controls: Use the left mouse button to choose the clothing.

love-clicker-valentine-s-day.name: Love Clicker: Valentine's Day
love-clicker-valentine-s-day.description: Love Clicker: Valentine's Day is a clicker game where you need to show your love to your loved one. Buy various gifts and give attention to your beloved to receive more love. When you have enough love, you will be able to create a family. There are 24 achievements in the game that you can complete as the game progresses.
love-clicker-valentine-s-day.controls: Use the left mouse button to click on the heart and also to interact with the in-game UI.

treasure-hunt-idle.name: Treasure Hunt Idle
treasure-hunt-idle.description: Treasure Hunt Idle is a clicker game where you embark on a journey to uncover hidden riches. Progress through clicks and upgrading your resources. Level up to earn special boosts that will speed up your journey. Play for speed or casual play, pick your boosts wisely. Uncovering the wealth of Treasure Hunt Idle!
treasure-hunt-idle.controls: Use the left mouse button to play.

cross-stitch.name: Cross Stitch
cross-stitch.description: Cross Stitch is a casual embroidery art game where you fill the labeled cells with the correct colors, a sort of "stitch by color" on a digital fabric and hoop. There are 50 beautiful drawings to color, sorted from easiest to hardest. Cross Stitch is a fun and relaxing game for people of all ages.
cross-stitch.faq:
What is a cross stitch game?

Cross Stitch is an online casual embroidery art game where you fill the labeled cells with the correct colors, a sort of "stitch by color" on a digital fabric and hoop.

Is cross stitch cool again?

Yes! Cross stitch is cool and can be played online at CrazyGames.
cross-stitch.controls:
PC Controls

  • Drag right-click = move the canvas
  • Left-click = coloring / moving the canvas (depending on the selected tool)
  • Mouse-scroll = zoom in / out
  • B = paint tool
  • H = move tool

Mobile Controls

  • One finger = coloring / moving the canvas (depending on the selected tool)
  • Two fingers = zoom and move (it is recommended to do this with the "move" tool so as not to accidentally mess up)
cross-stitch.how_to_play:
This craft game is fairly straightforward. At the bottom of the game screen, you have a series of colors labeled with letters to use to color, aka digital stitch, the black-and-white fabric, which is also labeled with corresponding letters. You simply have to press the color/letter combination at the bottom of the game and left-click on your fabric on the matching letters. It is very much like a "paint by numbers" type of game.

You can color in multiple letters by left-clicking and dragging across the area you want to color. Note that you can use a different color than the one indicated, but you won't get 100% completion this way. Your stitches will continue to display letters until they are stitched with the right thread color.

You can go back and forth to various cross-stitch patterns, so you don't need to complete one fully to move on. But there are a series of locked patterns that you can only get to if you watch an ad.

Unlocked Cross Stitch Patterns

Some of the unlocked cross-stitch patterns include:

  • Heart
  • Fox
  • Girl in Hat
  • Strawberry
  • Girl in Elegant Dress
  • Orange
  • Chick
  • Witch
  • Egg on Toast
  • Cat in Box
  • Watermelon
  • Cat
  • Dog
  • Duck
  • Mama and Baby Koala
  • Tree
  • Fat Cat
  • Rainbow Cat in Donut
  • Pumpkin with Three Black Cats
  • Rose

Locked Cross Stitch Patterns

Some of the ad-locked cross-stitch patterns include:

  • Cat in Ramen
  • Reindeer
  • Cat in Hamburger Bun
  • Fish in Fishbowl
  • Lollipop
  • Santa Claus
  • Tiger
  • Edvard Munch's The Scream
  • Waffle with Berries
  • Albert Einstein

dino-merge-wars.name: Dino Merge Wars
dino-merge-wars.description: Dino Merge Wars is an action arcade game where you'll use a variety of powerful dinosaurs and humanoid characters on the battlefield to defeat fearsome dinos and emerge victorious. With a large selection of unique units, you'll have to set a strategize and decide which ones to send into battle. You can even merge your units to create even more powerful characters! You'll also be able to create your own dino riders, combining a dinosaur and a humanoid character. Thus, you'll be able to unleash devastating attacks and turn the tide of battle in your favor. Protect your Dino Egg and make sure it remains solid till your next battle! So what are you waiting for? Play Dino Merge Wars today and join the fight for survival!
dino-merge-wars.controls: Drag the left mouse button to merge and also to put your characters on the battlefield.

end-of-war.name: End of War
end-of-war.description: End of War is a simulation game where you must help people and rebuild the cities that were destroyed because of the war. The war passed, and thousands of bombs destroyed cities, forests, and fields. Everything was burned and only ruins remained. The world needs a hero who will unite disparate people of all ages and rebuild cities, someone who will re-grow forests, a person who can rekindle hope for a peaceful existence in the hearts of people and revive life after the era of war. And that person is you! It is you who are able to unite people and rebuild houses, and factories. Rescue people from the rubble and restore forests. Revive the cities and lead the country to prosperity!
end-of-war.controls: Use WASD / arrow keys to move around.

lulu-run.name: Lulu Run
lulu-run.description: Lulu Run is a casual arcade game where you must run, jump, and roll! Enjoy spectacular Lulu action with just 2 button combinations for jumping and rolling! Can you collect all the scattered pieces of Cubistone? Let's go on an adventure with charming, adorable, and cute Lulu!
lulu-run.controls:
Mouse

Use the left mouse button on in-game buttons to jump and roll.

Keyboard

  • Left arrow key / X = jump
  • Right arrow key / Z = roll

(You can swap the left and right arrow keys function in the settings.)

bouncy-motors.name: Bouncy Motors
bouncy-motors.description: Bouncy Motors is a fun casual driving game where you drive a jelly car over various obstacles. Bounce, slide, and maneuver your way to the finish line to complete each level while unlocking cool new skins along the way. But watch out—driving on ice requires extra precision, and those red zones are nothing but trouble.
bouncy-motors.faq:
How do I customize my vehicle?

There is a customization tab on the bottom left which you can use to purchase new skins with your cash.

How do I create my own levels in Bouncy Motors?

Head to the editor game mode and create your own track. Your track will save automatically.
bouncy-motors.how_to_play:
Drive your jelly car as quickly as possible through the levels without crashing into any red zones or falling from the platforms. Progress through the stages as they get trickier, and earn more cash to customize your Bouncy Motor!

Stickman annihilation

Take your jelly wagon on a death trip. Knock down as many stickmen as possible before the timer runs out. Traverse the terrain, searching for stickmen to plow through. You earn 2 dollars for every stickman you drive over.

Drawing

Unleash your creativity in this classic freestyle drawing editor, where you can design your own custom track and race on it! Whether you’re sketching loops, ramps, or wild obstacles, the possibilities are endless. Like the fan-favorite Free Rider HD, this game lets you take full control—draw, drive, and experience the thrill of riding on a track you crafted from scratch.

Editor

Create your own Bouncy Motors tracks in the editor. You can place various blocks and customize them extensively to build custom levels just like the tracks that are already built into the game.

basket-ball.name: Basket-Ball
basket-ball.description: Basket-Ball is a 2D arcade basketball game where you must throw the ball in one shot and be able to catch the star and put the ball into the basket. Avoid obstacles that get in the way and use the portal to teleport the ball. Proof your skill and challenge yourself by beating all the levels available. This game is designed for your fun!
basket-ball.controls: Drag the left mouse button to aim and release to shoot the ball.

the-last-tater-demo.name: The Last Tater
the-last-tater-demo.description: The Last Tater is an action game where you play as a little fried tater who must survive as the earth turns apocalyptic. Make a few helpful friends along the way as you upgrade your gun and abilities to defeat all kinds of evil creatures that want to eat you. As the game progresses, players will have to use their quick reflexes and strategic thinking to fend off increasingly difficult and numerous enemies. With a variety of power-ups to unlock, players can upgrade their tater and become an unstoppable force on the battlefield. The challenges don't stop there! In addition to fighting off waves of enemies, players must also navigate treacherous environments and overcome challenging obstacles in order to survive. Can you emerge victorious as the ultimate tater hero?

city-takeover.name: City Takeover
city-takeover.description: City Takeover is an addictive casual strategy game where your ultimate goal is to dominate the entire city by building your buildings as you occupy enemy buildings with your community. Strategically connect buildings to expand your influence, build the largest and most powerful army, and outmaneuver your opponents. Every decision counts as you grow your forces and launch tactical assaults to crush enemy strongholds.
city-takeover.faq:
How many level are there in City Takeover?

There are 20 unique levels in City Takeover.

What type of game is City Takeover?

City Takeover is a casual strategy game where you are tasked to dominate a city by populating your buildings while de-populating your opponent's buildings.
city-takeover.controls: Drag the left mouse button to go to another building and cut off the line.
city-takeover.how_to_play:
In City Takeover, you are the blue team and your mission is to capture buildings and expand your population while competing against the red team, your enemy. There are other colors on the board such as yellow and green, who also pose a danger to building your empire.

You start with one building, where your population slowly grows. The goal is to capture neutral (gray) or enemy (red) buildings by sending your population to them to destroy their layers of building and rebuild in your blue. You can send your population to them if you latch onto their building, forming a path from you to them. One of your buildings can form multiple paths, so you are not limited to just one.

Creating paths with triangle buildings is best done towards enemy buildings. Triangles destroy enemy buildings at a faster speed.

Creating paths with circular buildings is best done towards your own weaker buildings. Circular buildings build your own structures at a faster speed.

If you outnumber the enemy or neutral building’s occupants, you take control and increase your population further. Strategy is key—you need to balance growing your population and capturing new buildings while avoiding stronger enemy buildings. As the game progresses, obstacles like walls add complexity, forcing you to plan your attacks wisely.

The paths you create are also crucial in fortifying your buildings. Link blue buildings to blue buildings as much as possible to strengthen your community.

Tip

Capture as many buildings as early as possible. The key to winning is capturing as many buildings as possible at the start to grow your population faster than your opponents.

Making the right connections is key! Circular buildings help heal allied buildings faster, while triangular buildings deal more damage to enemy structures. Use them strategically to gain an advantage in battle.

You can "freeze" your opponent's time, which gives you an advantage. You will need to watch an ad to do so, but it is worth it on the more challenging rounds.

zoo-island.name: Zoo Island
zoo-island.description: Zoo Island is a fun and immersive zoo management game. Build and manage your own zoo choosing from a wide variety of animals. Take care of your animals and feed them, so that they are happy and healthy. You can also explore the island, discovering new rare animals and earning rewards. Become the best zoo manager ever! Please note that visitors will only donate coins if the animals are well-fed.
zoo-island.controls: Use WASD / arrow keys / hold down the left mouse button to move around.

mike-and-mia-the-firefighter.name: Mike And Mia The Firefighter
mike-and-mia-the-firefighter.description: Mike And Mia The Firefighter is a dress-up game where you help Mike and Mia to jump on their wagon and drive to an emergency mission! Dress them up with some cute firefighter outfits and decorate the wagon. Rescue all cats and extinguish the flames. Be the firefighter hero with Mike and Mia!
mike-and-mia-the-firefighter.controls: Use the left mouse button to play.

shoot-gun-clicker.name: Shoot Gun Clicker
shoot-gun-clicker.description: Shoot Gun is a clicker game where you have to open your collection of a gun and destroy unusual figures developing your income and experience.
shoot-gun-clicker.controls:
• Left mouse button = single shoot
  • Hold right mouse button = rapid fire

merge-mine-idle-clicker.name: Merge Mine: Idle Clicker
merge-mine-idle-clicker.description: Merge Mine: Idle Clicker is a fun game for those who love mining, merging, and clicking! This game is perfect for those who enjoy idle clicker games, as well as those who love to merge and manage their resources. You will play as a miner who is tasked with extracting precious resources from the ground. As you progress through the game, you will unlock new mines, hire more miners, and upgrade your equipment to increase your mining efficiency.
merge-mine-idle-clicker.controls: Use the left mouse button to click on the rock, and drag the left mouse button to merge the items.

rock-buster-3d.name: Rock Buster 3D
rock-buster-3d.description: Rock Buster 3D is a casual game where you drive a tank and blast away rocks to reach new lands. The rocks get tougher to break as you progress, so use the available upgrades to help you smash through to the next zone!
rock-buster-3d.controls:
PC Controls

Move the mouse to the left and right, or use AD or left and right arrow keys to move the tank.

Mobile Controls

Swipe left and right to move the tank.

survivor-idle-run.name: Survivor Idle Run
survivor-idle-run.description: Survivor Idle Run is an idle clicker game where you must survive the zombie apocalypse and become the ultimate hero! Take control of your character and battle against hordes of flesh-eating zombies. Along the way, summon powerful allies to fight alongside you and merge them to create even stronger allies. Want to speed up the action? Click to enter fever mode and take down enemies at lightning speed! With idle gameplay, your hero will keep fighting even when you’re away. Are you ready to take on the undead and save the world? Join the adventure now and become the ultimate survivor! Discover new allies so your hero won’t have to face the zombie apocalypse alone! Summon allies to help you in battle and watch as they change in looks and strengths as you progress through the game. Will you choose to fight alongside cowboys, ninjas, gangsters, or other powerful allies? Merge three allies to create a stronger one and unlock even more powerful characters as you reach new milestones. With each new ally, you’ll gain a unique advantage in the fight against the undead. Join the adventure now and discover your new favorite allies. Survive the relentless zombie apocalypse and become the ultimate hero!
survivor-idle-run.controls:
• Left-click = interact with in-game UI
  • Left-click or spacebar = speed up the gameplay

hammer-worker.name: Hammer Worker
hammer-worker.description: Hammer Worker is an arcade game where you must break the rocks to find the money, diamonds, and power-ups! Upgrade your hammer with the money you earn and smash more rocks with an awesome powerful hammer. Break all the stones to relieve your stress. Earn more as you get stronger. You may not want to let go of this game. We wish you pleasant and relaxing games.
hammer-worker.controls:
• WASD / arrow keys = move hammer
  • Space = next
  • 1-3 = upgrade
  • Left-click = interact with in-game buttons

highway-racer-2.name: Highway Racer 2
highway-racer-2.description: Highway Racer 2 is a high-speedracing gamethat puts your driving skills to the test. Dodge the traffic and obstacles while collecting power-ups to boost your speed. Customize your car to your heart's content to reflect your style. Race against other players online in multiplayer mode! Are you ready to take on the highway?
highway-racer-2.controls:
• W / Up arrow key = accelerate
  • A / left arrow key = move left
  • D / right arrow key = move right
  • S / down arrow key = brake
  • Left-click = interact with in-game buttons

pit-stop-helper.name: Pit Stop Helper
pit-stop-helper.description: Pit Stop Helper is a casual game where you bring gallons of gas from the production machine to the waiting vehicles. Unlock the first-level go-kart vehicle with provided base money. The vehicles are ready to hit the road, and it's up to you to equip them with the right gear.
pit-stop-helper.controls:
• WASD or arrow keys = move
  • P = pause
  • Left mouse button = interact with in-game UI

money-tree-2-cash-grow-game.name: Money Tree 2: Cash Grow Game
money-tree-2-cash-grow-game.description: Money Tree 2 is the ultimate game to become the world's wealthiest business tycoon! Live the life of a billionaire and use your idle money to build your own empire. Grow your wealth like trees and buy the most expensive cars, houses, yachts, and jewelry. Hire celebrities to help you manage your endless cash and invest in a range of luxury items. If you dream of being a billionaire, "Cash Tycoon" is the perfect clicker game for you!
money-tree-2-cash-grow-game.controls: Use the left mouse button to click on the money tree to get some cash.

deadly-red-spikes.name: Deadly Red Spikes
deadly-red-spikes.description: Deadly Red Spikes is a challenging platform game where danger lurks around every corner. Monte holds your soul captive, selling it off bit by bit in his shop. To reclaim it, you must navigate his treacherous game and collect coins while avoiding red spikes that appear with every step. But beware, Monte is a cunning adversary who will stop at nothing to keep your soul. Do your best to collect keys to unlock the exit door.
deadly-red-spikes.controls: Use WASD / arrow keys to move around.

tall-io.name: Tall.io
tall-io.description: Tall.io is a thrilling and addictive game where you fight to be the tallest stickman in the arena! Collect bricks of your color to grow taller while dodging obstacles and other stickmen that are taller than you. Run through gates and smash trees to gain more height. Progress by conquering each arena!
tall-io.controls: Use WASD / arrow keys / drag the left mouse button to move around.

mine-runner.name: Mine Runner
mine-runner.description: Mine Runne is an endless runner game that takes you on an ultimate running adventure through the mine. Collect gems, avoid obstacles, and choose your character from a variety of options such as humans, robots, zombies, and cats. Use special power-ups like magnets and fast runs to boost your speed and survive longer. Upgrade power-ups and unlock rewards as you run faster and faster through the mine tunnel. Can you survive this thrilling 3D mine run adventure?
mine-runner.controls: AD or left or right arrow keys or tap or hold the left mouse button to the left or right part of screen to move.

funny-blade-magic.name: Funny Blade & Magic
funny-blade-magic.description: Funny Blade & Magic is an action game where you step into a goofy world seeking to reclaim the throne of the goblin king after your uncle betrayed you. Use magical abilities and powerful weapons like swords, axes, and hammers to fight close-quarters with unique bosses and enemies. Are you ready to become the funniest and strongest goblin?
funny-blade-magic.controls:
• WASD = move
  • WASD + C = dash
  • Space = jump
  • Shift = run
  • LMB / Z = attack
  • RMB / R = throw axe
  • F = ability
  • Tab = ability selector
  • 1-6 = select ability

debris-collector.name: Debris Collector
debris-collector.description: Debris Collector is a simulation arcade game that challenges you to manage and organize your junkyard. Drive your magnet crane tractor and collect various types of garbage, such as steel, food scraps, and wood, then transport it back to the recycling machine to turn it into cash. Keep upgrading and unlocking new vehicles such as vacuum trucks, shredders, and helicopters by scouring the junkyard for hidden treasures and valuable parts. Remember the saying, "One man's trash is another man's treasure," and become the newest junkyard tycoon on your journey to success!
debris-collector.controls: Use WASD or arrow keys to move.

doc-honeyberry-puppy-surgery.name: Doc HoneyBerry Puppy Surgery
doc-honeyberry-puppy-surgery.description: Doc HoneyBerry Puppy Surgery is a simulation game that lets you become the best veterinarian by taking care of an adorable puppy. Cure their sickness, treat their injuries, and solve all their problems. Clean them up and dress them up to make them look perfect again. With your care and expertise, you can help the puppy feel happy and healthy once more.
doc-honeyberry-puppy-surgery.controls: Use the mouse to play the game.

burger-clicker-ktl.name: Burger Clicker
burger-clicker-ktl.description: Burger Clicker is a fun and addictive clicker game where you start with a basic bun and work your way up to creating the biggest and most unique burger ever seen. Click on the burger to earn burger coins and use them to purchase upgrades and ingredients to make your burger even better. With each upgrade, you'll earn more burger coins and unlock special toppings for your bun.
burger-clicker-ktl.controls: Press the left mouse button on the burger to earn money.

space-swarm.name: Space Swarm
space-swarm.description: Space Swarm is a challenging arcade game that tests your survival skills. You're the only hope for the last space station against the ruthless alien invasion. Upgrade your defenses and match the enemy's strength. Can you protect the station and save humanity?
space-swarm.controls: Use the left mouse button to click on the enemy's ship to destroy them.

tv-invasion.name: TV Invasion
tv-invasion.description: TV Invasion is an arcade game where you take control of a character who is being attacked by dangerous TVs. You must use your TV remote control to defend yourself and defeat the TVs. As you progress through the levels, the TVs become more challenging to defeat, and you will need to use different strategies to win. How long can you survive the TV invasion?
tv-invasion.controls:
• Drag the left mouse button = aim and move the camera
  • W = increase size attack
  • S = decrease size attack
  • D = pause attack
  • Space = power off attack
  • 1 - 9 = use the controller's power

mineclicker-2.name: MineClicker 2
mineclicker-2.description: MineClicker 2 is the second sequel of the game MineClicker which is made for those who like clickers and idle games. Click to hunt animals and kill monsters. Get emeralds and combine items to get better equipment. This game has 100 levels, 45 monsters, 20 bosses, leveling statistics, leveling inventory, as well as 6 sets of armor, 6 types of melee and ranged weapons. There are lots of exciting things and new locations waiting for you!
mineclicker-2.controls: Use the left mouse button to interact with the in-game UI.

crazy-farming.name: Crazy Farming
crazy-farming.description: Crazy Farming is a farming simulation game where you must grow your farm and make it thrive. Sow seeds, sell your goods, gather resources, craft items, and face off against enemies as you work your way up the ranks to become the most successful farmer in town. With endless possibilities and hours of gameplay, this is the perfect casual game for anyone who loves farming and wants to have fun while doing it!
crazy-farming.controls:
• WASD / left-click = move
  • QE / drag right-click = rotate / move the camera view
  • Scroll mouse wheel = zoom in / out
  • Left-click / space / r-ctrl = interact with an object
  • Right-click on inventory item = open the item menu
  • C = open the crafting menu

idle-printers-2.name: Idle Printers 2
idle-printers-2.description: Idle Printers 2 is an incremental clicker game that lets you print various models. Upgrade your printers to boost productivity and buy new equipment to increase the value of your models. Keep clicking to unlock new achievements and become the ultimate printing tycoon.
idle-printers-2.controls: Use the left mouse button to click on the objects.

deads-on-the-road.name: Deads on the Road
deads-on-the-road.description: Deads on the Road is an action game where you play as a soldier who needs to kill as many zombies as possible. Be careful and keep an eye out for zombies lurking in the dark. One misstep and it's all over! Can you make it to safety? Prepare yourself for an intense and heart-pumping experience!
deads-on-the-road.controls:
• W = speed-up
  • S = slow down
  • A = move left
  • D = move right
  • Left-click = shoot
  • Right-click = use katana
  • P = pause

offroad-masters-challenge.name: Offroad Masters Challenge
offroad-masters-challenge.description: Offroad Masters Challenge is a realistic off-road driving sim that takes you on an adventure across different continents and countries. Embark on a career with your offroad vehicle, go on free SUV driving adventures, and crash your trucks in the car crash arena. There are various 4x4 vehicles and upgrades to purchase.
offroad-masters-challenge.controls:
Single Player

Player 1:

  • WASD or arrow keys = move
  • Left-click =move camera
  • C= switch camera
  • R = restart
  • F = light

Two Player

Player 1:

  • WASD = move
  • C= switch camera
  • R= reset car position
  • F = light

Player 2:

  • Arrow keys = move
  • K = switch camera
  • O= reset car position
  • L = light
  • P = pause

farm-family.name: Farm Family
farm-family.description: Farm Family is a captivating farm simulator game that allows you to build and manage your very own farm. You can cultivate crops, raise animals, and sell your products at the market to make money. With the money you earn, you can expand your farm, buy new resources, and improve your buildings. There are various tasks in the game that let you earn more money and progress to higher levels. If you love farm simulators and want to explore this world, then Farm Family is the perfect game for you!
farm-family.controls:
PC Control

Use the mouse to play the game.

Mobile Control

Use the touch screen gesture to play the game

grandma-recipe-apple-pie.name: Grandma Recipe Apple Pie
grandma-recipe-apple-pie.description: Grandma Recipe Apple Pie is a cooking game where you'll help Annie recreate her grandma's apple pie recipe. Find and prepare the ingredients, cook the pie to perfection, and add some tasty toppings. Dress up Annie in cute clothes, snap a picture, and add some fun emojis. This cooking game is sure to be a delicious and enjoyable experience!
grandma-recipe-apple-pie.controls: Use the mouse to play the game.

sword-adventure-idle.name: Sword Adventure Idle
sword-adventure-idle.description: Sword Adventure Idle is a captivating clicker game where you uncover the rarest and most potent swords. As you travel through mystical lands, you encounter challenges and enemies while your power increases. With each new upgrade and blade, your strength grows. Are you ready to start your sword adventure?
sword-adventure-idle.controls: Use the left mouse button to click on the screen and earn money.

space-colony.name: Space Colony
space-colony.description: Space Colony is a casual game where you need to extract resources to develop your colony and explore the new planet. These resources include iron, titanium, and other materials that can be gathered from the planet's surface. You can use these resources to build structures, create vehicles, and power your colony as you venture further into space.
space-colony.controls: Use WASD, the arrow keys, or hold down the left mouse button to move around.

unicycle-mayhem.name: Unicycle Mayhem
unicycle-mayhem.description: Unicycle Mayhem is a casual game where you must have good balance and timing to keep the ragdoll character on the unicycle while trying to knock your opponent off. The destructible environment adds another level of strategy and challenge to the game. You must carefully choose where to attack to create the best chance of success. With five victories needed to win the match, you must stay focused and determined to come out on top.
unicycle-mayhem.controls:
Single Player

  • AD or left/right arrow keys = move
  • Space = shoot

Two Players

Player 1:

  • AD = move
  • G = shoot

Player 2:

  • Left and right arrow keys = move
  • L = shoot

human-resistance.name: Human Resistance
human-resistance.description: Human Resistance is a 3D tower defense game where your mission is to resist an alien invasion! You are the army captain leading the fight against these invaders. Use your strategic skills to build defensive towers and fend off waves of alien attacks. Save humanity and become a hero!
human-resistance.controls: Use WASD / arrow keys / drag left click to move around.

archer-defense.name: Archer Defense
archer-defense.description: Archer Defense is an action game where you play as an archer defending your position against waves of enemies. You start with a basic bow, but you can upgrade it over time and use different power-ups like bomb, multi-shot, and freeze arrows. You can also set up defenses like sentries and barbed wires to help you fend off the enemy waves. The game features daily rewards, loot boxes to obtain new and powerful bows, and multiple levels of increasing difficulty. Can you defend your position against the enemy onslaught and emerge victorious?
archer-defense.controls: Hold the left mouse button to aim, release to shoot. Also, follow in-game UI to use power-ups.

lhama-clicker.name: Lhama Clicker
lhama-clicker.description: Lhama Clicker is a clicker game where you multiply the llama population through clicking and idling. Generate infinite llamas and unlock funny skins, hats, backgrounds, and achievements. Can you unlock everything and beat the game?
lhama-clicker.controls: Use the left mouse button to click on the Lhama.

cross-strike.name: Cross Strike
cross-strike.description: Cross Strike is an action platformer game where you take on the role of a futuristic robot, charged with protecting the vital Lumina Ark. Blas the enemies with the help of a powerful jetpack and powerful weapons. Transform into a high-tech jetplane and experience the thrilling sci-fi adventure.
cross-strike.controls:
• Arrow keys = move
  • Z = confirm dialogue / jump
  • X = shoot
  • C = transform
  • D = sword
  • Enter = pause

(Support keyboard and gamepad. Keyboard control can be customized in the game options.)

mini-caps-arena.name: Mini-Caps: Arena
mini-caps-arena.description: Mini-Caps: Arena is an arena-based action game where you and a friend battle in weapon-strapped cars. Prepare for zombies, explosions, and complete madness in hectic arena wars. An epic arsenal of weapons is at your disposal to cause absolute chaos and defeat your enemies.
mini-caps-arena.controls:
Player 1

  • WASD = move
  • V = attack
  • B = enter / exit car, pickup items

Player 2

  • Arrow keys = move
  • O = attack
  • I = enter / exit car, pickup items

10-minute-mage.name: 10 Minute Mage
10-minute-mage.description: 10 Minute Mage is an action game where you play as a powerful mage with the challenging goal of defeating all enemies within just 10 minutes. As you progress, you'll encounter more difficult foes, but don't fret, you'll level up and gain new spells to aid in battle. Every spell has its own unique abilities, such as dealing immense damage or continuously harming enemies. Fight against increasingly difficult enemies and emerge victorious!

tropical-island.name: Tropical Island
tropical-island.description: Tropical Island is a simulation farming game that lets you run your own farm and sell your harvest for profit. With gorgeous 3D graphics, calming music, and intuitive controls, managing your farm and completing delivery orders will be a fun and engaging experience. Plus, with the ability to save your game progress on the server, you can enjoy playing for hours without worrying about losing your progress. Get ready to immerse yourself in the tropical world of farming!
tropical-island.controls:
• WASD or arrow keys = move
  • Scroll mouse-wheel = zoom in / out
  • 1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8,9,0 = Select backpack item
  • Q,E = next / previous backpack page
  • Shift = run / walk
  • Tab = open menu
  • P = Toggle shadow
  • N = Toggle SFX
  • M = Toggle music
  • H = Open how to play

black-hole-blitz.name: Black Hole Blitz
black-hole-blitz.description: Black Hole Blitz is a strategic game where you control a powerful black hole with one simple mission: to consume as many units as possible and destroy the enemy's tower and base. As you grow bigger, you'll become stronger and more powerful, but also attract more attention from your enemies. To succeed, you'll need to use quick reflexes and strategy to outmaneuver and swallow your opponents whole. With addictive gameplay and stunning graphics, Black Hole Blitz offers an engaging way to pass the time and become the ultimate destroyer. Start your journey now and conquer the unpredictable environment!
black-hole-blitz.controls: Use WASD or arrow keys to move the hole.

tile-craft-3d.name: Tile Craft 3D
tile-craft-3d.description: Tile Craft 3D is a fun coloring game where you stack tiles to create beautiful artwork. Match the numbers on the floor design to complete each masterpiece! Collect coins to upgrade your skills and hire helpers to speed up the painting process. As you lay down tiles, pick up coins and upgrade your abilities at the Upgrade Center. Reach level 5 to hire helpers and become a master tile crafter!
tile-craft-3d.controls: Drag the left mouse button to move around.

slime-knight.name: Slime Knight
slime-knight.description: Slime Knight is a 2D platform game where you must reach the exit door in an ancient castle. You will control a knight that will be moving automatically, and all you have to do is jump and throw the sword to destroy the obstacles in front of you.
slime-knight.controls:
Desktop

  • X, Space, Up Arrow, or Right Click to Jump.
  • S, C, or Left Click to Throw Swords.

Mobile

  • Touch the Right Side of the Screen to Jump.
  • Touch the Left Side of the Screen to Throw Swords.

switch.name: Switch!
switch.description: Switch! is a fast-paced action game with one-touch gameplay. You must switch from wall to wall to avoid oncoming objects and collect stars to increase your score. Collecting 5 stars in a row will make you invincible for a short time. As you progress, the gameplay changes, getting faster and harder. The longer you last, the better your score. With appealing graphics and endless gameplay, Switch! will keep you entertained for hours.
switch.controls: Use the left mouse click (desktop) or tap (mobile) to switch walls and avoid obstacles.

wildlife-haven---sandbox-safari.name: Wildlife Haven: Sandbox Safari
wildlife-haven---sandbox-safari.description: Wildlife Haven: Sandbox Safari is a management simulation game where you can save endangered animals and help them thrive! In this adorable and colorful game, you'll take on the role of a wildlife rescuer and work to build a sanctuary for animals in need.
wildlife-haven---sandbox-safari.controls:
• Left mouse click or touch to heal animals and control the UI
  • WASD to control the camera
  • X and Z to zoom in and out
  • Shift to speed up camera movement

mini-caps-bombs.name: Mini-Caps: Bombs
mini-caps-bombs.description: Mini-Caps: Bombs is a fun and hilarious 2-player casual arcade game with minimalistic graphics. Enjoy ragdoll physics and a variety of fun and unique locations while challenging your friends. Move around and jump to avoid bombs and obstacles in front of your way, or do some kicking if you need to! With simple controls and fun characters, this game is sure to provide many unforgettable moments of laughter and entertainment.
mini-caps-bombs.controls:
Player 1

  • WASD = move
  • V = jump
  • B = kick

Player 2

  • Arrow keys = move
  • O = jump
  • I = kick

merge-to-battle.name: Merge To Battle
merge-to-battle.description: Merge to Battle is a strategy game where the goal is to capture all the castles in your way. Unite your warriors and archers on the battlefield and fight against enemies. Build and upgrade your castle and troops. Explore the entire evolution of warriors by combining two units into an even stronger one. React quickly and use strategy and tactics to win the battle and advance to the next level.
merge-to-battle.controls: Drag the left mouse button to merge the troops and to place them on the battlefield.

super-hero-driving-school.name: Super Hero Driving School
super-hero-driving-school.description: Super Hero Driving School is a casual car stunt game where you can drive, fly, and perform stunts on multiple crazy tracks with unique superhero vehicles. Unlock multiple colorful tracks that will put your driving skills to the test. Even heroes need a driving license, and in this game, you can learn to drive and fly superhero vehicles like never before! But be careful, because even superheroes can have super crashes. Buckle up and get ready for super fun times!
super-hero-driving-school.controls: Use the left mouse button to drive and use the booster.

fruit-cube-blast.name: Fruit Cube Blast
fruit-cube-blast.description: Fruit Cube Blast is a casual game that involves matching and exploding colorful blocks to solve puzzles. You simply need to match the colored fruit blocks and create bigger matches to make power-ups that can help them clear the screen. You can unlock insane gifts, defeat weird-looking worm enemies, and meet friendly characters on your adventure!
fruit-cube-blast.controls: Left mouse button to match the blocks.

revolution-idle-x-demo.name: Revolution Idle X
revolution-idle-x-demo.description: Revolution Idle X is a newly remade version of the classic game, boasting various features and complexities. Despite being a demo, this version surpasses the content and graphics of its predecessor. The objective is simple; fill circles to increase your numbers and achieve the rainbow spectrum. Enjoy the infinite possibilities of prestige, promotion, and endless gameplay. Start having fun now!
revolution-idle-x-demo.controls:
• Use the left mouse button to buy upgrades, prestige, etc.
  • A = ascend all
  • B = buy all basic upgrades

muscle-shift.name: Muscle Shift
muscle-shift.description: Muscle Shift is an exciting racing game that enables you to switch your superpower to overcome obstacles. With super-sized muscular hands, you can smash through any barriers obstructing your path. Alternatively, you can inflate your leg muscles to achieve faster speeds and gain an edge over your competitors. Transform into a ball shape to bounce and accelerate when falling down. Compete against others to showcase your superior muscle shape and leave them in your dust. Get ready to rush and assert your dominance in the ultimate showdown of muscular prowess!

funny-animal-cafe.name: Funny Animal Cafe
funny-animal-cafe.description: Funny Animal Cafe is a simulation game where you'll run a small cafe and strive for success. You'll begin with a modest cafe that you can personalize with your own decoration and furnishings. From menus to pricing, kitchen upgrades to interior design, attract more customers and manage your business to meet their needs. Boost productivity and service quality by hiring new employees. Every day, your cafe will welcome new animals eager to sample your cuisine. Quickly and efficiently serve them to ensure their satisfaction and encourage repeat visits. Keep track of new visitors on your profile. Will you rise to the top as the best cafe owner and win over the hearts of your customers? Dive into the game and find out!
funny-animal-cafe.controls:
• WASD = move
  • Left-click = interact with the object and in-game buttons

bubble-fall.name: Bubble Fall
bubble-fall.description: Bubble Fall is an arcade bubble shooter game with a satisfying fall-down effect. Aim and shoot balls of the same color to make them drop. Need a little extra oomph? Use a bomb to create some explosion and clear the way!
bubble-fall.controls: Move the mouse to aim and press the left mouse button to shoot the ball.

power-players-defenders.name: Power Players: Defenders
power-players-defenders.description: Power Players: Defenders is a match-3 arcade game where you must assist Axel in his one-on-one combat against the invaders by employing your match-3 abilities. Madcap is attempting to seize control of the city using a vast number of evil toys, and it's your responsibility to put an end to his plan! Unlock additional characters and upgrade their abilities to confront numerous adversaries. Can you rise to the challenge and rescue the city?
power-players-defenders.controls: Drag the left mouse button to swipe the power.

merge-pool-2048.name: Merge Pool 2048
merge-pool-2048.description: Merge Pool 2048 is a casual game that challenges you to merge pucks with the same number to achieve a bigger one until you reach the ultimate goal of 2048. With progressive level design and fantastic elements, each level presents a unique challenge. Some groups may help you, while others make it more difficult to achieve your goal. With various playing boards and puck formations, Merge Pool 2048 is an excellent time killer that keeps you entertained for hours.
merge-pool-2048.controls: Drag the left mouse button + aim + release to shoot the puck.

silly-walker.name: Silly Walkers
silly-walker.description: Silly Walkers is an action game where you can design and create your robot. The goal of the game is to save the town from Monsters. Use your robot to navigate obstacles and overcome challenges to save the day. Will you be able to complete your mission and save the city? It's up to you to find out in Silly Walker.
silly-walker.controls:
In the lab

  • Drag the left mouse button or use WASD / arrow keys to move the player
  • Click the left mouse button to buy and upgrade items

In the battle

  • Hold the left mouse button to raise one leg and release to step. Repeat until you reach the goal
  • After reaching the goal, click the left mouse anywhere as fast as possible to defeat the monster

endless-waves-survival.name: Endless Waves Survival
endless-waves-survival.description: Endless Waves Survival is an adrenaline-fueled endless survival game. Fight a continuous onslaught of enemies and claim upgrades and new abilities as you level up. How long will you survive the next run?
endless-waves-survival.controls:
• WASD / arrow keys = move
  • Q / R = use activated skils
  • Space = dash

Xbox Controller supported

escape-from-zombies.name: Escape from Zombies
escape-from-zombies.description: Escape From Zombies is a thrilling zombie action game where your mission is to save as many people as possible. Navigate through exciting levels, armed with a variety of weapons and simple controls. In this transformed world, overrun by zombies, it's up to you to guide survivors to the airfield for their safety. Exercise caution with missiles and exploding barrels to prevent harm to the people you're rescuing. The fate of humanity rests in your hands!
escape-from-zombies.controls:
• Drag the left mouse button to shoot the zombie
  • Use the left mouse button to upgrade and buy items
  • A = firing a rocket

my-sweet-world.name: My Sweet World
my-sweet-world.description: My Sweet World is an exciting casual adventure game where you embark on a heroic journey to Candy Land, offering assistance to those in need. The princess and locals rely on your skills as you enhance the land and collect keys to unlock hidden areas. Explore the vibrant world, gather resources like cotton from trees and icing from sugar planks, and use your creativity to craft a variety of delicious cakes.
my-sweet-world.controls:
• WASD or arrow keys to move
  • Use the left mouse button to update and trade items

grandma-recipe-nigiri-sushi.name: Grandma Recipe Nigiri Sushi
grandma-recipe-nigiri-sushi.description: Grandma Recipe Nigiri Sushi is a beauty game that combines cooking and fashion elements. You and your friends are gathering for a special evening, and you've decided to prepare a delicious meal, specifically Nigiri Sushi. But you'll need grandma's recipe to create the perfect sushi. Look around the kitchen and make sure you have everything you need to make the sushi. Once you've gathered everything, it's time to start making the rice balls for the Nigiri Sushi to create the perfect rice balls!
grandma-recipe-nigiri-sushi.controls: Use the left mouse button to play the game.

ball-blaster.name: Ball Blaster
ball-blaster.description: Ball Blaster is an arcade game where you must defend your base from relentless balls. Take control of a powerful cannon and aim to destroy the incoming balls to protect your base. Upgrade your cannon's strength, power, and speed to become an unstoppable force. Can you withstand the onslaught and emerge victorious? Prepare yourself for an intense arcade experience!
ball-blaster.controls: Use WASD / arrow keys / drag the left mouse button to shoot and move.

billionaire-wife-dress-up-game.name: Billionaire Wife Dress Up
billionaire-wife-dress-up-game.description: Billionaire Wife Dress Up is a fun and stylish dress-up game where you can live the life of a fashion stylist for a passionate socialite. Use your creativity and fashion sense to dress up the billionaire's wife with the latest trendy outfits, hairstyles, and accessories. With hundreds of unique clothing items and accessories, you can make the wife stand out from the crowd and become the superstar she wants to be. You can even change the background and take screenshots to share with your friends. Enjoy this fashionista dress-up game and make your doll beautiful without spending a dime!
billionaire-wife-dress-up-game.controls: Use the left mouse button to change looks, outfits, and accessories.

sky-car-drift.name: Sky Car Drift
sky-car-drift.description: Sky Car Drift is a car drifting game where you must compete drifting against your rivals on a thrilling track above the clouds. Master the art of drifting and aim for the longest drifts without crashing or falling off the edge to earn valuable trophies. Collect trophies to unlock a wide range of cool rewards, including over 200 cars, 120 drivers, 500 emotes, and 10 unique skies. Climb the trophy ladder to gain exclusive titles and showcase your skills. Compete in various drift categories, aim for the top of the leaderboards, and secure your spot in the prestigious hall of fame. Get ready to soar in Sky Car Drift!
sky-car-drift.controls:
• W / up arrow key = accelerate
  • A / left arrow key = drift left
  • D / right arrow key = drift right
  • S / down arrow key = brake
  • R = respawn car

elsa-anna-s-icy-dress-up.name: Elsa & Anna's Icy Dress Up
elsa-anna-s-icy-dress-up.description: Elsa & Anna's Icy Dress Up is a beauty game where you become the fashion stylist for the ice princess sisters. Customize their looks with clothes, hairstyles, and makeup in the princess fashion salon. Choose between classic princess attire or modern outfits.
