Accessorize with capes, necklaces, bracelets, and hair decorations. Enjoy the fun of dressing up Elsa and Anna in this icy dress-up game for girls!
elsa-anna-s-icy-dress-up.controls: Use the left mouse button to select an outfit.

trucks-race.name: Trucks Race
trucks-race.description: Trucks Race is an arcade game where your job is to move the cargo as fast as possible. Your goal is to deliver all goods to the consignee as fast as possible. As you progress, you'll earn money and level up, unlocking new roads to explore. Test your skills on the highway as you take on challenging delivery missions. Get ready for a thrilling trucking experience!
trucks-race.controls: Hold the left mouse button to move the truck.

ragdoll-fight.name: Ragdoll Fight
ragdoll-fight.description: Ragdoll Fight is an action-packed boxing game featuring dynamic ragdoll physics, stunning effects, and a range of playgrounds. Engage in intense fights against various opponents, unleashing powerful punches to knock them down. Enjoy challenging AI battles or compete against your friend in multiplayer mode. Experience the thrill of realistic ragdoll physics and engage in epic boxing matches in this exciting game.
ragdoll-fight.controls:
1 Player

  • WASD = move
  • F = left punch
  • G = right punch
  • V = jump

2 Player

  • Arrow keys = move
  • J = left punch
  • K = right punch
  • M = jump

castel-wars-modern.name: Castle Wars: Modern
castel-wars-modern.description: Castel Wars Modern is an action battle game set in diverse locations such as the moon, futuristic cities, and sci-fi realms. Engage in intense combat using a wide range of realistic weaponry and equipment. Experience thrilling game modes including zombie fights, two-player duels, and epic battles. Choose your preferred mode and embark on a pixelated warfare adventure in the modern world.
castel-wars-modern.controls:
Player 1

  • AD = move
  • W = jump
  • S = create a block
  • E = hit (hold the key to throw the weapon if holding the sword)
  • Q = change weapon

Player 2

  • Left and Right arrow keys = move
  • Up arrow key = jump
  • Down arrow key = create a block
  • L = hit (hold the key to throw the weapon if holding the sword)
  • M = change weapon

burger-boss.name: Burger Boss
burger-boss.description: Burger Boss is a restaurant simulation game where you take charge as the boss. Build your fast food empire in this thrilling restaurant management game! Serve up mouthwatering burgers, fries, pizza, drinks, and ice cream to satisfy hungry customers. Manage every aspect of the restaurant, from hiring and training staff to perfecting the menu. Keep customers happy, upgrade your kitchen equipment, and unlock new recipes to expand your offerings. Make strategic decisions to grow your business and become the ultimate Burger Boss! Are you ready to embark on this delicious journey? Play now and show off your management skills!
burger-boss.controls: Use WASD / arrow keys / drag the left mouse button to move around.

model-wedding---girls-games.name: Model Wedding
model-wedding---girls-games.description: Model Wedding is the ultimate beauty dress-up game where you get to style four gorgeous brides on one of the biggest days of their lives. Some characters include supermodels and celebrities -- so the pressure is on to make over these high-profile brides. Mix and match stunning dresses, dazzling shoes, elegant veils, stylish handbags, beautiful bouquets, and sparkling jewelry. Show off your fashionista flair as you create the perfect bridal looks. With endless combinations to explore, unleash your inner designer and have a blast making each bride shine!
model-wedding---girls-games.faq:
Are there any wedding planning games?

Model Wedding is a fun online game where you dress a bride from head to toe for her big day!

What is the best dress up game online?

There are plenty of fun dress-up games online with popular titles like Model Wedding, where you dress up a bride on her wedding day.
model-wedding---girls-games.controls: Use the left mouse button to choose an outfit.
model-wedding---girls-games.how_to_play:
The aim of the game is to get your bride looking as beautiful as possible on her big day.

Once you choose one of the four blushing brides, you will be met with a series of choices to make. Your bride is an open canvas, dressed in nothing but her undergarments. You will need to choose from the following:

  • Dress: Ball gown, A-line, drop shoulder, cowl neck, empire, scoop neck, sweetheart style. Which will you choose for that big moment?
  • Corset and skirt: Lace, satin, crêpe, ruffle, sequin. You may love them all, but you can only choose one!
  • Shoulder wrap: Fur wrap, bow tie wrap, shoulder cover, satin.
  • Gloves: Long, short, satin, studded, or a simple diamond bracelet. Tough choice.
  • Hairstyle: Long brown hair, ashe blonde hair, short platinum hair,
  • Tiara or Headpiece: Flowers, diamonds, side piece or full.
  • Heels: White, ice blue, red, gold, open-toe, pink stilettos. Go bold or traditional?
  • Bouquet: Carnations, roses, pink, red. Who will catch this lovely bouquet?
  • Purse: Gold, satin, flower, ruffle.
  • Jewelry: Diamond necklace, ruby, gold. What jewels should your bride wear?
  • Veil: Short, long, over the face, train. The final touches.
  • Wedding photo background

Say Cheese

There is no way to "win" this game. Instead, your task is to have fun and play around with all the options, and there are many. Once you've chosen the perfect outfit, you have a few backgrounds to choose from for your bride, which include a pristine green garden, a seaside backdrop, a beautifully decorated bedroom, or a gorgeous historic atrium.

Choose your backdrop and take as many photos as you like. There is a screenshot button where you can take photos of your bride and save them to your computer or phone. Share them with your friends and compare fashion phenomenons or faux pas!

haunted-heroes.name: Haunted Heroes
haunted-heroes.description: Haunted Heroes is an arcade game where you take on the role of a ghost. Your objective is to haunt heroes and possess their bodies, utilizing their unique powers to dominate the race. With your supernatural abilities, you can influence the outcome and secure victory. Challenge yourself to strategize and outwit the heroes as you navigate through thrilling levels. Unleash your spectral prowess and become the ultimate haunted hero!
haunted-heroes.controls: AD or left / right arrow keys or drag the left mouse to move your character.

yellowstone-ranch.name: Yellowstone Ranch
yellowstone-ranch.description: Yellowstone Ranch is a captivating farming game where you manage your cow farm, milk your cows, and sell fresh milk. Guide your cows to the milking area, drive away the wolf, expand and upgrade your farm. Become a successful cow farmer!
yellowstone-ranch.controls:
• WASD / arrow keys / drag the left mouse button = move
  • Space / right click = drive away the wolf, interact with the upgrade section
  • Left-click = interact with the in-game button

kingmaker-academy-warrior-s-duels.name: Kingmaker Academy: Warrior's Duels
kingmaker-academy-warrior-s-duels.description: Kingmaker Academy: Warrior's Duels is a card battle game where you must use your strategy to beat your opponent. Strategize and outsmart your opponents as you compete against talented rivals in the school's prestigious tournament. Hone your skills with each duel and aim to become the ultimate warrior and ruler of the academy. Can you rise to the top and claim victory?
kingmaker-academy-warrior-s-duels.controls: Use the left mouse button to select a card.

fashion-challenge-catwalk-run.name: Fashion Challenge: Catwalk Run
fashion-challenge-catwalk-run.description: Fashion Challenge: Catwalk Run is a beauty game where you style the stars! Become the most sought-after fashion stylist in Hollywood. There’s a plethora of outfits so you never run out of new fashion to try on and customize!
fashion-challenge-catwalk-run.controls: Use the left mouse button to interact with the in-game button.

zombo-buster-advance.name: Zombo Buster Advance
zombo-buster-advance.description: Zombo Buster Advance is a defense game where you must protect the entrance gate from hordes of relentless zombies. Strategically position your troops, upgrade their skills, and utilize powerful gadgets to fend off the undead invasion. Show your tactical prowess and save humanity from the impending doom. Can you survive the zombie onslaught?
zombo-buster-advance.controls:
• QWERTY / AZERTY = choose a troop
  • 1-6 = use an item
  • X = remove placed troop
  • P = pause
  • Or use a mouse to play the game

milky-way-idle.name: Milky Way Idle
milky-way-idle.description: Milky Way Idle is a multiplayer RPG inspired by Runescape. It features gathering and crafting skills, a flexible combat system, a player-driven marketplace, in-game chat, and leaderboards. The game minimizes active clicking, allowing the automatic repeating of actions until changed. Skills include gathering (milking, foraging, woodcutting), production (cheese-smithing, crafting, tailoring, cooking, brewing), enhancing equipment, and combat (stamina, intelligence, attack, power, defense, magic, ranged). Community features include a marketplace, chat, and leaderboard. Offline progress of up to 10 hours is supported, with upcoming features including tasks/quests, group combat, bosses, and dungeons.
milky-way-idle.controls: Use the left mouse button to play the game.

heist-master.name: Heist Master
heist-master.description: Heist Master is a fun puzzle game where you play as a thief solving puzzles to open a safe. Utilize your wit to overcome challenging environments and claim the most valuable treasures. Navigate through exciting levels, utilizing objects around you to conquer puzzles. Earn rare items as rewards for your successful heists. Customize your character with a wide selection of skins.
heist-master.controls:
• WASD / drag left-click = move around
  • Space = interact with an object

must-escape-the-wizards-castle.name: Must Escape the Wizards Castle
must-escape-the-wizards-castle.description: Must Escape the Wizard's Castle is a puzzle-escape game where you must carefully explore your surroundings and interact with various objects by clicking on them. By investigating and collecting items, you can add them to your inventory for later use.
must-escape-the-wizards-castle.controls: Use the left mouse button to start collecting items.

dr-psycho-hospital-escape.name: Dr. Psycho: Hospital Escape
dr-psycho-hospital-escape.description: Dr. Psycho: Hospital Escape is a thrilling horror escape game where you are trapped in a nightmare clinic and need to get out of there. Gather essential items to unlock doors and escape the clutches of the deranged Doctor Psycho and his psychotic patients. Time is ticking, you only have 3 days to break free. Navigate terrifying space and uncover multiple escape routes while avoiding detection. Hide in cleverly hidden places and explore the place carefully avoiding deadly traps. Can you outwit the doctor and secure your asylum escape?
dr-psycho-hospital-escape.controls:
• WASD / arrow keys = move
  • 1-5 = equip an item
  • E = action
  • C = crouch
  • G = drop an item
  • Space = exit from the hiding place
  • Shift = run
  • Tab = pause the game
  • Move mouse = change direction

fashion-trip-dress-up-games.name: Fashion Trip
fashion-trip-dress-up-games.description: Fashion Trip is a dress-up game where you can unleash your fashionista talent for travel purposes. Customize your dolls' faces with a vast selection of facial features, hairstyles, and a wardrobe filled with dresses, tops, skirts, trousers, jackets, and more. Accessorize with scarves, necklaces, bracelets, handbags, and adorable pets. Choose iconic city backgrounds like the Eiffel Tower, Big Ben, Statue of Liberty, or Milan Cathedral, and create outfits that perfectly capture each city's vibe. With over 250 apparel items and 100+ facial features, this virtual doll salon offers endless possibilities, all completely free. Take an imaginary world tour, indulge in virtual shopping, and capture your stylish creations with screenshots to share with friends. It's time to showcase your fashion expertise and design glamorous looks fit for superstars!
fashion-trip-dress-up-games.controls: Use the left mouse button to choose an outfit.

idle-it-company.name: Idle IT Company
idle-it-company.description: Idle IT Company is a clicker game where you are tasked with building your very own IT company from the ground up. As an idle clicker game, your main objective is to generate income and expand your business empire.
idle-it-company.controls: Use the left mouse button to start generating income.

loot-party.name: Loot Party
loot-party.description: Loot Party is an action game that introduces a new party mechanic to enhance your gameplay experience. In this game, you embark on a thrilling and perilous journey, gathering a party of brave heroes to accompany you.
loot-party.controls: WASD, arrow keys, or drag left mouse button to move.

prom-night-dress-up.name: Prom Night Dress Up
prom-night-dress-up.description: Prom Night Dress Up is a beauty game where you can experience the excitement of prom night with 6 stylish girl friends competing for the title of prom queen! Show off your fashion prowess in this makeover and dress-up game for girls, featuring over 200 trendy clothing items. Dress the girls in the best dresses and fancy accessories, from hats to shoes and handbags. Capture the prom princesses' stunning looks with photos to share with friends. Get ready to make prom night unforgettable!
prom-night-dress-up.controls: Use the left mouse button to choose outfit.

sky-riders-buk.name: Sky Riders
sky-riders-buk.description: Sky Riders is a high-speed casual vehicle driving game. Put your driving skills to the test as you complete several challenging tracks. Stay focused and avoid falling off! Whether you're behind the wheel of a car or riding a motorcycle, prepare for an adrenaline-fueled adventure and unforgettable racing moments. Get ready to conquer difficult tests and feel the excitement of Sky Riders!
sky-riders-buk.controls:
• W or up arrow key = forward
  • S or down arrow key = back
  • A or left arrow key = move left
  • D or right arrow key = move right
  • Space = handbrake
  • Left mouse button = interact ingame UI

tank-wars-iaw.name: Tank Wars
tank-wars-iaw.description: Tank Wars is an action game where you engage in explosive 3D turn-based tank warfare! Experience intense battles with strategic tactics and thrilling action. Choose from 5 unique tanks and navigate meticulously designed maps. Unleash devastating power-ups and dominate the battlefield. Play single, two, or four-player game modes, including a challenging campaign. With stunning graphics and addictive gameplay, Tank Wars delivers the ultimate tank warfare experience. Get ready for explosive battles and become the master of strategic tank tactics!
tank-wars-iaw.controls:
• W = aim up
  • S = aim down
  • A = move left
  • D = move right
  • Space = fire and bullet control
  • 1,2,3,4 = power-up selection
  • Enter = zoom in / out

fg-factory-2.name: FG Factory 2
fg-factory-2.description: FG Factory 2 is an incremental idle factory game where you must gather resources and craft items to complete the mission. Drawing inspiration from acclaimed titles like Factorio, Satisfactory, and Dyson Sphere Program, this game offers multiple scenarios to challenge your industrial prowess. Build, automate, and optimize your factories to maximize production and conquer new frontiers. Are you ready to become the ultimate factory tycoon?
fg-factory-2.controls: Use the left mouse button to play the game.

turbo-stars---rival-racing.name: Turbo Stars - Rival Racing
turbo-stars---rival-racing.description: Turbo Stars - Rival Racing is a heart-pounding high-speed skateboard racing game! Zoom through thrilling tracks, outpace opponents, and put a fresh spin on karting in this wild and fast-paced game.
turbo-stars---rival-racing.faq:
What are the keys for in Turbo Stars?

Collect 3 keys and you will be awarded a selection of chests containing various rewards.

How do I get new skateboards in Turbo Stars?

Every level you complete takes you one step closer to a new vehicle.

nightfall-drifters.name: Nightfall Drifters
nightfall-drifters.description: Nightfall Drifters is an adrenaline-fueled game that transports you to the exhilarating realm of high-quality drifting in a captivating cityscape. Master an array of unique cars, each with distinct features, and showcase your drifting prowess. Aim to dominate the streets, earn remarkable scores, and secure the title of the ultimate drift king. You can play this game in single-player mode or dual-player mode. Get ready for a thrilling midnight racing experience like no other!

sticker-art.name: Sticker Art
sticker-art.description: Sticker Art is a fun casual game that lets you unleash your creativity and make unique stickers. Customize various sticker shapes and designs with colors and patterns, then save and share your creations with friends. With a user-friendly interface suitable for all ages, this game has a delightful experience for kids and adults alike. Explore pre-made templates, or let your imagination roam freely! There are endless possibilities to express your creativity in this game.
sticker-art.controls: Use the mouse to play the game.

draw-crash-race.name: Draw Crash Race
draw-crash-race.description: Draw Crash Race is a casual art game where you not only get to race a car in 3D, but you get to design it beforehand! Show off your drawing skills to build a fast vehicle with a sturdy body to withstand even the most challenging tracks. The races are filled with all kinds of obstacles to avoid, so the drawing challenge is on!
draw-crash-race.faq:
Why does my car keep falling apart in Draw Crash Race?

You could be adding too many lines and extra parts to the car. It's best to keep it simple. Make sure you keep upgrading your durability level to ensure your car stays intact.

Can I save my progress in Draw Crash Race?

Yes, and with a CrazyGames account you can take your progress to another device and resume the game from where you left it.
draw-crash-race.controls:
• W or up arrow key = forward
  • A / D or left and right arrow keys = move left/right
  • Left mouse button = interact with ingame UI
draw-crash-race.how_to_play:
Draw a supercar

Use your drawing skills to create a sturdy car by connecting the wheels to the pilot's seat, and adding anything extra for aerodynamics! There’s no right way to build your car, but bear in mind it’s quite fragile. Experiment with different shapes to see what works best.

Reach first place

Compete against other racers while navigating obstacle-filled tracks. Green boosters give you extra speed and help you to the finish line. But spiked traps and other deadly contraptions can tear your fragile motor to pieces in one swing.

Upgrade your abilities

Prepare for high-speed races, but be cautious! Your wireframe car is quite flimsy and prone to breaking up. Use the gold you earned from previous races to upgrade your durability, ink, and speed. The more ink you have, the more parts you can add to your racecar. There is a badge on each upgrade icon that indicates your upgrade level.

cat-house.name: Cat House
cat-house.description: Cat House is an adorable casual game where you take charge of a cute cat on a mission to tidy up its toys. Navigate through 27 challenging levels, guiding the cat to collect and store each toy while avoiding obstacles. Experience new surprises and twists on each level, keeping you engaged throughout this delightful adventure.
cat-house.controls:
Desktop

  • A, D or Arrow Keys = Move
  • W, Up Arrow, Space, or H = Jump

Mobile

Tap the Control buttons to move and jump.

cinderella-dress-up-girl-games.name: Cinderella Dress Up Girl
cinderella-dress-up-girl-games.description: Cinderella Dress Up Girl is a stunning makeover game fit for a princess. As she prepares to attend the grand ball and meet Prince Charming, it's up to you to unleash your fashionista talent and create a stylish and glamorous outfit for her. Explore a beauty salon filled with a wide selection of clothing items, hairstyles, and accessories. With your creativity, transform Cinderella into a true fashion icon. Play this delightful dress-up game and join the world of princesses, fairies, and beautiful models. With countless outfit combinations and offline gameplay, the fun never ends. Get ready to become a fashion designer and enjoy the enchanting world of Cinderella!
cinderella-dress-up-girl-games.controls: Use the left mouse button to change outfit.

candy-hair-salon---doll-games.name: Candy Doll Hair Salon
candy-hair-salon---doll-games.description: Candy Doll Hair Salon is a dress-up game where you can meet adorable dolls with stunning hairstyles. These popular surprise toys are ready for a fabulous makeover, and it's up to you to create their perfect look. Choose from a wide range of backgrounds, dresses, shoes, and accessories to complete their picture-perfect appearance. Customize their lips, eyes, and eyebrows to make them truly unique. With animated features and high-quality items, this dress-up game offers a one-of-a-kind experience. Create dolls that resemble you or your friends and explore the fashion clothes and hair salon at your disposal. Get ready to immerse yourself in this adorable dolls makeover game and surprise your friends with your styling skills. With intuitive controls and bright graphics, it's the ultimate dolls dress-up experience. If you're a fan of cute dolls games, this one is a must-try!
candy-hair-salon---doll-games.controls: Use the left mouse button to change outfit

used-car-dealer-tycoon.name: Used Car Dealer Tycoon
used-car-dealer-tycoon.description: Used Car Dealer Tycoon is a captivating simulation game where you take on the challenge of running a used car business from the ground up. Your success hinges on your ability to maintain an honest reputation as a dealer. Make strategic decisions, negotiate fair deals, and provide top-notch customer service to keep your business thriving. Build a reputable brand and become the go-to destination for quality used cars. Are you ready to prove yourself as an honest and successful car dealer?
used-car-dealer-tycoon.controls: Use the mouse to play the game.

flag-defender.name: Flag Defender!
flag-defender.description: Flag Defender! is a defense game that puts you in charge of protecting the flag against relentless enemy invasions. Utilize your unique skills and deploy helpful allies to fend off waves of increasingly powerful foes. After each victorious wave, enhance your skills through upgrades to prepare yourself for the upcoming challenges. Get ready to defend the flag and prove your strategic prowess!
flag-defender.controls:
• WASD / arrow keys = move
  • Left-click = interact with in-game buttons

basketball-clash.name: Basketball Clash
basketball-clash.description: Basketball Clash is the ultimate basketball game that brings together players from around the globe, providing endless entertainment. Showcase your talent and rise among the top 100 basketball shooters worldwide. Prepare for exhilarating competitions where your agility, logic, and strategic thinking will determine your triumph. Prove your skills and dominate the court!
basketball-clash.controls: Drag and release the left mouse button to shoot the ball.

merge-battle-car.name: Merge Battle Car
merge-battle-car.description: Merge Battle Car is an exciting casual merge game where you can create mighty war machines by merging battle cars and robots. Engage in intense battles against enemy teams in a futuristic arena, using your tactical skills to defeat steel robots and earn money for army upgrades. With stunning 3D graphics and addictive gameplay, unlock the ultimate max-level cars and robots as you strive to become the ultimate merge master. Enjoy easy and intuitive gameplay, merge units to strengthen your forces, and unlock super-powerful robots and battle cars!
merge-battle-car.controls: Drag the left mouse button to merge the robots / cars.

crazy-mx.name: Crazy MX
crazy-mx.description: Crazy MX is a stunt motorbike game that you can play solo or with your friend locally. Showcase your daredevil skills with motorbike tricks like Superman, free hand and backflips. Whether riding solo or competing with a friend, get ready to unleash a flurry of jaw-dropping stunts and defy gravity on the track!
crazy-mx.controls:
Player 1

  • W = accelerate
  • S = break
  • A = lean backward
  • D = lean forward
  • V = free hand trick
  • B = Superman trick

Player 2

  • Up arrow = accelerate
  • Down arrow = break
  • Left arrow = lean backward
  • Right arrow = lean forward
  • O = free hand trick
  • P = Superman trick

hyper-survive-3d.name: Hyper Survive 3D
hyper-survive-3d.description: Hyper Survive 3D is an intense casual action game where you must defend yourself against a relentless zombie apocalypse. As you wake up to a world infected by a deadly virus, prepare for terror, horror, and the fight for survival against hordes of zombies. Build a camp, strategize, and endure the waves of undead. It's a whole new world where your survival and personal story are in your hands. Gather resources, adapt, and welcome the challenges of Hyper Survival!
hyper-survive-3d.controls: Use WASD / arrow keys / drag the left mouse button to move around.

cars-vs-skibidi-toilet.name: Cars vs Skibidi Toilet
cars-vs-skibidi-toilet.description: Cars vs Skibidi Toilet is an action-packed game where you engage in a thrilling battle against a monstrous Skibidi Toilet. Drive powerful cars armed with guns and unleash havoc on these invading creatures. Protect the city from their terror as you upgrade your vehicles, acquire new weapons, and become an unstoppable force against the toilet invasion. Explore the expansive city, encounter various types of Skibidi toilets, and save the residents from this unusual threat. Get ready for a wild mix of racing and shooting in this unique action game!
cars-vs-skibidi-toilet.controls:
Desktop Controls

  • WASD = control the car
  • Space = handbrake
  • Left-click = shoot
  • Move mouse = move camera view\

Mobile Controls

  • Virtual joystick = control the car
  • Moving your finger across the screen = aiming
  • The weapon fires automatically when pointing the sight

fashion-dress-up-challenge.name: Fashion Dress Up Challenge
fashion-dress-up-challenge.description: Fashion Dress Up Challenge is a beauty game where you can unleash your styling skills and create cool outfits for girls. Step into the world of fashion competitions and showcase your talent on the runway and in beauty pageants. Are you ready to become a renowned stylist? Compete against others and strive for world recognition in the fashion industry!
fashion-dress-up-challenge.controls: Use the left mouse button to interact with the in-game UI.

noob-parkour-3d.name: Noob Parkour 3D
noob-parkour-3d.description: Noob Parkour 3D is a parkour game that challenges players with a variety of blocks, obstacles, mechanics, and traps. Each track in this Minecraft-inspired universe has a unique theme, allowing players to explore different regions. Complete tracks in their own unique ways. Build your own path, strategically place blocks, and overcome challenges using special items. Get ready for an exciting parkour adventure!
noob-parkour-3d.controls:
• WASD / arrow keys = move
  • Space = jump
  • Left-click = interact with an object
  • Move mouse = move the camera view

merge-construct.name: Merge & Construct
merge-construct.description: Merge & Construct is an arcade game where you can be creative to build the ultimate vehicle for driving, flying, and smashing! Show off your imagination as you construct a vehicle capable of crossing the finish line in action-packed car trials. Put your skills to the test in thrilling obstacle races and ensure your car passes the crash test with flying colors. Unleash your creativity and prepare for an exhilarating gaming experience!
merge-construct.controls:
Desktop Controls

Hold W / Space / left mouse button to move and release it to break.

Mobile Controls

Tap to move and release to break.

jump-in-to-the-plane.name: Jump Into The Plane
jump-in-to-the-plane.description: Jump Into The Plane is a casual game that lets you perform mind-blowing stunts as you jump from a car into a plane, channeling your inner super agent. Who needs conventional parking when you can drive straight into a cargo hold? Brace yourself for an insanely fun experience that defies logic. With a wide array of cars, planes, and thrilling locations, prepare for heart-pounding excitement. But remember, timing is everything. Don't miss your chance to catch that plane!
jump-in-to-the-plane.controls: Use the left mouse button to interact with in-game UI.

noob-vs-cops.name: Noob vs Cops
noob-vs-cops.description: Noob vs Cops is an exhilarating survival game where you take on the role of Noob and must escape the relentless pursuit of zombie cops. Navigate your boat, dodge obstacles, and take down zombie cops. Collect points by gathering fish and crabs. Buy new weapons and upgrade your boat. With each thrilling mission, outsmart the zombie cops and become the ultimate pirate with your formidable pirate ship!
noob-vs-cops.controls:
Keyboard

Use AD or left / right arrow keys to navigate the boat.

Mobile

On mobile, tap on opposite sides of the screen for turns.

fantasy-avatar-anime-dress-up.name: Fantasy Avatar Anime Dress Up
fantasy-avatar-anime-dress-up.description: Fantasy Avatar Anime Dress Up is a dress-up game where you can style adorable anime characters in stunning outfits. Immerse yourself in the world of manga and anime as you create your own unique character and become a master doll designer. With over 300 items inspired by RPG cosplay styles, including warriors, knights, archers, and more, the possibilities are endless. Dress up your cute girl, customize her features, and choose from various backgrounds to complete the perfect look. Share your creations with friends and indulge in the ultimate fashion experience!
fantasy-avatar-anime-dress-up.controls: Use the left mouse button to select an outfit.

parking-line.name: Parking Line
parking-line.description: Parking Line is a casual puzzle game that puts your driving skills to the test. Your task is to draw the perfect line and park the car in the designated spot. With various levels offering unique parking setups, each challenge will demand precision and strategy. Sharpen your parking prowess as you progress through the game, conquering one parking spot after another. Can you master the art of precise parking? Take on the challenge and find out!
parking-line.controls: Drag the left mouse button to draw.

dino-crowd.name: Dino Crowd
dino-crowd.description: Dino Crowd is an exciting casual game where your objective is to gather a massive army of dinosaurs and create the largest crowd to defeat your opponents. Recruit various dinosaur species and strategically expand your crowd to overpower your rivals. Prove your dominance in this epic dinosaur showdown!
dino-crowd.controls:
• WASD / arrow keys / drag left-click = move
  • QE = use Dino's power

sniper-strike.name: Sniper Strike
sniper-strike.description: Sniper Strike is a first-person shooter game that puts you in intense and difficult situations. Stay vigilant and exercise caution as you navigate through challenging missions. Your keen eye and precise aim are crucial as you identify and eliminate high-value targets to accomplish each mission triumphantly. Prepare for an adrenaline-pumping experience filled with tactical precision and thrilling sniper action.
sniper-strike.controls:
• Left-click = shoot
  • Right-click = iron sight
  • Scroll mouse-wheel = zoom in / out
  • R = reload
  • Tab = pause

tanks-of-the-galaxy.name: Tanks of the Galaxy
tanks-of-the-galaxy.description: Tanks of the Galaxy is a top-down tank shooter game that delivers explosive 2D warfare. Engage in thrilling battles as you annihilate enemy tanks and obliterate environmental obstacles. Utilize a wide range of weapons to dismantle your adversaries while skillfully evading their attacks. Stay resilient with shields to emerge victorious. Liberate planets from invading tanks, earn coins, and enhance your tank with powerful upgrades and weapons. Immerse yourself in addictive gameplay and dominate the battlefield!
tanks-of-the-galaxy.controls:
Desktop

  • WASD / arrow keys = move
  • Space = switch weapon
  • Left-click = shoot
  • Move mouse = aim

Mobile

Use the virtual joystick on the screen (touch input). Auto-aim on enemies can be enabled in the game settings (optional).

construction-ramp-jumping.name: Construction Ramp Jumping
construction-ramp-jumping.description: Construction Ramp Jumping is a stunt car game that defies the laws of gravity. Experience the thrill as you launch 12 tons of metal into buildings, creating a breathtaking spectacle of destruction. With a variety of exciting locations and heavy vehicles at your disposal, indulge in the art of chaos and unleash your inner daredevil. Get ready for heart-pounding action and mind-blowing jumps!
construction-ramp-jumping.controls: Use the left mouse button to play the game.

hula-hoop-race.name: Hula Hoop Race
hula-hoop-race.description: Hula Hoop Race offers an exhilarating challenge for Hula Hoop enthusiasts! Dodge obstacles and race to the finish line with as many Hoops as you can. The more Hoops you collect, the bigger the celebration! Rollerskate and collect Hula Hoops as your character in this action-packed adventure. Conquer difficult obstacles, complete exciting challenges, and make it to the epic party at the end of each level. Customize your experience with new characters, unique Hula Hoops, and rollers. Stand out from the crowd with your personalized character. Best of luck on your Hoop-filled journey!
hula-hoop-race.controls: Hold the left mouse button to control the character.

ramp-bike-jumping.name: Ramp Bike Jumping
ramp-bike-jumping.description: Ramp Bike Jumping is a stunt game that defies gravity and allows you to perform jaw-dropping tricks on a bike, motorcycle, skateboard, or even plane! Experience the thrill of defying the laws of physics as you jump and flip through the air with abandon. Get ready for an adrenaline-packed adventure filled with pure fun and utter madness in this high-flying, action-packed gaming experience! YEE-HAW!
ramp-bike-jumping.controls: Press the left mouse button to boost.

barbiemania.name: Barbiemania
barbiemania.description: Barbiemania is a captivating beauty game that takes you on the ultimate makeup adventure! Accompany the iconic doll, Ellie, and showcase your styling skills by creating stunning looks for three different occasions. Step into the enchanting world of Barbiemania and let your inner stylist shine!
barbiemania.controls: Use the left mouse button to select an item.

miner-s-odyssey.name: Miner's Odyssey
miner-s-odyssey.description: Miner's Odyssey is an incremental game with charming pixel graphics reminiscent of Minecraft. Embark on a thrilling mining adventure, delving deeper into the mine as you unearth blocks to gather resources for creating powerful tools and upgrades. Merge picks to forge enhanced versions, enabling faster and more efficient mining. Navigate through various obstacles and challenges, honing your skills and tools to conquer new depths. Unravel portals to other dimensions, each offering unique opportunities and resources to obtain powerful artifacts and reach the pinnacle of development. With endless possibilities and an exciting journey!
miner-s-odyssey.controls:
• Hold the left mouse button to mine
  • Use the left mouse button to interact with the in-game menu
  • Drag the items from the inventory list to create a strong pickaxe in the craft area
  • Use hotkeys for switching between function menus and for some pop-up menus (works on PC)
  • Hold shift key down to make objects move fast

idle-inventor.name: Idle Inventor
idle-inventor.description: Idle Inventor is an idle game where you can build and expand your industrial empire, becoming a titan of heavy machinery and industry. Manage 5 unique factories with various vehicles, including cars, planes, and spacecraft. Hire managers, automate production lines, and complete exciting missions to grow your factory and earn profits even while you're away. Experience the thrill of being an idle tycoon and watch your empire flourish in this addictive and rewarding game!
idle-inventor.controls: Drag the left mouse button to move the camera view and use the left mouse button to interact with in-game buttons.

space-box-battle-arena.name: Space Cats Battle Arena
space-box-battle-arena.description: Space Cats Battle Arena brings an action-packed fusion of space shooter and battle arena genres. Create your unique space battleship by merging blocks with an array of weapons, armor, generators, lasers, rockets, and more. Engage in thrilling PvP duels in the cool arena of war strategy. Unlock new technologies, craft loot, and build your dream battleship. Customize your ship for speed, power, or impenetrable defenses using different blocks with unique abilities. With 14 maps, 35 types of weapons, blocks, and devices, the outer space sandbox war strategy offers endless possibilities. Challenge your friend to PvP battles and immerse yourself in the mayhem space shooter war. Take command, launch your powerful ship, and dominate the master duel space battle!
space-box-battle-arena.controls:
• WASD or arrow keys = move
  • Shift = nitro
  • Left mouse button = shooting/ interacting with in-game UI

tile-journey.name: Tile Journey
tile-journey.description: Tile Journey is a Match 3 puzzle game that tests your strategic skills. Take advantage of the seven empty slots to match three of the same tiles. But, be careful because failing to make a trio in all slots will end the game!
tile-journey.controls: Use the left mouse button to select tiles.

beekeeping-company.name: Beekeeping Company
beekeeping-company.description: Beekeeping Company is an idle game that lets you create a thriving beekeeping empire and amass a fortune. Unveil a variety of upgrades and enhancements to aid your journey. Begin with a single beehive, clicking diligently to harvest honey for selling. Progress your factory for bottling honey at premium rates. Conquer five distinct achievements to increase your honey production and earnings. Start on a sweet and lucrative beekeeping adventure today!
beekeeping-company.controls: Use the left mouse button to play the game.

bacteria-nrz.name: Bacteria
bacteria-nrz.description: Bacteria is a casual game that lets you inject bacteria into creatures to create monstrous beings! Unleash your creativity as you experiment with different combinations and see what kind of monstrous results you can achieve. Inject the bacteria strategically to produce powerful and unique creatures, each with its own set of abilities and characteristics. Dive into this addictive game of bacteria manipulation and witness the evolution of your creatures into formidable monsters!
bacteria-nrz.controls:
• WASD or arrow keys or left mouse button = move
  • QERT = use spells

skibidi-toilets-infection.name: Skibidi Toilets: Infection
skibidi-toilets-infection.description: Skibidi Toilets Infection is an action meme game in which you play as a mysterious cameraman agent tasked with destroying the Skibidi Toilet monsters, aka heads in moving toilets.
skibidi-toilets-infection.faq:
Is there a Skibidi toilet game?

Skibidi Toilets Infection is a meme game released in 2023 where you destroy the Skibidi Toilet monsters.

Is Skibidi Toilets Infection child friendly?

Indonesian newspapers have raised concerns that Skibidi Toilet's violent and bizarre visuals might harm young children, dubbing it "Skibidi Toilet syndrome." The Guardian later called this “moral panic”. Parents should use discretion when choosing entertainment for their children.

How to play Skibidi Toilet game?

Eliminate all the evil Skibidi Toilets and save your fellow cameramen from parasites using your anti-parasite gun. You can control your character with WASD keys, along with shift, tab, and left-click.
skibidi-toilets-infection.controls:
• WASD = move
  • Shift = run
  • Left-click = flush toilet / shoot
  • Tab = Pause

monster-truck-rampage.name: Monster Truck Rampage
monster-truck-rampage.description: Monster Truck Rampage is a driving game that lets you crush any cars and earn rewards. Use your money to build your garage and upgrade your monster truck. Unleash chaos as you go on a rampage, destroy any cars in your path and become the ultimate monster truck driver!
monster-truck-rampage.controls:
• WASD / arrow keys / drag left-click = drive / move
  • Left-click = interact with in-game buttons

cucumber-man.name: Cucumber Man
cucumber-man.description: Cucumber Man is a funny casual arcade game where you must control this weird-looking cucumber with a long tongue. Drag your body to the finish line using your tongue since you don't have feet and hands. Collect coins along the way and use them to unlock new skins. Get ready and show off your tongue skills!
cucumber-man.controls: Drag the left mouse button to control the tongue.

professor-strange.name: Professor Strange
professor-strange.description: Professor Strange is an action game where you play as a Supreme Mage. Take down your foes with various thrilling moves. Slash and cut your enemies, teleport them to the other dimension, and use your shield to defend yourself. Use your magical superpower and save the world!
professor-strange.controls: Use the mouse to play the game.

high-school-anime-dress-up.name: High School Anime Dress Up
high-school-anime-dress-up.description: High School Anime Dress Up is a beauty game where you can create stylish outfits for cute Japanese school girls. There are plenty of clothing options and accessories you can choose from. Design the perfect look, from traditional to trendy. Express your fashion flair and experiment with makeup and hairstyles. Capture your creation with in-game screenshots. Dive into the world of anime fashion, share your designs, and explore a variety of outfits and accessories.
high-school-anime-dress-up.controls: Use the left mouse button to select an outfit.

my-crystal-underwater.name: My Crystal Underwater
my-crystal-underwater.description: My Crystal Underwater is a delightful casual game where you can dive into the depths of the sea and gather precious crystals. Explore the beautiful underwater world, collect gold, and be the wealthiest diver!
my-crystal-underwater.controls:
• Use WASD / arrow keys / drag left-click = move
  • Left-click = interact with in-game buttons

noob-s-chicken-farm-tycoon.name: Noob's Chicken Farm Tycoon
noob-s-chicken-farm-tycoon.description: Noob's Chicken Farm Tycoon is a clicker game where you must help Noob to run his chicken farm. Breed and upgrade your chickens, buy useful tools for the farm, and protect your chicken from the fox's attack. You can put on various masks for your chickens, such as Noob, zombies, demons, cats, and more. Tired of chicken? Swap them out for a Banana Cat or Noobidi Toilet that makes toilet paper instead of eggs. You can also buy a dinosaur whose eggs are bigger and more expensive to sell! Build your chicken farm in different locations, like in a forest, under the sea, or even in hell. Compete with other chicken breeders to see who manages the best chicks!
noob-s-chicken-farm-tycoon.controls: Use the left mouse button to play the game.

animal-zoo-clicker.name: Animal Zoo Clicker
animal-zoo-clicker.description: Animal Zoo Clicker is an idle clicker game where you can purchase animals, make them big, and sell them to get some money. Clicks on the animals and collect their gold poo to receive additional money. Oversee and expand your zoo, accumulate wealth, and be the richest!
animal-zoo-clicker.controls: Use the left mouse button to play the game.

turbo-crash.name: Turbo Crash
turbo-crash.description: Turbo Crash is an adrenaline-pumping driving racing game where you battle it out on obstacle-packed tracks against pretty fierce competitors. Race through high-speed circuits filled with sharp turns, hazardous obstacles, and unpredictable twists. Your goal is to outmaneuver and outpace your rivals, proving your skill and speed as the ultimate driver.
turbo-crash.faq:
How to play Turbo Crash?

Your goal in Turbo Crash is to race through obstacle-filled tracks, master tight corners, and finish first to earn money, advance through leagues, and unlock new cars.

What is the game where you crash cars?

Turbo Crash is a driving racing game where you speed through challenging courses, all while crashing your way to the finish.
turbo-crash.controls: Use WASD / arrow keys to drive the car.
turbo-crash.how_to_play:
Turbo Crash offers an exciting racing experience as you speed around various tracks, skillfully dodging obstacles and mastering sharp corners. Your main objective is to finish the race in first place to maximize your earnings, which will help you advance through the racing leagues and unlock new cars.

You will likely not be speeding through the courses in your first few tries as there are as many curves as obstacles, which makes this incredibly challenging.

As you race, be prepared to face a variety of challenges, including tight curves and whimsical candy-cane-colored obstacles that can obstruct your path. While drifting is essential, your focus should be on control and precision to ensure you cross the finish line ahead of the competition.

Keep an eye on the railings—getting caught can slow you down significantly, so aim to stay centered on the track, especially during sharp turns. Maintain your speed by keeping your finger on the accelerator and using the arrow keys for steering.

After each race, visit the garage to upgrade your ride. Choose from a selection of unique cars, including the Ganymede, Orcus, Supernova, Haumea, Mercurio, Pallas, Centauri, Sirius, Vesta, Columbia, Luna, M2, Mars, Orion, Stellar, Eridanus, Phaethon, and Pluton.

With over a dozen cars ready to race alongside you, the competition is fierce. Are you ready to take on the challenge?

man-runner-2048.name: Man Runner 2048
man-runner-2048.description: Man Runner 2048 is a fun casual game where you run and merge men to reach 2048. Your goal is to get the highest score on each level so you can shoot the giant monsters with the most power.
man-runner-2048.controls:
• Use the left mouse button or AD or left-right arrow keys to move to the left and right.
  • Use the left mouse button to aim the monster.

crazy-for-speed.name: Crazy for Speed
crazy-for-speed.description: Crazy for Speed is a thrilling driving game where you can race around various tracks doing stunts, drifting, and reaching high speeds. Collect hidden car parts such as hoods, bumpers, spoilers, sideskirts, and fenders.
crazy-for-speed.controls:
• W / up arrow = accelerate
  • S / down arrow = brake / move backward
  • A / left arrow = turn left
  • D / right arrow key = turn right
  • R = reset car position
  • C = camera view
  • L = headlamp
  • M = map
  • P = pause
  • Left-click = interact with in-game buttons

block-clicker.name: Block Clicker
block-clicker.description: Block Clicker is a clicker game that puts you in charge of a mining company. Your objective is to enhance miners' abilities to extract new block varieties and clear islands of older blocks. Acquire upgrades to boost productivity. Earn rewards and achievements upon task completion. The game's minimalist graphics keep you engaged, while ambient audio cues enhance the experience.
block-clicker.controls: Use the left mouse button to interact.

furry-dress-up-anime-creator.name: Furry Dress Up: Anime Creator
furry-dress-up-anime-creator.description: Furry Dress Up: Anime Creator is a dress-up game where you can style these fantasy furry characters. There are various stylish outfits, from trendy to casual, to create the perfect look. Customize eyes, mouths, and fur color. Add wings, horns, and many more accessories to complete your character. Express your unique style!
furry-dress-up-anime-creator.controls: Use the left mouse button to select an outfit.

cubie-jump.name: Cubie Jump
cubie-jump.description: Cubie Jump is an arcade game where you embark on a journey with your adorable Cubie & Cupet friends. Navigate changing landscapes, collect fruit to slow down, and employ double jumps strategically to progress further. With charming low-poly visuals and over 70 unique characters to unlock, the game offers immersive one-touch controls and endless excitement.
cubie-jump.controls: Press Z or space or left/right mouse button to jump.

tower-defense-clash.name: Tower Defense Clash
tower-defense-clash.description: Tower Defense Clash is a casual tower defense game where you protect a castle from the persistent attack of outsiders. Place your turrets, upgrade them, and keep the horde away from the castle. Progress through the unique levels. It's all about thinking ahead!
tower-defense-clash.faq:
How many levels are there in Tower Defense Clash?

There are 18 replayable levels in this game.

How can I skip the wait time between waves?

If you click the loading skull icon, it skips straight to the next wave.
tower-defense-clash.controls: Use the left mouse button to play the game.
tower-defense-clash.how_to_play:
Embark on your quest

Start your journey as a master of tower defense, tasked with defending a series of castles from imminent attack. On this quest, you’ll battle various enemies, build and upgrade robust defenses, and use a range of epic spells to smite down the attacking hordes.

Prepare your defenses

Start the first level and jump into the action. There’s a cool-off period where you can plan your strategy and build defenses before each wave of enemies. Each defense has a unique ability, like long-range archery or wide-impact boulders. Choose wisely where you place each tower.

Upgrade and use spells

Every vanquished enemy delivers gold to your pocket in real-time. Use that gold during battle to place more towers and upgrade the existing ones. Use your spells on large groups of enemies to stop them in their tracks.

Progress to uncharted lands

Progress further down the path to victory into new terrains and trickier battles. As you move to the later levels, unique defenses and a litany of new spells await. You’re awarded a star rating for each level you complete. You can replay levels if you want to improve your score!

girl-dress-up-games-online.name: Girl Dress Up
girl-dress-up-games-online.description: Girl Dress Up is a beauty game with various fashion clothes and makeup. Dressup girl model with the most stylish clothes for a date, college, shopping, or a fashion show! Choose the color of her skin, eyes, eyebrows, as well as makeup like eye shadow, lipstick, and blush. Start dressing up with many clothing items for outfit design. Get stylish looks for any occasion from crazy shopping, a college date, or a star party. You can also choose backgrounds like a mall, bedroom, park, etc. Take screenshots and share them with your friends!
girl-dress-up-games-online.controls: Use the left mouse button to select an outfit.

ragdoll-archers.name: Ragdoll Archers
ragdoll-archers.description: Ragdoll Archers is an archery game featuring bow and arrow-equipped stickmen with ragdoll physics. Fire arrows at a range of opponents while earning points to upgrade your abilities and ammunition. Play two-player PvP against your friend or team up with them to defeat a range of foes!
ragdoll-archers.faq:
What is the best bow in Ragdoll Archers?

There are numerous powerful bows in the game. For a great early game choice, the 3-shot bow is one of the best.

What is the best way to survive long term in Ragdoll Archers?

Make sure to go for the apples as much as possible. This will greatly increase your longevity.
ragdoll-archers.controls:
1 Player Mode

  • Use the left mouse button to control the archer.
  • Use the spacebar to jump.

PvP Mode

  • Player 1 = uses WASD to control the archer and left-shift to jump.
  • Player 2 = uses arrow keys to control the archer and right-shift to jump.

2 Player Mode

  • Player 1 = uses WASD to control the archer and left-shift to jump.
  • Player 2 = uses arrow keys to control the archer and right-shift to jump.

marina-fever-tycoon.name: Marina Fever Tycoon
marina-fever-tycoon.description: Marina Fever Tycoon is a casual game where you manage a bustling marina clubhouse. This captivating blend of tycoon, adventure, and idle gaming lets you transform a modest establishment into a thriving empire. Build, upgrade, and strategically manage facilities to attract visitors, all while tapping to earn money. With stunning visuals, immersive sound effects, and innovative idle mechanics, create your dream marina empire and embrace the life of a tycoon!
marina-fever-tycoon.controls:
• WASD or arrow keys or drag the left mouse button to move the character.
  • Use the left mouse button to interact with the in-game UI.

only-up-craft.name: Only Up Craft
only-up-craft.description: Only Up Craft is a 3D action game where you go up to the clouds by flying steps. Embark on a captivating journey from ships to planets through the clouds and beyond. Scale the world's most perilous ladder, navigating obstacles, calculating height and speed. Prove your courage and dexterity as you jump and climb to new heights!
only-up-craft.controls:
• WASD / arrow keys = move
  • Space = jump
  • Shift = acceleration
  • V = change the camera view
  • Tab = pause

anime-princess-dress-up-games.name: Anime Princess Dress Up
anime-princess-dress-up-games.description: Anime Princess Dress Up is a beauty game where you create your own kawaii princess character with a range of costumes and hairstyles. The game offers numerous items like dresses, tops, skirts, shoes, bags, and accessories to mix and match for endless combinations. You can customize your anime princess's face, skin color, hairstyle, and makeup, then add glitter wings, face masks, and even cute baby pets. With various backgrounds to choose from, including magic castles and princess rooms, this dress-up game is perfect for creating your ideal anime fashion princess. Share your creations with friends and enjoy the magic of princess dress-up and makeover games!
anime-princess-dress-up-games.controls: Use left mouse button to change outfit.

fast-food-factory.name: Fast Food Factory
fast-food-factory.description: Fast Food Factory is a clicker game that caters to food enthusiasts and those eager to delve into the world of fast food production. As you run your factory, you'll craft a variety of foods, and expand your operations. The game's addictive simplicity lies in clicking to create and combine products, allowing you to witness your culinary creations spring to life. With each unlocked production line, your ability to concoct unique food combinations flourishes. Upgrade your assembly line by combining identical machines and compete with friends to build a thriving food empire in this addictive and rewarding game!
fast-food-factory.controls: Use the left mouse button to interact with in-game UI.

ram-cars.name: Ram Cars
ram-cars.description: Ram Cars is a car battle game where you drive and smash an opponent's car by drawing a line. This game offers 3D graphics, different arenas, multiple challenges, upgrades, and rewards! Draw the line to move your car. While planning your path, you will also see the trajectory of the enemy. That is where you need to think fast to react and coordinate your moving direction well to be rammed right into your opponent. The best hits are when you T-bone your opponent, which is not so easy to do! Don't forget to also upgrade your car's health and strength. More health equals harder to smash, and more strength means that a well-planned hit could destroy another fighter in one blow.
ram-cars.controls: Drag the left mouse button to draw a line.

tanks-arena-io-craft-combat.name: Tanks Arena io: Craft & Combat
tanks-arena-io-craft-combat.description: Tanks Arena.io: Craft & Combat is a thrilling PvP action tank battle game where you are combating intense tank wars with a vehicle built and customized by none other than yourself. You will get to challenge players from around the world, so be prepared for plenty of surprises and a variety of strategies from your opponent.
tanks-arena-io-craft-combat.faq:
How do you beat a larger vehicle in Tanks Arena io: Craft & Combat?

If you want to defeat a larger tank in Tanks Arena io: Craft & Combat, you need to outmaneuver them by targeting their weak spots, aiming for their wheels to disable their movement, or flipping their vehicle to expose vulnerable areas.

How can I make my tank bigger in Tanks Arena io?

If you want to make your tank bigger in Tanks Arena io, you need to upgrade your vehicle. All tanks are customizable.
tanks-arena-io-craft-combat.controls: Use AD or left and right arrow keys to control the tank's movement.
tanks-arena-io-craft-combat.how_to_play:
Your goal in Tanks Arena.io: Craft & Combat is pretty much to destroy or be destroyed. The sky's the limit in terms of creativity and tactical prowess as you determine what kind of vehicle you will use to destroy your enemy. Start by building your ultimate battle machine. Pick from a variety of chassis, turrets, armor plating, and weapons to craft a tank that reflects your unique style—or even emulate legendary tanks like the T-34 or Leviathan. Once you've built your tank, the real action begins.

Your first challenge is against Tobi the Tower, a rookie opponent to help you get a feel for the battlefield. Earn rewards like coins, jewels, and new tank parts as you progress, which can be used to unlock upgrades and make your tank even mightier.

As you climb the ranks, you’ll face tougher opponents like Frank the Mole, each with their own strategies and strengths—some tanks are much bigger than you, but it's not the size that counts. Outmaneuver them by targeting their weak spots—aim for their wheels to disable their movement or flip their vehicle to expose vulnerable areas.

The key to victory is constant improvement. Keep upgrading your weapons, armor, and gadgets to stay ahead. A stronger tank means better odds of winning battles and dominating the arena.

Prove your skills by crushing opponents in the championships and advance to the prestigious Bronze Division. With each victory, you’ll climb the leaderboard, earning bragging rights and unlocking more rewards.

Strategic hits can turn the tide of battle. A well-aimed shot to your rival’s wheels can render them defenseless—so aim wisely!

Release Date

  • June 2023 (Android)
  • September 2023 (WebGL)
  • December 2023 (iOS)

Developer

NOXGAMES developed Tanks Arena io: Craft & Combat.

Platforms

  • Web browser (desktop and mobile)
  • Android

golf-quest.name: Golf Quest
golf-quest.description: Golf Quest is a 2D top-down golf game where you must reach the hole by avoiding obstacles on your way. The game has 25 unique levels with growing difficulty and also a Speedrun mode to challenge yourself to finish the tracks in the smallest amount of time.
golf-quest.controls:
• H = back to the main menu
  • P = pause
  • R = restart level
  • Left click = stop the ball
  • Drag left-click = aim
  • Release left-click = shoot

paintball-king.name: Paintball King
paintball-king.description: Paintball King is a casual first-person shooter (FPS) game with a twist. In this game, you can wield a variety of unusual weapons like pistols, the KA 74, an automatic turret, or even a banana! Your objective is to compete in different arenas with the goal of being the first to finish the game, and maybe even earning the title of Queen or King. This quirky and fun-filled game offers a unique take on the FPS genre, where unconventional weapons and fast-paced action lead to hours of entertainment. Get ready to dive into a paintball battle like no other!
paintball-king.controls:
• WASD or arrow keys = move around
  • Drag left mouse button = shoot and look around.
  • Space = jump
  • 1 = use radar (when activated)
  • 2 = use turret (when activated)
  • Q = use music (when activated)

dirt-bike-mad-skills.name: Dirt Bike Mad Skills
dirt-bike-mad-skills.description: Dirt Bike Mad Skills is a dirt race game that challenges bike riders on thrilling stunt courses. Conquer valleys, canyons, and perilous terrains for heart-pounding moments in both single-player and 2-player modes. With various bike types and enhanced features, pick your ride and embark on the ultimate biking challenge today!
dirt-bike-mad-skills.controls:
1 Player Mode

  • WASD / arrow keys = move

2 Player Mode

  • Player 1 = use WASD to move
  • Player 2 = use arrow keys to move

empire-clicker.name: Empire Clicker
empire-clicker.description: Empire Clicker is a clicker game where you transform an empty plot of land into a thriving metropolis. Unleash your city-building skills as your settlement evolves into a bustling, dynamic cityscape.
empire-clicker.controls: Use the left mouse button to click

tiktok-street-style.name: Street Style Fashion
tiktok-street-style.description: Street Style Fashion is a dress-up game where creativity knows no bounds. Dive into the realm of trendy outfits and unlock endless style possibilities. Express yourself with the hottest TikTok vibes merged seamlessly with street style. Join the #TikTokStreetStyle challenge today and let your inner fashion rockstar shine!
tiktok-street-style.controls: Use the left mouse button to choose the clothes and accessories.

jump-up-3d-basketball-game.name: Jump Up 3D
jump-up-3d-basketball-game.description: Jump Up 3D is a sports basketball game where you shoot to get that slam dunk, but the one hitch is you're doing it by jumping on a trampoline. Not your ordinary basketball game, this one promises and delivers the excitement! Take aim, bounce on the trampoline, and score baskets before your opponent. With intuitive controls and addictive gameplay, it tests your precision and unleashes your inner dunk master. Be the court champion in this fast-paced! How far can you go in this unlimited playground of basketball action?
jump-up-3d-basketball-game.faq:
What is 3D basketball?

Jump Up 3D is a sports basketball game where you shoot to get that slam dunk, as you compete with random opponents to make your way victory.

What does 3D mean in basketball?

3D is three-point shooting in basketball.
jump-up-3d-basketball-game.controls: Use the left mouse button to shoot.
jump-up-3d-basketball-game.how_to_play:
The game's objective is simple—sink as many basketball shots as you can with a single click. In the first round, you're perched on top of a skyscraper, aiming for a single hoop. Press the spacebar to shoot when your trampoline jump is perfectly aligned for a slam dunk. The key to mastering this physics-based game is timing—wait for the perfect moment in your jump before hitting the spacebar to release the ball. Nail the shot, and you’ll be launched across the hoop, celebrating your victory with a dance alongside other players.

In the second round, you’ll team up with another basketball player, still aiming for just one hoop. But in the third round, things get more intense as you aim for three-point shooting success. Now, you’ll have three hoops at different distances—the farther you sink the shot, the higher the score. By round 4, you'll be shooting from the beach! The pace picks up, and so do the rewards, both in gameplay and points. Dunk as many as you can and watch your player soar. Round 5 ups the challenge with hoops that move up and down, making timing your shots even trickier. Round 6 keeps the pressure on with rotating basketball posts. Get creative, shoot fast, and aim for those multi-shot combos!

Some hoops are blocked, but all it takes is breaking through the barrier to nail your shot.

The levels get more challenging but increase in fun as well. Keep shooting as much as possible and gain an advantage over your opponent to become a three-point shooting basketball champ.

lost-kingdom-supply-wars.name: Lost Kingdom: Supply Wars
lost-kingdom-supply-wars.description: Lost Kingdom: Supply Wars is an action game where the primary objective is to collect as many supplies as possible while simultaneously fending off enemy assaults. This type of game typically involves navigating through a hostile environment or territory, grabbing resources like ammunition, health packs, or power-ups, and using them to survive and defeat enemies.
lost-kingdom-supply-wars.controls:
• WASD or arrow keys = move
  • Left mouse button = attack

make-up-queen-r.name: Make Up Queen R
make-up-queen-r.description: Make Up Queen R is a beauty game that challenges players to apply makeup and achieve a specific look that matches the model's appearance. The game typically consists of three stages, each featuring a different model with a distinct makeup style. The gameplay revolves around precision and timing, requiring players to stop the makeup application at just the right moment to replicate the model's makeup accurately. If the makeup doesn't match the desired look, the game ends at that stage.
make-up-queen-r.controls: Use the left mouse button to interact with in-game UI.

hill-climb-on-moto-bike.name: Hill Climb on Moto Bike
hill-climb-on-moto-bike.description: Hill Climb on Moto Bike is a physics balance game where you must drive your bike through steep and extreme terrain until you reach the finish. Practice and improve your skills and upgrade your motorcycle to make it perform better. Be the bike race baron and win all challenges!
hill-climb-on-moto-bike.controls:
PC Controls

  • W = forward
  • A/D = tilt to the left/right
  • Space = brake

Mobile Controls

Use the virtual buttons on mobile.

endurance-a-top-down-sci-fi-shooter.name: Endurance: A Top-Down Sci-Fi Shooter
endurance-a-top-down-sci-fi-shooter.description: Endurance: A Top-Down Sci-Fi Shooter is a thrilling pixel game set on a mysterious starship. As a researcher on the ship Endurance, you must survive the zombie-like crew, unravel the eerie story, and rescue sane members to build your team. Packed with humor, horror, and nods to classic sci-fi films, this action-packed adventure awaits."
endurance-a-top-down-sci-fi-shooter.controls:
• Use the WASD keys to move
  • Use the left mouse button to shoot / punch, advance the dialogues, and interact

kobolm-rescue.name: Kobolm Rescue
kobolm-rescue.description: Kobolm Rescue is a simulation game where you play as a crew of adventurers who set out to help cute little creatures known as Kobolm. Search for these Kobolms who sleep in caves, collect materials, and build them a nice new home on a peaceful beach. Simply click on a Kobolm and then click on an object to send them on a mission, and you can also click on the ground to plan a building. Explore the island and save all the Kobolms!
kobolm-rescue.controls:
• Left-click = interact with objects
  • Drag left-click = move camera view
  • Mouse wheel = zoom in / out

assassin-hero-infinity-blade.name: Assassin Hero
assassin-hero-infinity-blade.description: Assassin Hero is a roguelike action game that immerses you in the secretive world of the Assassin Brotherhood. Traverse perilous landscapes, from ancient Egypt to medieval cities, Valhalla's hills, and the feudal Orient. Confront classic foes like Templars, pirates, murderers, and mythical creatures. Brace for epic battles against formidable bosses as you relentlessly pursue legendary assassin status. Refine your hit-and-run skills, endure unrelenting enemy hordes, and etch your legacy in Valhalla.
assassin-hero-infinity-blade.controls: Use WASD / arrow keys / left mouse button to move the character

100-love-tester.name: 100% Love Tester
100-love-tester.description: 100% Love Tester is a fun casual game that lets you gauge your compatibility and chemistry with your partner or crush. Enjoy love stories and animations as you explore your romantic connections. Find out if love is in the air with this entertaining love tester!
100-love-tester.controls: Use the keyboard to write names and left-click to interact with in-game buttons.

tank-merge-royal.name: Tank Merge Royal
tank-merge-royal.description: Tank Merge Royal is an action game that combines elements of tank warfare, strategy, and resource management. In this game, players are tasked with merging various materials to craft and customize their own tanks, which they then use to engage in battles against other players.
tank-merge-royal.controls:
• WASD or arrow keys or hold left mouse button to drag the left joystick in order to move your tank
  • QE or click left mouse button to drag to the left or right stick to rotate your tank
  • Space or click the red button to shoot using left mouse.

motocross-arena.name: Motocross Arena
motocross-arena.description: Motocross Arena is an idle game that lets you experience the excitement of motocross racing.. Select from a range of high-powered bikes, explore four challenging arenas, and meet diverse characters. Execute jaw-dropping stunts, engage in thrilling multiplayer races, and personalize your rider and bike for unmatched adrenaline rushes. Prepare to unleash your engine's power and dominate the track in this heart-pounding motocross adventure!
motocross-arena.controls: Use the left mouse button to play

law-of-the-cat-god.name: Law of the Cat God
law-of-the-cat-god.description: Law of the Cat God is an idle clicker game with a unique storyline and a touch of humor. In this game, players find themselves in a future where cats have taken over the world, living a seemingly perfect life thanks to the Cat God. Players take on the role of an unnamed cat with aspirations to become the next Avatar of the Cat God. Along the way, they interact with Manny and other characters, engage in various activities, and uncover the game's lore.

pogo-stick-parkour-rage-game.name: Pogo Stick Parkour: Rage Game
pogo-stick-parkour-rage-game.description: Pogo Stick Parkour: Rage Game is a difficult 2D platformer game where you must use a pogo stick to overcome the path. Use your skills and jump around this surreal mountain full of different scenarios and impossible challenges. Try hard to avoid the frustration of falling. Will you be able to reach the top?

balloon-clash.name: Balloon Clash
balloon-clash.description: Balloon Clash is a casual game where players collect weapons to engage in battles against enemy balloons. This concept combines action, strategy, and perhaps a touch of humor. Players are likely to enjoy the challenge of collecting the right weapons and using them effectively to defeat their opponents.

numbers-arena.name: Numbers Arena
numbers-arena.description: Numbers Arena is a math, snake, and merge game altogether in one game. The green number means pluses, the red number means minus, and the yellow x2 is to multiply your number. If your number is higher than your enemies, then you can run up to it to break it. Collect gray numbers enemies drop to grow even more! You will win when you reach the right number. Collect numbers to be the biggest in the arena and smash the rest of your enemies!

trash-factory.name: Trash Factory
trash-factory.description: Trash Factory is a fun-filled game where you assist adorable trash pandas in sorting garbage into the right bins. These raccoons rely on you to keep their world clean! Beware, though; if you make mistakes, your boss won't be pleased, and your job will be on the line. Get ready to embark on a trashy adventure and save the day for these mischievous raccoons!

race-clicker.name: Race Clicker
race-clicker.description: Race Clicker is an action-packed idle clicker racing game that'll pump up your adrenaline. Customize, upgrade, and speed your way to victory. Each click pushes your limits, every upgrade unveils new possibilities, and each race dares you to click faster. Leave rivals in the dust and satisfy your need for speed with endless excitement. Start your engines and hit the track now!

go-kart-racing-3d.name: Go Kart Racing 3D
go-kart-racing-3d.description: Go Kart Racing 3D is an exhilarating kart racing game featuring over 15 thrilling tracks. Challenge AI opponents, customize your cars, and upgrade your character's abilities. Earn rewards, unlock new levels, and get ready for an adrenaline-fueled ride!

grand-cyber-city.name: Grand Cyber City
grand-cyber-city.description: Grand Cyber City is a driving game in a sci-fi world. The game contains various game modes such as missions, racing, free drive, derby, and challenge. You can drive various vehicles in the free-ride mode like a car, bike, motorbike, rocket, and parachute. Drive or ride whatever you want in the city, participate in events, collect coins, fly with your rocket, or speed up to the end of the limits with your car. Various cars and customization are waiting in the garage. Have some fun and let the super adventure begin!

leek-factory-tycoon.name: Leek Factory Tycoon
leek-factory-tycoon.description: Leek Factory Tycoon is an idle game where you will be managing your dream Leek Factory. Enjoy a steady flow of idle cash as you expand and upgrade your factories for big profits. Build an extensive conveyor belt system to transport and process your leeks, creating fantastic recipes. Even when you're offline, your restaurant stays open, earning you passive income. Play at your own pace or fine-tune your empire to compete on the live global leaderboard. Show the world your restaurant strategy is the most profitable!

mr-stretch-and-the-stolen-fortune.name: Mr. Stretch and the Stolen Fortune
mr-stretch-and-the-stolen-fortune.description: Mr. Stretch and the Stolen Fortune is a casual puzzle game where you are on a quest to reclaim stolen fortune. Mr. Stretch lost to an old enemy he can't quite remember. Return to the manor, gather your treasure, and uncover secrets from the past. Stretch between platforms, avoid spooks, and beat the game with gem combos and par scores. This demo offers 20 levels, journal entries, and a secret Artifact Vault.

dino-world-merge-fight.name: Dino World: Merge & Fight
dino-world-merge-fight.description: Dino World: Merge & Fight is a dinosaur battle game where you need to merge items and equip them to your dinosaur so it becomes more powerful. Battle in dino-on-dino showdowns and emerge victorious against your opponents!

foono-online-multiplayer-card-game.name: Foono Online Multiplayer
foono-online-multiplayer-card-game.description: Foono Online Multiplayer is an engaging card game that takes inspiration from classics like Uno Online and Crazy Eights. The objective is to clear your hand of cards before your opponents do. It's a game of strategy, quick thinking, and a bit of luck. Foono offers endless fun and opportunities for social interaction. Whether you're playing casually with friends or in competitive online matches, Foono promises an entertaining card game experience!

spacecraft-noob-return-to-earth.name: SpaceCraft Noob: Return to Earth
spacecraft-noob-return-to-earth.description: SpaceCraft Noob: Return to Earth is a casual adventure game where you become an astronaut and find yourself stranded on an alien planet after a spaceship crash. Your mission? Explore diverse biomes, gather vital resources, and construct advanced factories. Your ultimate goal is to build a rocket and make your way back home. Guide Noob in this cosmic journey filled with challenges and discoveries!

stickman-epic.name: Stickman Epic
stickman-epic.description: Stickman Epic is a fast-paced action arcade game that puts your fearless stickman hero on a mission to eliminate hordes of relentless zombies. In this adrenaline-charged adventure, your objective is to battle through waves of enemies while upgrading your character to become stronger and more resilient to even more difficult challenges along the way to victory.
stickman-epic.faq:
Is Stickman Epic free?

Stickman Epic is a free-to-play online game that you can find among other popular titles on CrazyGames.

When did Stickman Epic come out?

Stickman Epic was released in October 2023 and developed by GamePush.
stickman-epic.controls:
• W / up arrow key = jump
  • A / left arrow key = move left
  • D / right arrow key = move right
  • Space = hit
stickman-epic.how_to_play:
In Stickman Epic, your main goal is to clear each level by defeating zombies and bosses while constantly upgrading your hero. The game will start with a quick tutorial teaching you what your stickman is capable of. You will learn to walk left and right, easy enough. Other moves are jumps and double jumps—these are crucial to master as levels progress. The space bar is used to fight your opponent. Multiple clicks will do the job.

There are 15 chapters in Stickman Epic and they include:

  • Chapter 1: Start of the journey
  • Chapter 2: Dive
  • Chapter 3: Giant Zombie
  • Chapter 4: Spider nest
  • Chapter 5: Minecart battle
  • Chapter 6: Insidious Witch
  • Chapter 7: Zombified Piglin
  • Chapter 8: Wither-Skeleton
  • Chapter 9: Dungeon of Souls
  • Chapter 10: Stickman King
  • Chapter 11: Desert
  • Chapter 12: Cave with creepers
  • Chapter 13: Wither
  • Chapter 14: Keeper’s House
  • Chapter 15: Herobrine

Chapter 1 is fairly easy, and you can practice your moves while gathering coins and rewards. Chapter 2 begins to get trickier immediately, with new obstacles such as lava introduced to quickly keep you on your toes, forcing you to practice your jumps. Chapter 3 is the real test of your stickman's strength—this is where you and a giant zombie will battle to the finish. You may have to repeat this round several times to get enough rewards to unlock the rest of the rounds.

With a wide array of 72 different armor options, you can customize your stickman’s defense to withstand even the toughest of foes. The right combination of armor will give you a tactical advantage, making you an unstoppable force. Whether you’re facing off against challenging zombies or navigating terrifying terrain, every decision you make will impact your chances of survival. Conquer 15 thrilling levels and test your combat skills in epic showdowns with six powerful bosses, or prove your endurance in Survival Mode for endless action.

Tip

  • Red exclamation point = your enemy will soon attack
  • Green exclamation point = your enemy is open to direct attacks
  • White exclamation point = blocking blows

home-flip.name: Home Flip
home-flip.description: Home Flip is a casual arcade game where you are too tired to walk but you need to get to your comfy bed. Leap and somersault through your house, dodging obstacles like tables, chairs, and lamps on your way to bed. Remember the golden rule: DON'T TOUCH THE FLOOR! Master the art of backflips with easy clicks/taps, and enjoy dozens of fun levels, addictive gameplay, and quirky ragdoll physics. Turn your home into a flipping playground!

racing-in-city.name: Racing in City
racing-in-city.description: Racing in City is a driving game where you dodge traffic and complete challenges. Navigate through city traffic on a range of tracks while sitting with a view from behind the wheel. Participate in a long and illustrious driving career. Earn points and cash them in for cars and upgrades.
racing-in-city.faq:
What is the fastest way to earn money in Racing in City?
