One of the fastest ways to earn money in the game is to progress through career mode. Many of the challenges are quite easy to beat.

Is it worth buying new locations in Racing in City?

Customizing your car should be the priority, but since speed isn't everything in this game, it's definitely worth buying new locations for a change of scenery.

tornado-madness.name: Tornado Madness
tornado-madness.description: Tornado Madness is an exhilarating and destructive tornado simulation game that puts you in control of the most powerful force of nature. Take on the role of a rampaging tornado, wreaking havoc through towns and cities as they crush buildings, uproot trees, and cause chaos in their path. The objective? Create the most massive and devastating tornado possible while strategically upgrading your vortex of destruction to unlock new abilities and unleash meteorites and lightning strikes for even more destructive potential. You'll start small, swirling through picturesque landscapes and gradually escalating to urban environments, where your destructive capabilities will be put to the test. Crush entire buildings with a simple touch, tear through forests like a whirlwind of destruction, and leave a trail of devastation in your wake. This game also offers a dynamic upgrade system that lets you enhance your tornado's power, speed, and size, enabling you to obliterate larger structures and cause even more chaos. To amplify the chaos further, you'll have the ability to summon meteorites from the heavens to rain down destruction upon your surroundings. Additionally, call forth powerful lightning strikes to electrocute anything in your path, creating spectacular displays of elemental fury. Be the most destructive force of nature in the world of gaming!

get-ready-with-me-concert-day.name: Get Ready With Me: Concert Day
get-ready-with-me-concert-day.description: Get Ready With Me: Concert Day is a beauty game where you join teen Riri in preparing for the concert of a lifetime. Customize her signature cowgirl hat, experiment with bold makeup, choose jaw-dropping outfits, and accessorize for a complete look. Take your fashion game to the next level by trying out different hair color options, from vibrant hues to subtle highlights. Get ready to stand out from the crowd and have fun in this exciting makeover adventure!

bomber-xxl.name: Bomber XXL
bomber-xxl.description: Bomber XXL is an arcade action game where you control your airplane in the sky and survive your enemy's attack. Become a fearless pilot in a world filled with planes and bombers. Soar through the skies, and aim to get a high score!
bomber-xxl.faq:
Can you decrease your speed in Bomber XXL?

You can move your bomber airplane using the mouse, but you cannot decrease or increase its speed.

How do you shoot in Bomber XXL?

Your airplane will automatically shoot in the direction it is pointing in in Bomber XXL. You can also manually shoot rockets using the left click.

Can I play Bomber XXL on mobile?

Bomber XXL is available to play on mobile as well as desktop.
bomber-xxl.controls:
• Move the mouse = fly around and aim (the plane will automatically shoot)
  • Left-click = fire rocket
bomber-xxl.how_to_play:
The goal of Bomber XXL is essentially to stay alive and avoid enemy attacks, all the while earning rewards for shooting down enemy planes. This arcade survival game has simple, nostalgic graphics and maneuvers. You control your airplane with your mousepad or your mouse. Move the plane in the direction you want it to fly with your mouse, and it will follow that flight path.

It is vital that shoot down enemy airplanes around you, and this, too, is fairly simple gameplay - your plane will automatically shoot wherever it is pointing. You have no control over the speed of your flight, nor can you control how fast you shoot down enemy planes. If you need more robust weapons to fight your opponent, use the left click to shoot rockets.

The key to the game is to avoid dangers from enemy aircraft, but avoiding is not enough; you need to shoot your enemy down, or you will find yourself surrounded by multiple opponents, leaving you defenseless against strength in numbers.

Tip

After you've played several times, you will pick up on patterns and find the best angles for shooting at enemies. You will also want to keep in mind that enemy fire is not the only danger - don't fly into the ground or sun. It's an easy way to crash.

merge-run.name: Merge Run
merge-run.description: Merge Run is a battle arcade game where you must choose your monsters and make them stronger to battle with the villain monsters. Evolve your monsters while you run by entering the right gate. Be a legendary monster trainer, lead powerful monsters, and win the battle. Get ready to join the monster war!

air-battle-royale-sky-blitz.name: Air Battle Royale: Sky Blitz
air-battle-royale-sky-blitz.description: Air Battle Royale: Sky Blitz is an airplane shooting game where you take command of a heavily armed fighter jet. With just a single finger, you'll effortlessly soar through the skies, hunting down rivals and locking onto targets for intense dogfights. Win battles, earn rewards, and amp up your aircraft's speed and firepower or unlock even mightier planes. So, gear up, pilot – ascend to the skies and reign supreme as the ultimate ace in this high-flying extravaganza!

monster-world-fight-arena.name: Monster World: Fight Arena
monster-world-fight-arena.description: Monster World: Fight Arena delivers heart-pounding action and thrilling battles in a voxel-apocalyptic setting. The game's challenging and strategic gameplay makes every battle engaging. The need to continuously attack and develop your character creates a sense of progression and achievement.

nail-art-salon-for-girls.name: Nail Art Salon
nail-art-salon-for-girls.description: Nail Art Salon is a fun beauty game where you play as a nail art artist who can make beautiful nails for your customers.
nail-art-salon-for-girls.faq:
How to play Nail Art Salon?

If you have had a manicure, the gameplay will be very familiar. You need to clean and cream hands, clip nails and paint nails with whatever creative design you want.

Is nail salon game free?

You can play Nail Art Salon for free at CrazyGames.

Is Nail Art Salon fun?

Nail Art Salon is a fun and relaxing game where you get to do nails and show off your creative side.
nail-art-salon-for-girls.controls: Use the mouse to play the game.
nail-art-salon-for-girls.how_to_play:
Unleash your creativity by creating art on the tip of your customers' fingers! Take some "me time" whether you're a nail art enthusiast or simply looking for a fun and creative way to pass the time. Transform nails into works of art and let your imagination run wild. The magic is in your hands!

Features

  • Design Your Dream Nails: Dive into a vast array of nail art designs and patterns to create the manicure of your dreams. From cute and colorful to elegant and sophisticated, there are a lot of themes to choose!
  • Endless Color Options: Explore a rainbow of nail polish colors to express your unique style. Mix and match to create stunning nail art that dazzles.
  • Magical Tools: Use various magical tools to paint and decorate your nails. From brushes and stickers to gems and glitter, the possibilities are endless.
  • Relax and Unwind: Nail Art Salon for Girls is not just about creating beautiful manicures; it's also a relaxing and meditative experience.

Release Date

October 2023

Developer

abcgames developed Nail Art Salon.

Platforms

  • Web browser (desktop and mobile)
  • Android
  • iOS

gold-rush.name: Gold Rush
gold-rush.description: Gold Rush is a simulation game where you must find gem nuggets that are hidden in the sand. Vacuum the sand fields, separate the gems from the sand, and sell the gems to earn money. Make new upgrades for your vehicle to improve your vacuuming power, capacity, and moving speed. Evolve your vehicle to become bigger! Explore many islands to get all the gems and build your own Gold Empire!

knight-of-chess.name: Knight of Chess
knight-of-chess.description: Knight of Chess is a battle game where you can place your army strategically to defeat your enemy. Instead of usual chess pieces, there are many selections of units with unique characteristics you can choose from, such as tank, warrior, marksman, mage, assassin, etc. Synergies will help increase the strength of your army. Become king on the epic chessboard battle!

squadblast.name: SquadBlast
squadblast.description: SquadBlast is an action multiplayer game, a run-and-gun shooter set in the dystopian world set in 2042. With deep class-based combat, each hero brings unique abilities to the battlefield, requiring strategic mastery for victory. The game seamlessly blends the intensity of FPS gameplay with dynamic movement options, offering a refreshing take on the genre. Engage in meaty multiplayer modes, explore diverse maps, and wield various weapons, from assault rifles to experimental supa weapons. Join the fight against oppressive forces, where every bullet matters, and skill reigns supreme.

tankcraft.name: TankCraft
tankcraft.description: TankCraft is a battle tank game where you must take revenge on the villain who infected your tank mate and turned them into an evil tank. Find out who did it and destroy him. Build the strongest tank and install a super gun on it so you can defeat all your enemies. Don't forget about the super boosters also! Only by building the best and strongest tank, you can defeat all the evil tanks and their bosses.

spooky-park.name: Spooky Park
spooky-park.description: Spooky Park is a casual simulation game that puts you in charge of a creepy and mysterious amusement park. In this game, you'll take on the role of the park owner, responsible for designing and managing a theme park that offers spine-tingling experiences to thrill-seeking visitors. If you enjoy simulation games that are a little out of the ordinary, "Spooky Park" offers a captivating journey into the world of thrilling and eerie amusement!

ave-castle.name: Ave Castle
ave-castle.description: Ave Castle is a defense game where you take on the role of defense commander and must protect your castle using your strategy. Plant and cut down trees to get money. Use the money to hire new fighters and upgrade your army using wood. Destroy the enemy's castle, use rage skills during the heat of battle, and gain victory! You can also create your own maps and share them through the editor. Play with a friend by using the advanced settings in the menu. The goal of the game is to destroy the enemy's castle.

balanced-running.name: Balanced Running
balanced-running.description: Balanced Running is a casual game where you can show your skills by making a puppet walk in a room with a hot Lava Floor. This will be a little hard at first because you should decide how long you need to hold the button very carefully. If you hold too much, the puppet will make a long step, and this can make it unbalanced and fall down. Try to make your steps balanced and get the character to the finish! There are 1 Player and 2 Player modes available. Play by yourself or with your friend locally. Let's get it begun!

traffic-loop.name: Traffic Loop
traffic-loop.description: Traffic Loop is an idle game where you can earn money from the traffic. Morning traffic is usually the worst thing in the world, but now you have a chance to get an advantage of it! Buy cars and merge them together to create a better car. Better cars mean more money, plus merging cars together can also reduce traffic. All you need to do is to create traffic, merge cars, build roads, and keep the money flowing. Be the traffic tycoon and earn unimaginable amounts of money!

war-nations-io.name: War Nations.io
war-nations-io.description: War Nations.io is a real-time multiplayer game. Compete with other players to conquer the map, using simple drag-and-drop controls to lead your troops into battle. Send more attackers than your opponent's defenders to claim victory and be the last nation standing. With 2-4 players in each room and endless rooms to join, customize your nickname and avatar, and show your strategic prowess in this thrilling war game.

slushy-maker.name: Slushy Maker
slushy-maker.description: Slushy Maker is a cooking game where you can create delicious and refreshing slushy drinks. Unleash your creativity, quench your thirst, and be the master of slushy drink creations. Mix, match, and blend different ingredients from many selections of fruits, fizzy sodas, and sweet syrups. There are endless combinations of drinks to craft, from sweet strawberries to tangy lemons, and also don't forget exotic mangos! Show off your slushy-making skills to your friends and become the ultimate Slushy Master!

ice-cream-maker.name: Ice Cream Maker
ice-cream-maker.description: Ice Cream Maker is a simulation cooking game where you craft your dream ice cream flavor with over 60 recipes and a variety of toppings and colorful sprinkles. Mix, match, and decorate to your heart's content, whether in a cone or glass bowl. This sweet and creative game lets you explore the art of ice cream making while sharing your delicious creations with friends and family. Enjoy a symphony of flavors and textures that'll leave you craving more.

cute-mermaid-dress-up-games.name: Cute Mermaid Dress Up
cute-mermaid-dress-up-games.description: Cute Mermaid Dress Up is a beauty game where you help dress up cute mermaid princesses in these fun kids' games. Explore an underwater world where sea princesses have beautiful hair, stylish bathing suits, and unique tails. With a wide selection of clothing items, hairstyles, and accessories, create stunning outfits for the mermaid princesses. Choose from various backgrounds, add adorable pets, and perfect their looks with tiaras and tridents. Over 200 items are available, from different mermaid styles to diverse hairstyles and accessories. Let your creativity shine in these dress-up and makeover games for girls and kids!

racing-limits.name: Racing Limits
racing-limits.description: Racing Limits is a racing game that lets you push your skills to the max. Race and overtake vehicles in city and highway traffic with four thrilling game modes: carrier, infinite, against-time, and free mode. Choose between one-way and two-way traffic, and experience three times of day - 'Morning,' 'Sunset,' and 'Night.' With multiple camera angles, sensitive controls, and realistic physics, it's a high-speed adventure you won't want to miss. Customize, upgrade, and take on numerous race events in this graphically stunning racing world!

car-speed-racing-tycoon.name: Car Speed Racing Tycoon
car-speed-racing-tycoon.description: Car Speed Racing Tycoon is a casual tycoon game that takes you on a high-octane journey into the world of high-speed racing. Customize your racing tracks for heart-pounding thrills and manage crashes with precision to keep your racers on the fast track to victory. Get ready for the adrenaline rush of a lifetime!

giant-rush-arena.name: Giant Rush Arena
giant-rush-arena.description: Giant Rush Arena is a fun casual game where you can be a giant and destroy the city and your enemies. Become bigger as you destroy things such as houses, public buildings, transport, and even people. Don't let the other giants become bigger than you or they will become a serious threat to you. Win the game by being the last giant in the arena!

gang-brawlers.name: Gang Brawlers
gang-brawlers.description: Gang Brawlers is an action game that thrusts you into perilous streets. Unleash chaos as you obliterate boxes, gather items, and combat the forces of evil. Team up with a friend for a co-op journey or face off against them in 2P fighting mode. Don't forget to pocket those precious coins to boost your character's prowess at the store. Let the epic adventure commence!"

telekinesis-race-3d.name: Telekinesis Race 3D
telekinesis-race-3d.description: Telekinesis Race 3D is an engaging arcade game with a unique twist - superhuman abilities. The primary objective of the game is to engage in combat and destruction. Using your telekinetic powers, you can throw objects at enemies, lift and toss foes, and even interact with environmental elements to defeat adversaries. The game encourages creative use of telekinesis to overcome challenges and progress through the levels.

vacuum-hero-mafia-murder.name: Vacuum Hero: Mafia Murder
vacuum-hero-mafia-murder.description: Vacuum Hero: Mafia Murder is a casual game where you play as a little innocent robot vacuum cleaner that turns out to be a killing machine! You have to kill every single mafia in the room to pass the level. If they see the evil side of yours, they will chase and kill you! Move wisely and sneak into the hall, surprise and kill them in different ways. Vacuum all their money and run to the elevator. It is up to you whether you want to clean the murder mess or not! You can support the developer's social media channels onTwitterandYouTube.

rocket-well.name: Rocket Well
rocket-well.description: Rocket Well is a casual game that challenges players to stick rockets to their ragdoll character and ascend from a deep well. Your mission is to guide the character, strategically using boosters to rise higher and overcome obstacles. However, be cautious about managing your fuel range to ensure a successful ascent.

idle-dino-farm-tycoon-3d.name: Idle Dino Farm Tycoon 3D
idle-dino-farm-tycoon-3d.description: Idle Dino Farm Tycoon 3D is a casual tycoon game where you helm a prehistoric spectacle, nurturing dinosaurs from hatchlings to colossal wonders. As the park's new manager, your goal is to expand, enthrall visitors, and unveil unique hybrid dinosaurs. Construct habitats, amass funds from intrigued spectators, and elevate your park's status. With each decision, you shape the ultimate Jurassic World experience, featuring awe-inspiring reptiles that capture the imagination of all who visit!

survival-land.name: Survival Land
survival-land.description: Survival Land is a casual game where you construct diverse items to build your community. Develop your village by strategically creating essential structures and advancing your society. Delve into the immersive world of VillageCraft, where your decisions shape the destiny of your evolving village. Enjoy the challenge of resource management and community growth as you embark on this engaging strategic journey.

train-drift.name: Train Drift
train-drift.description: Train Drift is a casual drifting game combining the excitement of arcade drifting with the unconventional world of train driving. From executing extreme drifts to engaging in thrilling clashes with other trains, players are in for an adrenaline-fueled ride. The diverse selection of trains, captivating locations, and challenging tracks contribute to the overall appeal of the game. If you're ready to master the art of drifting on iron horses, hop aboard and embark on an unforgettable train drifting adventure!

my-monster-pet-train-fight.name: My Monster Pet: Train & Fight
my-monster-pet-train-fight.description: My Monster Pet: Train & Fight is a casual game with a blend of monster care, training, and epic battles in a vibrant village setting. With dozens of unique monsters, exciting gameplay, challenging levels, and the thrill of evolving your monsters, the game provides a captivating experience for players. Whether you're a fan of pet simulation or strategic monster battles, this game offers a delightful combination of both. Download now and embark on a monster-filled journey to become the ultimate monster trainer and legend of the village! You can support the developer's social media channels onTwitterandYouTube.

top-pizza.name: Top Pizza
top-pizza.description: Top Pizza is a casual game where you step into the shoes of a pizza maestro. Your goal: master the art of crafting pizzas within a time crunch. Conquer levels, rake in cash, and splurge on game-changing upgrades. Aim to be the ultimate chef, unlocking a slew of achievements along the way. Are you ready to rise to the top and create the perfect pizza empire?

laundry-rush.name: Laundry Rush
laundry-rush.description: Laundry Rush is a business simulation game where you must run your laundry business so it can be successful. Clean and deliver the dirty laundry from clothes to shoes. Make sure everything is dry and clean before you deliver it to the customers. Earn money and expand your laundry to become a big business!

rally-racer-dirt.name: Rally Racer Dirt
rally-racer-dirt.description: Rally Racer Dirt is a rally drift-based game, allows you to drift on both asphalt and dirt terrains while navigating through hills. This category is redefined with the introduction of Rally Racer Dirt, offering the best realistic and stunning controls for a rally game. Enjoy the experience of drifty and realistic tuned physics, coupled with detailed graphics, various vehicles, and racing tracks. Be a rally racer, driving like Ken Blocks and Collin McRae on the tracks. The game features a Realtime Multiplayer Mode, 13 different rally cars, tunable cars with adjustable features, upgradable cars and drive properties, 5 different tuned tracks, and more. Choose between two main game modes: Challenge mode, with 60 different challenges to pass, and Survival mode, where you drift and drive as long as you can, passing checkpoints.

basketball-league.name: Basketball League
basketball-league.description: Basketball League is an arcade basketball sports game where you must aim and shoot to score. If you want relaxing gameplay, you can try the Free Throw mode. If you want to challenge yourself, you can play the Timed Practice mode. If you want to show your skill and prove yourself to others, play the Online mode so everybody will know how talented you are!

shopaholic-black-friday.name: Shopaholic Black Friday
shopaholic-black-friday.description: Shopaholic Black Friday is a beauty game where you play as the stunning Lena on a thrilling shopping spree. Dive into a world of makeup choices, from vibrant lipsticks to sultry eyeshadows. Race against time at the mall, filling your bags with trendy dresses, stylish shoes, and dazzling accessories. Unleash your creativity, experiment with makeup, and create the perfect look for Lena. Get ready for a shopping adventure like never before!

anime-girls-dress-up-games.name: Anime Girls Dress Up Games
anime-girls-dress-up-games.description: Anime Girls Dress Up Games is a beauty game that vibrant fusion of fashion and Japanese pop culture. Immerse yourself in manga-inspired beauty, crafting outfits for charming animatronic characters. Whether it's the classic schoolgirl look or trendy attire, the options are vast. From high heels to adorable pets, explore endless possibilities. Hone your outfit designing skills in this delightful beauty salon experience.

inferno-drift.name: Inferno Drift
inferno-drift.description: Inferno Drift is an arcade game where you have to drive and stay on the track as long as possible. Collect coins along the way to gain special abilities. Destroy your opponents to earn extra scores. Stay on the path and don't fall off the cliff, or you will sink into the lava abyss. This is a battle for survival. Can you survive and achieve the highest score?

obstacle-race-destroying-simulator.name: Obstacle Race: Destroying Simulator!
obstacle-race-destroying-simulator.description: Obstacle Race: Destroying Simulator is a casual game where precision is key. Maneuver through a maze of obstacles while rival racers unleash chaos to impede your progress. The twist? Collide with obstacles, and your car shatters into fragments. Your mission: navigate the wreckage and skillfully reach the dealership. Outsmart competitors, dodge obstacles, and prove you're the ultimate racer in this intense, debris-strewn challenge.

animal-shopping-supermarket.name: Animal Shopping Supermarket
animal-shopping-supermarket.description: Animal Shopping Supermarket is a casual simulation game where you must help this cute little red panda to go grocery shopping. Explore colorful aisles, pick out fun items, and pay them to the cashier. Collect special gacha and unlock various mini-games. Enjoy a playful shopping experience, join the fun, and let the shopping adventure begin!

egg-farm.name: Egg Farm
egg-farm.description: Egg Farm is an arcade game where you play as a fox who needs to catch all the delicious chicken eggs inside your mouth! It's time to become an egg-cellent egg-catching maestro, but you need to be careful and not eat rotten eggs. Focus on the types of eggs because they can be either helpful or harmful to you. In the process, you’ll also get the chance to customize your character with skins. Explore the egg-citing adventure of Egg Farm world now!

flappy-dunk.name: Flappy Dunk
flappy-dunk.description: Flappy Dunk is a casual basketball game where you tap to propel the ball through hoops, earning points and unlocking new balls along the way. The game seamlessly blends simple one-touch controls with a challenging gameplay that's easy to grasp but hard to master. Perfect for basketball enthusiasts of all ages, Flappy Dunk keeps the excitement alive with its unique theme and a continuous stream of fresh challenges as you progress.

ragdoll-arena-2-player.name: Ragdoll Arena 2 Player
ragdoll-arena-2-player.description: Ragdoll Arena 2 Player is a fun casual arcade game that consists of 14 challenging 2-player games. Play these games by yourself versus AI or play with your friend locally. Each game will have a different goal, but your main goal is to score three before your opponent. Many games are available, such as fruit slicing, hammer challenge, chicken catching, rooftop shooting matches, and more. Earn coins from the matches, and buy a new costume for your character! Have fun!

wheelstars.name: Wheelstars
wheelstars.description: Wheel Stars is a driving multiplayer racing experience, introducing the first-ever free-to-play battle royale on the track. Compete and collaborate with your squad in a dozen unique game modes, from flag capturing to team races. Earn exclusive car models through challenges or craft your own with reward points. Dive into the vibrant universe, challenging others online or hosting private contests with friends. With multiplayer co-op, spectate mode, and an invite system, the thrill of Wheel Stars awaits. Race, compete, and conquer together!

loot-hero-wjo.name: Loot Hero
loot-hero-wjo.description: Loot Hero is a thrilling action game that takes you into a creepy graveyard filled with challenges. As a player, you'll unlock the power of loot and unleash it against enemies like skeletons and zombies. Smash chests, collect powerful weapons, and level up to become a formidable force in this action-packed journey. The game combines elements of exploration, combat, and upgrades to keep players engaged and entertained!

idle-animal-anatomy.name: Idle Animal Anatomy
idle-animal-anatomy.description: Idle Animal Anatomy is a clicker game where you can create living organisms from scratch. The goal of the game is to create an animal cell by cell, and this will make you feel like a scientist. Grow your favorite pets and learn interesting facts about them. You will see what the internal organs of animals and humans look like. Dive into anatomy like a real scientist. Grow all the living things!

asmr-stye-treatment.name: ASMR Stye Treatment
asmr-stye-treatment.description: ASMR Stye Treatment is a beauty game where you must treat your patient's dirty pimply face to make it healthy again. Be the pimple popper doctor and help her to take care of her face problem. Go live and show this satisfying pimple pooping to the world. After finishing the face treatment, style our patient with the best outfit and makeup from our collections to create the perfect look!

ice-cream-cafe.name: Ice Cream Cafe
ice-cream-cafe.description: Ice Cream Cafe is an ice cream cafe simulation game where you design, build, and manage your dream dessert haven. Craft endless frozen delights, experimenting with flavors, toppings, and cones to satisfy every craving. Navigate challenging levels, hone your culinary skills, and elevate your cafe with upgrades and rewards. With customizable design options, this sweet adventure promises a scoop-tacular journey for ice cream enthusiasts. Start scooping your way to success and create a buzz with your own Ice Cream Delight!

squishy-fruits.name: Squishy Fruits
squishy-fruits.description: Squishy Fruits is an arcade game where you must merge the same variety of fruits to make them pop. Combine and squish your favorite fruits with a simple click! This game offers a squishy twist on the classic merge game. Get ready to have a fruity fun experience by merging and squishing fruits!

office-fight.name: Office Fight
office-fight.description: Office Fight is a casual action game where you must beat everyone in the office. Use your powerful baseball bat to hit the enemies! Get other weapons such as baguette, frying pan, and else! You can throw your enemies in any different direction you want! Show who's boss in the office!

block-city-clicker.name: Block City Clicker
block-city-clicker.description: Block City Clicker is a clicker game where you can build your city. Click to collect resources, and build new buildings such as houses, smelters, and mills. Improve and develop your city, complete tasks, and unlock new opportunities. Your city will become bigger and more beautiful, and you will receive new opportunities for its development. Good luck!

zombies-attack-idle.name: Zombies Attack Idle
zombies-attack-idle.description: Zombies Attack Idle is a zombie game where you will play as an anti-hero and have to kill all humans. You are the captain of the dead creatures, and you need to lead the zombies to attack humans. Collect brains to upgrade yourself and make your zombie army stronger. Be the reason for the extinction of humanity.

funny-mad-racing.name: Funny Mad Racing
funny-mad-racing.description: Funny Mad Racing is a casual driving game that promises an adventurous journey featuring bouncy cars on dynamic roads. With 40 levels, various cars, and surprisingly funny features, players are in for a delightful hill-climbing experience. The game offers both single-player and 2-player modes, allowing for solo adventures or friendly competitions. As players progress, they can earn coins to unlock new features, adding layers of excitement to the pixelated world.

nature-strikes-back.name: Nature Strikes Back
nature-strikes-back.description: Nature Strikes Back is a casual tower defense game that combines the engaging mechanics of merging guardians with the mission to defend nature. Players embark on a cute and fun journey where they merge various guardians strategically to thwart incoming threats and protect the environment!

tavern-rumble-roguelike-card.name: Tavern Rumble: Roguelike Card
tavern-rumble-roguelike-card.description: Tavern Rumble is a strategy roguelike deckbuilding card game. Begin your adventure with basic mercenary cards, strengthen your deck, and face challenging bosses. Explore card synergies and experience a roguelike journey with random dungeons, loot, mercenaries, and permanent death. Craft a unique deck, encounter creatures, take blessings, and become a legendary monster slayer. The game offers playable classes, cute pixel art, easy-to-learn mechanics, and the ability to play offline or online. Play now for a perfect card game break!

offroad-life-3d.name: Offroad Life 3D
offroad-life-3d.description: Offroad Life 3D is an exhilarating driving game that invites players to experience the thrill of life on the mountains with powerful offroad vehicles boasting huge wheels. Set against the backdrop of different seasons, from the vibrant colors of autumn to the warmth of summer, players navigate challenging terrains and discover various locations. The game offers an array of offroad vehicles and wheel options, making the adventure both diverse and exciting. Additionally, the inclusion of a 2-player game mode allows friends to explore new areas together, adding a social element to the offroad journey!

switch-wheel-race-master.name: Switch Wheel: Race Master
switch-wheel-race-master.description: Switch Wheel is a casual race where strategy is key. Navigate diverse roads with a selection of powerful cars, speedy motorcycles, and agile helicopters. Tap the screen to switch vehicles, each offering a unique advantage. Earn coins, level up, and customize your wheels for an edge. Race against time and opponents in this challenging game with super easy controls. Prove you're number one in Switch Wheel's competitive battles!

crazy-mechs.name: Crazy Mechs
crazy-mechs.description: Crazy Mechs is a fast-paced battle game that allows you to customize your own mecha and battle your way to the top. Win and collect parts and weapons and create a super cool and powerful mecha!

color-page-asmr.name: Color Page ASMR
color-page-asmr.description: Color Page ASMR is a casual art coloring game where you draw and color hundreds of beautiful pictures. It is fun, easy, and relaxing, perfect for players of all ages. Dive into a serene world filled with hundreds of captivating illustrations, from whimsical animals and lush botanicals to everyday objects and scenes from around the globe.
color-page-asmr.faq:
How do I change my pen in Color Page ASMR?

There is a pen icon on the left that takes you to the skins gallery. Here you can choose skins that you have unlocked.

Can I play Color Page ASMR on mobile?

Yes, you can play it on the web on both mobile and desktop devices.
color-page-asmr.controls: Hold the left mouse button to draw the outline and drag the left mouse button to color.
color-page-asmr.how_to_play:
Engage in artistic expression

Color Page ASMR offers a straightforward and relaxing gameplay experience. Follow the outlines presented on your screen to sketch the image, then fill in the spaces with colors to bring your artwork to life. With intuitive controls, anyone can paint vivid and colorful images with ease.

Explore a wide variety of themes

Click the gallery icon on the left of the game screen to access a gallery of images. Whether you're in the mood for exploring the animal kingdom, indulging in the beauty of nature, or taking a virtual vacation through your art, there's an image for every scenario. The game features an expansive library of images, including fruits, vegetables, toys, scientific wonders, and more, all designed to spark your creativity and relaxation.

Unlock various pens as you progress

Color Page ASMR is a simple game without brain-hurting challenges that disrupt your relaxing time. It’s all about chilling out and drawing some nice pictures. There is progression to keep things interesting, though. You unlock various cute pens as you progress through the game. You can see all of your unlocked pens in the skins screen!

A relaxing artistic journey

Mistakes are just part of the process in this calming art game. If you've made a little mistake, it’s easy to correct by hitting the undo button. The game's design, with satisfying sound effects, visuals, and music, ensures a tranquil and satisfying experience that is perfect for unwinding.

Dive into the colorful and calming world of Color Page ASMR. Whether you want to unwind after a long day or explore your artistic side, this game offers a perfect blend of relaxation and creative expression. Start your artistic adventure now and paint your way to peace!

tongits.name: Tongits
tongits.description: Tongits is a three-player card game that is still in the Rummy family. The objective of the game is to empty your hand cards by forming sets(melds) or minimize the total score when a fight is called or when the central stack is empty. Each player will be dealt 12 cards while the dealer gets 13, and the rest of the cards are left as a draw card. The game begins when the dealer dumps a card. The next person can either pick up the disposed card if that card makes a set or adds to a set they already have or get one from the central stack. Collect hand combinations and dump unnecessary cards. The picking and discarding of cards goes on until someone wins by Tongits, calls a fight, or until the central stack runs out of cards. If this happens, the players tally the points of the cards they have in hand, and the one with the lowest wins. To call a fight, the player needs to put down a meld on the table, and no player drops any card on any of their melds in that round. If the player can use all of their cards in combinations by connecting to opponents’ or the exposed card sets, or if the player gets rid of all their cards, then the player wins by Tongits. Have fun with your friends, enjoy exciting moments, and relieve your stress every day!

jingle-defense.name: Jingle Defense
jingle-defense.description: Jingle Defense is a turn-based action strategy game where you must defend your Elves' Workshop from the Evil Santa's attack. Prepare your Snowman Turrets and Christmas Tree Rockets to attack them. This will be a long night because you need to hold off Evil Santa's minions for 12 rounds. Battle against gangsters, soldiers, and zombies. Also, stop all the suicide bombers from entering your bunker! Make your strategic decisions with your trusty elves squad. Position them in the best spot to take down all the enemies. Manage your team and upgrade your base. Decide carefully on your strategy and think ahead to survive!

mafia-business-empire-stickman-escape-3d.name: Mafia Business Empire: Stickman Escape
mafia-business-empire-stickman-escape-3d.description: Mafia Business Empire: Stickman Escape 3D is a casual game where you will become a real thief. Get into the banks, museums, and other rich places. Steal everything you see and then get away from the security guard and CCTV. Upgrade your character to increase skills and unlock new skins to make your hero unique. Open new locations to steal as much money as you can and be the most skillful thief in this game!

ultimate-flying-car-2.name: Ultimate Flying Car 2
ultimate-flying-car-2.description: Ultimate Flying Car 2 is the ultimate adventure driving game where you can drive, fly, and teleport with your supercars. Explore many different worlds with lots of new features in this second chapter of the game series! This version will bring more stable and fun car physics, more explosives, and more actions. Newly designed wings and super cool flying physics will also be ready to be used in your driving adventure. Win races, collect diamonds and coins, and buy new cars! Prepare yourself for more fun than before. Let's get started!

monster-battle.name: Monster Battle
monster-battle.description: Monster Battle is a casual game where you can capture various monsters and start dueling with your opponent. Merge your identical monsters so they are upgraded and become more powerful monster! Find and collect new types of monsters around you. Kill the boss opponent in the area and be the ultimate duelist!

mancala-shu.name: Mancala Online
mancala-shu.description: Mancala is a casual board game where strategic prowess meets thrilling competition. Unlock new boards and pebbles, challenging friends or global enthusiasts. Sharpen your skills against intelligent AI, climb the leaderboard, and enjoy the excitement of capturing stones in this classic game. Dive into the world of Mancala today, customize your gameplay, and become the ultimate champion in this captivating pebble adventure!

shoot-and-drive.name: Shoot and Drive
shoot-and-drive.description: Shoot And Drive is an action game where players find themselves in a post-apocalyptic setting where radiation has plunged society into chaos. As a survivor trapped by bandits, you must navigate treacherous landscapes, confront enemies, and engage in intense shoot-and-drive sequences. The combination of vehicular combat and gunplay adds a dynamic layer to the gameplay, making it a thrilling experience for players who enjoy action-packed adventures in a dystopian world!

slicer-cursor-idle.name: Slicer Cursor Idle
slicer-cursor-idle.description: Slicer Cursor is a unique idle game where the cursor takes center stage. The game revolves around slicing enemies using your cursor, with the aim of leveling up upgrades to increase its slicing power. As an idle game, "Slicer Cursor" offers players a satisfying blend of slicing action and strategic upgrades, making it an entertaining and casual experience for players who enjoy incremental gameplay!

mega-ramp-car-stunt.name: Mega Ramp Car Stunt
mega-ramp-car-stunt.description: Mega Ramp Car Stunt is an adrenaline-pumping driving race game that challenges players to embark on an exhilarating journey through an array of mega ramps and stunt-filled tracks. With a selection of unique cars and an endless array of ramps and springboards, players are thrust into a world of high-speed racing, daring jumps, and spectacular stunts.

megabattle.name: Megabattle
megabattle.description: Megabattle invites players to a strategic and action-packed experience where they build powerful robots, enter the arena, and engage in thrilling battles. This game combines elements of strategy, deck-building, and roguelike mechanics, offering a unique and innovative gameplay experience. As you progress, you'll need to strategize your robot builds and deck compositions to ensure victory in the ever-challenging arena!

new-year-makeup-trends.name: New Year Makeup Trends
new-year-makeup-trends.description: New Year Makeup Trends is a beauty makeup game where you step into the role of stylist for Ellie, Olivia, and Kiki as they get ready to dress in their best to ring in the new year! Experiment with endless combinations of glamorous hairstyles, chic dresses, vibrant makeup shades, and eye-catching accessories to craft the ultimate party look. With so many options just a click away, you can create unique, show-stopping styles that ensure these trendsetters spend New Year's Eve feeling confident in flair. Get ready to shine.
new-year-makeup-trends.faq:
What is the makeup trends then and now game?

Make Up Trends: Then and Now game is a beauty game where you dive into the glam world of makeup trends. Other similar games include New Year Makeup Trends.

Who are Ellie, Olivia, and Kiki in New Year Makeup Trends?

They are three best friends who love to party with impeccable style.

Can I start over in New Year Makeup Trends?

Sure! Once you finish playing you can refresh the page to start a new game and try out a fresh set of styles!
new-year-makeup-trends.controls: Use your mouse to play the game on a desktop or tap to play on mobile devices.
new-year-makeup-trends.how_to_play:
After a quick chat about New Year’s party plans and trendy makeup ideas—think bold eyeliner and shimmering shades—it’s time to step up as the trusted stylist of Ellie, Olivia and Kiki. These girls are counting on your expertise to look fabulous, so bring your A-game to ensure they turn heads and leave an unforgettable impression.

Dive into a world of style as you get each girl ready for the NYE party. Choose from a broad selection of makeup options like vibrant lipsticks, blush, and mascara, along with eye colors that pop. But it’s not just about makeup—explore hairstyles, accessories, and elegant clothing that match each girl’s vibe. From glamorous dresses to sparkling jewelry, you have all the tools to create the perfect look.

You will know the look is perfect when the heart barometer hits its highest level.

Each girl brings her own unique style, so you’ll never run out of inspiration. After styling the first character to perfection, move on to the next with fresh choices and colors tailored to her personality. Experiment with bold and creative combinations, transforming each girl into a stunning vision that’s uniquely hers.

When you’re done styling, head to the camera room and snap a selfie with the girls to capture the moment. Share your stylish creations on social media, showing off your style to welcome the New Year in style! New Year Makeup Trends is offered in five different languages: English, Spanish, Russian, Portuguese, and Turkish.

ice-skating-ballerina.name: Ice Skating Ballerina
ice-skating-ballerina.description: Ice Skating Ballerina is a free fashion game where you prepare Ellie and Ben for their ice skating extravaganza! Mix & match hairstyles, dresses, makeup shades, and much more so you can both glide in glamour!
ice-skating-ballerina.faq:
Are Ellie and Ben dating in Ice Skating Ballerina?

No, their relationship is strictly professional.

What can I do if I'm not happy with the look I picked in Ice Skating Ballerina?

You can reset the game by refreshing the page and starting again.

fisquarium.name: Fisquarium
fisquarium.description: Fisquarium is an idle clicker game that combines the joy of clicking with the soothing atmosphere of an aquarium. In this game, players click to earn fish, unlock diverse species, enhance production through upgrades, discover new fish types, collect trophies, and immerse themselves in the relaxing world of aquatic wonders. Whether you're a casual player or an avid clicker fan, Fisquarium offers a laid-back and enjoyable experience!

tile-guru.name: Tile Guru
tile-guru.description: Tile Guru is a casual puzzle tile-matching game that combines mental sharpness with relaxation. Spend just 10 minutes a day matching vibrant 3D tiles and finding new fruit designs while mastering strategic match flips. With its unique puzzlescapes, escalating challenges, and a serene zen-inspired color palette, this game offers a perfect blend of brain training and tranquility, making it your ideal daily escape.
tile-guru.faq:
How many tiles do you have to match in Tile Guru?

You need to match three tiles in Tile Guru for them to disappear off the board.

How many tiles can I have in my holder in Tile Guru?

If you hold more than six tiles in your holder in Tile Guru, you will not pass the round. Seven is the max.
tile-guru.controls: Use the left mouse button to select the tiles, use a hint, and use power up.
tile-guru.how_to_play:
Tile Guru is one of those addictive games that you find yourself playing for hours, day after day. The aim of the game is fairly simple - you need to match sets of three tiles of the same suit.

You'll start with a colorful array of fruit-themed tiles—grapes, watermelon, apples, cherries, and more. Click on each tile, and it will fall into the tile holder section. Once you get three matching tiles in the tile holder, they will disappear to make room for more. Early levels keep things simple, as all tiles are the same, making it easy to match a set of three. As the levels continue, the challenges get harder.

Your tile holder is where the magic happens, and it is the part that requires the most strategy. The tile holder holds up to 7 tiles—if the holder fills up with unmatched tiles, the game is over! You will need to make sure you get as many similar tiles as possible, so be careful what you click on.

As you progress, the challenge ramps up. Tiles become layered, so you’ll need to think strategically about which ones to free up first. If you grab too many unmatched tiles, you might run out of space before completing your sets. Plan ahead, keep an eye on your available space, and aim for those perfect matches to clear the board!

idle-world-miner-tycoon.name: Idle World Miner Tycoon
idle-world-miner-tycoon.description: Idle World Miner Tycoon is an idle clicker game where your mission is to obliterate entire planets, extracting valuable resources. Enhance your pickaxe to delve deeper and uncover more precious ores. Smelt your findings to acquire diverse materials for superior shop upgrades. Watch the quarry work for you during idle moments and unravel the mystery hidden at the planet's core. Dive into a cosmic mining adventure!

hospital-simulator.name: Hospital Simulator
hospital-simulator.description: Hospital Simulator is a hospital management game where you need to help your patients, hire some staff, and make sure everything goes well in your hospital! There are many things you can do in this game, such as diagnose the patients' sickness, send an ambulance, take the patients to the emergency room, do surgery on patients' eyes, look for foreign objects with X-rays, and more! They trust you, so make sure to cure patients with all your might!

city-car-driving-simulator-online.name: City Car Driving Simulator: Online
city-car-driving-simulator-online.description: City Car Driving Simulator: Online is a multiplayer driving game set in dynamic urban landscapes. Customize your ride both visually and mechanically, then hit the streets to earn cash by pushing your skills to the limit. Engage in heart-pounding pursuits with law enforcement, outmaneuvering relentless cops to prove you're the ultimate outlaw. Unleash your creativity by designing your own stunt-filled playgrounds throughout the city. Team up with friends or challenge rivals in intense online multiplayer action, racing, drifting, and competing in real-time with players from around the world.

magic-merge-tower-defense-3d.name: Magic Merge: Tower Defense 3D
magic-merge-tower-defense-3d.description: Magic Merge: Tower Defense 3D is a captivating casual tower defense game. Your kingdom is under threat from an evil army, and you must protect it. Expand your castle, unlock powerful towers, engage in strategic merges, and upgrade your defenses to thwart dragons, trolls, goblins, and other dangerous enemies. In this magical world, you have the opportunity to hire formidable units such as swordsmen and archers to aid in the defense of your castle. Prepare for an epic battle where your decision-making skills and strategic prowess will determine the fate of your kingdom.

platformer-chef.name: Platformer Chef
platformer-chef.description: Platformer Chef is a platform game where you step into the shoes of a master chef. Your mission: skillfully navigate platforms while combining burger ingredients and serving up perfection to hungry customers. Each level presents a delightful challenge, urging you to race against the clock. Ready your ingredients, the clock is ticking jump into the action-packed world of 'Platformer Chef,' where every level is a savory adventure waiting to be relished.

bar-master.name: Bar Master
bar-master.description: Bar Master is a casual game where you step into the shoes of a bar manager and take charge of your establishment. From serving drinks to expanding your bar empire, this casual simulation game puts you in control of every aspect of running a successful bar business. Manage your staff, upgrade your facilities, and attract more customers to become the ultimate bar master!

cavern-from-the-fog.name: Cavern: From the Fog
cavern-from-the-fog.description: Cavern: From the Fog is a tower-defense and mining game at once. You will play as a dwarf who needs to defend his cave. Gather resources to build turrets and upgrade them. Kill all the goblins that want to attack your base. Get some money and use it to upgrade your base, weapon, lantern, etc. Ensure the survival of your clan!

noob-gigachad-parkour-tricks-challenge.name: Noob Gigachad: Parkour Tricks Challenge
noob-gigachad-parkour-tricks-challenge.description: Noob Gigachad: Parkour Tricks Challenge is a fun 2D casual parkour game in the Noob universe! After getting expelled from Monster School, Noob is transformed into Gigachad by Herobrine, giving him new powers and challenges. Your mission is simple—you need to run, leap, and pull off impressive parkour tricks as you race toward victory. Collect diamonds along the way to unlock a variety of cool new skins, and carefully navigate through tricky obstacles to reach the portal without falling into the holes.
noob-gigachad-parkour-tricks-challenge.faq:
How do I unlock the Gigachad skin?

Gigachad is the last skin you can unlock, so keep playing and unlocking skins to get there.

Can I interact with the NPCs in this game?

No, the NPCs are there as part of the scenery.

How do I get more rewards in Noob Gigachad?

If you want more rewards and points in Noob Gigachad, try to collect as many diamond clusters as possible.
noob-gigachad-parkour-tricks-challenge.controls:
• AD or left / right arrow keys = run to the left / right direction
  • W or up arrow key = jump
noob-gigachad-parkour-tricks-challenge.how_to_play:
Explore the levels

Run through various levels featuring Minecraft-inspired landscapes. Dodge obstacles, complete tricky jumps, and collect blue gems along your way to the portal at the end.

Avoid the dangers

You’ll encounter animals, villagers, creepers, and more on your quest. Don’t worry! They won’t harm or interact with you. However, objects such as TNT certainly will! Other dangers you should avoid include falling sand platforms, lava, and arrows. The arrows are non-lethal, but they do knock you back.

Earn your rewards

Once you’ve saved up enough of your precious blue stones, you can hit pause and head to the home menu. Here you’ll find the shop. You can buy random skins here and equip them.

bffs-luxury-loungewear.name: BFFs Luxury Loungewear
bffs-luxury-loungewear.description: BFFs Luxury Loungewear is a free dress up game where you help four BFFs get ready for a cosy night in! Mix & match hairstyles with comfy loungewear looks to prepare for a much-needed get-together with the girls!
bffs-luxury-loungewear.faq:
Can I start over in BFFs Luxury Loungewear?

Sure! Once you finish playing you can refresh the page to start a new game and try out a fresh set of styles!

How many characters are in BFFs Luxury Loungewear?

There are four different girls to style in this game.

press-a-to-party.name: Press A to Party
press-a-to-party.description: Press A to Party is a casual arcade game collection designed for players of all ages. Gather your friends and family, settle onto the couch, and dive into the action with simple one-button controls and fast-paced gameplay. Compete against up to 4 players on the same screen, vying for the coveted title of the ultimate arcade champion. Get ready for a blast of fun and excitement at your next gathering!

rock-climbing.name: Rock Climbing?
rock-climbing.description: Rock Climbing is a thrilling casual game where you guide a unique two-headed creature. Stay composed as you aim for your landing spot, holding and releasing the button for a strategic jump. Rotate mid-air for precision, but be cautious not to collide with your second head to avoid unwanted bouncing. If you miss, savor the calming mountain sounds before embarking on your ascent again.

space-wars-battleground.name: Space Wars Battleground
space-wars-battleground.description: Space Wars Battleground is an action battle game set in a faraway galaxy where battles are fast, numerous, and to the death. The game features numerous characters that you play with and against people from around the world to dominate the competitive leaderboard and reach the heights of galactic victory with the support of your fellow fighters.
space-wars-battleground.faq:
What type of game is Space Wars Battleground?

Space Wars Battleground is an action game set in the galactic future where you battle your numerous opponents to the death.

How old is Space Wars Battleground?

Space Wars Battleground was released in February 2024 by developer GoGoMan.
space-wars-battleground.controls:
• WASD or arrow keys = move
  • Space = roll
  • Left-click = shoot
  • Right-click or V = aim
  • G = grenade
  • R = reload
  • Q/C = jetpack
  • Tab = open menu
space-wars-battleground.how_to_play:
At the beginning of each match, you start with zero experience points, putting everyone on an equal footing. To gain experience, you must deal with damage and take down enemy team characters, steadily building your strength as the battle progresses.

Once you've accumulated enough experience, you can spend it on purchasing new characters, each with their own unique abilities and playstyles, adding depth and strategy to your gameplay.

After each match, you'll also earn coins as rewards for your performance. These coins can be used to unlock a variety of weapons, character skins, and upgrades, allowing you to customize and enhance your arsenal.

The ultimate goal is to work with your team to eliminate 100 enemy characters first, securing victory and bragging rights in this intense, action-packed competition.

How to find your enemy

It's key to use the floor plan map in the top corner of the game, which shows you exactly where your opponents are hiding and, more importantly, where your allies are as well. You want to be strategic about where your support is needed and avoid shooting friendly fire. Coordinate your moves based on where you won't be ambushed, where you can help your team, and where you have the most chance to shoot your opponents.

house-flip.name: House Flip
house-flip.description: House Flip is a simulation game where you navigate property listings, buy houses, and turn them into profits. Host an open house to gauge buyer interest and needs. Dive into mini-games to take charge of cleaning, repairing, and upgrading the house. Make strategic choices and meet buyers' demands to satisfy them and raise house prices. Time is ticking, so make sure to renovate the house wisely! Get ready to enter the exciting world of House Flip!

idle-bee-swarm-simulator.name: Idle Bee: Swarm Simulator
idle-bee-swarm-simulator.description: Idle Bee: Swarm Simulator is a casual idle game, where you'll take charge of a vibrant bee colony and embark on an epic journey to dominate the hive kingdom! In this casual idle game, you'll dive deep into the exciting life of bees, managing your hive, recruiting worker bees, and training powerful warrior bees to protect your precious honey reserves.

solitaire-crime-stories.name: Solitaire Crime Stories
solitaire-crime-stories.description: Solitaire Crime Stories is a casual solitaire game where you delve into the mysteries of Springdale, a seemingly tranquil town hiding dark secrets. Join journalist Lana Whitt and her assistant Bill as you solve crimes by mastering Solitaire. Explore unique locations, meet intriguing characters, and unravel the town's enigmatic puzzles. Plus, enjoy bonding with Max, the adorable kitten companion, in between investigations. Ready to become a Solitaire master and detective extraordinaire?

hyper-evolution.name: Hyper Evolution
hyper-evolution.description: Hyper Evolution is a casual simulation game where you must gather resources, craft tools, take a rest, hunt, and eat so you can survive on the islands. Evolve yourself from a primitive to a modern human being. Do the best and see what you can become!

diy-makeup-salon-spa-makeover.name: DIY Makeup Salon: SPA Makeover
diy-makeup-salon-spa-makeover.description: DIY Makeup Salon: SPA Makeover is a beauty game where you become a make-up stylist. Showcase your skill and do makeovers for these pretty girls! Select the model and pick her stunning color combinations for her. Use various tools and facial cleansers to give your model refreshing and healthy skin. Apply flawless makeup look and hair-do for them! Stay up-to-date with the latest trends in fashion. This game is perfect for you who desire to create the most fashionable looks.

tank-masters---idle-tanks.name: Tank Masters - Idle Tanks
tank-masters---idle-tanks.description: Tank Masters - Idle Tanks is a casual game where you'll dive into the heart of epic tank battles. Take full control of your tank's trajectory, strategically plan your shots, and dominate the battlefield as you face off against formidable enemies!

merge-dig.name: Merge & Dig!
merge-dig.description: Merge & Dig! is a casual game where you'll delve deep into the earth, merge pickaxes, and conquer challenging levels filled with various ores and blocks. With each dig, upgrade your pickaxes, merge them to improve their efficiency, and dominate the underground world!

desert-riders-car-battle-game.name: Desert Riders: Car Battle Game
desert-riders-car-battle-game.description: Desert Riders: Car Battle Game is a casual destroy game where you fight intense battles from a weapon-fitted vehicle. Fight various enemies with an array of weapons, cars, and upgrades. Tear other cars to shreds and battle tricky bosses. Dive into the desert and start shooting!
desert-riders-car-battle-game.faq:
How can I earn more cash in Desert Riders?

When facing a van, shooting the back doors off sometimes reveals crates full of cash. The green vans are best for this!

How do I earn bonus rewards in Desert Riders?

Execute drive-by shootings near buildings in slow motion. This provides additional points and helps you progress through levels more quickly.
desert-riders-car-battle-game.controls: Hold the left mouse button to shoot and release for dodge.
desert-riders-car-battle-game.how_to_play:
Embark on thrilling car battles

Desert Riders offers an engaging experience with straightforward controls for seamless combat. Challenge yourself against diverse enemies, including motorcycles, sports cars, police vehicles, and armored trucks. When you blast vehicles, you tear them to pieces in a satisfying display of destruction. Execute drive-by shootings near buildings in slow motion for bonus rewards, accumulate eliminations to advance through levels, and earn additional points for precise headshots!

Navigate apocalyptic worlds

Advance through various dystopian landscapes, each presenting unique challenges and terrains. Test your mettle in particularly demanding boss battles and showcase your firepower and armor in a spectacular display of dominance.

There are lots of new items and upgrades to unlock. Every time you complete a world, you’ll unlock two new weapons to shoot in the coming battles. When you reach the next area, you can equip those weapons and other power-ups like health and armor.

Utilize power-ups

At the beginning of each level, you can select from an array of boosters to enhance your gameplay. With options ranging from laser and plasma weaponry to lightning, armor, and health boosts, you can tailor your approach to each challenge for maximum impact.

Upgrade and customize your vehicle

Conquer levels and reach milestones to unlock treasure chests filled with rewards. Utilize these gains to modify and enhance your vehicle at the auto shop. Unlock a diverse collection of cars, including retro and rare models, and personalize your ride with over 70 customization options for wheels, bumpers, exhausts, engines, and paint jobs.

This shooter and car game has it all: fast-paced gameplay, mind-blowing excitement, and cool cars and weapons. Get behind the wheel and jump into the action! Play Desert Riders on the web now, and go for a spin!

digital-circus-obby.name: Digital Circus: Obby
digital-circus-obby.description: Digital Circus: Obby is an adventure game where you traverse intricate parkour levels crafted by the mysterious Caine. Immerse yourself in a virtual circus world, aiding Pomni's escape by conquering challenging Obby tracks. Test your skills as you navigate the mesmerizing digital circus, facing a captivating challenge at every turn.

my-imperfect-cult.name: My Imperfect Cult
my-imperfect-cult.description: My Imperfect Cult is a casual simulation game where you play as the head of the cult and must lead it to greatness! Persuade people to join your cult, perform the rituals, and make their faith grow stronger! When they have full faith in your cult, they will also be your loyal servants! Don't forget to upgrade yourself so it is easier to persuade people and to make them more loyal to you. The game will be more difficult as you go because you'll also have a competitor. Try to recruit as many people as you can and make your church bigger!

valentine-s-day-couple-date.name: Valentine's Day Couple Date
valentine-s-day-couple-date.description: Valentine's Day Couple Date is a beauty dress-up game where you set the scene for the perfect Valentine’s Date! Choose various clothes and stunning accessories suitable for a range of memorable Valentine’s Day activities. How will you make this special day one to remember?
valentine-s-day-couple-date.faq:
How do you get to the next scene in Valentine's Day: Couple Date?

You need to complete the scene in Valentine's Day: Couple Date to get to the next round, and you will know this is the case when your heart barometer reaches its max.

Are Ellie and Ben from Valentine's Day: Couple Date getting married?

After you've made this valentine's day magical, there is no obstacle to marriage for Ben and Ellie.

Can I play Valentine's Day: Couple Date on mobile?

Yes, Valentine's Day: Couple Date is available on mobile.

How can I start over in Valentine's Day: Couple Date?

Refresh the page to start the game again!
valentine-s-day-couple-date.controls: Use the left mouse button to do a makeover.
valentine-s-day-couple-date.how_to_play:
Show your styling versatility.

Ben has put much effort into making Valentine’s Day perfect for Ellie! He’s relying on your skills as a professional stylist to make every aspect of this day look picture-perfect so that the memories can be cherished forever. How will you choose to design the set? And what bedazzling styles will you choose to ensure they look stunning every step of the way?

Select from a range of styles.

The day starts with the perfect morning scene - breakfast in Paris, with a view of the Eifel Tower. After that, you’re hitting the gym together before being swept away to a romantic rooftop dinner. In each scene, you will style Ben and Ellie, picking the best outfits for the situation and ensuring the decor is on point.

Browse unique looks.

Each character and scenario has a unique set of clothes and props, from breakfast items to gym gear and romantic gifts; your creativity is refreshed for each moment.

Snap a selfie.

After a day of romance, you can reflect on the pictures and the great memories you’ve shared with each other. Look back on every moment and save the best ones.

fashion-store-shop-tycoon.name: Fashion Store: Shop Tycoon
fashion-store-shop-tycoon.description: Fashion Store: Shop Tycoon is a casual tycoon game where you manage your own boutique clothes store. Craft your store layout, attract customers, and maximize profits to expand your fashion empire. Are you ready to become the ultimate fashion tycoon?
fashion-store-shop-tycoon.faq:
How do I open a new store in Fashion Store: Shop Tycoon?

You have to unlock and purchase all the available options in your first store before being able to move to the next.

What do VIP customers do in Fashion Store: Shop Tycoon?

VIP customers buy more clothes and leave tips.

dancing-dreamer.name: Dancing Dreamer
dancing-dreamer.description: Dancing Dreamer is a casual music game where individuals immerse themselves in virtual training to realize their aspirations. Join Bruno on his quest to become a dancer, mastering moves with intuitive controls like sliding to surf and tapping to jump. Embark on dream journeys accompanied by original soundtracks, shaping your destiny through rhythm and motion.

mine-loop.name: Mine Loop
mine-loop.description: Mine Loop is an idle game that challenges you to dig deep and explore the earth with your train to unearth valuable ores. Transform into the premier Mine Company by collecting ores, earning money, and upgrading your operations. Expand your rail system with new carts, merge for increased capacity, and elevate ore market prices. Relax as the looping train effortlessly gathers your riches, but don't forget to tap for a speed boost. Delve deeper for rare ores as your gold collection grows!

xtreme-drift-racing.name: Xtreme DRIFT Racing
xtreme-drift-racing.description: Xtreme DRIFT Racing is an exciting drift racing game that will bring adrenaline to your body! Test your drifting skill on 5 unique tracks, from racing tracks to the winding roads of the canyon. Experience unforgettable racing at the limit while enjoying energetic music that will accompany you every step of the race. Choose from more than 30 different cars, including stock, tuned, iconic, and cyberpunk cars. Each car has its own characteristics, such as power, handling, drifting, and nitro which will make each race unique! Break records on each track and collect all the stars by proving your drifting skills. Get ready and be the drift king!

monsterella-fantasy-makeup.name: Monsterella Fantasy Makeup
monsterella-fantasy-makeup.description: Monsterella Fantasy Makeup is a free makeup game where you help Frankie Stein, Clawdeen Wolf, and Draculaura prepare for Halloween with cute and spooky styles! Mix & match hairstyles with spooky accessories and more to prepare for the scariest day of the year!
monsterella-fantasy-makeup.faq:
Who is Monsterella?

Monsterella is a play on words. You're making someone look as beautiful as Cinderella, but as scary as a monster!

How many characters are in Monsterella Fantasy Makeup?

There are three girls to style with unique items. They are Frankie Stein, Clawdeen Wolf, and Draculaura.

emerland-solitaire-card-game.name: Emerland Solitaire Card Game
emerland-solitaire-card-game.description: Emerland Solitaire Card Game is your gateway to a magical realm where mighty mages vie for the ancient magic of Cards. Join a noble Knight, an Elven Archeress, and a mystical Sorceress in battling the malevolent Dark Master. Solve puzzles, collect combinations, and brave challenging levels. Learn the mysteries of magical Solitaire, prove your skills, and face trials at the card table. With classic rules, hundreds of levels, and a captivating fantasy tale, this game promises an enthralling adventure into the enchanting world of Solitaire!

gun-range-idle.name: Gun Range Idle
gun-range-idle.description: Gun Range Idle is a casual game where you'll experience the thrill of unlocking and upgrading a wide variety of guns while earning money and leveling up to unlock exciting features. In this casual idle game, your goal is to become the ultimate gun aficionado by mastering the art of shooting and collecting an impressive arsenal of firearms.

island-builder.name: Island Builder
island-builder.description: Island Builder is a building game that offers both relaxing and fun gameplay that challenges you to strategically place various buildings to get maximum points. Use your logic to achieve objectives to progress through levels successfully. This game is ideal for you to enjoy in your free time. Explore new islands, and aim for a high score!

one-among-zombies.name: One Among Zombies
one-among-zombies.description: One Among Zombies is a turn-based strategy game where you must survive the zombies. The majority of the population perished due to the use of poisons and chemicals by the armies. Those who were lucky enough to survive had to wear protective suits and venture to the surface of the contaminated planet in search of remaining useful resources, sustenance, and equipment. As a result of the last war, the dead lost their eternal peace. It is unknown which chemicals were used, but they caused partially decaying bodies to move once again and feel an incredible hunger, which can only be partially satiated by a warm piece of fresh meat.

living-cannon-dx.name: Living Cannon DX
living-cannon-dx.description: Living Cannon DX is a platformer game where you take on the role of a small living cannon adventurer on a quest to uncover treasures and navigate through over 90 challenging levels filled with obstacles and surprises.

college-girls-team-makeover.name: College Girls Team Makeover
college-girls-team-makeover.description: College Girls Team Makeover is a beauty game where you, as the stylist for five high school BFFs, you have full control over their appearance, from skin tone to wardrobe. With over 1000 clothing and accessory options, you can create diverse looks for each girl, whether it's a geeky chic or party-ready ensemble. Show off your styling skills and compete with friends to see who reigns supreme in dressing these fashionable teens!

fashion-famous.name: Fashion Famous
fashion-famous.description: Fashion Famous is a beauty game venturing into the high-stakes world of fashion modeling. Strut your style on the runway, competing against others to prove your fashion prowess. With each round presenting a new theme, you must curate the perfect ensemble to captivate the audience and secure the coveted title of Fashion Famous. Will you rise to the occasion and dominate the runway?

broomcraft-mystic-evasion.name: Broomcraft Mystic Evasion
broomcraft-mystic-evasion.description: Broomcraft Mystic Evasion is a horde survival action game where you fly on a magic broom and survive in battle against tons of enemies! Defeat enemies and collect experience points. Level up and become stronger. Learn new spells and develop the spells you have acquired to be able to defeat enemies faster. Face various types of enemies and bosses who try to stop you. Collect coins to unlock new magic brooms, and don't forget to upgrade them to make them faster and more agile. Combine different magical spells, each associated with its own element, and find your winning strategy! There are two game modes available: Level Mode, where you can practice, explore new enemies, and, most importantly, conquer bosses; and Endless Mode, for those who want to challenge themselves against wave after wave of monsters. Good luck in the battle!

grandma-recipe-ramen.name: Grandma Recipe Ramen
grandma-recipe-ramen.description: Grandma Recipe Ramen is a cooking game where you embark on a culinary adventure as you learn to prepare a mouthwatering bowl of authentic ramen. Follow grandma's time-tested recipe and instructions to create the perfect blend of flavors and textures. With its charming visuals, engaging gameplay, and authentic cooking experience, Grandma's Recipe Ramen offers players the opportunity to immerse themselves in the art of Japanese cuisine. Don't forget to dress up in various cute costumes. Making Ramen has never been more fun!

offroad-climb-4x4.name: Offroad Climb 4x4
offroad-climb-4x4.description: Offroad Climb 4x4 is a driving off-road adventure where you'll conquer rugged terrains and daunting obstacles. Choose from a lineup of powerful off-road vehicles and navigate through challenging landscapes, earning coins to upgrade your ride. Whether you're a seasoned off-road enthusiast or just seeking thrilling hill-climbing action, this game offers endless excitement and challenges for every player. Gear up and embark on your off-road journey today!

death-ball.name: Death Ball
death-ball.description: Death Ball is a casual game where you take a ball and throw it to your opponent until you become the last one standing. Swing hard, throw the ball, and let the people fly!

offroad-island.name: Offroad Island
offroad-island.description: Offroad Island is the ultimate driving truck simulation game that puts you behind the wheel of powerful trucks, rugged trailers, agile quads, high-speed bikes, and much more. Get ready to explore three vast, open-world environments, each filled with challenging terrains, hidden paths, and stunning landscapes. Perform daring stunts, collect valuable coins, and tackle tough trials to earn major rewards as you push your skills to the limit. With every twist, turn, and jump, the adventure gets more intense. Buckle up!
offroad-island.faq:
How do I earn money in Offroad Island?

You can earn money by doing stunts and completing trials.

How can I make my vehicle faster in Offroad Island?

The upgrades menu contains all the performance enhancements you'll need.
offroad-island.controls:
• WASD / arrow keys = move
  • U = respawn car
  • P = pause
  • C = switch camera view
  • V = toggle rear view camera
  • L = light button]
  • H = diffransiyel lock button
  • J = 4WD / 2WD
  • G = off-road gear
offroad-island.how_to_play:
Your goal in Offroad Island is to explore the map, gather gold, and complete races. There are three expansive, open-world maps, each offering its own set of challenges and terrains. From the stunt-filled Woodlands to the muddy, dense forests of MuddyHill, every map is uniquely designed to push your off-road skills to the limit. Whether navigating rugged trails, conquering steep hills, or mastering tight corners, these environments will keep you on your toes.

The game boasts a stunning collection of vehicles, ranging from iconic Cherokees and rugged Hummers to classic hotrods. But that’s just the beginning! You can also purchase quads, SxS vehicles, crawlers, bikes, and even hook-up trailers for your ride. Explore the premium vehicle collection for a selection of custom motors to make your off-road adventure even more thrilling.

Once you’ve chosen your vehicle, the true fun begins with a wide range of customization options. Personalize every detail—from the body and paint job to rims and tires. To enhance performance, tweak everything from engine power to weight distribution, suspension, and gearbox settings. The in-depth tuning menu lets you fine-tune each component to create the perfect off-road machine suited to your driving style.

The graphics in Offroad Island are quite realistic, where every terrain comes to life. As you drive, your vehicle’s wheels tear into the dirt, splashing mud and leaving behind a trail of debris that coats your ride. The suspension reacts dynamically to the ever-changing ground beneath you, providing a truly immersive experience. Whether you're conquering rocky hills or drifting through muddy swamps, the varied terrain ensures every ride feels authentic and challenging.

color-farm.name: Color Farm
color-farm.description: Color Farm is a casual game where you'll embark on an exciting journey of resource extraction through the power of painting. In this vibrant and colorful world, you'll discover the joy of creating and cultivating your farm by painting everything around you. Get ready to unleash your creativity and see what bountiful harvests you can grow on your farm!

king-s-landing---arcade-idle.name: King's Landing - Arcade Idle
king-s-landing---arcade-idle.description: King's Landing - Arcade Idle is a casual game where the excitement of medieval kingdom-building meets the leisurely pace of idle games. In this captivating adventure, you'll embark on a journey to establish and customize your castle, explore a vast and enchanting realm, and manage resources effortlessly—all through strategic idle gameplay. Get ready to embrace the relaxed conquest as you automate your rise to power and become the ruler of a mighty empire!

horseback-survival.name: Horseback Survival
horseback-survival.description: Horseback Survival is a 2D side-scrolling game where you must run and survive from the zombies attack while you're horse riding. You can play the Level mode or Free Run mode which unlocks after level 5. Upgrade your weapon and purchase different hairstyles and hats in the Shop. Complete the task on your way to reach the well. Good luck!

fireman-2024.name: Fireman 2024
fireman-2024.description: Fireman 2024 is a action game where you embody an American firefighter racing against time to save lives in dire situations. Team up with your rescue crew at the Firehouse Emergency HQ, blasting sirens as you speed through the city in your firetruck. Answer the call of duty, extinguish flames, and become the ultimate hero of the city.

tower-defense.name: Tower Defense
