tower-defense.description: Tower Defense is a casual game where strategic prowess is put to the test as you build walls, erect towers, and expand your kingdom to defend against relentless hordes of enemies. As the ruler of your realm, you must harness your resources wisely, fortify your defenses, and lead your forces to victory against the encroaching threat. Are you ready to rise to the challenge and safeguard your kingdom from destruction?

emily-s-hotel-solitaire.name: Emily's Hotel Solitaire
emily-s-hotel-solitaire.description: Emily's Hotel Solitaire is a puzzle game where you embark on a tropical adventure with Emily, and fulfill her grandfather's dream of building the best hotel in the world! Immerse yourself in the magical atmosphere as you enjoy the challenging games of Solitaire and create your luxurious hotel paradise. With exciting Solitaire puzzles, glorious locations, and endless opportunities for customization, this game offers an unforgettable experience!

wizard-io.name: Wizard.io
wizard-io.description: Wizard.io is an action game set in a realm of magic and mystery. Engage in intense duels amidst enchanting arenas teeming with mystical foes. Unleash elemental spells and cunning enchantments to overcome your adversaries. Explore dynamic spell combinations, collect magical orbs, and fortify your wizard's home base for strategic advantages. Unearth powerful artifacts to turn the tides in your favor.

catch-tiles-piano-game.name: Catch Tiles: Piano Game
catch-tiles-piano-game.description: Catch Tiles: Piano Game is a casual rhythm game where you test your hand speed to the beat of your favorite tunes. With a diverse selection spanning EDM, classic, anime, KPOP, and more, immerse yourself in the music. Play popular hits or import your cherished songs for a personalized experience. Compete online for rewards and feel the thrill of the keys beneath your fingertips.

jet-fighter-airplane-racing.name: Jet Fighter Airplane Racing
jet-fighter-airplane-racing.description: Jet Fighter Airplane Racing is an action airplane game where you can complete many different missions, improve your flying skills, and become a true professional in piloting! There are many exclusive airplanes available, such as MiG-21 “Fishbed", McDonnell Douglas F-4 Phantom II, MiG-29 “Fulcrum”, F-16 Fighting Falcon, MiG-31 BM “Foxhound”, F-22 Raptor, SU-35 “Flanker-E”, SU-47 "Firkin", SU-57. Become a skilled fighter pilot in the sky and get lots of adrenaline. Avoid the fly traffic in jet-flying race games! Are you ready for a traffic airplane adventure? Fasten your seatbelt and prepare to fly!

mom-s-diary-cooking-games.name: Mom's Diary: Cooking Games
mom-s-diary-cooking-games.description: Mom's Diary: Cooking Games is a cooking game that brings you to the ultimate kitchen madness time management fever experience! Become a culinary master in Kitchen City, conquering challenging targets across 1000+ unique levels in locations worldwide. Unleash your creativity with 800+ dishes, upgrade kitchen items, and master the art of cooking with ease. Serve dishes like a star and win over customers with your fast-paced skills! Be a top chef now!

battle-button-clicker.name: Battle Button Clicker
battle-button-clicker.description: Battle Button Clicker is a clicker game with roguelike elements in it. Your goal is to level up by choosing the best card on each upgrade. Choose your upgrade card wisely since each decision can determine the outcome of your epic journey! You’ll face a new challenge and a variety of cards with unique abilities and bonuses. Combine them for powerful combos.

aod---art-of-defense.name: AOD - Art Of Defense
aod---art-of-defense.description: AOD - Art of Defence is a casual tower defense game set in a post-apocalyptic world. As Commander of the A.O.D squad, you lead the charge against Mr. Ivil's ruthless thugs, determined to find the lost Inola project. With stunning isometric graphics, build your technological kingdoms and thwart the enemy's destructive ambitions. Will you save mankind or succumb to darkness?
aod---art-of-defense.faq:
What does a katana do in Art of Defense?

The katana is a rocket launcher that strikes ground targets in the Art of Defence?

How do you change the tower for the hero in Art of Defense?

In the Art of Defense, the hero can move between towers whenever needed. Simply choose a tower and click the hero icon to send them upward.
aod---art-of-defense.controls:
• Use the left mouse button to place a tower
  • Use the scroll wheel/pinch the touchpad to zoom in/out

idle-bouncy-ball.name: Idle Bouncy Ball
idle-bouncy-ball.description: Idle Bouncy Ball is a unique idle game where you can buy and merge balls to boost your income. Observe balls bouncing in 3D within a container by rotating and moving the camera for a dynamic view. Enhance earnings by adding pads. Experience high-energy gameplay as you watch balls move around in 3D, earning more by exploring various enclosures. Get ready for a thrilling idle gaming experience!

mine-keeper.name: Mine Keeper
mine-keeper.description: Mine Keeper is a simulation game where you play as a dwarf lord and create one of those great kingdoms of yours. Build your own town, and take care of your nation. Collect fruits and sell them to provide food for your people. Provide better houses for a living and build new facilities or direct your money to create your military forces from an army of dwarves. Mine into deep mines to get valuable stones and gems. Don't forget to take your troops with you because there are monsters in the mine! As your kingdom becomes known, more people will move in to live and work, and you will be able to hire farmers and soldiers. Build new facilities for crafting, and get new resources. Create the greatest kingdoms of all time!

merge-racers.name: Merge Racers
merge-racers.description: Merge Racers is an idle game in which you have to cover the entire planet with expensive cars. Buy and merge identical cars to create better ones. Bring your cars to the race track and earn idle money every time they cross the finish line!

dash-hero.name: Dash Hero
dash-hero.description: Dash Hero is a casual game where you become a courageous hero on a quest to rescue the princess. Navigate through challenging levels, confront enemies, and showcase your skills in epic battles. Embark on an exciting journey filled with danger and excitement, where every move counts towards your ultimate goal of saving the kingdom. Are you ready to embrace your destiny and become the hero you were meant to be?

race-clicker-tap-tap-game.name: Race Clicker: Tap Tap Game
race-clicker-tap-tap-game.description: Race Clicker: Tap Tap Game is a clicker game with a thrilling racing experience that challenges your speed, agility, and strategy. Control your runner with a single tap through intricate tracks and obstacles. Train your character to enhance muscle, speed, and endurance, unlocking new skills and items. Master quick reactions and strategic speed usage to outpace opponents and claim victory. With stunning scenery and varied terrain, find the balance between speed and endurance to become the ultimate race champion.

asmr-beauty-treatment.name: ASMR Beauty Treatment
asmr-beauty-treatment.description: ASMR Beauty Treatment is a game where you take on the role of esthetician at the ASMR clinic to help meet your client’s beauty needs. Get ready to scrape plaque, pop pimples and top off the beauty treatment with a head-to-toe outfit makeover. The game is fully guided so you can sit back, relax and enjoy the subtle sounds of transformation.

carnage-battle-arena.name: Carnage Battle Arena
carnage-battle-arena.description: Carnage Battle Arena is a sports car game where speed is just the beginning. With an extensive destruction model, you'll wreak havoc on the streets, transforming the environment as you race. Choose from 82 awesome cars across multiple game modes, including Battle Arena and Survival. Blocky, retro-styled graphics and game-changing power-ups add to the excitement as you race through dozens of unique maps.

raft-of-the-dead---zombie-survival.name: Infection Town of Zombies
raft-of-the-dead---zombie-survival.description: Infection Town of Zombies is a casual game where you become the boss of Zombie and destroy humans! Lead the ultimate Zombie Horde in a chaotic showdown! Control a powerful zombie and infect the humans to become your army. Upgrade your character and mutated zombies for maximum devastation. Battle civilians, policemen, and soldiers, each with unique fighting styles. Customize your strategy and conquer the city!

pet-clicker.name: Pet Clicker
pet-clicker.description: Pet Clicker is a cute clicker game where you must upgrade your clicker power and evolve the animal, bringing it closer to the next tier of evolution. Progress through 10 tiers of adorable animals, each evolving to a new stage of life. Click to earn money and buy upgrades to increase your income. Unlock new background, cursor, music, and effects for a more fun experience. Use prestige to boost your earnings further!

neon-stars.name: Neon Stars
neon-stars.description: Neon Stars is a casual game where every attack on your ship is a sudden test of reflexes. Amidst the endless expanse of shimmering stars, you must swiftly prepare your weapons for battle. Repel wave after wave of enemy assaults to prolong your survival, earn new ships, and achieve heroic status. Compete with friends for the top spot on the leaderboard.

cat-bakery.name: Cat Bakery
cat-bakery.description: Cat Bakery is a casual simulation where you embody a feline entrepreneur managing a bakery. Serve customers, expand your menu, and style your staff to perfection. With each purr-fectly baked treat, unlock new recipes and outfits to dominate the baking scene. Are you ready to whisk your way to the top of town?

slingshot-stunt-driver-sport.name: Slingshot Stunt Driver & Sport
slingshot-stunt-driver-sport.description: Slingshot Stunt Driver & Sport is a sports car game where you morph cars into planes, embracing the ultimate thrill of aerial stunts. Adjust slingshot strength, pick your launch direction, and witness the chaos as your car takes flight. Skillfully navigate the skies, aiming for precision landings amidst challenging terrain. It's not just about driving – it's about becoming the fearless stuntman of your dreams.

ice-cream-fever-cooking-game.name: Ice Cream Fever: Cooking Game
ice-cream-fever-cooking-game.description: Ice Cream Fever: Cooking Game is a casual simulation game in which you play as a restaurant owner. Serve customers with many variations of food and beverages. Decorate your restaurant to attract more customers. Upgrade kitchen items, cook fast, and try to serve your customers efficiently. Use boosters to get more benefits like no burn, easy preparation, and auto-serve to customers. Make customers happy and be the best chef!

bot-bumper.name: Bot Bumper
bot-bumper.description: Bot Bumper is an arcade action game where you'll take on the role of a feisty minibot in a futuristic arena teeming with rival minibots. In this adrenaline-fueled arcade action game, your objective is clear: outmaneuver, outwit, and outlast your opponents by strategically pushing them out of the arena or annihilating them with calculated collisions. Are you ready to prove your dominance in the arena? Strap in, rev your engines, and get ready to bump your way to victory in Bot Bumper!

riders-downhill-racing.name: Riders Downhill Racing
riders-downhill-racing.description: Riders Downhill Racing is a bike racing game that you can play by yourself or with your friend locally. There are three game modes available: Racing Mode, Career Mode, and Free Style Mode. Try to be the first to reach the finish line in the Racing Mode. Reach the finish line before the time runs out in the Career Mode. Have a super fun ride, and don't forget to collect diamonds in the Free Style Mode to unlock more items. Fly through the ramps, do stunts, and experience exciting moments! Go to the garage to buy new bikes, costumes, ATV bikes, cross bikes, and speed boats for more great adventures! Are you ready to be the best riders? Let the ride begin!

merge-battle-tactics.name: Merge Battle Tactics
merge-battle-tactics.description: Merge Battle Tactics is a thrilling merge battle game where you command an army of unique monsters. Merge identical creatures to unleash their full potential and strategically position them for combat against your foes. Master the art of merging and tactical placement to dominate the battlefield and emerge victorious in every clash!

heroic-archer.name: Heroic Archers
heroic-archer.description: Heroic Archer is a casual game where precision and upgrades are your keys to success. Protect your team by aiming carefully and prioritizing your cards wisely. Stay vigilant against armored foes, and remember, victory is within reach with teamwork. Best of luck on your quest!

cartoon-moto-stunt.name: Cartoon Moto Stunt
cartoon-moto-stunt.description: Cartoon Moto Stunt is an exhilarating racing adventure packed with 24 heart-pounding levels! Select from 4 distinct motorcycles, each boasting 4 captivating designs. Earn coins to purchase and enhance your bikes, tackling new challenges in every level. With its vibrant cartoon visuals and addictive gameplay, it's tailor-made for thrill-seekers and racing aficionados. Get ready for adrenaline-fueled stunts and intense races to the finish line.

idle-restaurant-tycoon.name: Idle Restaurant Tycoon
idle-restaurant-tycoon.description: Idle Restaurant Tycoon is an exciting idle game where you can open and become the owner of your own restaurant! Be an effective manager and turn your establishment into the best restaurant in the city! Develop your restaurant and attract more visitors. Earn money and reinvest it in your establishment by buying new furniture and decorations, hiring new employees, and opening additional sectors and rooms. Unlock new dishes, upgrade your kitchen, and earn even more money! Buy new parking spaces so more customers can park their cars and bring you more money. Open an outdoor terrace to earn more stars for your establishment, or open a family room to attract entire families.

mushroom-clicker.name: Mushroom Clicker
mushroom-clicker.description: Mushroom Clicker is an incremental game where you cultivate a vast mushroom empire by simply clicking on mushrooms. Expand your realm by constructing factories and hiring workers to accelerate production. Level up to gain free mushrooms and unlock power-ups to boost efficiency. Customize your experience with unique skins and backgrounds. Aim for ultimate mastery by reincarnating with a permanent multiplier.

mr-dude-king-of-the-hill.name: Mr. Dude: King of the Hill
mr-dude-king-of-the-hill.description: Mr. Dude: King of the Hill is an action game where you play the famous criminal, Mr. Dude. You're escaping from the cops and end up on the top of a mountain, where residents are living and ready to hand you over to the police. Knock out and throw these residents off the cliff and conquer the mountain! There are different objects that you can use as a weapon, throw and swing at your opponents. Grab some food to refill your health bar. With various enemies and interactive ragdoll characters, this game will bring a lot of fun to you!

mini-crushers.name: Mini Crushers
mini-crushers.description: Mini Crushers is an idle game where you play as a knight who must save the princess. Princess is locked in the tower, so, do your best to destroy the tower. Collect food to increase your strength, collect money as you hit the tower, and use your money to buy upgrades and assistants to help you complete the mission quickly. Good luck!

pet-cafe.name: Pet Cafe
pet-cafe.description: Pet Cafe is a simulation game where every visitor can surround himself with various animals and pay you. Buy a wide selection of animals, from affectionate kittens and puppies to woolly sheep, and also buy seats for visitors. Take care of the animals by feeding them, shower them, and let them sleep so they will be happy and healthy all the time. The happier the animals are, the more visitors your cafe will attract.

luxury-inc.name: Luxury Inc
luxury-inc.description: Luxury Inc is a fashion game where you design luxurious bags and shoes! Use the paintbrush to color and get various unique patterns to be used on your bags and shoes. Fill up your closet with luxurious designer shoes and bags, and make everyone jealous of your collection! There are little surprises throughout the game, so get ready to discover them all! Get ready to design all your dream bags and shoes!

bike-jump.name: Bike Jump
bike-jump.description: Bike Jump is an adrenaline-fueled challenge game! Ride your bike down thrilling ramps, then push the limits by launching off and soaring through the air. Show off your skills with jaw-dropping spins and twists. Take it to the next level by making your driver leap off mid-air. Upgrade engines, add boosts, and unlock bonus powers for the ultimate performance. How extreme can your stunts get?

rooftop-run.name: Rooftop Run
rooftop-run.description: Rooftop Run is a parkour game where you'll navigate urban landscapes with lightning-fast reflexes.
rooftop-run.faq:
How many levels are in Rooftop Run?

You get to enjoy 50 levels of near miss roof jumps and excitement with Rooftop Run.

Can I play Rooftop Run on my mobile?

Yes, you can play Rooftop Run from your mobile device, tablet as well as desktop.

Is Rooftop Run free to play?

Yes, Rooftop Run is free to play and can be found at CrazyGames.
rooftop-run.how_to_play:
Get ready for the adrenaline-pumping world of "Rooftop Run," where you take charge of a fearless character navigating the urban jungle with nothing but agility and nerve. Your mission? To leap from one precarious rooftop to another with the finesse of a seasoned freestyle runner, all while maintaining breakneck speed.

This high-octane game tests every jump, roll, and slide for skill and precision. With stunning 3D visuals that immerse you in the heart-pounding action. Each level of the game brings on new obstacles to overcome. From epic jumps that defy gravity to heart-stopping escapes from relentless pursuers, every moment is a test of your reflexes and courage.

Originally launched in June 2020 for iOS, followed by an Android release in September of the same year, Rooftop Run offers intuitive controls that put you in command of every move. Hold the left mouse button to control the camera movement, allowing you to survey your surroundings and plan your next daring leap.

shopping-sort.name: Shopping Sort
shopping-sort.description: Shopping Sort is a casual game where you become a savvy shopper, hunting down unbeatable deals and maximizing your savings. Compare prices, utilize coupons, and strategize to snag the best bargains. Master the art of frugal spending and watch your savings grow as you conquer the shopping world. Happy saving!

space-waves.name: Space Waves
space-waves.description: Space Waves is an arcade game where you need to control an arrow to avoid obstacles until you get to the end. There are 33 levels to the game, and you can choose any level you want to play at any time. All levels vary in difficulty and are labeled accordingly with faces; this way you get to decide how courageous you want to be.
space-waves.how_to_play:
All 33 levels of Space Waves more or less have the same scope – get to the end of the level without crashing your arrow into a wall, a rotating cog or thorns. Each level has its own degree of difficulty.

If you choose a “green” level, you’ll be met with wider space and angles, making it possible to gain some straight momentum with your arrow. As you choose more difficult levels, you can expect more obstacles, tighter angles and more of them.

Space Waves allows you to choose any level you want to play, so you can start with the most difficult which can quickly give you a sense of the need for quick reaction times.

Tips and Tricks

Move in a zigzag when obstacles are ahead, as this will give you the momentum of a straight line trajectory.

asmr-nail-treatment.name: ASMR Nail Treatment
asmr-nail-treatment.description: ASMR Nail Treatment is a beauty game where a patient is dealing with the thickening of the fingernails. Help her maintain good nail hygiene by providing proper nail care. Showcase your medical skills by performing this ASMR Nail Treatment game. Once the treatment is done, dress her in a fashionable outfit and create captivating nail art using various styles and accessories.

hoop-world-3d.name: Hoop World 3D
hoop-world-3d.description: Hoop World 3D is a flip-and-dunk game that brings basketball to a whole new dimension! Get your timing right or you'll fall short of the net and fall flat on your face.
hoop-world-3d.faq:
What can I do with my coins in Hoop World 3D?

You can continue collecting coins in Hoop World 3D and see them as points rather than coins to purchase something with.

Can I play Hoop World 3D online?

Yes, you can play Hoop World 3D online at CrazyGames.
hoop-world-3d.how_to_play:
Hoop World 3D is fairly easy to maneuver and easy to learn. Use your mouse or keypad to control movement with just one finger.

This game will challenge you to flip, dunk, and soar right towards the net. Test your skills, and your flips to progress to the next level, but keep in mind the more flips you do, the quicker you progress to the next level.

How do you master your triple-front flip dunks, you ask? To flip the ball and aim for a dunk, you will need to tap the controls. Hold the left mouse button to jump and flip, and then release to dunk. You will have a few challenges along the way like trampolines, slides and more.

With simple controls and stunning graphics, it's addictive and exhilarating. Jump, dunk, and explore thrilling environments. Just watch out for those falls!

  • October 2021 (Android)
  • April 2024 (WebGL)

  • Android
  • iOS

slice-master.name: Slice Master
slice-master.description: Slice Master is a casual one-person game whose goal is to slice everything in sight, well, almost everything. This one-button game is driven by precision, timing, and discernment to rack up a high score. Flying knives are generally a no-no, but in this game, they are the only way to progress to new blades and skins.
slice-master.faq:
How can I earn more points in Slice Masters?

When you reach the end of the level, make sure you hit the numbered targets to multiply your points. The higher the number, the more points you will receive, so aim high.

Can I cut the white pillar in Slice Masters?

No, the white pillar can’t be cut, but you can attach it and use it as a safety net to prevent it from hitting the ground.

Can I go backwards in Slice Masters?

No, you can only go forward in Slice Masters.

How many knives can I unlock in Slice Masters?

You can unlock 9 knives in Slice Masters so keep those points coming.
slice-master.controls: Use the left mouse button or space to flip your knife into action.
slice-master.how_to_play:
Slice Master is a one-button game controlled by the space pad on your keyboard or the left click on your mouse. All the control lies in this one simple movement. The game has an ASMR quality, and the consistent slicing is oddly soothing in sound.

The aim is simple: slice everything in sight: fruit, shapes, walls, furniture, and more. You can slice most things, but don’t add the white wall to your target list—it’s just a holding material for your knife.

You will get to shop along the way, using the coins accumulated to purchase objects like sharper blades, swords, mace, and more.

Tips

  1. Stay away from the pink spiked metal shapes. They are too strong for your knife and will take you straight back to the beginning of the round.
  2. Hit the correct numeric target at the end of each level to multiply your points by the target number and boost your score.

Release Date

April 2024

Platform

Web browser (desktop and mobile)

mancala-classic.name: Mancala Classic
mancala-classic.description: Mancala Classic is a timeless strategic board game that pits players against each other or a cunning computer opponent. Its rich history and intuitive gameplay offer a captivating experience for strategic thinkers. Are you prepared to outwit your opponents, conquer the board, and claim victory?

beauty-princess-makeup-game.name: Beauty Princess Makeup
beauty-princess-makeup-game.description: Beauty Princess Makeup is a fashion game where you embark on a magical journey into a world of endless possibilities! In this enchanting beauty game, you have the power to glam up princesses with your magical touch and transform them into radiant visions of royalty. Dive into the magical world of makeup and nail art, and let your creativity shine as you transform princesses into dazzling icons of royalty!

rush-car-driving-race-master.name: Rush Car Driving: Race Master
rush-car-driving-race-master.description: Rush Car Driving: Race Master is a driving game that delivers thrilling action as you navigate heavy traffic. Push the limits of your speed and driving skills to become a winner! Experience the adrenaline of high-speed racing in heavy traffic, where split-second decisions can be the difference between victory and defeat. Explore a variety of immersive environments, from busy urban highways to rural roads. Choose from a wide selection of cars, from sports cars to muscle machines. Buckle up and start the race!

drift-no-limit.name: Drift No Limit
drift-no-limit.description: Drift No Limit is a driving game where you go into the heart of high-speed asphalt battles.
drift-no-limit.faq:
What is drifting a car?

Drifting a car involves maneuvering it to slide sideways through a turn in a controlled manner, with the front wheels directed away from the direction of the turn.

Is Drift No Limit available on mobile?

Yes, Drift No Limit is available on both mobile and desktop so you can enjoy the thrill of the drag-race from any device.

Can I play Drift No Limit for free?

Yes, you can play Drift No Limit for free at CrazyGames.
drift-no-limit.how_to_play:
Drift and drive into the exhilarating world of Drift No Limit, a 3D driving simulator that immerses you in various gameplay modes. You will be able to earn rewards to invest in a better driving experience and upgrade your car.

You can choose from different game modes that include Career, Free Run, Crash Mode and Online to navigate through a series of different landscapes and missions. Select from a vast selection of powerful cars, each with its own traits that you will get to master on the road. Take full control of customization, upgrading every aspect from the engine to the paint job.

Your aim is to complete challenging missions and unlock new vehicles, allowing you to conquer the streets of multiple cities. You get rewards the more you enhance your driving experience, pushing your skills to the limit in extreme conditions.

Gameplay Tip

Each car drives differently, so if you want to test your stunt skills, try several cars until you find the right one for you.

  • April 2024 (WebGL)

More Games Likes This

Do you want to continue mastering your driving skills? Check out our driving games including popular titles like Drift Hunters, a game of intense asphalt battles and Moto X3M, a 22 level bike racing game.

vehicle-masters.name: Vehicle Masters
vehicle-masters.description: Vehicle Masters is a departure from the high-octane thrills of typical racing games. Instead, it offers a unique experience focused on precision and finesse.
vehicle-masters.faq:
What car should I choose to drive in Vehicle Masters?

That depends entirely on your preferences! It is suggested to try different cars, as each vehicle does have a different feel to it when it comes to the controller.

How do you control your car in Vehicle Masters?

Use the WASD / arrow keys / the left mouse button to control the steer.

Can I play Vehicle Masters on mobile?

Yes, Vehicle Masters can be played on both desktop and mobile!
vehicle-masters.how_to_play:
Maneuver a variety of heavy vehicles through challenging environments, honing your skills as you navigate tight spaces without a scratch. Embrace the calm satisfaction of mastering the art of careful driving in this surprisingly realistic simulator.

Features

⚠️REAL DRIVING

  • Realistic steering, acceleration, and braking are carefully calibrated for all vehicle types.
  • Adapt your driving technique to different road conditions and situations.

🅿️YOU CAN’T PARK THERE!

  • Gently does it! Follow the steering pointers to guide your vehicle into the green space.
  • Missed the mark? Don’t panic; you can always reverse slowly and try again.
  • Feel the satisfaction as you finally get your unwieldy vehicle perfectly parked.

🚚🚒🚓VEHICLE VARIATION

  • Over 20 different cars, trucks, and other vehicles to drive in the game.
  • Get behind the wheel in pickups, articulated trucks, fire trucks, police cars, and even excavators.
  • More than 80 items to decorate and customize the interior of your vehicle.

🌎TRUCKING ALL OVER THE WORLD

  • 7 regions in the game with different climates and road conditions.
  • 20 unique areas to navigate, from crowded parking lots to twisting mountain roads.
  • Keep on trucking and enjoy the gorgeous views as you drive.

🔧MORE THAN JUST A DRIVER

  • Get out from behind the wheel and perform a variety of other simulator tasks in over 35 different missions.
  • Jump in the fire truck, rush to the scene of the conflagration, and douse the flames.
  • Operate all kinds of heavy machinery, including diggers and excavators.

🛣THE LONG AND WINDING ROAD

  • If you’re looking for a new driving game with a difference, a game that brings the world of hyper-realistic vehicle simulators to your mobile device, and a game that’s challenging, fun, and surprisingly relaxing to play, then Vehicle Masters could be just what you’ve been searching for. Hone your skills behind the wheel and live out your trucking dreams in a huge array of different vehicles and driving situations.

  • December 2022 (Android)
  • April 2024 (WebGL)

Platforms

  • Android
  • iOS

sprout-valley.name: Sprout Valley
sprout-valley.description: Sprout Valley is a charming farming simulator game where you can escape the hustle and bustle of everyday life and immerse yourself in the tranquility of nature. In this captivating game, you play as Nico, a cute cat on a quest to find a peaceful place to call home. Along the way, Nico will make friends, uncover secrets, and embark on a journey of discovery in the enchanting world of Ostara. Are you ready to sow the seeds of your paradise?

mine-slingshot.name: Mine Slingshot
mine-slingshot.description: In Mine Slingshot, you wield a colossal slingshot to hurl Minecraft mobs at relentless zombies. Strategize to topple structures and eliminate multiple foes by targeting their footholds. Merge mobs for stronger allies by colliding them. Your mission? Clear each level by vanquishing all zombies in this explosive and inventive twist on the classic slingshot game.

grab-them-all.name: Grab Them All
grab-them-all.description: Grab Them All is your ticket to thrilling fun as you take down robbers by putting them in the trap! Explore diverse traps on each level and get rid of all the robbers. It is suitable for all ages! Get ready for a blast of excitement and endless entertainment!

fast-ball-jump.name: Fast Ball Jump
fast-ball-jump.description: Fast Ball Jump is a thrilling adventure game where you roll, spin, and jump through challenging obstacles. Test your focus and speed in this epic ball race across diverse environments. With each level presenting new challenges, only the most skilled players will conquer the journey. Prepare for excitement and relaxation as you immerse yourself in the world of Sphere Sprint.

bffs-k-pop-fangirls.name: BFFs K-Pop Fangirls
bffs-k-pop-fangirls.description: BFFs K-pop Fangirls is a casual dress-up game where you can be the ultimate fangirl and flaunt your styling skills! You get to dress four fabulous and fashionable women ready to start their evening of K-pop fun. You can decide what they wear, from head to toe to accessories.
bffs-k-pop-fangirls.faq:
What languages can I play BFFs K-pop in?

BFF K-pop can be played in five different languages: English, Spanish, Russian, Turkish, and Portuguese.

Can I play BFFs K-pop on mobile?

Yes, you can! BFFs K-pop is available on mobile, desktop, and tablet, so you can enjoy this fashion frenzy from most devices.

Is BFFs K-pop Fangirls Game free?

Yes, you can play BFFs K-pop Fangirls Game and many other similar games for free at CrazyGames.
bffs-k-pop-fangirls.controls: Use the left mouse button to play.

truck-driving-simulator-game.name: Truck Driving Simulator Game
truck-driving-simulator-game.description: Truck Driving Simulator Game is a driving game that immerses you in the thrill of truck driving throughout Asia. The graphics offer a realistic experience with unique truck models and captivating environments.
truck-driving-simulator-game.faq:
What is the best free truck game?

Truck Driving Simulator Game immerses you throughout Asian landscapes and roads with realistic graphics and sounds while you complete tasks like transporting livestock and more.

Can you play Truck Driving Simulator online?

Yes, you can play Truck Driving Simulator and other similar driving games online at CrazyGames.

Can you play Truck Driving Simulator for free?

Yes, you can play Truck Driving Simulator Game for free at CrazyGames.
truck-driving-simulator-game.controls:
• W/upper arrow = forward movement
  • A/left arrow = left movement
  • D/right arrow = right movement
  • S/back arrow = backward movement/reverse
  • Space = brake
  • P = game pause
  • H = horn
truck-driving-simulator-game.how_to_play:
Navigate through exciting terrains while transporting various cargo, from livestock to weapons to cars. With customizable trucks and multiple missions, embark on a journey through rural landscapes, mastering the art of trucking in this immersive simulator.

Movement is controlled by WASD keys or arrow keys. When you move backward, the perspective of the game changes along with your movement, giving you a full view of the back landscape.

Begin by choosing your game mode. The game offers several modes, which include:

  • Animal Transport Mode
  • Robbery Mode
  • Oil Transport Euro Truck
  • Travel in India
  • Police Truck Chase

Once you choose your mode, you can choose your truck and get ready to enjoy the rural landscape. Each mode offers a different selection.

Each mode offers different tasks, such as attaching and transporting oil tankers, capturing and transporting livestock, driving tractors back to the farm, and more.

Tip

Watch out for the curves. The game gives clear warnings about potential obstacles. Choose to follow them or explore what the game is capable of.

gearshift-one.name: Gearshift One
gearshift-one.description: Gearshift One is an immersive vehicle customization game that puts you in the driver's seat of your own mechanical playground. Experiment with every aspect of your vehicles, from electronics to mechanics, and unleash your inner engineer. Drive freely in a vast open world, customize obstacles, and test your creations. Whether with an Xbox controller or keyboard and mouse, the power is in your hands

cute-kitchen.name: Cute Kitchen
cute-kitchen.description: Cute Kitchen is a casual restaurant game where you enjoy culinary delights with adorable characters and delicious challenges! Start on a kitchen adventure where you match ingredients to serve hungry customers. Earn coins to open new restaurants and customize your chef with stylish clothes and accessories. With hundreds of levels and colorful graphics, cooking will be a blast. Get ready to smile!

real-drive-3d-parking-games.name: Real Drive 3D Parking Games
real-drive-3d-parking-games.description: Real Drive 3D Parking Games is a parking car simulation game where you start with an SUV and unlock various vehicles as you progress. Test your driving skills in challenging levels, from rooftop terrains to off-road adventures. Master manual gear shifting and precision parking while enjoying a wide selection of cars, including sedans, trucks, muscle cars, and supercars. Get ready to unleash your inner racer and conquer each level with finesse!

jump-up-3d-mini-basketball.name: Jump Up 3D: Mini Basketball
jump-up-3d-mini-basketball.description: Jump Up 3D: Mini Basketball is a trampoline basketball game where you control the action. With simple controls, anyone can enjoy aiming for that perfect shot. The vibrant graphics and lively animations make each game session a blast. Challenge yourself to beat your high score or compete with friends for bragging rights. It's time to bounce, shoot, and score big in Jump Up 3D: Mini Basketball!

racing-empire.name: Racing Empire
racing-empire.description: Racing Empire is an adrenaline-pumping game that lets you build your own racing dynasty. Earn tokens, upgrade and customize your car, and push your limits on the track. With high-speed action and strategic car modifications, Racing Empire lets you prove you're the ultimate racing mogul. Get ready to race and conquer the competition!

crusher-clicker.name: Crusher Clicker
crusher-clicker.description: Crusher Clicker is an addictive game where you smash rocks and crystals, then upgrade to enhance your crushing power and speed. It's like operating a hydraulic press but with a satisfying, stress-relieving twist. Boost your crusher's power, speed, and gravity for even more dramatic destruction. Get lost in the colorful physics and the endlessly engaging gameplay.

my-jelly-bear-pet.name: My Jelly Bear Pet
my-jelly-bear-pet.description: My Jelly Bear Pet is your adorable new virtual pet who brings a unique twist to the classic tamagotchi experience. This cute, jiggly companion loves to eat, nap in the fridge, and play mini-games. Keep Jelly Bear happy by feeding him sweets, washing him, and dressing him up. He thrives on your daily care and attention, so make sure he never gets bored, hungry, or sleepy. Jelly Bear is not your typical virtual pet—his charm will win you over, even if animal games aren't usually your thing!

backpack-idle.name: Backpack Idle
backpack-idle.description: Backpack Idle is an idle game where you have to put items into backpack slots to maximize your earnings. Place items like magical artifacts to nifty gadgets. Strategically organize your gear in your bag to earn passive income. Dive into research to unlock cool ones and use prestige to improve your game. You will earn a lot of wealth with the automatic earning feature even when you are AFK. Get ready for an epic journey in this easy-to-control game that makes this game truly amazing!

mergementals.name: MergeMentals
mergementals.description: Embark on an exhilarating 3D Horde Survival adventure in MergeMentals, where you must vanquish waves of enemies to collect and merge powerful elemental forces. Combine strategy, quick thinking, and mastery to level up elements and achieve ultimate domination. Are you ready to become the MergeMental Master?

pot-pelting.name: Pot Pelting
pot-pelting.description: Pot Pelting is a delightful casual game where you embark on a gardening adventure by throwing plant seeds at pots, nurturing them with water, and defending them against pests to earn points and unlock exciting upgrades. Cultivate a variety of plants with special abilities and aim for high scores. Let's dive into the world of Pot Pelting!

park-master-car-parking-jam.name: Park Master: Car Parking Jam
park-master-car-parking-jam.description: Park Master: Car Parking Jam is a challenging puzzle game where you must navigate through various parking lots filled with obstacles and barriers. Your goal is to become a master at parking cars while avoiding collisions and traffic jams. With multiple levels and scenarios to tackle, you'll need to use your critical thinking skills to maneuver through the tight spaces and earn rewards along the way. Are you ready to test your parking prowess and become the ultimate park master?

ninja-parkour-multiplayer.name: Ninja Parkour Multiplayer
ninja-parkour-multiplayer.description: Ninja Parkour Multiplayer is a 2D game where your objective is to avoid obstacles along your path to the end of the course. Quick movements and precision jumps will get you far. Hesitation will get you straight back to the beginning.
ninja-parkour-multiplayer.controls:
• WASD / arrow keys = move
  • Left-click = interact with in-game buttons

wild-archer-castle-defense.name: Wild Archer: Castle Defense
wild-archer-castle-defense.description: Wild Archer: Castle Defense is a casual game where you are the last surviving archer hero and defender of your kingdom, embark on an epic journey to reclaim your castle, rescue the princess, and restore your empire to its former glory! Face relentless waves of invaders, expand your castle, and build a formidable defense to thwart your enemies. Are you ready to defend your walls and restore glory to your realm?

real-car-parking.name: Real Car Parking
real-car-parking.description: Real Car Parking is a skill-testing game that challenges your parking abilities. With various parking lots, vehicle types, and difficulty levels, it's a fun way to improve your skills. Experience realistic graphics, intuitive controls, and a wide range of vehicles as you navigate through narrow streets, office buildings, and more. Get ready to park like a pro and become a parking master!

bike-stunts-race-bike-games-3d.name: Bike Stunts Race Bike Games 3D
bike-stunts-race-bike-games-3d.description: Bike Stunts Race Bike Games 3D is an adrenaline-fueled bike racing experience game with exhilarating journeys through city streets and rugged terrains. Test your skills on challenging tracks designed for daring stunts. Customize your bike with unique styles and colors, and compete against world-class players. With stunning graphics and realistic landscapes, immerse yourself in the thrill of acrobatic stunts and epic races. It's time to rev up and conquer the streets!

tuggowar.name: Tuggowar
tuggowar.description: Tuggowar is an immersive deckbuilding experience game with strategic twists reminiscent of RTS games. Unleash your tactical prowess as you craft unique strategies and combinations to outsmart your opponents. Whether disrupting their plans or rushing with tanks, every move counts. Challenge others in PvP or enjoy a laid-back session against AI opponents. Are you ready to dominate the battlefield?

capybara-merge-evolution.name: Capybara Merge Evolution
capybara-merge-evolution.description: Capybara Merge Evolution is an addictive clicker game where you click capybaras into existence and unlock astonishing transformations along the way. Your capybara evolves, and so do the eggs you've conjured up with clicks.
capybara-merge-evolution.faq:
Is Capybara Merge Evolution unblocked?

You can play Capybara Merge Evolution unblocked at CrazyGames.

Can I merge two forms of capybara together?

In Capybara Merge Evolution, you can only merge similar capybara to form a whole new form of capybara.

Is there a Capybara Merge Evolution guide?

Read about and play Capybara Merge Evolution on CrazyGames.
capybara-merge-evolution.controls:
• Use the left mouse button to interact with the in-game UI
  • Drag and drop the capybara by holding the left mouse button to merge with other capybaras
capybara-merge-evolution.how_to_play:
You are on a farm of capybara, and your task is to click on the dancing capybara to actively collect rewards. Click quickly and see the points flood in, or don’t click at all and still get points.

If you take a break here and there, it's not a problem. Capybara Merge Evolution is a clicker game that allows for passive point accumulation, so sit back, relax, and let your capybara empire grow exponentially, but be warned that when you come back, you will find a farm full of capybara - those eggs hatch quickly.

When you create a new form of capybara, you will progress to the next round, essentially the same as the previous one but faster. Your advanced form of capybara will come with you. Each realm offers game upgrades and dynamic weather conditions, so there is always something to surprise you when you click away.

As the rounds progress, the capybaras move more quickly, making it slightly more challenging to merge. All part of the fun!

Merge Your Capybara

Once eggs hatch, you will have plenty of capybara to merge. You can merge similar capybara to form a whole new form of capybara. There are 32 distinct capybara evolutions spread across 4 diverse realms for you to explore. The capybara gets odder and odder as you merge.

Get ready for a delightful adventure as your capybara collection thrives!

Tip

When the board is full of mixed capybara, click on the more evolved capybara for more points.

Click on capybara poop for more points.

sunset-bike-racing.name: Sunset Bike Racing
sunset-bike-racing.description: Sunset Bike Racer is an adrenaline-pumping offroad adventure game that puts your skills to the test. Experience thrilling bike physics on challenging tracks. Earn stars to unlock powerful bikes and dominate the competition. Need a second chance? Reverse time and try again! Compete against ghosts, perform stunts, and discover hidden secrets on dozens of dynamic tracks. Are you ready to race into the sunset?

craft-drill-clicker.name: Craft Drill Clicker
craft-drill-clicker.description: Craft Drill Clicker is a clicker game where you upgrade your drilling machine to mine endlessly. Enhance your drill, discover new mines, and excavate valuable resources. Enjoy intuitive gameplay with varied upgrades, exciting bonuses, and power-ups. Dive into this adventure to become the ultimate miner and build your mining empire!

fork-n-sausage.name: Fork N Sausage
fork-n-sausage.description: Fork N Sausage is a casual food game where you navigate a jumpy little sausage through a series of wacky obstacles to reach its final destination - a fork. This game offers the perfect amount of quirk to keep you curious about what new obstacle you will meet or what household item will help get you to the end of each level.
fork-n-sausage.faq:
Is the fork and sausage game appropriate for kids?

Fork N Sausage is a fun, casual game that is totally appropriate for kids. The game has you navigate a sausage all the way to its final destination -- a fork! Be careful because household appliances may stop you from reaching your goal.

When was Fork N Sausage released?

Fork N Sausage was released in May 2024.

Is Fork N Sausage free?

Fork N Sausage can be played for free online at CrazyGames.
fork-n-sausage.controls: Use WASD, arrow keys, or swipe gestures with the left mouse to control the sausage.
fork-n-sausage.how_to_play:
The game's objective is simple - flip and fly your sausage to reach the final goal - a fork. Flip, twist, and bounce your way through levels filled with humorous encounters and challenging physics-based moves. Fork N Sausage offers ragdoll game dynamics to help you prove your physics skills.

As you progress through the game, you will be met with a surprise box between rounds, which you can tap to open. The boxes unlock exciting new game mechanics, which may or may not help you toward the fork. The boxes contain helpful (or not so helpful) kitchenware or other household items like pots, pans, toasters, fans, saws, treadmills, jelly, knives 🔪, bombs 💣, portals, rubber ducks, and more. They all might either help your sausage bounce and flip its way to the fork or stop it in its tracks (and possibly even slice it to pieces), but they’re guaranteed to add to the crazy fun.

A few examples of helpful items are pudding and toaster, both of which give you a super boost to help you jump to even greater heights. Watch out, here we come, fork!

As you advance deeper into the game, you'll face increasingly challenging levels that push your skills to the limit. These levels require more precise coordination as the obstacles get more challenging to jump through and over. You may find your sausage stuck in the sharp, appliance-filled world of the modern kitchen with no room to jump!

Fork N Sausage Coins

As you reach the fork, you will be surrounded by coins. Collect all the coins you can in the levels to save up for cool new accessories—sunglasses, a top hat, boxing gloves, a chef’s cap, and dozens more collectible items guaranteed to make your sausage look good enough to eat.

Tips

Grab keys whenever you can to flip plates and get further cool rewards 🎁. You’ll also get the chance to spin the wheel for more coins or mystery prizes.

airborne-motocross.name: Airborne Motocross
airborne-motocross.description: Airborne Motocross is a driving game where your dirt bike transforms into a glider. Experience smooth physics as you race through secret paths and reach hidden treasure caves in the sky. Discover cool items like gravity changers, boosters, and more across hundreds of tracks, ensuring endless excitement and challenges.

ragdoll-throw-challenge.name: Ragdoll Throw Challenge
ragdoll-throw-challenge.description: Ragdoll Throw Challenge is a physics-based casual game where you control a wobbly character, help them grab weapons, and fling them at your enemies for ultimate chaos and fun! The gameplay is simple, but movements can be complex and challenging to master.
ragdoll-throw-challenge.faq:
Is Ragdoll Throw Challenge game free?

You can play Ragdoll Throw Challenge for free at CrazyGames.

How to play Ragdoll Throw Challenge?

Use the A and D keys or arrow keys to rotate your character's hands and the space bar to grab objects and release them. The key is to find the right balance of force and release.
ragdoll-throw-challenge.controls:
• AD or arrow keys to rotate hands
  • Space to grab weapons, release to throw
  • Left mouse button to interact with in-game UI, and see the full in-game controls
ragdoll-throw-challenge.how_to_play:
There are several challenges you can choose from at the start of the game, all of which are quite different from each other but have a common thread - the simple physical movements with very big repercussions. You can choose from various gameplays:

Bow and Arrow

Your ragdoll is standing on a ledge with a bow and arrow. Rotate your arms clockwise or counterclockwise, point, shoot, and aim. You won't always get your opponent to fall off the game screen when struck. Depending on the intensity of the hit, you may need a few arrows. Each challenge gets harder with ragdolls at various points on the game screen.

Dynamite

This challenge can be trickier. Your ragdoll's mission is to grab dynamite and throw it towards your opponent. Are you throwing it too far, too close, over the edge? You must find that perfect balance of rotating your hands, grabbing the object, and letting go to get to the next challenge. Easier said than done.

Simple Arrow

Click the play button at the start of the game, and you will be equipped with a simple arrow. This challenge will teach you the basics of this game. The arrow and movements very much mirror that of the Dynamite challenge.

Basketball

You aim to dunk the ball in the hoop. How much force is needed to shoot, and how far should you be before letting go of the ball? Practice makes perfect in this challenge.

Cannon

Hold, release, and fire! You will shoot your ragdoll out of a cannon and get him safely on a platform. Don't be afraid to hit him against other platforms to lose a bit of force and gain a bit of direction - all for the sake of physics!

Release Date

  • August 2019 (Android)
  • May 2021 (iOS)
  • May 2024 (WebGL)

Platforms

  • Web browser (desktop and mobile)
  • Android
  • iOS

merge-restaurant.name: Merge Restaurant
merge-restaurant.description: Merge Restaurant is a casual food game in which you are responsible for preparing a restaurant that’s not in the best shape for opening. Redesign and transform it from a neglected space to the hottest spot in town.
merge-restaurant.faq:
How do you play Merge Restaurant?

The object of Merge Restaurant is to get the restaurant in good shape for opening. To do this, you need to complete certain tasks, like dusting and washing table covers. Use your mouse left click to merge items and get what you need.

Can I play Merge Restaurant online?

You can play Merge Restaurant online at CrazyGames.

Why do people play merge games?

The low-key, casual element of merge games gives players a sense of satisfaction while navigating new challenges.
merge-restaurant.controls: Use the mouse's left button to interact.
merge-restaurant.how_to_play:
Your name is Mina, and you've got a new job. You’re in charge of a restaurant that is in a fantastic location, so it has a ton of potential, but it is in disarray as it was once shut down by a "strange man" and abandoned for some time. The only hitch is that this new restaurant is in worse shape than you thought, so you need to put in significant effort to clean it up.

How do you clean up the restaurant?

Merge Restaurant is an interactive merge game in which you combine objects to create new ones or to restore or clean them up. It’ll take some time to get this place back in shape and ready for customers, but that is your challenge. All the restaurant needs is your loving touch to breathe life back into it.

You will need to wash tables, dust, replace furniture, and revamp the menu, all by merging items within the restaurant using your left mouse to click and drag. You merge to get what you need. Since the restaurant requires a lot of clean-up, you will get quite a few sponges to merge. Keep combining so you get even more useful items. The more you combine, the more unique and practical items will appear.

Once you get your first restaurant in shape, you can move on to bigger and better restaurants and use your pro skills while you follow roller coaster love stories of the "strange man" who seemingly wants to shut your restaurant down.

Release Date

  • March 2021 (Android)
  • January 2023 (iOS)
  • May 2024 (WebGL)

Platforms

  • Web browser (desktop and mobile)
  • Android
  • iOS

flames-fortune.name: Flames & Fortune
flames-fortune.description: Flames & Fortune is a collectible card game inspired by Card Crawl. Play as a knight wielding powerful fire spells to conquer dungeons. Strategically clear all cards to escape each level, collecting gold and using your deck to overcome challenges and adversaries. Engage in tactical gameplay as you navigate through treacherous dungeons, ensuring your survival and victory.

idle-crafting-empire-tycoon.name: Idle Crafting Empire Tycoon
idle-crafting-empire-tycoon.description: Idle Crafting Empire Tycoon is an economic simulator game where you manage an island empire. As the ruler, explore the island, discover resources, and craft items. Hire managers and traders to boost profits and upgrade factories to optimize production. Fulfill orders for rewards and build an empire known throughout the fantastical world!

impossible-mega-ramp-car-stunt.name: Impossible Mega Ramp Car Stunt
impossible-mega-ramp-car-stunt.description: Impossible Mega Ramp Car Stunt is a driving game where you’ll get speed, drama, awesome cars, and much more in these addictive mobile racing games. Get a perfect landing on the floor by landing both wheels at the same time in impossible GT car stunt games. While in the air, hold the left or right button to rotate your vehicle. Press up before jumping to get an extra boost in crazy car stunts mega ramp games. Each car has its own set of tasks to complete the ramp car racing games. Unlock cars and choose the best one for your racing style. The main tracks are designed for casual play, but the bonus tracks offer more extreme challenges and have high risks but also high rewards. Levels include hard trials levels, easy speed levels, and casual and fun jump ramp levels. Customize your cars based on your preferences with cool paint jobs, engines, tires, and more. The car selection includes classic and modern muscle car types, sports cars, off-road vehicles, and other legendary car models in impossible GT car stunt games. Get ready and show your cool stunt performances!

hyper-cars-ramp-crash.name: Hyper Cars Ramp Crash
hyper-cars-ramp-crash.description: Hyper Cars Ramp Crash is a 3D driving stunt and crash simulation game with realistic physics and graphics. Perform incredible stunts in many different modes with great-looking cars. There are seven different super-sport car models in the garage, waiting in the garage for you to try them. Open world, stunt mode, and fall mode can be played in 1-player and 2-players. You can also drive freely in Free Style mode. Have fun with these fantastic-looking cars!

fire-truck-driving-school.name: Fire Truck Driving School
fire-truck-driving-school.description: Fire Truck Driving School is a cutting-edge fire engine driving game where you handle dual controls to master emergency response. Join the 911 rescue team, navigate realistic city environments, and save lives with precision in this immersive fire emergency simulation. Your quick thinking and driving skills are crucial in this dynamic sandbox experience.

pepi-hospital-learn-care.name: Pepi Hospital: Learn & Care
pepi-hospital-learn-care.description: Pepi Hospital Learn & Care is an engaging casual game for kids where you can play as a doctor, patient, or explorer. Dive into a colorful hospital environment featuring everything from X-ray rooms to dental clinics. Assist the Pepi characters, operate medical tools, and interact with numerous objects. Meet various characters, including the helpful Pepi Bot, and enjoy an educational adventure that teaches basic medical concepts.
pepi-hospital-learn-care.faq:
Is Pepi Hospital Learn & Care game kid-friendly?

Pepi Hospital Learn & Care is a child-friendly game designed to spark curiosity in kids and adults alike!

What can you explore in Pepi Hospital Learn & Care?

There are six rooms to explore in Pepi Hospital, along with the ER and reception, making a total of eight areas for kids to learn about.
pepi-hospital-learn-care.controls: Use the left mouse button on the desktop or tap on mobile devices.

human-mech.name: Human Mech
human-mech.description: Human Mech is a game where you reconstruct wrecked buildings by earning trophies in mech battles. Combine stickmen to design powerful mechs, upgrading stats to enhance strength and speed. Join battles, earn rewards, and conquer arenas to become an unstoppable force in your journey to rebuild and dominate.

noob-basketball-clicker.name: Noob Basketball Clicker
noob-basketball-clicker.description: Noob Basketball Clicker is a fun and addicting clicker game that combines with unique basketball elements. Your goal is to manage the basketball court and earn money by shooting the ball into the basket. Just click your mouse to send the ball flying toward the hoop. Each hit will bring you profit, which you can use to improve your gaming experience. Develop your skills, acquire new balls, and expand your support team to increase your income. This game offers addictive gameplay that will keep you busy for hours. Immerse yourself in a competitive atmosphere and test your business management skills. Become a real basketball tycoon and conquer this virtual sport!

neon-rider-vwz.name: Neon Rider
neon-rider-vwz.description: Neon Rider is an electrifying 2D game where you navigate a bike through a neon obstacle course full of twists, turns, and surprises. Neon Rider retro graphics and simple gameplay will take you back to when arcade games ruled the world.
neon-rider-vwz.faq:
What is the 2D racing futuristic game where you race bikes?

Neon Rider is an online 2D retro arcade game where you perform mid-air stunts, speed through circuits, and find precision in your speed.

Do you change bike skins in Neon Rider?

Yes, your bike changes color, often matching the circuit colors to add more challenge and fun to the gameplay.
neon-rider-vwz.controls: Hold the left mouse button / use space to play.
neon-rider-vwz.how_to_play:
The game's scope is to get to the end of the level with speed and precision, but more importantly, without having crashed your bike or driven it into an abyss, which is pretty easy to do when you're not practiced.

Game controls in this side-scrolling game are simple; you click on the left mouse to go forward, and the space bar gives you even more speed. This is where things get tricky - the game is filled with arcade-like neon ramps where you have no choice but to perform mid-air tricks. Will your trick be a success or a flop? That is all up to how you maneuver your speed.

An eye for gameplay physics and much practice will set you on the right course. Once you master your mid-air tricks, get ready for points to accumulate. The tricks and perfect landings will increase your score even more. Dodge obstacles, collect batteries for fire mode and soar through the stage. Your mission? Ride as far as you can in this neon-lit adventure!

Want more of a challenge? You can also change the color of your bike to match the game surface.

This arcade-style game will have you on the edge of your (driver's) seat. Sit back, rev the engine, and have fun retro style.

More Games Like

If you like the look and vibe of Neon Rider, you may want to try another arcade favorite, Atari Breakout. Stick with the neon theme in a side-scrolling game, Geometry Neon Dash Subzero, where you get to control your small but fast geometric cube through obstacles. If you want to try another bike game, our popular title Moto X3M delivers on fun.

Another game you may enjoy is Slice Master, an oddly soothing and addictive game where you slice everything in sight. Browse our casual games for more games like this.

Release Date

May 2024

Platform

Web browser (desktop and mobile)

bee-colony.name: Bee Colony
bee-colony.description: Bee Colony is a game where you control a bustling hive. Direct gatherer bees to collect flowers, send worker bees to defend against enemies and manage resources efficiently. Expand your colony by creating more bees and wisely controlling the economy to ensure your hive thrives.

sort-parking.name: Sort Parking
sort-parking.description: Sort Parking is a puzzle game where you sort cars by type, ensuring every color car is parked in a row with cars of the same color to get to the next stage of the game. It is a classic sort-and-order game that involves skills like logic to advance to the next levels.
sort-parking.faq:
What is the number one parking game?

Sort Parking is a great way to test your logic skills if you love puzzle games.

What is the game where you move cars out of the way?

Sort Parking is an online game in which you move cars around a parking lot to match them with similar cars.

Is Sort Parking a difficult game?

The first few stages of the Sort Parking game can be quite easy, but the further you advance, the more difficult it becomes as mixed-colored cars become harder to group.
sort-parking.controls: Use the left mouse button to interact.
sort-parking.how_to_play:
The concept of Sort Parking is fairly straightforward. You need to use logic to park cars of a similar color in one row, ensuring that no odd car is blocked in the parking lot between unmatching colors. The gameplay has a logical, pattern-based structure reminiscent of Mahjong, where each move affects the options that follow.

The game begins with cars of various colors parked all together. You will have a row with mixed car colors: brown, red, yellow, and blue, but you aim to get the same color car parked all in the same row, so all red cars parked in one row, brown cars parked in one row, and so on.

There are a few empty rows—these are the ones that you need to be strategic about filling. Once you place one color in an empty row, you will have to add the same color to that very row. Cars cannot be placed in front of different-colored cars, so once you start a row, make sure you have a plan to fill it.

When you fill an entire row with one color, that row is locked in. Lock them all in and complete the stage.

Earn More Points

Once you clear a stage, you can increase your points by clicking on the highest rotating number. It seems easy enough, but those numbers rotate pretty quickly.

What Can You Do With Your Points?

You can unlock more car models with in-game coins. Clear stages to collect pieces for the background; when matched, you can change the background to a new theme.

auto-riskrisk.name: Auto RiskRisk
auto-riskrisk.description: Auto RiskRisk is a strategic 2D card battle game. This is an auto battler game where you must manage your fighters by strategically equipping different items and artifacts to assemble the strongest team possible in order to win the battle. Send them off to fight against AI opponents in single-player or against other human players online. By combining certain types of items, you can increase your strength or counter the opponents' strategies. Collect money after each battle and use it to level up and buy new equipment for your fighters. You can also buy multiple of the same items to combine them into stronger versions. Each item belongs to two different sets. If you collect multiples of the same set, you get additional set bonuses. Your fighters will automatically run out and fight for you with the equipment you have assigned to them. The loser of the battle will lose health, and if you go down to 0 health, you are out of the game. The last player standing is the winner!

glitch-mkf.name: Glitch
glitch-mkf.description: Glitch is a 2D platformer game where you must solve challenging puzzles to overcome the glitching platform and reach the finish door. Get ready for a gaming experience like no other, whether you’re a fan of puzzles, action, or platformers. Start your adventure!

drill-quest.name: Drill Quest
drill-quest.description: Drill Quest is a casual game combining the excitement of crushing blocks, upgrading your drill, and building your city. Explore diverse locations, progressively upgrade your equipment, and choose from machines. Enjoy addictive and meditative ASMR gameplay as you create and expand your city!
drill-quest.faq:
What is a block game?

Block games are a game style where blocks are the main gameplay element. Typically, blocks are stacked, staggered, destroyed, or arranged.

What can you buy with your rewards in Drill Quest?

As the levels get harder, you will need heavy machinery that is better equipped. You can buy things like extra drills with your reward money.
drill-quest.controls:
• WASD or arrow keys to move
  • Left mouse button to interact with in-game UI
drill-quest.how_to_play:
The scope of Drill Quest is essentially to crush and destroy blocks, collect them onto your truck, sell them, and buy even bigger drills.

You are driving heavy equipment. You start with one drill, and your task is to destroy a landscape of blocks. Your heavy machinery not only destroys the blocks but also picks them up and stacks them simultaneously to take them back to the factory to sell.

Once you sell your blocks, you can buy more drills to break through some tougher blocks as levels advance. The drills become increasingly larger, getting you through rounds quicker.

The more blocks you collect and sell, the closer you are to unlocking the next level. Blocks are essentially valuable resources that maintain your livelihood and are key to upgrading your equipment.

This game can be oddly meditative. Who knew construction could be so relaxing?

graduation-makeup-trends.name: Graduation Makeup Trends
graduation-makeup-trends.description: Graduation Makeup Trends is a beauty game where you discover the latest makeup trends for your big day. Experiment with stunning looks that make heads turn as you walk across the stage. Choose from bold and fierce to soft and elegant styles. Enjoy a variety of makeup options, dresses, and accessories for three BFFs, blending floral prints, golden jewelry, and holographic accessories for ultimate inspiration!

card-cafe.name: Card Cafe
card-cafe.description: Card Cafe is a cooking simulation and management game where everything is represented by cards. Combine cards to prepare dishes or serve customers. Unlock new cards, earn money, buy new things, and grow your cafe. Good luck, Chef!

terraforma.name: Terraforma
terraforma.description: Terraforma is an idle building game where you build and grow your land by placing blocks & buildings while carefully planning your placements and making your own little world. Every block will generate points, and some will be affected by nearby tiles. Buy cards, place blocks, and grow your world.

planetary-assault.name: Planetary Assault
planetary-assault.description: Planetary Assault is an idle clicker game where your rockets automatically bombard a planet. Upgrade your rockets to boost their power and earn more gold. Unlock and enhance powerful satellite turrets, and deploy various skills to amplify your destructive capabilities. Accumulate resources and watch your arsenal devastate planetary defenses. Master the art of cosmic destruction and aim for supremacy on the leaderboards!

hero-castle-war-tower-attack.name: Hero Castle War: Tower Attack
hero-castle-war-tower-attack.description: Hero Castle War: Tower Attack is a 2D action game where you play as Hiro, a ninja trained by master Daiki and his daughter Hana in a secret ninja village. When the vampire king Dakura discovers the village, he kidnaps Hana and leaves his army of corrupted ninjas, giants, dragons, and witches to guard her. Despite the formidable foes, Hiro is determined to rescue Hana. Why did Dakura take Hana? No one knows. Help Hiro reach the highest tower and rescue his beloved now!

crazy-motorcycle.name: Crazy Motorcycle
crazy-motorcycle.description: Crazy Motorcycle is a driving game where you guide a noob rider on a high-speed motorcycle to the finish line. Navigate through thrilling levels, jumping over gaps and dodging obstacles. Get ready for an adrenaline rush as you tackle exciting challenges on your way to victory!
crazy-motorcycle.faq:
What is the motorcycle arcade game called?

Plenty of motorcycle games are available to play online - a few popular ones include Moto X3M and Crazy Motorcycle.

How do you avoid falling off the edge in Crazy Motorcycle game?

Make subtle moves. If you move left or right too abruptly, you run the risk of steering off course.
crazy-motorcycle.controls:
• WASD or arrow keys to move
  • Space to jump
  • Left mouse button to interact with in-game UI
crazy-motorcycle.how_to_play:
Crazy Motorcycle combines Minecraft graphics with classic 80s arcade gameplay. Your movements are limited to left, right, up, down, and jumping. Simple but all crucial to your survival on this obstacle-ridden bike course. You also have control of the sound off / on. Ah, the good old days were when choice was more tangible. The lack of frills is not a measure of fun in this exciting bike race in the sky.

The object of the game is to reach the finish line while avoiding obstacles and collecting rewards to fatten your final score. You will mostly be going straight with the occasional moves to the right and left to avoid hitting obstacles or, worse, meeting your fate with the abyss below you by falling off the race track.

You can't get away with a straight run, and even on level one, you must maneuver to avoid falling to your demise.

The race course is also not entirely linear, and there are breaks in the course with nothing below you but chance. This is where your jumps will come into play. The wider the gap, the more speed and jump you will need to cross the divide.

If you see a series of swerving roads ahead with moving obstacles, slow down to retain your balance and avoid getting knocked off the road. The key to moving items is to move with them, even if you get close to the edge. Not all items can be jumped over.

Grab the red flags along the road -- red flags in this game are a good thing -- and increase your score.

looping-monsters.name: Looping Monsters
looping-monsters.description: Looping Monsters is an idle game where you train your monsters by making them run around a training area. Each lap earns experience and coins. Merge identical monsters to level them up instantly. Engage in quick battles and face stronger foes as your monsters grow. Train them all to their final forms to become the best!

travel-tile.name: Travel Tile
travel-tile.description: Travel Tile is a mind-sharpening game where you match tiles and solve puzzles daily. Engage in 3D matching puzzles to enhance your memory and intelligence. Overcome obstacles like Ice, Chain, and Glue while building and exploring unique towns. Perfect for puzzle enthusiasts seeking a relaxing yet challenging experience.

pop-us.name: Pop Us!
pop-us.description: Pop Us! is a delightful puzzle game where you piece together virtual fidget toys and pop their bubbles for a satisfying ASMR experience. Enjoy hundreds of vibrant designs, collect coins for colorful rewards, and revel in realistic sound effects. This game is perfect for stress relief and enhancing fine motor skills, providing instant joy and relaxation.

pizza-maker-woi.name: Pizza Maker
pizza-maker-woi.description: Pizza Maker is a casual food game and culinary adventure where you create delicious pizzas from scratch. Select the pizza you want, gather the ingredients, slice vegetables, shred cheese, and prepare toppings. Get ready for a culinary feast and have fun!
pizza-maker-woi.faq:
Is the Pizza Maker app free?

You can play Pizza Maker for free online at CrazyGames. It is available on mobile, desktop, and tablet.

What is the computer game where you make pizza?

Pizza Maker is a casual food game where you can master 15 unique recipes from start to finish. You will buy ingredients and serve up a delicious homemade pizza.
pizza-maker-woi.how_to_play:
The gameplay in Pizza Maker is fairly simple. It is a one-button casual game where success is measured by how much fun you have in playing.

The game's objective is to get through several stages of cooking until your pizza is cooked and ready to serve.

Shop for Ingredients

You will need ingredients to make pizza, so the game begins by shopping for them. All necessary ingredients will be on a shelf. You must take the ingredients from the shelf and add them to your cart.

Prepare the Ingredients

In this step, you will slice tomatoes, pick basil, shred the cheese, and more. This is all the work involved in preparing the ingredients for making pizza.

Make the Sauce

This is where you unscrew the tomato jar and add it to a pan with water, oil, and salt. Shake the salt, stir, and pour all the ingredients into a bowl.

Roll the Dough

Mix flour, water, and salt. Lay the dough flat on the table and roll it out to form a pizza crust.

Add Toppings

Add all toppings onto your rolled pizza dough, including tomato, cheese, and whatever other ingredients you are working with.

Bake the Pizza

Place the pizza in a pizza oven and let it cook away. It will cook faster if you click your left mouse button fast enough.

cell-to-singularity-mesozoic-valley.name: Cell to Singularity: Mesozoic Valley
cell-to-singularity-mesozoic-valley.description: Cell to Singularity: Mesozoic Valley is a clicker science-based idle game where you get to delve into the prehistoric world of dinosaurs. Uncover hidden fossils and construct your own Jurassic simulation as you complete missions to earn fossil points, unlocking a diverse array of unique dinosaur species. Collect Trait Cards to automate fossil production, allowing for effortless point accumulation and triggering extinction events to expand your simulation even further. With each click, you’ll watch your dinosaur collection flourish, transforming your simulation into a vibrant, thriving ecosystem where the majestic creatures of the Mesozoic Era reign supreme.
cell-to-singularity-mesozoic-valley.faq:
What is the max level in Cell to Singularity: Mesozoic Valley?

There are fifty levels in Cell to Singularity: Mesozoic Valley.

How many prestiges are there in Cell to Singularity: Mesozoic Valley?

There are 10 prestiges in Cell to Singularity: Mesozoic Valley.
cell-to-singularity-mesozoic-valley.controls: Use the left mouse button to click, collect, and play the game.
cell-to-singularity-mesozoic-valley.how_to_play:
In Cell to Singularity: Mesozoic Valley simulation, you embark on an exciting journey through the prehistoric era, focusing on the evolution of various dinosaur species and other non-dinosaur creatures. You begin with a single dinosaur node and can unlock additional species by progressing through extinction events. Fossils are generated through clicking, with the option to charge nodes for faster fossil production.

You can also tap on dinosaurs to purchase more copies, increasing their fossil payout. Trait cards can be unlocked to streamline gameplay, automate fossil production, and enhance productivity while you collect Mutagen currency by acquiring dinosaurs.

As you complete quests displayed at the top of the screen, such as "Collect 25 Stegosaurus" or "Photograph Archosaur," they earn rewards like Stone Geodes, which contain Mutagen and Trait Cards. After reaching certain milestones, you can trigger an Extinction Event, resetting their progress but unlocking new dinosaurs and increasing their Simulation Level.

Once you reach rank 50, they can choose prestige, retaining rare and epic Trait Cards while boosting your dinosaur payout. The simulation features achievements that document significant milestones in prehistoric research, enhancing the overall experience as you explore the rich history of the Mesozoic Era.

hamster-kombat-clicker.name: Hamster Kombat Clicker
hamster-kombat-clicker.description: Hamster Kombat Clicker is an addictive clicker game where you manage a hamster empire. Tap to earn coins, unlock unique hamsters, and upgrade their skills to boost income. Conquer prestige levels, collect bonuses, and enjoy endless development in this charming game filled with cute hamsters and limitless possibilities.

slime-farm-3.name: Slime Farm 3
slime-farm-3.description: Slime Farm 3 is a clicker game where you breed a variety of slimes. Buy and collect the slimes they produce, and combine them to create unique species! Unlock achievements by completing various tasks. Dive into the world of slimes and build the ultimate slime farm!

flipped-chain-dunk.name: Flipped Chain Dunk
flipped-chain-dunk.description: Flipped Chain Dunk is a thrilling game where you jump, flip, and make chains to slam insane dunks. Tap the screen to move from ring to ring, creating a chain of players carrying a basketball. Tap again to leap into the Dunk and complete each level. Get ready for an exciting chain dunk adventure!

solar-smash.name: Planet Smash Destruction
solar-smash.description: Planet Smash Destruction is a casual game in which you wield cosmic power to create and destroy planets. You can try out different weapons, design custom planetary systems, and release black holes. With easy-to-use controls, it suits both beginners and seasoned players. Unleash your creativity and discover the wonders of space in this captivating physics simulator.
solar-smash.faq:
Is Planet Smash Destruction appropriate for 10 year olds?

The game is appropriate for children aged 9 and older. There is violence in terms of destruction, so parental screening is advised.

What are the secret planets in Planet Smash Destruction?
