Planet Smash Destruction has 15 secret planets, including Donut Earth, Cube Earth, Flat Earth, and Snowman. Ghost World, Pumpkin, Gingerbread Man, Block World, Sun, Cube Mars, Ghost Donut, Snow Globe, Water World, Ceres, and Waterworld.

What is Planet Smash Destruction available on?

You can play Planet Smash Destruction online at CrazyGames. It is compatible with mobile and desktop. Planet Smash Destruction can also be downloaded from the App Store or Andriod.
solar-smash.controls: Use the left mouse button to play.
solar-smash.how_to_play:
Your goal in Planet Smash Destruction is to destroy planets, essentially for the fun of it. You will journey to various planets and celestial bodies with nothing but courage and weapons to accompany you. Your weapons will help you on your path to destruction, but they also help reshape planets from their original form.

Planet Smash Destruction can be categorized as a sandbox game, so you get a significant amount of freedom to explore space, making each gameplay quite unique. Your imagination is the only limit to full space domination.

The game starts with a view from space of Earth -- it's just sitting there waiting to be destroyed. Fret not; if all feels overwhelming while destroying your homeland, you can always press reset while repeating the mantra - it's only a game, it's only a game.

Choose your weapon

There are several ways to destroy Earth and other planets. On the right side of the screen, select a weapon to destroy your chosen planet. For example, you can choose an alien monster drill to create a donut-like hole in the center of Mars. Or, if the planet is rotating close enough to you, you may want to detonate a bomb. Say goodbye to one or all seven continents with a few consistent laser shots. Want to practice your aim? Send a rocket out to see just how much you can destroy in one go.

The more planets you destroy, the more money you earn. Currency will get you upgrades and new planets to explore via a store purchase, allowing you to destroy even more worlds.

You can tweak your weapons via settings. You might enlarge your laser beam and change its color, make meteorites hit a wider area, move faster, or expand the blast radius of missiles. You can even unleash dozens of missiles for those peskier planets that are more difficult to destroy.

devil-s-road.name: Devil's Road
devil-s-road.description: Devil's Road is an exciting arcade platformer game that tests your agility and reflexes. Navigate dangerous caves filled with deadly traps like spikes, moving floors, and flying saws. With short, challenging levels, intuitive controls, and beautiful pixel art graphics, you’ll need maximum attention and quick reactions to succeed. Can you master the perilous paths of Devil's Road?

wrecking-wheels.name: Wrecking Wheels
wrecking-wheels.description: Wrecking Wheels is a browser game where you construct machines to complete levels. Unlock new parts, solve physics-based puzzles, and battle enemy contraptions. Use creativity and strategy to master each challenge and advance through the game, enhancing your contraption with every level.

iron-crusher.name: Iron Crusher
iron-crusher.description: Iron Crusher is an action-packed game where Earth's fate rests on a heroic cat. Play as this fearless feline, shooting down alien invaders and upgrading your abilities with powerful items. Navigate through intense battles, protect the planet, and become the ultimate defender in this thrilling adventure.

motocross-dirt-bike-race-games.name: Motocross Dirt Bike Race Games
motocross-dirt-bike-race-games.description: Motocross Dirt Bike Race Game is an adrenaline-pumping experience where you showcase your riding skills on zigzag paths, vertical ramps, and sky-high roads. Perform mega stunts, race in various modes, and conquer challenging ramps. Become the ultimate bike stunt master by executing thrilling jumps and competing in intense offroad racing events.

emoji-ball-blast.name: Emoji Ball Blast
emoji-ball-blast.description: Emoji Ball Blast is a game where you use Hand Cannon Shooters to defeat evil Emoji Balls. The virus-infected balls shrink with each shot until they burst. Upgrade your cannons and call for reinforcements to overcome tougher enemies, including the formidable Big Bad Emoji Boss Ball. Enhance your skills and save the world from chaos.

crypt-crawler.name: Crypt Crawler
crypt-crawler.description: Crypto Crawler is an exhilarating action RPG that allows you to become the ultimate hero. Dive into epic battles, crush fearsome monsters, and collect legendary loot. Your Knight runs on autopilot as you unleash powerful skills. Customize your hero with stunning gear and tackle challenging quests for unique rewards and prestigious titles.

designville-merge-design.name: Designville: Merge & Design
designville-merge-design.description: Designville: Merge & Design is a casual game that takes you on a creative adventure to renovate and decorate various spaces. Tackle unique design challenges, craft stunning interiors, and turn your studio into the best in town. Unleash your creativity to bring your dream designs to life and grow your decorating empire!
designville-merge-design.faq:
What is the game where you merge?

Designville is a design and merge game where you renovate and decorate space by merging items.

How do you merge items in Designville?

The yellow bag on the grid board contains push pins that can be merged to form other items that also can be merged. Left-click on it to release the pins.
designville-merge-design.controls: Use the left mouse button to play the game.
designville-merge-design.how_to_play:
The objective of the game is to renovate the run-down home. Renovations are done by merging items and designing and decorating gardens. After a brief intro of characters, you will be introduced to a board with multiple items. Most of which are cardboard boxes from the renovation.

The grid is mostly filled with boxes, but other tiles are filled with random objects that can be found in a home, including coffee cups, pizza slices, rubber gloves, and more. Most of these items are covered in dust and cobwebs, and some can only be accessed on other levels.

There is one object on the grid that is most important to begin merging - a yellow bag full of corkboard push pins. Left-click on the yellow bag to fill all empty board pieces with push pins. This is where you merge. Begin merging all push pins. It takes two push pins to create another object, an eraser. As you merge, you will get more free board space, so keep clicking and merge.

Potential merges and results:

  • 2 corkboard push pins = 1 eraser
  • 2 erasers = 1 Post-it note
  • 2 post its = 1 ruler
  • 2 rulers = 1 round ruler
  • 2 protractors = 1 pencil
  • 2 pencils = 1 highlighter
  • 2 highlighter = 1 drawing compass
  • 2 drawing compasses = 1 stapler
  • 2 staplers = 1 color sample

Keep merging and find more and more new items.

champions-of-the-void-paladin.name: Champions of The Void: Paladin
champions-of-the-void-paladin.description: Champions of the Void is an action game that plunges you into the unknown. Play as the Paladin, embodying the Jungian Hero, and explore the enigmatic Void. Progress through stages, upgrade abilities and face challenging foes. Beware: death resets your progress, but milestones advance the story. Confront Vylis, the shapeshifting antagonist, and unravel the Paladin's past in this captivating narrative adventure.

chibi-doll---avatar-creator.name: Chibi Doll - Avatar Creator
chibi-doll---avatar-creator.description: Chibi Doll—Avatar Creator is a beauty dress-up game where you create your own avatar. You can create and customize your own chibi characters, dressing them up with over 5,000 items. There are plenty of scenarios for endless hours of creativity and fun.
chibi-doll---avatar-creator.faq:
Who made Chibi Doll Avatar Creator?

Chibi Doll Avatar Creator was developed by ARPAPLUS who have developed a series of similar dress-up game titles.

What is a Chibi Avatar?

A Chibi is an anime image with a large head, small body, and large facial features. A Chibi avatar can be made by dressing your character in the Chibi Doll Avatar Creator.
chibi-doll---avatar-creator.controls: Use left mouse click to change outfit.
chibi-doll---avatar-creator.how_to_play:
The objective of the game is simply to have fun and be creative, giving your style to a blank Chibi canvas. You get to choose from a series of options - and there are many - thousands, in fact!

Hair

Choose from 75 hairstyles and endless colors. Hairstyles include bob, pixie, crew cut, buzz cut, undercut, fade, mohawk, mullet, shag, layered cut, blunt cut, asymmetrical cut, bowl cut, tapered cut, and side part. The best part is you can choose from 50 set colors. Can’t find the color you want? Create your own with a rainbow palette.

Headpieces

Doll your Chibi up with cat ears, a witch hat, bows, a birthday hat, a top hat, bunny ears, a crown, a Viking hat, and a baseball hat. The sky’s the limit.

Eyes

You have a vast array of eyes to choose from in red, blue, green, and all sorts of shapes and sizes. Want something beyond conventional? Choose heart-shaped eyes or diamonds, or go for more expressive eyes to make your Chibi as unique as possible.

Mouth

Customize your Chibi with all sorts of mouths, from a grimace and an x shape to a surprised face, a slight smile, puckered lips, and a laugh. And that's just the beginning—there are even more fun expressions to discover!

Shirts

Choose from T-shirts, dress shirts, polo shirts, button-down shirts, flannel shirts, chambray shirts, Western shirts, Hawaiian shirts, tank tops, raglan shirts, boat neck tunics, peasant blouses, patterned or plain.

Jackets & Outerwear

These are my favorite. They have a lot more detail than the other clothing pieces and include lots of designs such as capes, blazers, oversized sweaters, and knitwear. Bundle Chibi up if they’re going out in cool weather.

Pants

Choose from jeans, dress pants, cargo pants, sweatpants, joggers, leggings, harem pants, cargo shorts, denim shorts, and running shorts, or opt for some mismatching patterns for that extra pizzazz.

Other Customizations

You can also customize your Chibi with various eyebrows, dresses, shoes, and more.

Download Unique Chibi Doll Scenarios

There’s no need to stop at the conventional. Chibi Doll - Avatar Creator gives you the option of downloading various other elements to customize Chibi with.

Some of the sets you can download include:

  • Apocalypse: Unique futuristic clothes and accessories.
  • Baby: Bottles, bibs, and baby items galore.
  • Kawaii: Punk rock cosplay dress.
  • K-Pop: Oversized jackets and vibrant colors with unique accessories to match.
  • Food: Dress your Chibi like a hamburger, chicken, waffle, and lots of other yummy treats.
  • New Year: A festive selection of reindeer and Santa-themed garb.
  • Elves: A fantasy world of archery and elves.
  • Colorable Eyes: An entire set of eyes waiting to be touched by color.
  • Halloween: Festive-themed pumpkins, witches, ghouls, and ghosts.
  • Boyz: Boy-themed fashionwear.
  • School Girls: Glasses, plaid, and uniformed choices.
  • Anime Girls: Fun, over-the-top outfits and accessories.

Don't forget to choose a background and take a photo of your Chibi that you can download, share, and compare with friends!

armyclash-io.name: Armyclash.io
armyclash-io.description: Armyclash.io is a 1v1 auto-battle game where you strategically build an army by selecting and merging units with unique abilities and stats. Engage in ranked matches, find the best combinations, and outsmart your opponents to achieve victory!

road-to-golflantis.name: Road to Golflantis
road-to-golflantis.description: Road to Golflantis is an adventurous golf game where you guide your ball to discover the lost city of Golflantis. Navigate through randomized underwater courses, collect over 30 unique golf balls, and uncover mysterious artifacts. With three distinct underwater areas and numerous quests, you'll enjoy epic shots and intriguing golf facts on your quest.

demolition-derby-3.name: Demolition Derby 3
demolition-derby-3.description: Demolition Derby 3 is a thrilling car game offering open-world driving and multiplayer modes. Choose from 100 vehicles, upgrade performance, and customize your ride. Enjoy 20+ tracks and demolition arenas, daily rewards, and first-person driving!

bell-madness.name: Bell Madness
bell-madness.description: Bell Madness is a fun, casual game in which you test your neighbor's patience with playful antics. Knock on doors, ring doorbells, and tap on windows to witness hilarious reactions from unsuspecting neighbors. The more pranks you pull off, the more coins you earn. Use your hard-earned coins to unlock a variety of quirky doorbells with unique and amusing sounds. Plus, buy hints to uncover even more delightful surprises. It’s a prankster's paradise where laughter and fun are just a doorbell ring away!
bell-madness.faq:
How do you make the neighbor come out in Bell Madness?

There are various ways to make the neighbor come out of the house in Bell Madness, but the goal is to irritate him enough to do so. Ring the bell and knock on the door till the anger barometer hits red. You can also ask for hints to know exactly how to get a reaction.

Is Bell Madness a multiplayer game?

Bell Madness is a single-player game.
bell-madness.how_to_play:
Your goal is to prank your neighbor and get as many different reactions as possible from him and his wife. If you don't taunt them enough, they only peek through the window or the mail hole and don’t come to the door. Sometimes, they get angry and stomp their feet up and down as they come to the door, or they smear their lipstick from sheer aggravation. In one reaction, they become so furious they turn into a Medusa-like character and turn to stone!

You might even witness a golden cup being randomly thrown out the door. They could also yell out their window in frustration. By buying hints, you can discover more about what actions to take to provoke these reactions. There’s even a reaction involving a cheating partner.

Sometimes, the character gets locked out of the house and has to crawl through a window. After a shower, you might see a towel falling off, or he could get squirted in the face with a hose. In another hilarious scenario, the house itself turns into a monster! And occasionally, a man will hold up a "Get Off" sign in response to your antics.

Some of the reactions include your neighbor or his wife:

  • Peeking through the window but not coming to the door.
  • Peeking through the mail hole but not opening the door.
  • Coming to the door, fuming and stomping their feet.
  • Coming to the door, they accidentally smeared their lipstick from aggravation.
  • Turning into a Medusa-like character and turning to stone.
  • Randomly throwing a golden cup out the door.
  • Yelling out the window.
  • Cheating partner reaction where the husband finds a love letter in the mailbox and the wife drags him back in by his ear.
  • Getting locked out of the house and crawling through a window.
  • Coming from the shower in a towel that soon falls.
  • Getting squirted in the face with a hose.
  • The house turns into a monster.
  • Holding up a "Get Off" sign.

Buy hints with rewards

It's difficult to know how to get a big reaction. You have a limited number of ways to do so, such as ringing the doorbell, knocking on the door, or playing with the post box or the water tap. You can buy hints with your reward points. The hints will tell you exactly what to do to get a reaction.

breaking-fall-epic-bone-blast.name: Breaking Fall: Epic Bone Blast
breaking-fall-epic-bone-blast.description: Breaking Fall: Epic Bone Blast is a stress-relief game where you hurl a character off various high places to cause maximum damage. Aim for the perfect angle to break as many bones as possible and earn points. Unlock new characters and experience the ultimate satisfaction with each destructive fall.

travel-with-me-asmr-edition.name: Travel with Me: ASMR Edition
travel-with-me-asmr-edition.description: Travel with Me: ASMR Edition is a dress-up game where you join stylish vlogger Lisa on a global adventure. From Thailand's serene temples to Dubai's desert escapades and the Maldives' tropical paradise, dress her in fabulous outfits that match each stunning destination. Challenge your fashion skills, immerse yourself in calming ASMR sounds, and create unforgettable looks. Let your imagination soar in this unique dress-up game designed for fashion lovers!

gt-cars-mega-ramps.name: GT Cars Mega Ramps
gt-cars-mega-ramps.description: GT Cars Mega Ramps is an exciting driving car game that puts you behind the wheel of fully customizable super-sport cars, featuring heart-stopping mega ramps, vibrant giant bosses, and intense head-to-head races. Experience a one-of-a-kind adventure as you launch yourself off towering ramps, execute daring stunts, and outmaneuver colossal bosses in electrifying showdowns. With stylized cars and thrilling gameplay, you’ll race to conquer the ultimate title of driver extraordinaire.
gt-cars-mega-ramps.faq:
What does GT stand for on cars?

GT is an acronym for grand tourer or gran tourer, which is typical of high-speed luxury cars designed for long distances.

Is it gran tourer or gran turismo?

Gran tourer is a translation of the Italian term gran turismo.
gt-cars-mega-ramps.controls:
1 Player Mode

  • WASD / arrow keys = move
  • L-Shift = NOS
  • R = reset car position
  • C = change camera view

2 Players Mode

Player 1

  • WASD = move
  • L-Shift = NOS
  • R = reset car position
  • C = change camera view

Player 2

  • Arrow keys = move
  • N = NOS
  • L = reset car position
  • U = change camera view
gt-cars-mega-ramps.how_to_play:
GT Cars Mega Ramps offers three exhilarating game modes: Face to Face, Mega Ramps, and Color Lands. Choose between single-player and two-player options, allowing for competitive racing fun with customizable exotic super-sport cars that you can tweak to your liking. Adjust the color panel, window tint, wheel designs, and light colors to make your vehicle truly unique.

In Face to Face mode, you and your opponent race side by side, but don’t let the simplicity fool you. This isn’t just a regular race; if one car crashes, the debris can take you down at full speed, resulting in an instant game over. Stay alert and swerve wisely, or you risk tumbling off the cliff's edge!

Color Lands presents a vibrant challenge as you navigate through roads resembling colorful Lego blocks. Obstacles lurk at every turn, and if you’re not careful, slowing down could send you spiraling into an abyss.

Mega Ramps is the ultimate test of your driving skills, packed with high-speed thrills and perilous obstacles. Dodge enormous rolling balls threatening to crush you and navigate walls made of crates and geometric shapes flying at you from all directions. It’s a wild ride that requires quick reflexes and sharp focus—so buckle up and prepare for an unforgettable experience!

kick-the-noobik-3d.name: Kick the Noobik 3D
kick-the-noobik-3d.description: Kick the Noobik 3D is a casual game where you unleash your creativity by smashing, slicing, blowing up, and incinerating a character named Noobik. Use an endless arsenal, from rockets and swords to machine guns and torture devices. With vibrant Minecraft-inspired visuals, a realistic physics engine, and dynamic sound effects, relieve your stress in style!

escape-from-prison-multiplayer.name: Escape From Prison Multiplayer
escape-from-prison-multiplayer.description: Escape From Prison Multiplayer is a thrilling multiplayer platformer game where your mission is to make a daring escape from prison! Customize your brave little mouse and race against time to break out. Each room you conquer brings you closer to freedom, but watch out for the dangerous traps and obstacles in your way! Can you outsmart the prison's challenges and make a successful escape? Test your skills and find out if you have what it takes to flee from prison!

jetski-boat-racing-boat-games.name: Jetski Boat Racing: Boat Games
jetski-boat-racing-boat-games.description: Jet Ski Boat Racing is a thrilling water racing game that combines the excitement of jet ski and boat racing. Compete against opponents in various 3D environments, performing extreme stunts and navigating challenging tracks. With diverse missions, customizable jet skis, and stunning sound effects, this game offers an immersive and exhilarating experience for water sports enthusiasts.

satisfying-ball-clicker.name: Satisfying Ball Clicker
satisfying-ball-clicker.description: Satisfying Ball Clicker is an incremental clicker game in which the goal is to spawn vibrant, bouncing balls inside rotating circles. As the balls ricochet around the circle, they transform into dazzling colors, adding to the mesmerizing chaos. Each ball that escapes the circle and falls brings valuable rewards, which you can use to unlock powerful upgrades. The more you play, the more satisfying it becomes to watch your ever-growing collection of colorful balls bounce, collide, and evolve.
satisfying-ball-clicker.faq:
What are those clicker games called?

There are plenty of clicker games available at CrazyGames; one such popular title includes Satisfying Ball Clicker.

What is the most fun clicker game?

There are plenty of fun clicker games, and the most fun depends on what you're looking for, but there is one in particular—Satisfying Ball Clicker—which is fun and satisfying!
satisfying-ball-clicker.controls: Use the left mouse button to play the game.
satisfying-ball-clicker.how_to_play:
You will begin Satisfying Ball Clicker with a circle right in the center of the screen, which has a small gap—an essential detail for your strategy. Your goal is to click and generate balls within this circle. You’ll start with a limited supply of balls, but they can gradually increase over time. The key is to keep as many balls bouncing inside the circle as possible, as each bounce increases their value. However, the circle rotates unpredictably, and the balls won’t always stay where you want them, making it tricky to control their movements.

As you advance through the game, watch for opportunities to supercharge your ball supply and skyrocket your earnings. Spot an x3 multiplier? Don’t hesitate—click it to triple your bounce points for a limited time instantly. From there, aim your balls with precision to hit the most valuable sections of the circle, racking up massive points and taking your score to new heights!

You’ll have the option to upgrade different elements, including adding more balls, boosting your income, widening the gap, or even creating additional circles. Each upgrade is locked until you’ve earned enough points, so strategy is key to unlocking more powerful features.

As the game advances, the difficulty ramps up. You'll encounter multiple rotating circles and balls that move faster with each level, challenging you to master timing, placement, and the physics of their bouncing patterns.

prison-break-architect-tycoon.name: Prison Break: Architect Tycoon
prison-break-architect-tycoon.description: Prison Break: Architect Tycoon is an action game in which you are the main prison guard tasked with securing the prison. Your job is to ensure that no prisoners can escape or, worse, kill you, leading to a game over. You start with an empty prison and transform it into a secure facility. Build inmate cells, reinforce doors, install surveillance cameras, and recruit additional guards. Improve your warden to handle a larger population of prisoners efficiently. Each facility offers unique challenges, providing a captivating experience for players of all ages.
prison-break-architect-tycoon.faq:
Is Prison Architect a tycoon game?

Yes, Prison Break: Architect Tycoon is a tycoon game where you start with an empty prison and transform it into a secure facility filled with facilities, guards, and prisoners.

Who made the game Prison Architect?

Prison Break: Architect Tycoon was developed by Square Dino.
prison-break-architect-tycoon.controls: Use WASD or arrow keys or hold and drag the left mouse button in the desired direction.
prison-break-architect-tycoon.how_to_play:
The game starts with you as a security guard in a prison, requiring plenty of work. There are few jail cells with doors and no toilets, and the prison is in dire need of handcuffs and leg shackles, just in case of a prison break! You aim to keep up with the number of prisoners that are detained, increasing your security staff along with administrative staff and collect as much money as possible to make this all happen!

Prison Break Battle

The game is broken up into "days". Each day is defined by a battle - or a potential prison break. There is a green button on the side of the screen labeled battle. Tap it for the final challenge of the day, where all prisoners escape, and the only thing you can do to protect yourself is neutralize them into submission and carry them back off to their cells. This will not only get you to the next day but will also give you a hefty jackpot of rewards if you survive the prison break!

It is vital that you spend your money wisely to survive these prison breaks. Increase security to the max by adding the heaviest shackles and most secure handcuffs and upgrading your weapon as much as you can afford. This will ensure you can out beat the prison break, especially when you are further along, and multiple cells are filled to capacity. It's impossible to defeat the prisoners otherwise.

Hire more staff

The further along you are in days, and the more money you have collected and reinstated in prison repairs, the more security guards you will need and be able to hire. Your security guards will fight prison breaks right alongside you.

Not all prisoners are alike

Spend your money on repairs for current prisoners and in preparation for future prisoners. Most prisoners are of average strength and capacity, but the more you progress in the game, the more interesting your prisoners become. They will eventually come in all shapes and sizes and will have difficult combat skills. Get your upgrades at the front office in capacity, speed, and strength. You can also upgrade your weapon, which is strongly recommended.

octopusrun.name: OctopusRun
octopusrun.description: Octopus Run is an underwater runner game where you control a powerful octopus navigating the ocean's depths. Hunt divers and fish, dodge obstacles, and collect money to upgrade your abilities and attacks. Dive into this thrilling aquatic adventure and become the ultimate predator of the sea!

cannon-pirates-multiplayer.name: Cannon Pirates Multiplayer
cannon-pirates-multiplayer.description: Cannon Pirates Multiplayer is a game where you, as a pirate, must reach the treasure island by jumping between platforms using your cannon. Shoot downwards to propel yourself, navigate between barrels and platforms, and avoid obstacles. Test your skills to find the hidden treasure!

racing-unlimited.name: Racing Unlimited
racing-unlimited.description: Racing Unlimited is a driving game where you unleash the speed demon within! Choose from 15 turbocharged cars, each with unique performance. Race through neon-lit cities, twisty mountains, and sunny beaches. Customize your ride with vibrant colors, decals, and fine-tuning for optimal performance. Enjoy multiple modes: Career, Time Trials, and Endless Traffic. Burn rubber, outpace rivals, and become the ultimate street legend!

fall-ball-clicker.name: Fall Ball Clicker
fall-ball-clicker.description: Fall Ball Clicker is a thrilling game where you create unique balls to drop through zones filled with obstacles. Collect coins as you navigate through challenging levels, unlocking new stages and upgrades. Enhance your balls and zones to maximize your success and tackle various tasks to level up and earn valuable bonuses.

hypemaster.name: HypeMaster
hypemaster.description: Hype Master is a dynamic social simulation where you star in a high-stakes reality TV show. Navigate gossip, form alliances, and tackle challenges to outshine rivals and win viewers' hearts. Manage relationships, use rumors wisely, and adapt to public perception to secure victory. Your choices shape multiple possible endings in this thrilling game.

taxi-rush.name: Taxi Rush
taxi-rush.description: Taxi Rush is a driving simulation game where you race through city streets to deliver clients swiftly and safely. Navigate dense traffic, avoid roadblocks, and manage unique passenger demands to earn rewards. Upgrade and customize your taxi, strategize your routes, and climb the leaderboard to become the ultimate taxi driver in this dynamic urban adventure.

gumball-drop.name: Gumball Drop
gumball-drop.description: Gumball Drop is a 3D casual game that will have you hooked from the very first drop! Take control of a delightful gumball as it rolls forward on an exciting adventure through a whimsical world filled with colorful balls, tubes, and endless fun. Your objective is simple: collect as many balls as possible along the way and create the most impressive gumball chain imaginable!

merge-knights.name: Merge Knights!
merge-knights.description: Merge Knights! is a casual merge game where you strategically combine archers and knights on your battlefield to fight against enemies. Use your merging skills to strengthen your army and become an unstoppable force. Aim to become the ultimate merge master and lead your army to victory!

airline-tycoon-idle.name: Airline Tycoon Idle
airline-tycoon-idle.description: Airline Tycoon Idle is a clicker management game where you take control of the skies as you build and manage your very own airline empire! Start small with just a handful of planes and airports, then strategically expand by treating travelers to lavish VIP lounges, purchasing state-of-the-art planes, and expanding to international airports. Like most management games, you can't do all the work yourself. Hire skilled managers to automate your flights, upgrade your fleet to maximize efficiency, and ensure top-tier passenger satisfaction. Unlock powerful bonuses and climb the ranks to airline tycoon!
airline-tycoon-idle.faq:
How much do tickets cost in Airline Tycoon Idle?

Tickets in Airline Tycoon Idle vary in cost depending on factors similar to real flights, such as departure airport and destination, seat capacity, and more.

How much does an airplane cost in Airline Tycoon Idle?

An airplane in Airline Tycoon Idle costs $5000.

How many cities can you own airports in Airline Tycoon Idle?

You can have airports in 50 cities in Airline Tycoon Idle.
airline-tycoon-idle.controls:
• Click on an airport to view the possible trips
  • Send airplanes on trips to earn money
  • Upgrade airplanes, airports and lounges
  • Prestige when you transport enough passengers to get a permanent ticket price multiplier
airline-tycoon-idle.how_to_play:
Your objective in Idle Airline Tycoon is to transform a small operation into a global airline fleet. Start with a modest amount of airplanes, two to be exact, with limited destinations, but soon you'll be connecting dozens of cities worldwide.

Gameplay is simple and made to keep you engaged (and relaxed!) as you click your fleet to take off as often as possible, driving up revenue and unlocking more upgrades. Fly as much as you can, and you will soon find yourself upgrading your airports and planes to gradually grow your airline empire.

Purchasing a new airplane will set you back around $5,000, but it's a crucial step in expanding your airline. To gather the necessary funds, you'll need to fly your planes to the initial routes offered, like Rome, London, and New York, running consistent flights to build up your earnings. The goal is to master these routes and venture into new cities, steadily growing your airline’s reach. Every flight you run brings you closer to unlocking more destinations,

Each choice you make shapes your airline’s success—expand air routes, optimize flight paths, and invest in airport upgrades to attract more passengers and increase your earnings.

The game combines strategy with the ease of idle gameplay, allowing you to earn profits with a click. But don’t just sit back—efficient management is key. Carefully plan your routes between cities to ensure smooth operations and steady profits, avoiding costly mistakes that could disrupt your flights.

Bon voyage!

magic-finger-3d.name: Magic Finger 3D
magic-finger-3d.description: Magic Finger 3D is a casual physics game where you use your magical powers to defeat alien foes creatively. Use your magic touch to throw enemies at each other, utilize explosive barrels for big impacts, and send adversaries off platforms. Control your surroundings by picking up and manipulating objects, becoming the ultimate magic user.
magic-finger-3d.controls:
• Left mouse to hold and drag to pick up enemies and items
  • Left mouse release to throw
magic-finger-3d.how_to_play:
Your mission in Magic Finger 3D is to clear the ground of pesky aliens using your powerful magic finger! Flick them off the edge, zap them with bombs, or even hurl objects at them—whatever it takes to wipe them out.

The first round is a breeze, just a warm-up with a single alien. But don’t get too comfortable—things heat up quickly! By round two, you'll be juggling multiple aliens, and by round three, they’re getting sneaky, hiding out and running for cover. Oh, and by level 9, those crafty aliens start shooting back, so take out the gun-toting ones first!

Level 11 turns up the intensity with endless waves of aliens and a helicopter that swoops in, firing missiles. Take down that chopper fast, but don’t let your guard down—there’s always another battle around the corner.

When you hit level 25, giant aliens join the fray, demanding extra effort to defeat. You'll need to throw multiple objects to bring these behemoths down. And for a fun twist, level 27 transports you to the beach, where instead of tossing aliens off cliffs, you’ll send them splashing into the water. Apparently, aliens can't swim, so keep chucking them in the water.

The further you advance in levels, the more powerful your magic finger will become. You can kill aliens without even throwing them off the edge.

Flick, throw, and blast through each thrilling round as they get more and more challenging!

Tip

Aim for a few double kills! Pick the perfect-sized object and line up your shot to take out multiple aliens in one go. You can also let them gather together for a bigger hit, but don’t wait too long—timing is everything!

sweet-and-fruity-makeup.name: Sweet And Fruity Makeup
sweet-and-fruity-makeup.description: Sweet And Fruity Makeup is a makeup game where you dive into a vibrant palette inspired by juicy fruits. Experiment with luscious watermelon pinks, zesty lemon yellows, and tangy orange hues. Use fruity lip glosses, shimmering eyeshadows, and blushes to create stunning looks. Mix and match fragrances for a fresh, stylish finish in this delightful makeover adventure!

splatmans.name: Splatmans
splatmans.description: Splatmans is a casual 2-player shooting game where two stickmen duke it out in a colorful arena. Your goal in this third-person shooter game is to cover as much ground as possible before time runs out. Battle it out with the computer or play against a friend in a competitive match filled with colorful chaos. With unique paint types, diverse game modes, and rapid-fire action, Splatmans delivers an exciting and highly competitive experience that will keep you and your friends on your toes!
splatmans.faq:
How do you play the Splatmans game?

The goal of Splatmans is to shoot your opponent with paint and take them down before they take you down.

How do you shoot in Splatmans?

Aim at your target, and your paint weapon will automatically shoot in Splatmans, so angles and where you are standing are very important to win the game.
splatmans.controls:
• Single mode = WASD / arrow keys / virtual joystick to move
  • Coop mode = WASD for Player 1 and arrow keys for Player 2 to move
  • Left mouse button = interact with the in-game UI
splatmans.how_to_play:
Your goal in Splatman is to outmaneuver and defeat your opponents in a tight arena by ambushing them with high-speed paint blasts from your weapon. You start by choosing the number of players on your team—you can go solo or team up with a partner, both playing from the same keyboard. If you're feeling bold, you can even control both characters yourself to double the challenge!

Once you enter the arena, don't stay in one spot for too long. Like any great arena game, offense is key, so keep moving to gain the upper hand. Try to corner your opponents, but remember—staying on the move makes you a harder target. If you find yourself on the defensive, use obstacles in the center of the arena to avoid direct hits.

Customize your gameplay by upgrading to new paint colors or more powerful paint guns. As you accumulate rewards and points, you'll unlock better equipment, with upgrades starting at 2,000 coins. It may take a few games to build up enough currency, but the right upgrades can significantly boost your chances of victory.

Keep an eye on key stats like health, damage, and rate of fire to see where you might need an upgrade. If your fire rate is slowing you down, consider investing in a faster, more powerful paint gun to dominate the competition!

struckd---3d-game-creator.name: Struckd - 3D Game Creator
struckd---3d-game-creator.description: Struckd - 3D Game Creator is a cutting-edge casual game platform that allows for the creation and enjoyment of games within a global community. Become part of the rapidly expanding network and craft unique games or explore thousands of user-generated titles from over 150 countries.
struckd---3d-game-creator.faq:
How to make a game in Struckd 3D Game Creator?

Create games in Struckd 3D Game Creator by exploring a variety of objects to add to your game. Drag and drop, add to your game, and create your environment.

What is the age rating for Struckd 3D game creator?

Struckd 3D Game Creator is appropriate for children ages 12 and up.
struckd---3d-game-creator.controls:
Editor

  • Left mouse button = select
  • Hold the right mouse button = look around
  • Scroll mouse wheel = zoom
  • WASD = move
  • Tab = hide instructions

Player:

  • WASD = move
  • E = interact
  • B = inventory
  • Shift = fash
  • 1,2,3,4 = use items
  • Space = jump
struckd---3d-game-creator.how_to_play:
Struckd—3D Game Creator doesn’t require any coding skills! It is like a game engine or editor for 3D games or modes on the web. With an intuitive drag-and-drop interface designed for web creators, this studio empowers anyone to become a game maker.

Select from over 1,500 free assets to build whatever you can envision. Mix and match assets to create something unique, and watch your games gain plays and likes from the community, marking your progress as a game creator. Now is the perfect time to bring your ideas to life! Who knows—your creation could become the next viral 3D game sensation!

Drag-and-Drop Game Creation Technology

Struckd makes game creation accessible to everyone with its intuitive drag-and-drop interface. This technology allows users to place and arrange game elements effortlessly, making it easy to design unique levels and environments without any coding experience.

Personalize Your Game

Add a personal touch by creating dialogues and customizing the game to reflect your style. Adjust the stats of your assets, such as attack power, movement speed, and health, to create gameplay that suits your vision.

Share and Play Globally

Once your game is ready, share it with the world. Struckd allows you to publish your creation globally, attracting players from around the globe. You can also dive into multiplayer mode to play your game with friends or join others in their creative worlds.

Vast Library of Free Assets

With over 1,500 free assets at your disposal, the possibilities are endless. Choose from characters, heroes, animals, robots, vehicles, landscapes, and more to bring your game to life. Whether you’re building a bustling city, a mysterious dungeon, or an alien planet, Struckd provides the tools to make your vision a reality.

Popular Game Mechanics and Custom Gameplay

Struckd supports a wide range of game mechanics, allowing you to create everything from fast-paced racers and thrilling adventures to physics puzzles and RPGs. If you have a unique idea, you can invent your gameplay style and see how it resonates with the community.

Explore Amazing 3D Worlds

Immerse yourself in stunning virtual environments, from pirate-filled waters to dense forests, alien planets, deserts, and even prehistoric landscapes with dinosaurs. Struckd offers a wide variety of settings to explore, ensuring that each game is a new and exciting experience.

doomr-io.name: Doomr.io
doomr-io.description: Doomr.io is a 3D post-apocalyptic shooter where survival is a relentless battle. After a devastating nuclear war, few human survivors remain. Mutants roam the desolate world, posing constant threats. Armed with powerful weapons and gear, you must fight through hordes of mutants in a constant struggle for survival. Only the strongest and most resourceful will endure in this unforgiving wasteland. You can hang out in safe zones to gear up, trade, and rest. Head to Survival Mode for PVE and to earn gear and items.

hide-and-build-a-bridge.name: Hide and Build a Bridge!
hide-and-build-a-bridge.description: Hide and Build a Bridge is a thrilling game where your objective is to gather blocks and construct a bridge to reach the portal. Strategize with other players to collect materials while evading the seeker who can destroy your progress. Use stealth, teamwork, and quick thinking to succeed in this exciting race to the finish!

hook-arena.name: Hook Arena
hook-arena.description: Hook Arena is an action-packed game where you battle the opponents on opposite sides of a river using unique hook weapons. Your objective is to hook enemies to eliminate them one by one, pull in beneficial rune bottles, or escape by hooking yourself to a physical support like a pole. Before the match, you can choose your team's color, upgrade your character, and change their skin and weapon. In the treasure menu, you can hack and open chests with both a chest and a key. Who knows what secrets they hold, but all items will be placed in your inventory. Fight in matches, earn trophies, and climb the leaderboard rankings. Good luck in the battle!

dungeon-deck.name: Dungeon Deck
dungeon-deck.description: Dungeon Deck is a card battle game where strategy is key to victory. This is a unique take on the roguelike dungeon crawler! Explore a procedural dungeon in the form of a deck of cards. Collect unique and powerful weapons, and defeat cute enemies by creating your own deck. Each game is different, encouraging you to try various combinations of cards and abilities to create the most powerful deck possible!

soccer-clicker.name: Soccer Clicker
soccer-clicker.description: Soccer Clicker is a clicker game that puts you in charge of your own soccer club. Build a dream team by recruiting players with unique skills, upgrading your facilities, and managing finances to fund your ambitions. Lead your team to victory across prestigious leagues, unlock achievements, and experience the excitement of soccer management like never before!

car-flip.name: Car Flip!
car-flip.description: Car Flip is a casual driving game that takes you on a wild joy ride with friends with one simple mission -- flip your car as much as possible before heading to the parking lot. Launch your car into the air by picking the perfect jump angle, then go for epic flips to snag coins mid-flight. Rack up your loot to unlock awesome new cars and quirky drivers. Put your driving skills to the test across all the levels and show everyone your flipping finesse!
car-flip.faq:
What is the car game where you do flips?

Car Flip is a casual driving game where you main objective is to do as many flips as possible before getting your car back to the parking lot.

What is the game where you flip over cars?

Car Flip is a fun game where you flip over any object that comes your way, including ramps, trampolines, cars, and more.
car-flip.controls: Hold the left mouse button to flip.

monster-puzzle.name: Monster Puzzle
monster-puzzle.description: Monster Puzzle is a driving game where you collect puzzle pieces in the arena in order to unlock new elements and new vehicles in the arena. The game strikes a balance between being neither too complicated nor too easy. Perform stunts with the monster trucks to grab targets. Each truck has unique physical options, so find the one that suits your style. Once all elements and vehicles are unlocked, maps remain in free mode. For optimal control of the gas and camera, a gamepad is recommended.

mage-vs-monsters.name: Mage vs Monsters
mage-vs-monsters.description: Mage vs Monsters is a casual game where you step into the shoes of a powerful mage who must fend off hordes of menacing monsters! Use a variety of spells to battle these creatures and collect valuable resources like mushrooms and plants. These resources can be used to craft potions that will aid you in your fight. With every wave of monsters, sharpen your magical skills, experiment with different spell combinations, and concoct potent potions to ensure your victory. Get ready for an enchanting adventure full of magic and mayhem!

stick-crush.name: Stick Crush
stick-crush.description: Stick Crush is an exhilarating casual physics game that tests your reactions and skills! Start by revving your car, crashing into obstacles, and launching your stick character into the sky. Once airborne, navigate challenges, dodge obstacles, and take down enemies with precise maneuvers.
stick-crush.faq:
What is the name of the game with stickman?

There are plenty of stickman games, including Stick Crush where you earn rewards by crashing your vehicle and sending your stickman as far as possible. Other series include the popular Henry Stickmin escape series.

How do you earn rewards in Stick Crush?

You earn rewards in Stick Crush by throwing your stickman as far as possible. The further the stickman lands, the more rewards you earn.
stick-crush.controls:
• W / up arrow key = accelerate
  • Space = aim and release for flight direction
  • R = quick restart
stick-crush.how_to_play:
With its fast-paced gameplay, exciting levels, and plenty of hilarious moments, Stick Crush offers endless fun and adrenaline. Your aim is to master the timing and strategy needed to project your ragdoll character far enough out of your vehicle and collect reward points based on distance. The more points you collect, the more challenging your course will become, advancing the fun.

You will need to play rounds multiple times in order to accumulate rewards. Each new challenge is costly so focus on earning. You will likely spend some time on the first round of First Blood and enough money to crash your way to the final round -- Burn!

  • Boxes, $1000
  • Basketball, $2000
  • Pyramid, $5000
  • Wall, $7000
  • Football, $10000
  • Kamikazee, $15000
  • Dart, $20000
  • Rings, $30000
  • Puppets, $40000
  • Into Fire, $50000
  • Burn!, $60000

Choose Your Stick Crush Ride

In Stick Crush, the thrill of the game begins with selecting your perfect ride. Whether tearing through the city streets or taking on challenging terrains, the vehicle you choose will set the tone for your adventure. Each option has its own strengths, so pick wisely to match your style and the obstacles ahead.

Car - Coupe

If you're looking for a balanced ride, the Coupe is your go-to. With a top speed of 60 mph, a mass of 1200, suspension rated at 10, and a power output of 100, this car offers a smooth and steady drive, making it ideal for those who like a mix of speed and control.

Pickup Truck

Need something that packs a punch? The Pickup is built for power, with a top speed of 60 mph, a hefty mass of 1800, suspension rated at 4, and an impressive 150 power. It's perfect for players who want to muscle through obstacles and leave a trail of destruction behind.

Motorcycle

For those who crave speed and agility, the motorcycle is the ultimate choice. This lightweight machine boasts a top speed of 90 mph, a mass of just 350, suspension rated at 3, and a power output of 50. It's all about zipping past obstacles and outmaneuvering your opponents.

Police Car

Channel your inner law enforcer with the Police Car. With a top speed of 75 mph, a mass of 1200, suspension rated at 7, and a power output of 120, this vehicle strikes a balance between speed, control, and authority, making it a versatile option for any challenge.

Cabriolet

Ready to feel the wind in your hair? The Cabriolet offers a thrilling ride with a top speed of 90 mph, a mass of 1500, suspension rated at 15, and a powerful 150 under the hood. It's the perfect blend of style and substance, ideal for those who want to race in luxury.

village-of-heroes-roguelike-td.name: Village of Heroes: Roguelike TD
village-of-heroes-roguelike-td.description: Village of Heroes: Roguelike TD is a roguelike tower defense game that blends strategic gameplay with thrilling adventure. Assemble a team of legendary heroes to defend your village from relentless monster invasions. Choose from various heroes, each with unique abilities and roles. Place your heroes wisely and manage your resources to survive against the odds. Build and upgrade your village to unlock new heroes and enhance your defenses. Enjoy the unpredictable and ever-changing challenges that make each run unique. Experience the strategic depth of placing and upgrading your heroes to fend off relentless enemies. Have fun on an unforgettable adventure! Defend your village, recruit legendary heroes, and conquer the monstrous hordes today!

buggy-kart-racing.name: Buggy Kart Racing
buggy-kart-racing.description: Buggy Kart Racing is an exhilarating experience where you race on impossible tracks high in the sky. Customize your cars for high-speed stunts, tackle dangerous obstacles, and prove yourself as the ultimate ramp master. Experience stunning graphics, realistic physics, and thrilling jumps as you conquer challenging levels and showcase your stunt-driving skills.

empire-city.name: Empire City
empire-city.description: Empire City is a casual management game where you strategically construct and govern a thriving empire from nothing. Build magnificent cities, develop resources, and create a unique culture while engaging in trade and diplomacy. Expand your influence, make historic discoveries, and craft wonders that will be remembered for centuries. Your choices shape the future of your empire: lead wisely!
empire-city.faq:
Is the Empire City game offline?

You can play Empire City online at CrazyGames.

What are the tips and tricks for Empire City?

Follow the guidance of Flavius and Julia to care for your community - they are there to support you throughout the journey whenever you need help.
empire-city.controls: Use the left mouse button to play and interact with all the in-game buttons.
empire-city.how_to_play:
Empire City is a classic management game set in ancient times where you get to build an entire city, including roadways, residential homes, waterways, workshops, and more -- all from a blank slate with a bit of help from two close advisors: Julia and Flavius.

The game starts with a full intro from Julia and Flavius, which will walk you through step by step how to build your city. Once you have the hang of it, you're on your own. But not to worry, help from your advisors is just a click away.

Julia and Flavius guide you through the following directions:

Julia: "Welcome to the city, Prefect! I’m Julia. I run an inn here, and I know everything about everyone. This is Flavius, the architect."

Flavius: "My projects can do the talking for me! The first one is a residential building. Let’s get to work!"

Julia: "Remember, every building in the city must be connected to a road."

Action: You get to build a road.

Flavius: "Congratulations, Prefect! The building is ready. We can house people in it now."

Julia: "People?! There’s barely room for one citizen. The building needs to be upgraded."

Action: Build a house.

Flavius: "Prefect, we have a problem. We need clay to make the house more spacious, but it’s mined outside the city."

Julia: "If it’s even mined at all! The clay quarry is in bad shape, and the tool storage is totally dilapidated. But our Prefect can solve that, right?"

Action: Fix the clay quarry.

Julia: "Now we can hire a manager! But that can happen later. First, we need to build a road to deliver the clay to the city."

Action: Build a road.

Flavius: "The road is wonderful, Prefect! Collect the mined clay, and my people will deliver it to the construction site right away."

Action: Collect the clay.

Flavius: "Thank you for the help. I’ll get to work upgrading the house right now!"

Julia: "You and Flavius are doing wonderfully! Let’s upgrade another house. It could use a second floor, with a good view of the city."

Flavius: "Regular clay isn’t enough to build another floor. This requires a sturdier material, such as clay mixture."

Julia: "Alas, this material isn’t produced in our city. Although the Prefect could give orders to build a special workshop."

Julia: "If you don’t want to wait, use gems! Their shine speeds up any project. The first time is free, though."

Action: Use gems.

Flavius: "Very grand, Prefect. Now we won’t lack building materials. Give the order to produce clay mixture."

Julia: "Production can take a long time. When it ends, a clay mixture icon will appear above the workshop."

Action: Wait for production to finish.

Flavius: "It’s ready, Prefect! Tap the icon to move the mixture to the warehouse."

Action: Move the mixture to the warehouse.

Julia: "So, are we going to upgrade the house or just pretend that it’s intentionally unfinished?"

Flavius: "Please accept this scroll. I sketched out some improvements. Remember, Prefect, Julia and I are always here to support you!"

You're on your own after this training. Continue building your empire and make Julia and Flavius proud, Prefect!

epic-empire-tower-defense.name: Epic Empire: Tower Defense
epic-empire-tower-defense.description: Epic Empire: Tower Defense is a thrilling strategy game where you command powerful heroes and towers to protect your kingdom from waves of evil forces. Embark on an epic adventure through vibrant worlds, from frozen kingdom, soaring magical kingdoms, dark underground tunnels, and enchanted florists. Face unique challenges worldwide as you battle to reclaim territories overrun by enemies.

force-drift-racing-aussie-burnout.name: Force Drift Racing: Aussie Burnout
force-drift-racing-aussie-burnout.description: Force Drift Racing: Aussie Burnout is a thrilling car drift simulator offering an authentic driving experience with realistic physics. Customize and tune your cars to master drift racing across stunningly detailed tracks. Show off your unique rides in showcase mode, explore diverse maps, and choose from a variety of cars to challenge your skills and dominate the race.

demolition-derby-2.name: Demolition Derby 2
demolition-derby-2.description: Demolition Derby 2 is an adrenaline-fueled driving game that puts you behind the wheel in a high-stakes battle for survival. Inspired by the chaotic excitement of demolition derbies across the globe, this game challenges you to smash, crash, and obliterate your rivals’ cars in a brutal quest for victory. Each match is a no-holds-barred competition where strategy meets sheer mayhem. Whether you’re slamming into opponents at full speed or maneuvering through wreckage to deliver the final blow, the intense action and bone-crushing collisions keep you on the edge of your seat. The goal is to outlast your competitors and reign supreme.
demolition-derby-2.faq:
When did Demolition Derby 2 come out?

Demolition Derby 2 came out in August 2024 and was developed by BeerMoneyGames.

Where can I play Demotion Derby?

You can play Demolition Derby 2 and Demolition Derby 3 at CrazyGames.
demolition-derby-2.controls:
• WASD / arrow keys = drive
  • Shift = boost (when NOS is already bought)
  • C = change camera
demolition-derby-2.how_to_play:
In Demolition Derby 2, your main objective is to survive the carnage by obliterating your opponents’ cars before they destroy yours. Jump into the driver's seat and start with a test drive to get yourself into the car of your choice. Practice both your offensive and defensive tactics so you can cause the maximum damage with minimal damage to your own vehicle.

You will start with the Tiny Classic car. Doesn't sound too intimidating, but you will need to work your way up to upgrades through various rides and crashes. The more damage you deal, the longer your gameplay and the better the rewards.

There are six classes of cars to choose from. You will begin in class 0, but with a bit of practice and a lot of teeth-gritting, you can slowly work your way to unlocking upgrades to truly feel the power of vehicular destruction.

Demolition Derby 2 Car Classes

Class 0

  • Tiny Classic
  • Compact Retro, 2,000 coins
  • Trio, 7,500 coins
  • Compact Sport, 18,000 coins
  • 38 Hotrod, 20,000 coins
  • Apollo, 25,000 coins
  • Jinn, 100,000 coins

  • Mullaro Classic, 20,000 coins
  • Marshal, 22,500 coins

  • Zegato, 25,000 coins

  • Havana, 20,000 coins
  • Bandit Classic, 30,000 coins

Class 2

  • Victora Taxi, 10,000 coins
  • Duke Classic, 15,000 coins
  • Duke Wagon, 17,500 coins
  • Classic Taxi, 20,000 coins
  • Stranger, 30,000 coins
  • Police Car, 40,000 coins
  • Sedan, 40,000 coins

Class 3

  • Howler, 18,000 coins
  • Bovidae, 19,500 coins
  • Decagon Full, 20,000 coins
  • Decagon Pickup, 30,000 coins
  • Van, 30,000 coins
  • SUV, 25,000 coins
  • Hammer, 30,000 coins

Class 4

  • Kitt Retro, 7,500 coins
  • Stockcar Retro, 25,000 coins
  • Colt, 23,000 coins
  • Stinger Classic, 25,500 coins
  • Fury, 40,000 coins
  • Thunder, 40,000 coinsVolusia, 25,000 coins
  • Super, 50,000 coins
  • Lanvo, 50,000 coins
  • Wraith, 35,000 coins

Class 5

  • Velocità, 27,500 coins
  • Rapidità, 28,500 coins
  • Gurney Classic, 32,000 coins
  • Drakester, 30,000 coins
  • Stuttgart, 33,000 coins

  • Foudre, 50,000 coins
  • Venom, 40,000 coins
  • Rebel, 50,000 coins
  • Star, 50,000 coins

Special

  • School Bus, 30,000 coins
  • Semi Truck, 40,000 coins
  • Euro Truck, 50,000 coins

More Games Like This

There are plenty more racing games in our driving games category, so look and get behind the wheel of another challenge, such as Moto X3M or Drift Hunters, two thrilling racing games.

Features

  • Free Drive mode
  • Demolition Derbies and Races
  • Police Chases
  • 50+ Unique Cars
  • 60+ Racing Tracks and Demolition Arenas

Release Date

  • May 2017 (Android)
  • June 2017 (iOS)
  • August 2024 (WebGL)

Platforms

  • Web browser
  • Android
  • iOS

coffee-idle.name: Coffee Idle
coffee-idle.description: Coffee Idle is a casual clicker game where you start a small coffee business and transform it into a thriving hot spot, becoming the ultimate coffee mogul. Watch it flourish into a bustling empire as you upgrade your equipment and enhance your brewing techniques. Train your baristas to perfection while crafting a delightful menu of beverages, including frothy cappuccinos and rich Irish coffee. Maximize your profits by optimizing production speeds and expanding your customer base, ensuring that every cup is served with excellence. With strategic planning and a passion for coffee, you'll build a caffeinated kingdom that dominates the market.
coffee-idle.faq:
How do you put out a fire in Coffee Idle?

If a fire breaks out in your coffee shop, you will need to put the fire out with a fire extinguisher by clicking until the blue barometer reaches its max and the fire is out.

Can you play Coffee Idle offline?

You can play Coffee Idle online or on mobile. You can also download the game from the App Store.
coffee-idle.controls:
• Use the left mouse button to play
  • Press and hold the left mouse button to speed up
coffee-idle.how_to_play:
In Coffee Idle, you're on a mission to create the ultimate coffee empire. Start by brewing classic coffee, but as you attract more customers, expand your menu with delicious options like cappuccinos and Irish coffee. Keep up with the morning rush by upgrading your production capacity and unlocking new recipes to keep customers happy and loyal.

Emergencies can happen, so stay alert! If a fire breaks out in the shop, grab the fire extinguisher and click fast to put it out before it impacts business. As your shop grows, so does the demand, which means it’s time to expand with a delivery service. Equip your café with essential tools like a coffee grinder, premium beans, and high-efficiency production machines, and hire workers to keep everything running smoothly.

To really amp up your business, bring in specialized managers who can automate each part of the workflow. With every upgrade, you’ll streamline production and boost profits, helping you to build a true coffee empire. Take control, strategize your growth, and watch as your coffee business takes the city by storm.

xtreme-moto-mayhem.name: Xtreme Moto Mayhem
xtreme-moto-mayhem.description: Xtreme Moto Mayhem is a heart-pounding driving motorcycle game that challenges you to master intense stunts and high-speed races. With over 100 levels, a diverse collection of bikes, and various environments, you’ll push your skills to the limit. Upgrade your ride, earn rewards, and dominate the tracks in this ultimate two-wheeled adventure.
xtreme-moto-mayhem.faq:
How many levels are in Xtreme Moto Mayhem?

There are 100 levels in Xtreme Moto Mayhem, each more challenging (and fun) than the last.

How do you brake in Xtreme Moto Mayhem?

Use the S key or down arrow to brake in Xtreme Moto Mayhem, but be careful not to brake short, or your rider will fall off the bike and fall, ending the round.
xtreme-moto-mayhem.controls:
• W / Up Arrow Key = Acceleration
  • A / Left Arrow Key = Lean Back (To perform backflips)
  • D / Right Arrow Key = Lean Front (To perform front flips)
  • S / Down Arrow Key = Brake
  • Space Bar = Jump
  • P = Pause
xtreme-moto-mayhem.how_to_play:
Your mission in Xtreme Moto Mayhem is to gain as many reward points as possible while making your way to the next level via motorcycle stunts, flips, and challenges. Each level offers a series of obstacle course racing paths with near-impossible ramps and more. If you're a fan of (digital) extreme sports, this is the game for you.

Rev up your engines and hit the gas with the W key, but don’t think you can just coast through these thrilling tracks on auto-pilot! Each round presents a unique set of exhilarating challenges that will keep you on your toes. From treacherous collapsing floors that might give way beneath you to daring half ramps soaring high in the sky, every twist and turn demands your full attention. Brace yourself for sliding doors that can unexpectedly alter your path and elevator shafts that add a vertical twist to the action. And that’s just the beginning—each level is packed with creative obstacles that will test your reflexes and driving skills.

The key to the game is to get as comfortable as possible with the control keys and all the many moves you can make. Once you have this down, you can have fun and test your reflexes. This is where you get to practice your stunts, including forward and backward flips. These may not be reserved for vanity purposes. Some of these flips are ideal ways of getting you past a few obstacles.

Tip

Make the brake key your friend throughout the game; it will get you out of sticky situations, but don't brake too fast; you may just find yourself face flat on the floor.

prankster-3d.name: The Prank King
prankster-3d.description: The Prank King is a laugh-out-loud casual game where you step into the shoes of prankster Nick, the ultimate trickster on a mission to outwit Misty, the notoriously cranky Scary Teacher. Each level is a new adventure as you sneak around her house, setting up hilarious traps and creating chaos at every turn. Your goal? To catch Misty off guard and watch her reactions as she falls victim to your cleverly planned pranks. With tons of creative tricks to choose from, you’ll craft moments of pure comedy gold that will have Misty fuming and you grinning from ear to ear!
prankster-3d.faq:
What is Scary Teacher from Prankster 3D game based on?

The Scary Teacher from Prankster 3D game is based on the Story of Matilda, a film adaptation of Roald Dahl's Matilda.

Where can I play Prankster 3D?

You can play Prankster 3D online at CrazyGames.

What country is Prankster 3D from?

Prankster 3D, a game where you prank the Scary Teacher, was developed by ZnK Games which is based in Pakistan.
prankster-3d.controls: Use the left mouse button / AD to choose the prank.
prankster-3d.how_to_play:
She's snoozing away, blissfully unaware of the chaos that's about to unfold. But you're not here to let her sleep, are you? Time to give her the rudest wake-up call ever!

You have two deliciously devious options: slather her alarm clock with sticky glue or blast her awake with an ear-splitting air horn. Which one will jolt her out of dreamland? Yep, you know it—the air horn! As the deafening noise fills the room, she shoots out of bed, already regretting her decision to close her eyes.

But the fun is just beginning! Now, she needs to brush her teeth. What could make this simple task a morning nightmare? Should you sneakily replace her toothpaste with fiery hot sauce or maybe swap it with a dollop of shaving cream? If you chose hot sauce, you’re on a roll! Watch her eyes widen in shock as the fiery paste hits her tongue—she’s not just awake now. She’s wide-eyed and fuming.

In a desperate attempt to cool off, she grabs her trusty thermos for a refreshing drink. But you're not about to let her off easy! Should you spike it with a splash of vinegar or go soft with some soda? Soda? Nah, that’s way too nice! Vinegar is the ultimate prankster's choice. As she takes a big swig, her face twists in disgust—now she’s really boiling, and you’ve just leveled up to round two!

It's your choice

The Prank King is all about making mischievous choices that turn everyday moments into a comedy of errors. From swapping her shampoo with bleach and setting up sneaky tripwires to tying her shoes together before she hits the treadmill and sabotaging her barbells with glue, you’re the mastermind behind every misstep, every tumble, and every furious outburst. Your mission? To keep Scary Teacher stumbling, falling, and absolutely losing her mind at every turn. It’s the ultimate game of pranks where the goal is simple: make her day as miserable—and hilarious—as possible!

polytrack.name: PolyTrack
polytrack.description: PolyTrack is a fast-paced, low-poly driving game featuring thrilling loops, jumps, and high-speed action where every millisecond counts. Inspired by TrackMania, it challenges you to race against the clock, constantly striving to improve your time on various tracks built by you and the Polytrack community! It doesn't get any more hands-on than that.
polytrack.faq:
How to play Polytrack?

In Polytrack, you race a car you customize on a track you've designed yourself. This means you have to think about beating your record and master the craft of building for speed and precision.

Can I share my track designs with other Polytrack players?

Polytrack has an active and robust online community where you can share design codes and customizing tips.
polytrack.controls:
Driving Controls

  • WASD / arrow keys = drive
  • Enter / R = restart

Editor Controls

  • Left-click = build
  • Right-click + move = move camera view
  • Middle mouse-click + move = rotate camera view
  • Mouse-scroll = zoom in / out
  • Shift + mouse-scroll / ZC = height up / down
  • QE = rotate camera view to the left / right
  • R / Space = rotate item
  • X = delete item
  • T = test drive

mine-merge-mania.name: Mine Merge Mania
mine-merge-mania.description: Mine Merge Mania is an addictive clicker game that invites you to embark on an exhilarating mining adventure. As the master of your own mine, you'll start with basic tools like shovels and pickaxes and progressively unlock new horizons by merging tools and upgrading your mining operation. The goal is to dig deeper, collect valuable resources, and become a legendary miner!

gladiator-fights.name: Gladiator Fights
gladiator-fights.description: Gladiator Fights is an action fighting game that transports you back to the blood-soaked sands of ancient Rome, where every battle is a fight for survival and glory. As you step into the digitalized Colosseum, you'll feel like a true gladiator, immersed in the brutal world of hand-to-hand combat. Battle your way through fierce arenas, squaring off against formidable foes who will push your strength and strategy to the limit. Each fight is a raw test of skill, where victory means honor and defeat could be your last breath.
gladiator-fights.faq:
Are there any good gladiator games?

There are plenty of gladiator games available with realistic simulation; one such game is Gladiator Fights, developed by GamePush.

Is Gladiator Games free to play?

You can play Gladiator Games for free online at CrazyGames.
gladiator-fights.controls:
• WASD / arrow keys = move
  • Q / E/ R = attack
gladiator-fights.how_to_play:
In Gladiator Fights, your mission is clear: fight to the death in brutal arenas set in ancient Rome. You'll use the arrow keys to move around the battlefield, positioning yourself for the best chance of survival. Attacking is simple—press Q or E/R to unleash your weapon of choice. Combat is fast and intense. Use left-click to attack with your sword and right-click to fire arrows. Each battle is a test of both skill and strategy, and you'll need to stay sharp to outmaneuver your enemies.

There are several battle modes to choose from. In Custom Battles, you can set up your own matchups, whether it’s a classic one vs. one duel, a chaotic three vs. three fight, or even a daring one vs. two challenge for the ultimate test of skill. For a more structured experience, enter the Tournaments, where you'll fight your way through ten grueling rounds, each one more difficult than the last, as you strive to become the ultimate gladiator champion. There's also a Rating Battle mode where you'll face off in ranked duels, battling to climb the leaderboard and prove your dominance.

Weapons in Gladiator Fights vary from swords and hammers to axes and arrows, each offering a unique fighting style. Some weapons are so large that you won’t be able to carry a shield, so you’ll need to rely on agility and timing to defend yourself. Your enemies are armed with their own deadly tools, so always keep an eye on what they’re wielding. To avoid arrows, the best defense is to simply dodge—quick movements will save you from certain death. If you’re up against a sword-wielding opponent, use your shield to block their attacks. And if you find yourself facing fire, your best option is to run!

The key to survival is staying on the offense—if you hesitate, your enemies will strike first, or worse, the battle will drag on with no clear winner. There's no place to hide, and the only way out is to eliminate every opponent in your path. Stay aggressive, adapt to your enemies' tactics, and fight your way to glory!

blogger-clicker.name: Blogger Clicker
blogger-clicker.description: Blogger Clicker is an engaging clicker game where you start as a budding blogger, creating engaging videos on various topics like gaming, music, tech, and more to gain fame. As you grow your audience, upgrade your equipment and aim to surpass top popular bloggers. Every click helps you gain subscribers, climb the ranks, and become the ultimate internet sensation.

drift-io.name: Drift.io
drift-io.description: Drift.io is a thrilling online racing game where you take on high-speed drift challenges across dynamic tracks. With realistic physics, stunning visuals, and customizable cars, you’ll immerse yourself in intense races. Compete in single-player or multiplayer modes, earn coins, and unlock exclusive cars and upgrades as you rise to the top.

race-clicker-drift-max.name: Race Clicker: Drift Max
race-clicker-drift-max.description: Race Clicker: DRIFT MAX is an action-packed clicker game that puts you in the driver’s seat of intense drift races. Get ready to tap your way to victory in this fast-paced game where every split-second decision counts. Are you ready to drift your way to the top?

ibiza-foam-party.name: Ibiza Foam Party
ibiza-foam-party.description: Ibiza Foam Party is a vibrant summer-themed makeover game where you join Gina and Selena for an electrifying experience in the party capital of the world. As their stylist, you’ll scrub, pamper, and perfect their look with dazzling makeup and fashion, ensuring these best friends dazzle under the Ibiza sun.

idle-airport-tycoon.name: Idle Airport Tycoon
idle-airport-tycoon.description: Idle Airport Tycoon is a casual simulation game that puts you in charge of building and managing your very own bustling airport. Start with a humble airstrip and turn it into a world-class travel hub—move over Atlanta airport; we're looking to be the busiest airport in the world now! Upgrade everything from planes to terminals, unlock new revenue streams, and watch your profits soar! Are you ready to take on the challenge and become the ultimate airport tycoon?
idle-airport-tycoon.faq:
How to play Airport Tycoon?

Idle Airport Tycoon is a casual simulation game where you build your airport empire from scratch.
idle-airport-tycoon.controls:
• Use the left mouse button = interact with the in-game UI
  • +/- keys = change the size of the camera
idle-airport-tycoon.how_to_play:
To begin your tycoon journey, you will need some guidance. Your personal assistant will help you start off your journey with a few prompts so you understand the gameplay and how to build and buy.

First up, get your hands on a state-of-the-art metal detector to ensure your passengers feel secure and their journeys are smooth. Next, you will need a better ticketing system. Assemble a dynamic ticket booking team to handle the growing crowds. After all, the more tickets you sell, the more revenue you'll rake in, supercharging your airport’s growth and turning your terminal into a bustling travel hotspot.

But hold on! Your visitors need a comfy waiting area. Set up some benches so they can relax and avoid those pesky complaints. A happy customer is a returning customer! Don’t forget the baggage drop-off—essential for a smooth operation. And now, it’s time to take flight yourself! The rest of the airport adventure is in your hands.

The key to success is to keep your eye on demand so you can supply whatever is needed. Too many people standing in the waiting room? You will need more benches. Too many potential customers waiting in line to buy tickets? Hire more staff. When the airport begins buzzing with movement, you can buy even more airplanes and expand your airport to fully immerse yourself in the world of tycoons.

hostage-negotiator.name: Hostage Negotiator
hostage-negotiator.description: Hostage Negotiator is a casual quiz game where you step into the intense and high-stakes world of hostage negotiation. The fate of innocent lives rests in your hands as you navigate complex scenarios, make crucial decisions, and try to save everyone caught in a terrible situation.

fruit-masters-online.name: Fruit Masters Online
fruit-masters-online.description: Fruit Masters Online is a casual merge game that offers an engaging and colorful experience, combining the fun of merging mechanics with the excitement of online multiplayer gameplay. Whether you enjoy playing solo or competing against others, this game delivers a juicy, fruit-filled adventure that will keep you entertained!

spider-evolution-runner-game.name: Spider Evolution: Runner Game
spider-evolution-runner-game.description: Spider Evolution: Runner Game is a thrilling game where you begin as a tiny spider, racing along a vibrant track to grow stronger with every step. Your mission is to evolve into the most powerful spider by overcoming challenges and obstacles. Test your survival skills and watch your spider transform in this exciting adventure.

wheelie-up.name: Wheelie Up
wheelie-up.description: Wheelie Up is a thrilling balance game where you aim to keep a perfect wheelie while navigating challenging levels. Control your bike’s balance, avoiding obstacles as speed and difficulty increase. Unlock new skins and bikes with each own characteristics. Test your skills, challenge your friends, climb the leaderboards, and become the ultimate wheelie master!

cube-vs-ball-clicker.name: Cube vs Ball Clicker
cube-vs-ball-clicker.description: Cube vs Ball Clicker is an exciting clicker game. This game is a battle between cubes and balls! Do the clicks to unleash powerful balls that crush waves of cubes, earning money to upgrade your arsenal. Conquer each level and become the ruler of the ball empire. Customize your balls with unique skins and trails, and unleash the fireball skill to annihilate your foes. Can you conquer all the levels available?

carousel-idle-clicker.name: Carousel Idle Clicker
carousel-idle-clicker.description: Carousel Idle Clicker is an engaging idle clicker game where you turn a small island into a thriving amusement park empire. You’ll strategically merge and upgrade carousel seats to boost your park's growth and profits. Enjoy vibrant graphics while expanding your park, and watch as your investment pays off, even when you’re not actively playing.

card-shuffle-sort.name: Card Shuffle Sort
card-shuffle-sort.description: Card Shuffle Sort is a smart and calming puzzle game that challenges you to strategically rearrange cards by color. With increasing difficulty, each level tests your organization and problem-solving skills. Enjoy beautiful designs, intuitive gameplay, and daily challenges that keep you coming back for more. Perfect for sharpening your mind while unwinding.

paper-delivery-boy.name: Paper Delivery Boy
paper-delivery-boy.description: Paper Delivery Boy: Bike Delivery Drive Game is a thrilling adventure where you navigate bustling neighborhoods on your bicycle, deliver newspapers, and handle special requests. Your mission is to toss papers to customers while skillfully avoiding obstacles. Ride through various districts, helping as many people as possible in this exciting delivery challenge!

superhero-race.name: Superhero Race!
superhero-race.description: Superhero Race! is an epic adventure where you become the hero the world needs. Choose your superhero story and race against villains, overcoming every challenge on your path to saving the world. It's your time to clean up the chaos and show the villains who's boss!

street-life.name: Street Life
street-life.description: Street Life is a clicker merge game where you rise from the streets to stardom by tapping, merging, and jamming with your musical monkey. Perform soulful tunes, earn riches, and transform your style as you journey from a struggling street performer to a global sensation. Are you ready to conquer the world through music and dance?

basket-blitz.name: Basket Blitz 2
