basket-blitz.description: Basket Blitz 2 is an exhilarating sports basketball game that puts your hoop skills to the test. The aim of the game is simple: flick the basketball into the hoop, but achieving mastery is anything but easy. With each shot, you’ll need precision, quick reflexes, and a keen eye for accuracy as you strive to hit nothing but the net.
basket-blitz.faq:
How do you play Basket Blitz?

Basket Blitz challenges you to get as many basketball shots into the hoop without hitting the rim at all.

Can you change your ball in Basketball Blitz?

With enough reward points, you can upgrade your basketball to something more fun like a football, a hamburger, a donut, and more fun random items.
basket-blitz.controls:
PC Controls

Drag and release the left mouse button to throw the basketball.

Mobile Controls

Swipe up using your finger to shoot the ball.
basket-blitz.how_to_play:
Playing Basket Blitz 2 is all about timing, accuracy, and combos. To start, simply flick the basketball toward the hoop and aim for a perfect swish. Each time the ball goes through the net without touching the rim, you reset the 15-second timer and add more precious seconds to your game.

The real excitement comes when you string together consecutive swishes, triggering combo multipliers that can skyrocket your score. The more precise your shots, the higher your score grows. As the clock ticks down, it’s a race to keep the streak alive and maximize your points before time runs out.

The basketball gameplay is relatively limited. You have to swipe up to throw the ball and aim by moving your mouse side to side. You can only really SWISH the ball into the net with one clean sweep of a swipe up! Getting the right angle clearly helps, too.

You will notice the SWISH by a neon blue laser-like film that surrounds your ball. Aim to get as many as possible.

Rewards

The more rewards you get, the more you can purchase. Change your basketball into something fun like an 8-ball, a lantern, a hamburger, a donut, and more.

doodle-road.name: Doodle Road
doodle-road.description: Doodle Road is an imaginative and captivating 2D casual game that combines creativity with problem-solving. In this fun browser game, your primary objective is to draw a path that will successfully guide a car from the starting point to the finish line. With a multitude of levels to explore, each one introduces new challenges and exciting obstacles that test your creativity and strategic thinking. Draw your way to victory and see how far your creativity can take you!
doodle-road.faq:
How to play Doodle Road game?

The objective of Doodle Road is to draw the perfect path to guide your car from start to finish in an addictive and creative browser game!

How to play Doodle Road game with engines off?

When you reach a level with your engine off in Doodle Road, you will need to use your physics-based logic as much as possible. Try to create velocity curves to propel your car as much as possible.
doodle-road.controls:
• Left mouse button to draw a line.
  • Restart button or R to restart.
  • Start button or Space to start.
doodle-road.how_to_play:
You start in Doodle Road by practicing drawing a straight line from the car to the target. Sounds simple, right? Wait until you see how straight your line really is! The true challenge is how easy it is for your car actually to drive across that path.

Next challenge – draw a line to the target, but now there's a wall in your way. Remember, your car can’t fly! So, think about how to draw your path – you don’t have to go over the wall; you can go under it! As you go, you'll see that drawing a straight line is harder than it looks. If you don’t start the line from behind your car, it’ll just dangle off into oblivion.

How do you get over an L-shape? Or a huge gap in the ground? And the challenges keep coming. By level 5, your engine shuts off, so you’ll need your physics brain to figure out how to use hills and momentum to get across.

Some levels have trampoline-like springs that’ll launch you toward your target. The challenges change each time, keeping you on your toes. Buckle up because it's going to be a bumpy ride, depending on how well you draw!

minetap.name: MineTap Merge Clicker
minetap.description: MineTap Merge Clicker is an idle clicker that combines merge mechanics with crafting and adventure. Dive into a pixelated world where you mine resources, craft powerful gear, and battle zombies and other monsters. Build your own village as you gather materials, merge items, and level up your character. Become a legendary hero by crafting epic weapons and conquering challenges.

parking-fury-3d-side-hustle.name: Parking Fury 3D: Side Hustle
parking-fury-3d-side-hustle.description: Parking Fury 3D: Side Hustle is a high-speed driving mission game where you take on various roles, from taxi driver to ambulance hero, navigating busy city streets. You'll master parking, traffic dodging, and even pull off daring car heists while evading the law. Every mission challenges your timing, precision, and driving skills.
parking-fury-3d-side-hustle.faq:
How to play Parking Fury 3D?

Parking Fury 3D: Side Hustle lets you master the art of precise parking while completing missions, exploring the town in cool cars, and dodging lurking police officers.

Can I play Parking Fury on my phone?

Parking Fury 3D: Side Hustle is available on mobile, as well as desktop.
parking-fury-3d-side-hustle.controls: Use the arrow keys to steer and maintain balance. Press CTRL to hop into vehicles. Follow the mini-map arrows to reach your destination.
parking-fury-3d-side-hustle.how_to_play:
Think you're a parking pro? Parking Fury 3D will put your skills to the ultimate test as you maneuver through tight spaces and tricky angles to achieve the perfect park. Precision and patience are key, but there’s more to this game than just parking!

When you're not navigating challenging parking spots, you can take the wheel of a variety of cool cars and explore the town. Drive through realistic streets, uncover hidden corners, and push the speed limit but be careful! The police are always lurking, ready to fine reckless drivers.

Your main objective is to skillfully park and complete missions, which are delivered via on-screen prompts. A handy map in the top left corner will keep you on track, but the temptation to wander off and soak in the scenic surroundings is real. Stay focused, as your missions often require precision and dedication.

Parking Fury 3D combines the thrill of driving with the satisfaction of mastering complex parking challenges. Are you up for it?

motogp-motocross-race.name: MotoGP: Motocross Race
motogp-motocross-race.description: MotoGP Motocross Race is an adrenaline-fueled racing game where MotoGP and Motocross worlds collide. Race through tracks and rugged terrains as you push your skills and speed to the limit. With high-speed asphalt races and thrilling off-road challenges, you’ll experience intense, action-packed gameplay perfect for any motorbike enthusiast.

age-of-arms.name: Age Of Arms
age-of-arms.description: Age of Arms is a strategic defense game where you battle through different eras. Set your weapons in the enemy’s path, defeat foes, and evolve into stronger warriors in each age. With every victory, upgrade your arsenal and keep advancing to become the ultimate warrior of history’s greatest battles.

rogue-dunk-viy.name: Rogue Dunk
rogue-dunk-viy.description: Rogue Dunk is a thrilling 2D basketball game that combines fast-paced action with rogue-like strategy. Each game offers new skills to unlock and challenges to face, making every match feel fresh and exciting. Test your skills, adapt your strategy, and push your score higher as you take on this unique blend of sports and adventure.

steam-city.name: Steam City
steam-city.description: Steam City is a casual building game that transports you to a world where Victorian charm meets futuristic innovation. As the newly appointed mayor renowned for your achievements in steam technology research, you will design and develop a unique city filled with sprawling infrastructure, beautiful buildings, and industrious citizens. With the help of your assistant, Agatha, and a cast of brilliant engineers like the self-taught Ida, you’ll bring your creative vision of progress to life while balancing the city’s needs and resources.
steam-city.faq:
Is the Steam City game offline?

You can play Steam City online in your browser or on mobile at CrazyGames or download the game on the App Store.

How do you play Steam City?

Steam City is a classic building game, and the best way to play it is to follow all the initial cues and prompts that will help you build your empire.
steam-city.controls: Use the left mouse button to interact with the in-game buttons/objects.
steam-city.how_to_play:
Your journey begins with a warm welcome from Agatha, who will guide you through the essentials of city planning. Start by meeting key figures like Ida, a resourceful engineer who quickly points out that the builders already need your support. As mayor, you will complete the exciting task of building the city’s housing. Head to the construction workshop, select your first house and drag it onto the map. Every building requires a road for access, so plan strategically. From modest homes to grand residences, you will be able to design spacious, comfortable houses that cater to a growing population.

Resources are the lifeblood of your city’s development. Start by extracting natural resources like sand to produce essential building materials in your factories. When the sand runs out, you must activate the nearby quarries with a steam excavator to keep construction moving. You’ll face key decisions about which resources to sell on the market or export to neighboring cities to maximize your city’s income and growth.

To ensure your city thrives, you’ll manage a journal of tasks that will help you address urgent issues and develop strategic improvements. Completing tasks not only rewards you but also elevates your status as mayor, unlocking new opportunities and growth for your city.

As your city grows, connecting with fellow mayors becomes essential. Create a union and invite others to join, fostering a community where you can exchange resources, tackle challenges together, and discuss city issues openly. This collaboration can help you overcome obstacles and bring prosperity to all members.

A bustling city is a profitable one. Collect taxes from commercial buildings to expand your city’s territory, build new infrastructure, and grow your population. As your reputation and resources grow, you’ll have the opportunity to construct more advanced buildings, meet the rising demands of your citizens, and create a city that’s uniquely yours in Steam City.

brat-girl-summer.name: Brat Girl Summer
brat-girl-summer.description: Brat Girl Summer is the ultimate dress-up game where style meets attitude! Join four besties as you style them in trendy outfits inspired by K-pop and VSCO aesthetics. Mix and match tops, skirts, dresses, shoes, and accessories to create bold, eye-catching looks. Whether you're designing a fierce K-pop stage outfit or a laid-back VSCO vibe, endless fashion possibilities await. Get ready to slay the summer with your unique style creations!

forest-dump.name: Forest Dump
forest-dump.description: Forest Dump is a casual roguelike game that takes you on a unique adventure through a quirky and polluted woodland. As a clever and resourceful fox, your mission is to clean up your corrupted forest home by flipping cards to uncover mysteries, face off against trash monsters, and collect powerful weapons to aid in your journey. Combining card-flipping mechanics with deckbuilding elements, this game offers a strategic adventure full of surprises. Will you be able to clean up the pollution and restore the forest to its former glory? Jump into Forest Dump and find out!

home-builder-3d.name: Home Builder 3D
home-builder-3d.description: Home Builder 3D is a strategic building simulator where you can demolish old structures and create new ones, like farms, pools, and parking lots. Master the art of resource management as you tackle various projects and sell your completed works for profit. Plan each move carefully to rise as the ultimate property tycoon.

xtreme-city-drifting.name: Xtreme City Drifting
xtreme-city-drifting.description: Xtreme City Drifting is a high-octane racing game that challenges you to master drifting through vibrant city streets. Choose from over 10 unique cars, each with its own style, and earn cash by pulling off slick maneuvers. Avoid the relentless police who are ready to seize your hard-earned money. Upgrade your rides and sharpen your skills!

idle-monster-slayer.name: Idle Monster Slayer
idle-monster-slayer.description: Idle Monster Slayer is a clicker game where you click monsters to deal damage and gather gold and resources. Use your earnings to upgrade abilities, unlock powerful features, and automate your progress. Face increasingly difficult enemies, refine your strategies, and aim for the top spot on the leaderboard as you dominate the adventure!

the-bottle-boy.name: The Bottle Boy
the-bottle-boy.description: The Bottle Boy is a 3D puzzle platformer game where friendship is at the heart of every challenge! You play as a groovy, breakdancing Glass Bottle with a mission: to save Corky the Dog from a looming tsunami. To rescue your best friend, you'll need to fill up with water, solve math and logic puzzles, and dance your way through obstacles across a vibrant, hip-hop-inspired world. Along the way, collect photos to exchange at the HIP STYLE HOP STORE and unlock cool new looks. Get ready for a journey filled with love, puzzles, and endless style!

hextoland.name: Hexo Land
hextoland.description: Hexo Land is a game where you create and expand your own island in the vast ocean. Use trade ships to acquire unique hexagon blocks, strategically growing and enhancing your island’s features. Every shipment brings new possibilities, challenging you to craft a thriving and beautifully designed paradise.

horror-room-scary-hotel-tycoon.name: Horror Room: Scary Hotel Tycoon
horror-room-scary-hotel-tycoon.description: Horror Room: Scary Hotel Tycoon is a simulation game where you manage a spine-chilling theme park. You’ll design terrifying rooms, hire creepy actors, and come up with creative ways to scare visitors. Keep your attractions running smoothly by cleaning, repairing, and maintaining equipment. Track guest feedback to make improvements and aim to become the top fright master in the business!

money-factory-aqs.name: Money Factory
money-factory-aqs.description: Money Factory is a fast-paced, clicker incremental game where you build your financial empire by strategically connecting tokens on the game board. Each connection generates cash, and the more valuable the tokens you combine, the faster your earnings soar. Plan your moves carefully, optimize your token placements, and watch as your money factory transforms into a booming financial powerhouse!
money-factory-aqs.faq:
How do you earn money quickly in Money Factory?

There are several ways to earn money quickly in Money Factor,y one of which is to place chips in strategic positions to multiply your earnings.

How much money do you have to earn to get to the next level in Money Factory?

You need to earn $250,000 to get to the next level in Money Factory.
money-factory-aqs.how_to_play:
Money Factory is a physics-based puzzle game where your goal is to amass a fortune by strategically multiplying your earnings. Money rains down from the sky—truly a dream come true—but most of it starts in small amounts, just single dollars. To grow your wealth, you'll need to make the most of the eight obstacles on your screen, each temporarily catching the falling money and boosting its value. Some obstacles add a fixed amount, like +1, while others multiply your earnings, such as x1.1 or x2. For example, if a dollar hits the +1 obstacle, you earn an extra dollar, but hitting x1.1 will increase your total by 10%.

You start with blank slots that you’ll need to fill strategically. Place bumper chips in the most effective spots to maximize your returns, and use the bumper button to acquire new chips that add value. As you play, you can unlock additional slots by watching ads or earning enough money to open prime real estate. The $5k chip, for example, speeds up your progress, but getting there requires smart planning and precise placement.

Your ultimate goal is to earn $250k and advance to the next round. Each new level brings more challenges and demands smarter decisions. With careful strategy, well-placed multipliers, and a bit of patience, you’ll turn those falling dollars into a mountain of wealth.

let-s-journey.name: Dragon Hunter
let-s-journey.description: Dragon Hunter is a clicker RPG where you roll dice, battle monsters, and face epic dragons. Engage in thrilling encounters, level up to unlock powerful skills, and use battle magic to sway outcomes. Gather gold, rare loot, and pets, while completing quests and clearing ruins. Uncover treasures and conquer fierce bosses to become a legendary dragon hunter.

carnival-shooter.name: Carnival Shooter
carnival-shooter.description: Carnival Shooter is a fun and engaging clicker/idle game where you use a water gun to inflate toys and earn money. Use your earnings to spawn new toys and make some upgrades. Inflated toys can be merged to create higher-level ones, which generate even more income. Each level brings new toys and exciting platforms, offering endless entertainment and challenges for players. Enjoy the blend of strategic clicking and idle progression in this carnival full of surprises and fun!

battle-of-knights-robby-and-dragons.name: Battle of Knights: Robby and Dragons
battle-of-knights-robby-and-dragons.description: Battle of Knights: Robby and Dragons is an engaging clicker game where you train your hero to grow stronger and defeat fierce enemies. Wield your sword and team up with companions to face thrilling battles. Strengthen your skills and overcome every challenge in your journey to victory!
battle-of-knights-robby-and-dragons.faq:
Is there a game where you play as a knight?

In Battle of Knights, you start with nothing but your fists and each victory brings you closer to upgrades to turn you into a full knight.

Where can I play Battle of Knights?

Battle of Knights can be played online at CrazyGames either in your browser or on your phone.
battle-of-knights-robby-and-dragons.controls:
Desktop

  • Use WADS to control the character.
  • Use the Spacebar to jump.
  • Move the mouse across the screen to rotate the camera.

Mobile

  • Use the joystick to control the character.
  • Use the button in the lower right corner to jump.
  • Swipe your finger across the screen to rotate the camera.
battle-of-knights-robby-and-dragons.how_to_play:
You start off with nothing but your bare hands: no armor, no weapons. It’s enough to get you through your first battles, but every fight you win brings you closer to valuable upgrades. Follow the arrows to navigate your first battle. A simple left-click is all it takes to engage your opponent.

Winning your first battle earns you 100 coins, just enough to explore new gear. Head to the sword store to upgrade your combat power. Each sword comes with its own force multiplier:

  • 2x force for 1 coin
  • 4x force for 25 coins
  • 8x force for 100 coins
  • 12x force for 300 coins
  • 20x force for 500 coins
  • 50x force for 1000 coins
  • 80x force for 5000 coins
  • 100x force for 10000 coins
  • 120x force for 25000 coins
  • 150x force for 50000 coins

The pet store is another place to boost your strength. Pets provide valuable strength boosts:

  • +3 strength for 5 coins
  • +10 strength for 30 coins
  • +30 strength for 100 coins
  • +250 strength for 500 coins
  • +800 strength for 1000 coins
  • +3000 strength for 5000 coins
  • +10000 strength for 25000 coins
  • +20000 strength for 50000 coins

You’ll also want to upgrade your appearance. At the skin store, you can enhance various parts of your character, from your arms and beard to your body, cloak, feet, hands, head, helmet, and pants. Each upgrade not only changes your look but might just earn you the respect of your enemies and the princess!

Coins are earned through combat. Fight a newbie for 1 coin, engage in a simple fight for 3 coins, test your skills in a medium fight for 6 coins, or take on a strong fight for 10 coins. When you’re ready for the ultimate test, challenge the dragon for 50 coins! Defeating tougher enemies means more coins and faster upgrades.

Your journey is about more than just fighting, it’s about earning the right to face the boss and unlocking the portal to another world. Explore your surroundings with a 360-degree view, controlled by your mouse. The world of knights is vast, and every turn might reveal a new challenge or a new ally.

And remember, the king promises his daughter, the princess, to the knight who defeats all the dragons. But only a worthy knight, one who has proven himself in battle and dressed for the occasion, can claim this honor. So gather your armor, prepare your weapons, and show the world you’re the hero it’s been waiting for.

super-sucker-3d.name: Super Sucker 3D
super-sucker-3d.description: Super Sucker 3D is a unique action game where you take control of a powerful vacuum to clear out enemies and obstacles. Suck up everything in your path, then unleash it to defeat bosses and advance through levels. Show your skill by mastering this unconventional and fun way to overcome challenges!"

merge-happy-planets.name: Merge Happy Planets
merge-happy-planets.description: Merge Happy Planets is a merge game where you drop the planets and let them merge! Be careful when it comes to meteor showers and some mad planets! Use Big Bang Bombs, Rainbow Planets, and Black Holes to achieve victory! Try your best to beat your high scores. How long can you survive?

country-life-meadows.name: Country Life Meadows
country-life-meadows.description: Country Life Meadows is a farming adventure game where you turn a humble patch of land into a thriving estate. Cultivate crops, expand your business, and manage a skilled team. Explore untamed areas, unravel intriguing mysteries, and connect with the charming residents of Woodburn as you build your agricultural empire from the ground up.
country-life-meadows.faq:
How do you get the axe in Country Life Meadows?

To get the axe in Country Life Meadows, you need to clear the area where there are clouds, expand your territory, and find the axe.

What is the best farming game online?

There are plenty of farming games to choose from but one popular farming game is Country Life Meadow.
country-life-meadows.controls: Use the left mouse button to play and interact with all the in-game buttons.
country-life-meadows.how_to_play:
Welcome to your new farm! You’ve just acquired Roadside Farm, or whatever name you choose, and it’s time to embrace farm life. But first, here’s a letter from the previous owner that will give you an idea of your situation:

Hi,

Congrats on buying my farm! Sorry to hear you got stranded overnight - wish I could’ve helped fix your car. I don’t remember that rock being on the road… strange. Anyway, I asked around for help, and hopefully, you’ll find an oil pan soon.

You were right about the sunrises - they're stunning, much better than in the city! The soil here is top-notch too. Too bad I had to leave in such a rush. Life happens...

This land is the best spot on that flat hilltop, right near the road. It’s called Roadside Farm, but feel free to rename it. Oh, and please take care of Clarabella!

Best Wishes,

Jim Grey

Now that you’re settling in, it’s time to start farming. Each day brings new rewards, so be sure to check in and claim them. The key to a thriving farm is planting, harvesting, and managing your resources wisely. Sow your seeds, take care of your animals, and keep an eye on your barn and warehouse to track what you’ve gathered. As you grow your farm, you’ll have the chance to expand your land, unlocking even more opportunities to cultivate crops and raise livestock.

Clover is an essential crop for your animals. Cows, turkeys, and goats love it, and if you have bees, they’ll pollinate it, producing honey before harvest. Clover is also used in the production of milk, black feathers, and white feathers. Wheat is another staple: grind it at the Dutch Mill to make flour or use it to feed your sheep. It’s a key ingredient in making flour, vodka, wool, and black wool. If you need milk, make sure to feed your Holstein cows. A full cow is a happy cow, and happy cows keep your farm running smoothly.

Your farm has several important buildings to manage. The Dutch Mill turns wheat into flour, and keeping it filled will power the windmill. The barn stores essentials like wheat, clover, and flour, while the warehouse holds resources such as honey, sugar, oxygen, and propane. As you progress, you’ll gain access to even more supplies, including gear, decorations, chests, and medals. Keep an eye on your stockpile to prepare for the next task.

While ripe crops are beautiful to look at, don’t forget to harvest and replant to keep your farm productive. Wheat should always be replenished, and replanting clover on eight plots of soil will ensure a steady supply. Adding sacks of wheat to the Dutch Mill will keep your flour production running smoothly. The more you maintain your farm, the more opportunities you’ll unlock, allowing you to expand even further. Check the map to see just how vast your farm can become.

Beyond the daily farm routine, there are plenty of ways to engage with the world around you. If you enjoy a relaxed farming experience, you’ll love the peaceful rhythm of planting and harvesting, accompanied by soothing animations and calming sounds. For those who like a challenge, competitions, achievements, horse racing, and leaderboards offer ways to test your skills and earn permanent prizes. The farming co-op lets you collaborate with fellow players, whether by sending Wedding Doves to ceremonies or trading produce at the Market.

Neighbors are a valuable part of farm life. The more neighbors you have, the more gifts you’ll receive, helping you progress faster. You can also personalize your farm with beautiful artwork and decorations, customizing both your Farmhouse and Log Cabin. If you feel like exploring, venture into the surrounding landscapes to forage for mushrooms and edible roots, or head to the mines to uncover valuable ores and hidden riches.

With so much to do, you can play Country Life Meadows your way. Relax and unwind with hours of farming fun, compete to showcase your skills, or grow your farm into a flourishing empire. The possibilities are endless: so start planting and watch your farm come to life!

Features

  • Play to Relax: Unwind with hundreds of hours of farming fun. Revel in the soothing daily routine of planting and harvesting your crops, complete with beautiful animations and calming sounds.
  • Play to Compete: Test your skills in Competitions, Achievements, Horse Racing, and Leaderboards. Earn permanent prizes, and rewards, and showcase your public stats.
  • Farming Co-op: Collaborate with fellow players to achieve common goals. From sending Wedding Doves to weddings to participating in the all-new Market where you can exchange produce with others, teamwork is key.
  • Neighborly Gifts: Your Neighbors can send you valuable gifts, so the more neighbors, the faster you’ll progress.
  • Artwork: We focus on crafting beautiful in-game artwork rather than promotional materials, so what you see is what you get.
  • Interior Decoration: Personalize the interior of your Farmhouse and your Log Cabin in the woods.
  • Exploration: Venture into vast, picturesque landscapes to forage for mushrooms and edible roots.
  • Mining: Delve into the depths of The Mines to discover ores and riches.
  • Barn Management: Our Barn management offers unparalleled control with filtering options that help you maximize your results.

happy-cakes.name: Happy Cakes
happy-cakes.description: Happy Cakes is a delightful game where you unleash your creativity by designing cakes with fondant, animals, toppers, and candles. Light up your masterpiece and share your sweet creations with friends. Dive into the fun of customizing every detail and make the perfect cake for any celebration!

battle-disc-cui.name: Battle Disc
battle-disc-cui.description: Battle Disc is a casual simulation adrenaline-boosting game reminiscent of good old foosball meets billiards where your ultimate goal is to break your opponent's defense to score a point with your disc toss. Your opponent is just as tactical, aiming to catch your toss and toss it right back at you. Every match is a test of agility and wit as you dodge, deflect, and plan your next move. Outsmart your opponent with well-timed throws and clever angles in this intense, action-packed disc-throwing duel.
battle-disc-cui.faq:
Can you destroy your own blocks in Battle DISC?

No, fortunately, even if a disc you tossed hits your blocks, it will not be destroyed. You can only destroy your opponent's blocks.

What is the online game where you shoot discs?

Battle DISC is a fun simulation game where you toss discs to defeat your opponent and protect yourself from the same.
battle-disc-cui.controls: Use WASD to control your character and press the space button to release the disc.
battle-disc-cui.how_to_play:
Your Battle DISC task is fairly straightforward—toss the disc to your opponent's end and destroy the protected barriers. There is no "goal" in this classic sports court game, but you and your opponent are looking to protect blocks behind you. Once the disc hits these blocks, they shatter, and when the opponent shatters all of them, you lose the match.

The first few levels are easy. Some disc throws actually hit all of your opponent's blocks, making a win with one shot very possible. As you advance in levels, the challenges increase. There will gradually be more opponent blocks to destroy. Some levels include bombs which, when you hit, you can destroy multiple blocks in one go with the explosion.

Every so often, you will get to open a "lucky box." Sometimes, you need to watch an ad, but you can opt out and claim your prize later in levels. Lucky boxes contain rewards that help you buy upgrades like more people to your squad, a group to cheer you on, more potent discs, or a bundle of all three.

Some of the challenges you can expect are multiple opponents defending their blocks, moving blocks, changing arenas, and more.

Tips

Your aim is important. Catching the disc is even more important.

Much like billiards, you need to know your angles and aim and shoot your target. You will often be met with a moving target or reactive "goalkeepers," but it is vital you don't shoot aimlessly. All discs tossed will eventually come back your way with just as much force. Catch them before your opponents do. If you miss your toss, your opponents will catch them. Be reactive and get ready to defend and catch that disc when it makes its way back to you.

moto-racing-club.name: Moto Racing Club
moto-racing-club.description: Moto Racing Club is a high-speed 3D driving bike game where you are tasked to tear through bustling city highways, dodge traffic, and push your reflexes to the limit as you race to victory. Choose from 3 unique characters and take on five dynamic levels, each packed with twists, turns, and ever-increasing challenges. Use your nitro boosts to surge ahead and perform jaw-dropping stunts to outmaneuver rivals in a bid for the top spot.
moto-racing-club.faq:
Is moto racing a sport?

Moto racing is indeed a sport, but it can be practiced both professionally and recreationally.

How do I play Moto Racing Club?

You can play Moto Racing Club online for free at CrazyGames.
moto-racing-club.controls:
• WASD or arrow keys to control the car
  • Space for nitro
  • Shift or B key for slow-motion
  • Ctrl or V key for horn
  • C for switch camera
moto-racing-club.how_to_play:
You start Moto Racing Club by choosing from a variety of bikes, ranging from classic scooters to powerful racing motorcycles. Unlock higher-level motorcycles as you progress, with options like the Level 2 motorcycle costing 4,900 coins, up to the Level 28 bike at 85,000 coins. The only way to upgrade is to earn more points, earning you purchase power.

Even the most basic of scooters can be customized, so go ahead and deck your ride out by changing its color and rims. Upgrades that help with speed will require points to buy, like upgrading your engine for better speed and acceleration or adding nitro for that extra boost.

You’ll take on various racing challenges, including Career Mode, One Way, Two Way, Time Attack, and Free Ride. Each mode gives you a target or distance to cover, pushing your skills to the limit as you weave through traffic.

Keep track of your progress on the roster, which shows your score, coins earned, completed missions, total distance driven, highest speed, points for close calls, and the time spent using nitro.

The game features 7+ different motorbikes, from urban commuters to powerful superbikes, and offers multiple camera angles to enhance the racing experience. You can switch between two outdoor cameras or enjoy a realistic interior view that puts you right in the rider's seat. With realistic graphics and sound, you’ll feel the speed of your bike as you tear through highways. But beware—if you crash, because it’s game over. Luckily, you're always equipped with a helmet!

worldguessr.name: WorldGuessr Free GeoGuessr
worldguessr.description: Worldguessr is a casual quiz game, a free alternative to Geoguessr, perfect for testing and expanding your geography skills through immersive Street View exploration. Each round, you will find yourself dropped into random locations around the globe, with only environmental clues to guide you in pinpointing your exact whereabouts. From cityscapes to rural roads, your surroundings become the puzzle pieces you need to analyze, turning each game into a thrilling geographical investigation.
worldguessr.faq:
Can I play Worldguessr for free?

Worldguessr is free to play at CrazyGames.

How do you find where you are in Worldguessr?

The key to finding where you are in Worldguessr is exploring where you are and looking for cultural clues.
worldguessr.controls: Use the mouse to play the game.

guess-their-answer.name: Guess Their Answer
guess-their-answer.description: Guess Their Answer is a casual quiz game where your goal is to outsmart opponents by predicting the most popular answers. Tackle three head-scratching questions per round across diverse topics, earn rewards, and unlock unique skins to personalize your experience. With daily quizzes and competitive matches, every game is a chance to prove you know your trivia.
guess-their-answer.faq:
How do you play Guess Their Answer?

Guess Their Answer is a quiz game similar to Family Feud where your goal is to predict the most popular responses to various questions.

Is Guess Their Answer free?

Guess Their Answer is free to play at CrazyGames.
guess-their-answer.controls: Type in the right answers, be quicker than your opponent, and win!
guess-their-answer.how_to_play:
Guess Their Answer is a guessing game similar to Family Feud, where you try to predict the most popular answers given to specific questions. You start by giving your character a name and meet your opponent.

You’re presented with a question or prompt with an audience watching you. You have to type your answer, and when you get the right answer, the audience will rally by your side. The more audience you have on your side, the more you know you’re winning. You will be told when your opponent gets wrong answers, and there is a barometer letting you know as well, so keep an eye out.

Some of the questions you can be asked are "Name a superhero”. The key is you are trying to guess the most common answer, not just any old answer. If your answer is the most common, the very audience members who responded with your guess will back you up. You have to think of answers that the audience or survey participants might have chosen. Each round features a different category, and your goal is to type responses that align with the most common answers.

Points are awarded based on how popular your answers are. The game typically includes multiple rounds, with the final rounds offering double or triple points. The person or team with the most points at the end wins. Creativity and speed are key since you have limited time to respond. The game allows for some flexibility with misspellings or variations, which can lead to unexpected wins.

Whether you're playing solo or with friends, the challenge is to think quickly, predict what others might say, and sometimes laugh at how quirky or close-to-wrong answers can still score points.

gym-simulator-2024.name: Gym Simulator 2024
gym-simulator-2024.description: Gym Simulator 2024 is a highly immersive simulation that brings the intensity of real-life workouts to your fingertips. Push your limits with dynamic, realistic challenges that evolve with your fitness journey. Whether you’re lifting weights or mastering cardio routines, this game keeps you engaged and motivated, offering an authentic and thrilling fitness experience.

rough-ball-kvz.name: Rough Ball
rough-ball-kvz.description: Rough Ball is a multiplayer platform game that tests your skills with its unique bouncy jump mechanic. Master creative moves and cool tricks as you navigate challenging levels designed to keep you on edge. Whether you're a speedrun enthusiast or looking to sharpen your reflexes, Rough Ball offers intense gameplay for all types of players. Compete with friends or join with players worldwide. Collect gold throughout tricky levels and unlock awesome ball skins in the in-game shop to personalize your experience. Get ready for an adrenaline-fueled adventure!

kogarashi.name: Kogarashi: Ninja's Adventure
kogarashi.description: Kogarashi is a thrilling adventure where you guide a fearless ninja through dangerous obstacles and ancient landscapes. With precise jumps and quick reflexes, you must help the ninja navigate perilous platforms on the journey to reach Mount Fuji’s sacred peak. Test your skills in this intense, action-packed challenge for ultimate victory.

perfect-drive.name: Perfect Drive
perfect-drive.description: Perfect Drive is a fast-paced driving game that puts your skills to the test. Whether you're a seasoned driver or just starting out, buckle up and prove your abilities on the road. With every challenge, you'll need quick reflexes and precision to show you're the ultimate driver.

geometry-dash-open-world.name: Geometry: Open World
geometry-dash-open-world.description: Geometry: Open World is a fast-paced 2D action game where players control a ship navigating through treacherous obstacles, battling a variety of enemies, and ultimately facing off against formidable bosses. The game’s dynamic and vibrant open world, combined with strategic upgrades and powerful abilities, allows you to chart your course to victory! Can you defeat the bosses, conquer the obstacles, and become the best player in this open-world geometry action game?

idle-zoo-pcr.name: Zoo Builder
idle-zoo-pcr.description: Zoo Builder is a simulation game where you design, build, and expand your very own zoo. Choose animals, create enclosures, and customize every aspect to attract more visitors and boost your profits. Upgrade your zoo manager to speed up development and enhance your zoo’s operations. Can you build the most impressive zoo and maximize your earnings?

outlets-rush.name: Outlets Rush
outlets-rush.description: Outlets Rush is a time-management casual arcade game where you become the master of your own shopping empire. Build and expand various stores, manage staff, and make strategic decisions to keep customers happy. Enjoy watching your mini outlets grow into massive retail hubs as you effortlessly manage operations and maximize profits! Dive into the excitement of creating your ultimate shopping destination!
outlets-rush.faq:
Can you visit old shops in Outlet Rush to make more money?

If you are low on money and want to earn quickly from a lucrative shop, you can indeed spend time in your already successful shops in Outlets Rush.

How many shops are there in Outlets Rush?

There are seven shops to manage in Outlets Rush, starting with the Neki sports store.

Is Outlets Rush free?

Outlets Rush is free to play online at CrazyGames.

What type of game is Outlets Rush?

Outlets Rush is a casual arcade game, which will have you moving from shop to shop managing an entire shopping center.
outlets-rush.controls:
• Use the left mouse button to interact with the in-game UI
  • Use the WASD or arrow keys to move
outlets-rush.how_to_play:
Are you ready to run a high-speed retail empire? Outlets Rush puts you center stage as a manager of a shopping mall. Your task is to build each shop, starting with Neki, a sports shop, from the bottom up.

Start with a sneaker shop, stocking shelves straight from the warehouse as shipments roll in. Keep up with demand by quickly restocking and rushing to the counter to check out eager customers because the line isn’t getting any shorter!

As you rack up earnings, reinvest in your store. Expand with new shelves for sneakers and T-shirts, unlock skateboards for faster movement, and balance stocking with customer service to maximize profits.

Want to work smarter, not harder? Open an HR office to hire staff or upgrade your speed and capacity to keep the store running smoothly. With the right strategy, you’ll be filling shelves faster, making more money, and scaling up operations.

Once your shop is thriving, expand your business! Earn enough stars to unlock new stores and become a retail tycoon. But be careful: each new shop requires careful management to run independently before you move on.

idle-cinema-tycoon.name: Idle Cinema Tycoon
idle-cinema-tycoon.description: Idle Cinema Tycoon is a casual business simulation game where you are in charge of your very own movie theater with the aim of slowly managing an empire of theaters. Purchase cinema halls, schedule screenings, and upgrade interiors to boost profits. Curate and collect films of various genres, liaise with guests in VIP rooms, and squeeze out as much profit as you can from ticket sales and more. Strategically expand your theater and complete missions to unlock valuable rewards!
idle-cinema-tycoon.faq:
What is the rating for Idle Cinema Tycoon?

Idle Cinema Tycoon is appropriate for children 12 and older.

Is Idle Cinema Tycoon online or offline?

You can play Idle Cinema Tycoon online at CrazyGames. The game is compatible with most browsers, mobile, and desktop.
idle-cinema-tycoon.controls: Use the left mouse button to interact with the in-game UI
idle-cinema-tycoon.how_to_play:
In Idle Cinema Tycoon, you begin by purchasing your very own movie theater. Congratulations! You will get some help to set it up with screen prompts to start you off. Be sure to follow all of them to best understand how to become a tycoon. Your first task is to hire a cashier who will sell tickets at the entrance.

Next, you’ll need to buy sofas for the waiting area, ensuring visitors can comfortably relax before their movie starts. Once that’s done, it’s time to open your first cinema hall, complete with comfortable seating, a large screen, and high-quality acoustics. Films will automatically be shown here once it’s set up.

Afterward, purchase chairs for the cinema hall to accommodate your viewers, and set up the screening schedule by selecting the movie times and titles.

Now, it's time for your first showing! Watch as patrons buy tickets and find their seats. If the waiting room fills up, expand by purchasing more sofas and even opening another cinema hall to keep the flow of customers moving.

While you wait for new halls to unlock, you can speed up the process by watching ads to reduce the wait time. As your cinema grows, make sure to upgrade key facilities like the generator room, VIP lounge, toilets, and DVD collection to keep your visitors happy. The more guests you have, the more facilities you'll need to maintain a smooth operation.

Keep an eye out for small money bags scattered throughout the cinema—click them to collect extra rewards and keep your theater thriving!

Rinse and repeat and you are on the road to creating a cinema empire.

world-survivors.name: World Survivors
world-survivors.description: World Survivors is an intense roguelike game where you fight to survive waves of relentless enemies. As you battle through hordes, collect Legendary Cards to unlock powerful abilities and upgrades, helping you grow stronger with each encounter. Your goal is to become the ultimate Survivor Viking, mastering the chaos and proving your might. Can you outlast the enemies and claim your place at the top?

back-to-school-uniforms-edition.name: Back To School: Uniforms Edition
back-to-school-uniforms-edition.description: Back to School: Uniforms Edition is a fun beauty dress-up game that lets you dress for school success. Spin a wheel to unlock school uniforms from all around the world, like Japan, the U.S., the U.K., India, France, and South Korea. Dress up your character with just the right outfits and dazzle them up with accessories and hairstyles inspired by each culture. Discover the unique styles of school uniforms worldwide and express your fashion creativity.
back-to-school-uniforms-edition.faq:
Can you take photos of the individual students in Back to School Uniform Edition game?

You will need to dress all your students to get a perfect photo in Back to School Uniform Edition, as you can only take a photo of all the students together and not individually.

Where can I play Back to School Uniform Edition?

You can play Back to School Uniform Edition at CrazyGames!
back-to-school-uniforms-edition.controls: Use the mouse to play the game.

take-photo.name: Take Photo
take-photo.description: Take Photo is a captivating simulation game where you embark on a global adventure to capture stunning photos of various objects on the map. Navigate diverse environments and take pictures that perfectly frame each target to complete your objectives. With locations from all around the world, every level offers a new and exciting photo task. Sharpen your photography skills, explore unique landscapes, and build your collection of remarkable shots. Get ready to discover the world!

asmr-beauty-homeless.name: ASMR Beauty Homeless
asmr-beauty-homeless.description: ASMR Beauty Homeless is a beauty dress-up game in which you take on the role of a compassionate doctor helping your homeless friend Anna regain her dignity. Begin by providing her with essential hygiene care—clean her body, brush her teeth, and carefully treat the area around her piercing to restore her health and comfort. Once she's all freshened up, show off your fashion expertise by choosing the perfect outfit that transforms her appearance and lifts her spirits.
asmr-beauty-homeless.faq:
How many tasks are there in ASMR Beauty Homeless?

There are three main tasks in ASMR Beauty Homeless, which include a hygiene cleanse, ear infection care, and a fashion makeover.

How do you pull the earwax out of Anna's ear in ASMR Beauty Homeless?

In order to fully remove the earwax from Anna's ear in ASMR Beauty Homeless, you need to keep clicking within the green area of the barometer. If you go beyond green into the red, you won't be successful.
asmr-beauty-homeless.controls: Use the mouse to play the game.
asmr-beauty-homeless.how_to_play:
Welcome to the ASMR Clinic, where we help people relax and unwind with gentle, soothing sounds and sensations. Step into the calming world of ASMR with three major tasks.

Task #1: Hygiene Boost for Anna

One of your patients has brought her homeless friend, Anna, to the clinic. After some bad luck, Anna is in need of a hygiene makeover to help her get back on track. Let's start by cleaning her up! Scrub Anna’s body and deep-clean her hair. Beneath the grime, you'll reveal her beautiful blonde locks. Zap away all the bacteria and dirt to make sure she’s fully refreshed, then rinse off the bubbles. Clean her face and brush her teeth to uncover her bright smile. Remove any remaining bacteria.

Wow, she looks amazing! You did it!

Task #2: Infected Ear Piercing Care

Anna hasn’t been able to care for her pierced ears properly, leading to a buildup of bacteria and bugs. Tweeze out the bugs and clean away the excess earwax using multiple cotton swabs. Carefully remove all dirt from deep inside the ear canal. Ew!

You did it! Her ears are spotless!

Task #3: Styling Anna in Y2K Emo Fashion

Now, it's time to give Anna a fresh new look! Dress her up in an exclusive Y2K emo collection. Choose from funky shirts, bold makeup, headgear, hairstyles, and more to create her unique style.

You did it! Anna has been completely transformed!

our-bingo.name: Russian Bingo
our-bingo.description: Russian Bingo is a classic board game that you can enjoy with your family and friends. Up to 6 players can join in, receiving random cards with numbers before placing their bets. As barrels with numbers from 1 to 90 are drawn, players cover matching numbers on their cards. The first player to meet the winning conditions claims victory, depending on the game mode. It is filled with cheerful memories and fun competition at every match!

squarun.name: Squarun
squarun.description: Squarun is an action-packed arcade game where you take on the role of a new prototype robot undergoing rigorous testing. Your mission is simple: survive. Dodge deadly traps, evade incoming bullets and push your limits as you upgrade your robot to progress even further. With every run, you'll face increasingly challenging obstacles, testing your reflexes and strategy. How long can you survive in this intense test of skill?

anger-foot-3d.name: Fury Foot
anger-foot-3d.description: Anger Foot 3D is an action-packed game where your foot becomes your ultimate weapon. Foot fights through challenging rooms to defeat enemies and unlock powerful weapons. You can customize your foot fighter for even more fast-paced combat and immerse yourself in a vibrant world with a high-energy soundtrack. Kick your way to victory in this adrenaline-fueled adventure!
anger-foot-3d.faq:
What can I play Anger Foot 3D on?

You can player Anger Foot 3D online on your browser desktop, mobile or tablet. You can also download it at the App Store.

How do I pick up the gun in Anger Foot 3D?

Stand right next to the gun to automatically pick it up in Anger Foot 3D.
anger-foot-3d.controls:
• WASD = character control (forward, left, back, right)
  • F key = kick
  • Left Mouse Button = shoot (if the player has picked up a weapon)
  • Mouse = camera control
  • TAB = pause menu

stick-epic-fighter.name: Stick Epic Fighter
stick-epic-fighter.description: Stick Epic Fighter is an action-packed, arcade physics-based fighting game where you are in control of a stick fighter to battle enemies in a dynamic, geometric world. Your mission is to evolve your character into an unstoppable force by unlocking powerful upgrades, mastering epic combos, and unleashing devastating fatalities that will destroy your foes. Conquer waves of enemies with precision and skill as you dominate each battle. Only after crushing every opponent will you unlock the portal to the next level, where even more significant challenges await. Sharpen your reflexes, perfect your strategies, and prove you have what it takes.
stick-epic-fighter.faq:
What is the stickman fighting game called?

The stickman fighting game, in which you are a stick fighter battling enemies, is called Stick Epic Fighter.

How do you play stick fighter?

To control your stickman in Stick Epic Fighter, you will need to use your left and right arrow keys to move, the up arrow to jump, space to dash, and the down arrow key to attack.
stick-epic-fighter.controls:
• AD or left/right arrow keys = move
  • W or up arrow key = jump
  • Space = dash
  • Left mouse button or S or down arrow key = attack
stick-epic-fighter.how_to_play:
You begin in a classic arcade-style side-scrolling screen, where you’ll quickly get accustomed to the game’s controls. Use the up arrow to jump, the down arrow to attack, and the left and right arrows for movement. Before long, you’ll encounter enemies—attack them by holding the down arrow to unleash a series of sword strikes. Holding down the attack key continuously lets you deliver multiple hits, which is essential since enemies require several strikes to be defeated.

Though you can jump and sprint past enemies to reach the end of the level quickly, you won’t be able to progress to the next round until all foes are eliminated. If you leave any behind, you’ll have to backtrack and take them out. Once every enemy is defeated, and you reach the final portal, your stickman will celebrate with a happy dance, signaling that you’ve successfully cleared the level!

As you advance, the difficulty ramps up with more enemies and tougher challenges, so stay alert and fast on your feet! Use the arrows for guidance on enemy locations and areas you may have missed. Throughout the course, prompts will also direct you to jump to high platforms or descend into lower areas.

Each round rewards you with points that can be used to purchase upgrades, boosting your power and making it easier to defeat stronger enemies. Plus, you can customize your stickman by changing skins, giving your hero a fresh look as you fight your way through each increasingly intense round!

shoe-race.name: Shoe Race
shoe-race.description: Shoe Race is a racing game where you must quickly switch shoes to match the changing environments. Speed and adaptability are key as you race to outshine your opponents. The fastest to adjust wins the race and claims victory on the podium!

krash-karts.name: Krash Karts
krash-karts.description: Krash Karts is a high-speed, bumper-car brawl where every turn could spell victory or destruction. Race head-to-head, unleash wild power-ups, and send opponents flying in a chaos-fueled quest for glory. Dodge, drift, and demolish in this turbo-charged showdown that blends kart-racing thrills with demolition derby intensity! Are you ready to rule the road?

racer-clicker.name: Racer Clicker
racer-clicker.description: Racer Clicker is a fast-paced tap-to-race game where each tap accelerates your car, pushing you past rivals on the track. Feel the rush as you overtake competitors and speed your way to victory. Enjoy the intensity of racing right at your fingertips with every click!

classic-card-games-collection.name: Classic Card Games Collection
classic-card-games-collection.description: Classic Card Games Collection is a collection of over 150 solitaire card games, including favorites like Klondike, Spider, and Freecell. Explore new games with clear rules for every variation. Customize your gaming experience with unique card designs, backgrounds, and animated win effects. Dive into the classics or try something new while enjoying the personalized feel of each game.

dice-roll-protect-the-relic.name: Dice Roll: Protect the Relic
dice-roll-protect-the-relic.description: Dice Roll: Protect the Relic is a tower defense game that combines strategic dice-rolling with magical combat. You’ll defend an ancient relic from enemy waves by rolling dice with unique powers like fireballs, ice barriers, and healing spells. Each roll activates different abilities, making every move crucial to your survival.

only-up-balls.name: Only Up Balls
only-up-balls.description: Only Up Balls is an exciting casual physics-based game where your primary objective is to guide a ball through various platform challenges, defying gravity and skillfully jumping from track to track. The goal is to reach the top of each platform while avoiding falling and mastering the game’s mechanics.

apes-fighting-gorilla-game.name: Apes Fighting Gorilla Game
apes-fighting-gorilla-game.description: Apes Fighting Gorilla Game is a wild fighting game where you battle rival monkeys and work your way up to King Kong status. Show off your strength by throwing opponents down and grabbing bananas to boost your power. With each clash, you’ll face tougher chimpanzee challenges. How long can you survive the fierce jungle showdown?

survival-runners.name: Survival Runners
survival-runners.description: Survival Runners is a fast-paced adventure where you race through thrilling worlds, collecting coins and unlocking powerful gear. Upgrade your character, discover legendary swords from chests, and smash mines for extra loot. Battle rivals and conquer unique challenges in each new world. Can you rise to the top and become the ultimate Survival Runner?

dungeon-of-terror.name: Dungeon of Terror
dungeon-of-terror.description: Dungeon of Terror is a thrilling casual deck-building game where strategy, resource management, and survival come together. Your mission is to navigate a labyrinthine dungeon, gather resources, and release imprisoned captives—all while avoiding the wrath of the terrifying Minotaur that lurks within.

run-desnecessauro.name: Run Desnecessauro
run-desnecessauro.description: Run with Desnecessauro takes you on a wild adventure with Desnecessauro. Help Desnecessauro pursue Coitadossauro and find the most creative ways to "destroy" his unlucky best friend. Dodge obstacles or blow them up, whichever suits your mood! Customize Desnecessauro with your favorite outfits, collect funny in-game photos, and enjoy the quirky voices and jokes that add to the fun. Unlock achievements as you explore all the crazy antics and laugh-out-loud moments. What are you waiting for? It's time to RUN with Desnecessauro and experience the madness!

syder-hyper-drive.name: Syder Hyper Drive
syder-hyper-drive.description: Syder Hyper Drive is a futuristic stunt car game where you can perform thrilling stunts using a variety of cool vehicles. Unlock and upgrade different rides as you tackle challenging missions in an endless adventure. Show off your skills, conquer obstacles, and push your stunt-driving limits to the max!

northern-lights.name: Northern Lights
northern-lights.description: Northern Lights is an enchanting casual merge game where you can create new items while exploring a magical forest. The clever Scientist Cat has hidden objects throughout the forest, waiting for you to discover and merge them into valuable treasures. As you merge and unlock new items, you'll earn emeralds to boost your progress. The friendly cat welcomes new guests and invites you to dive into this mysterious world of surprises. With relaxing gameplay and endless merging possibilities, this game is perfect for those who love exploration and creativity!

chicken-clicker.name: Chicken Clicker
chicken-clicker.description: Chicken Clicker is a fun, clicker, idle game where you help a fearless chicken on an epic flight through infinite universes. Click to soar higher, uncover bizarre realms, and unlock unexpected surprises at every turn. With vibrant visuals, fast-paced challenges, and endless opportunities to push your limits, this quirky game will keep you coming back for more sky-high clicking. Get your fingers ready for a non-stop clickable challenge.
chicken-clicker.faq:
What is the chicken game where you click?

Chicken Clicker is an idle clicker game where you help a fearless chicken on an epic flight through infinite universes.

What are those clicker games called?

Clicker games are a genre of games where players perform simple tasks. The genre falls under a category of games called idle games.
chicken-clicker.controls: Use the left mouse button to play.
chicken-clicker.how_to_play:
In Chicken Clicker, your success is based on a single click or a single click multiplied by forever. With every click, you can watch as your chicken pops out eggs, which somehow keep your chicken afloat, climbing higher and higher.

As the eggs pile up, you can invest in upgrades like boosting eggs per click or earning passive eggs per second. Before you know it, you're skyrocketing past the clouds, unlocking outrageous outfits, bizarre hats, and even cosmic accessories for your chicken.

Need a break from clicking? Use one of the jet packs available to you, but you can’t relax too much. You will still need to click to go high and finish the round.

The aim of the game is to get your chicken as high as possible and reach absurd milestones like superseding the height of the Eiffel Tower, and if that is not challenging enough, keep clicking to get to space. As you transform simple clicks into an egg empire, you will quickly realize that the challenge just keeps getting higher and higher.

So, you think the game ends in space? Nope, this game is never one click away from the end. Keep clicking to break new records and push the egg count to infinity—because in Chicken Clicker, the eggs seem to never end.

icee-scream-haunted-bubbles.name: ICEE Scream: Haunted Bubbles
icee-scream-haunted-bubbles.description: ICEE Scream: Haunted Bubbles is a spooky bubble shooter game that combines fast-paced action with challenging puzzles, perfect for fans of casual and arcade-style gameplay. Take on the role of the brave ICEE Bear, who must stop the evil Raging Raccoon from spreading a dark curse over the frozen world of ICEE. Armed with a powerful bubble cannon, you'll need to shoot your way through haunted levels filled with ghostly bubbles and eerie puzzles to save the day.

draw-defense.name: Draw Defense
draw-defense.description: Draw Defense is a casual game to defend your castle by drawing lines with the mouse to crush waves of advancing enemies. Each line drops down to eliminate foes, challenging you to place them strategically before your defenses are breached. The simple controls and fast-paced gameplay make every move crucial as the onslaught intensifies. Combos add excitement, rewarding quick kills of three or more enemies with an ink refill to keep up the momentum. Upgrading your abilities is essential to survival—boost your ink bar's capacity and refill rate for more frequent attacks. These upgrades allow you to keep up with the growing enemy waves, adding depth to the action. As a final line of defense, your archer automatically fires arrows when enemies get close to the castle. Each enemy that reaches the castle costs you one of your three hearts, and losing them all means game over. Draw Defense tests your skill in balancing rapid drawing, timely upgrades, and last-ditch defenses in a thrilling fight for survival.

last-play-ragdoll-sandbox-kqb.name: Last Play: Ragdoll Sandbox
last-play-ragdoll-sandbox-kqb.description: Last Play: Ragdoll Sandbox is an action sandbox universe where your creativity takes center stage. Build stunning structures, pilot powerful mechs, and populate your world with lively ragdolls. Enjoy thrilling destruction, uncover quirky melon-themed mini-games, and design imaginative playgrounds. With tools to create and share your own games, the possibilities are endless. What will you create?
last-play-ragdoll-sandbox-kqb.faq:
What is the best free ragdoll game?

There are plenty of free ragdoll games to choose from online. The only way to find the "best" is to play them all!

What is ragdoll sandbox?

Ragdoll sandbox is a type of physics-based game where you build and navigate dynamic ragdolls. Create and explore in a sandbox world full of endless possibilities and realistic interactions.
last-play-ragdoll-sandbox-kqb.controls:
• Arrange battles in the sandbox and unlock new items by passing challenges in various genres. Go through mini-games to unlock new characters for the sandbox and make the battle of your dreams come true.
  • Use the WASD buttons on the keyboard to move the character
  • Use the left and right mouse buttons to interact with sandbox objects and the interface
last-play-ragdoll-sandbox-kqb.how_to_play:
Last Play: Ragdoll Sandbox is an action-packed world of this immersive shooter game! Start with Sandbox Mode, available right from the get-go. Choose from three distinct maps: Default, War City, and the Bunker Map. For a hassle-free experience, begin with the Default map: it comes with no ad interruptions or upgrade restrictions. Don’t forget to claim your daily bonus and customize your gameplay with specific guns to match your style.

As you progress on your journey, you'll encounter obstacles that must be destroyed. Stand in front of them, and your player will automatically fire. But beware, shoot too slowly, and you risk being counterattacked, overwhelmed, and ultimately defeated. Stay sharp and quick to survive!

You can also go for more focused challenges and unlock exclusive modes like Titan Plasma, Titan Drill, Titan TV, and Titan DJ. These thrilling experiences require ticket upgrades, which you can earn by waiting a set amount of time or watching multiple ads.

Strategic upgrades are key to survival. Power up with enhancements for health, freeze, plasma, bouncing bullets, ricochet, explosions, and more! As you progress, you’ll encounter destructible objects blocking your path. Stand your ground, and your character will automatically shoot. But beware, if you’re too slow to destroy these obstacles, you risk being counterattacked, overwhelmed, or even killed.

merge-monsters-halloween.name: Halloween Merge
merge-monsters-halloween.description: Halloween Merge is a spooky-themed casual merge game where you dive into the secrets of the Spelton Estate! Join Chloe on a thrilling Halloween adventure to uncover the mystery of her family’s past and restore the mansion to its former glory. Solve the witch’s disappearance, fend off goblins, and prepare the estate for a haunting Halloween celebration! Uncover hidden mysteries and decorate for the spookiest time of the year in Halloween Merge!

slingshot-fortress.name: Slingshot Fortress
slingshot-fortress.description: Slingshot Fortress is a casual destroy 2D action game that turns every shot into a flashback of your younger, more menacing days. Get ready to shoot stones, bombs, and shurikens, and let your slingshot shine as you smash through towering fortresses to uncover and defeat sneaky hidden creatures. Each level takes you to vibrant, ever-changing landscapes—from lush forests to icy tundras. Slingshot Fortress is the ultimate test of your aim and ingenuity. Sling, smash, and conquer in this nostalgic game.
slingshot-fortress.faq:
What is the game where you use a slingshot?

Slingshot Fortress is a game where your only weapon is a slingshot, and your objective is to destroy structures that get more intricate with each level.

How do you get rewards in Slingshot Fortress?

There are plenty of ways to get rewards in Slingshot Fortress, including snatching up as many diamonds as possible in the structures you destroy.
slingshot-fortress.controls:
• Aim = Click and hold on the projectile in the slingshot
  • Pull Back = Drag the mouse to adjust the angle and power
  • Release = Let go to launch the projectile
  • Activate Effect = Click while the projectile is in the air to trigger its special effect before it hits anything
slingshot-fortress.how_to_play:
Master the art of destruction in Slingshot Fortress and destroy structures in sight with basic sticks and stones, the good old-fashioned way. Each round will present you with an intricate structure filled with cakes, little creatures, diamond rewards, balloons, and more hidden between a structural foundation that can, and should, easily be destroyed.

Begin by clicking and holding the projectile in your slingshot, then pull back by dragging your mouse to adjust the angle and power of your shot. When ready, release to launch. But here’s the twist—some projectiles come with special effects! Click mid-air to trigger their unique abilities before they hit anything, adding an extra layer of strategy to your aim.

This physics-inspired game challenges your precision and creativity as you knock down increasingly complex towers to advance through levels. Start simple with stones and wooden structures, aiming for weak points or TNT barrels to cause a satisfying chain reaction of destruction. As the levels get harder, you'll need to carefully study each structure to find its Achilles' heel, with fewer projectiles at your disposal to make every shot count.

Strategy is everything. If there’s no TNT, aim for the base of the structure—it’s all about that base! Some objects require a smarter approach: target support beams to unbalance the tower or pop balloons holding parts of the structure afloat. The game rewards clever thinking and sharp aim, keeping every level fresh and challenging.

Are you ready to conquer gravity and bring down every fortress in your path? Grab your slingshot, take aim, and let the destruction begin!

real-drift-world-2.name: Real Drift World
real-drift-world-2.description: Real Drift World is a dynamic driving experience where you can explore the city or map freely, either on foot or behind the wheel. Master thrilling drifts, tackle challenging road features, and catch serious air on ramps. Switch up the adventure with multiple maps, parking levels, and tournaments. In this limitless world, your skills make the rules.

sculpture-collector.name: Sculpture Collector
sculpture-collector.description: Sculpture Collector is a clicker game where every tap reveals a path to hidden treasures buried in stone. Chip away to unearth rare, beautiful sculptures and add them to your growing collection. With each new find, you get closer to becoming the ultimate collector. Start tapping and discover the ancient wonders waiting for you!

fashion-tour-simulator.name: Fashion Tour Simulator
fashion-tour-simulator.description: Fashion Tour Simulator is your ticket to global runway domination! Step into the world of high fashion as a fabulous stylist and dress up supermodels to rule the catwalks in iconic locations worldwide. Unleash your creativity with stunning makeovers, glamorous outfits, and chic accessories. Compete with other fashionistas, showcase your unique style, and climb the ranks to become a fashion legend. Decorate, dress up, and dazzle your way to victory. Every vote brings you closer to the crown. Join the ultimate fashion journey today and let your style shine!

crazy-guys.name: Crazy Guys
crazy-guys.description: Crazy Guys is a chaotic party game that throws you into colorful, unpredictable obstacle courses packed with wild challenges. You’ll guide your bouncy character through hilarious chaos, dodging traps and racing others to stay in the game. Test your reflexes, embrace the madness, and show everyone you’ve got the moves to reach the finish line.

parking-race-drift-master.name: Parking Race: Drift Master
parking-race-drift-master.description: Parking Race:Drift Master is a high-octane driving game that puts your skills to the test. Race through tight spaces, master sharp drifts, and navigate tricky courses to perfect your parking. Each level ramps up the challenge, pushing you to prove your precision and speed as you aim to become the top parking expert!

bouncy-pickaxe.name: Bouncy Pickaxe
bouncy-pickaxe.description: Bouncy Pickaxe is a fun, fast-paced game where you buy, merge, and drop tools to smash blocks and earn money and experience. Strategically upgrade your tools and use boosts to reach new levels, unlocking more rewards. Keep refining your strategy to maximize your earnings and push to the next stage.

fix-the-hoof-hkv.name: Fix The Hoof
fix-the-hoof-hkv.description: Fix The Hoof is a relaxing simulation game where you step into the role of a hoof specialist, cleaning and restoring the hooves of animals like horses, cows, and goats. Experience the most satisfying ASMR moments as you clean, polish, and paint hooves in this immersive 3D game. Collect money from your services to upgrade your farm and buy new animals to care for. Whether you're a fan of ASMR videos or simply seeking a stress-relieving activity, Fix The Hoof offers a therapeutic and enjoyable experience, letting you indulge in the oddly satisfying art of hoof care!

supermarket-simulator-cashier-game.name: Supermarket Simulator: Store Manager
supermarket-simulator-cashier-game.description: Supermarket Simulator: Store Manager is a dynamic retail experience where you juggle cashier duties and store management. Scan items, process payments, and keep customers happy while managing stock and organizing shelves. As challenges intensify, you’ll grow your store and meet rising demand. Can you handle the rush and build a thriving supermarket empire?

wizard-masters.name: Wizard Masters
wizard-masters.description: Wizard Masters is an action multiplayer game that immerses you in a medieval world of magic and mayhem. Team up with your friends and unleash your arcane powers to dominate your opponents in thrilling magical duels. Scorch them with flames or blow them away with gusts of wind; Wizard Masters promises endless magical chaos. Step into the arena and show your mastery of the elements!

autumn-glam-gala.name: Autumn Glam Gala
autumn-glam-gala.description: Get ready to light up the season with Autumn Glam Gala, a beauty makeup game, the ultimate fashion and makeup experience! Transform three besties into autumn-style icons for the gala of the year. Immerse yourself in a world of beauty, where every choice—whether it’s soft, earthy tones or bold, golden sparkles—captures the magic of fall. Mix and match an array of luxurious makeup shades, chic hairstyles, and dazzling outfits to craft show-stopping looks. Embrace the season’s hottest trends, flex your makeup artist skills, and watch your creations shine under the gala lights.
autumn-glam-gala.faq:
Where can I play Autumn Glam Gala?

You can play Autumn Glam Gala online at CrazyGames.

Do all the girls have the same outfit choices in Autumn Glam Gala?

The three friends in Autumn Glam Gala have different outfits, hair, and makeup selections.
autumn-glam-gala.controls: Use a mouse to play the game.
autumn-glam-gala.how_to_play:
Autumn Glam Gala invites you to style and dazzle for the ultimate Fall event! Available in five languages—English, Russian, Spanish, Turkish, and Portuguese—this game is your chance to be the ultimate stylist for a glamorous evening.

Three girls are counting on you to help them shine at the gala. Start with makeup, where bold, autumn-inspired choices take center stage. One of your clients, Olivia, loves sparkles, while others lean towards radiant gold looks. Experiment with eyeshadow in warm fall hues like brown, wine, or deep reds. Add precision with a matching lip liner, then finish the perfect pout with shades of red, blush, or wine lipstick. Don’t forget mascara to make those eyes pop!

Next, head to the wardrobe to craft the ultimate ensemble. Whether it’s a diamond-studded blazer, a sequined off-the-shoulder top, or a cozy striped knit, pick a look that complements their makeup flawlessly. Accessorize with bracelets, from glittering diamond bands to bold gold cuffs, and choose earrings—will they be dangling diamonds or vibrant jewel tones? Every detail counts!

As you dress each girl, watch the heart barometer fill with approval. But don’t stop there! You can keep mixing and matching outfits, makeup, and accessories until your creativity knows no bounds. Once all three girls are runway-ready, it’s photo time. Capture solo shots of each look and a stunning group picture to commemorate their autumn elegance.

Get ready to unleash your inner stylist and make this gala a night to remember!

krakax-com.name: Krakax
krakax-com.description: Krakax is a multiplayer game where you test your skill in archery and axe-throwing against live opponents. Select your character, choose your weapon, and embrace the challenge of hitting precise targets using unique gravitational mechanics. With each throw, experience an inventive twist on classic archery that demands accuracy and strategy.

roling-balls-sea-race.name: Rolling Balls Sea Race
roling-balls-sea-race.description: Rolling Balls Sea Race is a casual driving physics-based racing game that propels you through stunning sea routes, where precision and speed are the keys to victory. Roll your way across vibrant platforms, mastering the art of ball control as you race solo or face off against a friend in thrilling 2-player mode. Along the way, collect coins to unlock an array of unique ball designs, colorful tail tracks, and ever-changing sky themes that add an extra layer of excitement to every race. With breathtaking nature visuals, smooth physics, and dazzling effects, each level is a new, heart-pounding challenge that will keep you on the edge of your seat, racing toward the finish line in style!
roling-balls-sea-race.faq:
What is that rolling ball game?

Rolling Balls Sea Race is a physics-based accuracy game where you roll your way across obstacle courses just inches from the depths of the sea.

Is Rolling Balls Sea Race multiplayer?

Rolling Balls Sea Race is a multiplayer game that can be played with friends or on your own.
roling-balls-sea-race.controls:
1 Player Mode

WASD / arrow keys = move

2 Players Mode

  • WASD = player 1 move
  • Arrow keys = player 2 move
roling-balls-sea-race.how_to_play:
In Rolling Balls Sea Race, you control a donut-shaped rolling ball, and while it sounds easy, it’s all about precision and balance. You can roll forward, backward, and side to side, but don’t get too comfortable – one wrong move and you’ll be splashing into the sea, losing valuable time!

The challenge ramps up quickly as you race through tight curves and tricky obstacles. The real trick is finding the perfect mix of speed and control. As you navigate the track, you'll need to dodge obstacles while collecting coins scattered along the way. The more coins you grab, the more rewards you unlock, including new rolling objects that are easier to control and give you a competitive edge.

For extra fun, jump into the 2-player mode and compete head-to-head with a friend! The race gets even wilder with more laughs and some serious competition. Keep your balance, avoid the falls, and master the curves to be the first to reach the finish line!

tower-jam-3d.name: Tower Jam 3D
tower-jam-3d.description: Tower Jam 3D is an addictive match-3 puzzle game where you must clear blocks from a colorful tower while keeping it stable! This twist on classic match-3 gameplay combines the excitement of block matching with the strategy of tower stacking. Clear blocks by creating color matches without causing the tower to topple, and climb through progressively challenging levels as you master this balance.

puckit.name: Puckit!
puckit.description: Puckit! is a fast-paced game where you clear the board by knocking pucks into holes or bouncing opponents out of play. Navigate intense levels and sharpen your aim as you strategize to advance. Each challenge tests your precision, adding a unique twist to the classic puck battle experience.

happy-dog.name: Doggy Tricks
happy-dog.description: Doggy Tricks is a mischievous casual game where you step into the paws of a naughty dog adopted from a shelter. Each level offers a new chaotic adventure as you explore the house, set clever traps, and unleash pranks to keep your unsuspecting owner on his toes.
