Your mission: stir up as much mayhem as possible and enjoy the priceless reactions of your frustrated yet lovable owner. Are you ready to cause some mayhem?

zombie-island-survival.name: Zombie Island Survival
zombie-island-survival.description: Zombie Island Survival lets you experience life as a zombie stranded on a deserted island, where survival is your main goal! In this unique twist on the survival genre, you’ll explore mysterious landscapes, gather vital resources, and rescue other zombie relatives scattered across the island. Build your zombie family and uncover the secrets of the island as you adapt to its challenges.

bomb-head-hot-potato.name: Bomb Head Hot Potato
bomb-head-hot-potato.description: Bomb Head Hot Potato is a thrilling survival game where you dodge bomb blasts and outsmart your opponents in a dynamic arena. Toss bombs to take down enemies, but beware of your own explosions! Progress through challenging levels, unlock new skins and items, and show off your style while proving your survival skills and tactical smarts.

word-crash.name: Word Crash
word-crash.description: Word Crash is a fun and educational word-building game where you match words to their definitions. Using flashcard-style challenges, you’ll learn how prefixes, suffixes, and roots combine to form new words. Test your vocabulary and improve your language skills as you progress through various levels, making learning both engaging and rewarding!

mono-move.name: Mono Move
mono-move.description: Mono Move is a casual platformer that combines gravity-switching mechanics with a challenging obstacle course designed to test your skills and patience! This rage-inducing game requires precise timing and strategic moves to beat all 9 levels while minimizing collisions. Are you ready to take on the challenge and master all 9 levels?

gridle.name: Gridle
gridle.description: Gridle is an incremental idle RPG where you’ll manage a powerful party to take down waves of enemies! Strategically upgrade, heal, reassign, and level up your party members to ensure maximum progress. With 50 initial levels to conquer, the game transitions into infinite levels where the challenge never stops.

flying-bat-robot-car-transform-game.name: Flying Bat Robot Car Transform Game
flying-bat-robot-car-transform-game.description: Flying Bat Robot Car Transform Game is a thrilling action game where you take control of a Bat Robot Mobile to battle criminal gangs and dark forces. Use your superhero abilities, like soaring through the skies and unleashing energy blasts, to dominate intense aerial combat and restore order to the city.

rush-hour-owq.name: Rush Hour
rush-hour-owq.description: Rush Hour is a high-speed racing adventure where every street becomes a thrilling challenge. Navigate busy urban traffic, pushing your reflexes and skills to the limit with each drift and daring maneuver. Embrace the adrenaline, master every sharp turn, and prove you have what it takes to reign as the ultimate champion of speed!

word-fishing.name: Word Fishing
word-fishing.description: Word Fishing is a casual and relaxing word game that is easy to pick up and play. Cast your net and reel in words! Push and collect letters to complete words in this relaxing yet strategic word game. With limited moves and time, every choice matters. Score big and climb the leaderboards!

trial-mania.name: Trial Mania
trial-mania.description: Trial Mania is a high-octane driving bike game that combines racing with daring stunts. Test your skills on challenging tracks, master extreme techniques, and aim to become the ultimate motorcycle champion. Each course pushes your abilities to the limit, offering a thrilling experience for every adrenaline-seeking rider. Join the fun and become the best moto rider in Trial Mania!
trial-mania.faq:
What is the new motorbike game in 2024?

Trial Mania is a high-octane motorcycle game by HikBoo Studios released in November 2024.

Where can I play Trial Mania?

You can play Trial Mania online at CrazyGames.
trial-mania.controls:
• W or Up Arrow = speed up
  • S or Down Arrow = brake
  • A and D or Left Arrow and Right Arrow = position your motorbike to perform front flips and backflips.
  • Space = jump
  • P = pause
trial-mania.how_to_play:
Trial Mania is an exciting bike racing game where you ride across planks just above a gorgeous sea with challenges like transparent tubes, fires, rolling balls, steep ramps, and plenty more.

The good thing is that you get to start off easy with your first round, where you can cruise straight ahead, making ramps and getting the perfect speed to reach the finish line without falling into the water. Simple enough, right? But things get more exciting as you progress through the three difficulty levels: Easy (Noob), Medium (Rider), and Hard (Pro). Each level offers a fresh challenge to test your skills.

In Trial Mania, performing stunts is key! As you race through tracks, you'll need to pull off forward and backward flips, jump over gaps, and avoid dangerous obstacles. These stunts aren’t just for show—they’re essential to completing the levels successfully.

With over 100 levels, you’ll ride through seaside tracks, snowy slopes, desert safaris, and forest trails. The variety keeps things fresh and fun.

Choose from a range of high-performance bikes and use your coins to upgrade them for enhanced speed, grip, and agility. If you're feeling competitive, dive into various game modes, including classic racing and thrilling stunt challenges. The excitement never ends!

Features

  • 100+ Levels: Ride across seaside tracks, snowy slopes, desert safaris, and forest trails.
  • High-Performance Bikes: Pick from a range of bikes and upgrade them with coins to enhance speed, grip, and agility.
  • Multiple Modes: Enjoy various game modes like classic racing and thrilling stunt challenges.

stunt-paradise.name: Stunt Paradise
stunt-paradise.description: Stunt Paradise is a high-octane driving adventure packed with daring stunts and electrifying challenges. Push your limits as you soar off ramps, pull off jaw-dropping flips, and crash through explosive obstacles. Every turn delivers a new thrill, testing your reflexes and courage. Are you ready to conquer the ultimate playground for fearless drivers?

cool-girl-aesthetics.name: Cool Girl Aesthetics
cool-girl-aesthetics.description: Cool Girl Aesthetics is a fun and creative beauty dress up game where you help Mia design her ultimate trendy look! Unleash your style sense and customize every detail to make her stand out with unforgettable vibes.
cool-girl-aesthetics.faq:
How do you dress up Mia in Cool Girl Aesthetics?

In Cool Girl Aesthetics, you get to dress your character up in different ways—makeup, nails, accessories, and more.

Can I play Cool Girl Aesthetics on my phone?

Yes, you can play Cool Girl Aesthetics on your phone, so get ready for a mobile makeover!
cool-girl-aesthetics.controls: Use the left mouse button to play this game.
cool-girl-aesthetics.how_to_play:
Cool Girl Aesthetics is a fun game where you can create the ultimate stylish look with personalized accessories.

Start by decking out your water bottle. Choose from various colors and decorate it with fun stickers like cherries, hearts, or cactuses. Add cute accessories like a phone or a fuzzy keychain ball. Don't forget to finish off your bottle with a colorful straw. Once it’s decorated, check if it reaches the heart barometer to see if it’s cool enough!

Next, decorate your headphones. Begin with a plain white pair, then choose a color to add flair. You can opt for bold colors like yellow, red, blue, hot pink, or something else that suits your style. Add polka dots in a different color and spray-paint them yourself! To complete the look, add some bows. Once the heart barometer is maxed out, you’re good to go.

Now it’s time for nails! Choose from a range of colors like rainbow, classic hot pink, or 80s-inspired designs. The options are endless! Afterward, add some rings and hand decor. Don’t forget your shades, although you won't be wearing them, you’ll hold them in your hand, so pick the coolest color to match your nails. Of course, your phone is a must, so grab it and choose a cool phone cover to complete the aesthetic.

Next, it’s makeup time! Get creative with funky eyeshadow colors, a little blush, and some sparkles on your cheeks. Finish your makeup look with earrings and hair clips. There are even gummy bear hair clips, so feel free to go wild! You can also add a fun nose ring for that extra touch.

Finally, it's picture time! Snap a photo of your look, download it, and share it with your friends. You’re looking amazing, girl! Keep experimenting and styling to perfect your ultimate cool girl aesthetic.

coloring-by-numbers-pixel-room.name: Coloring by Numbers: Pixel Room
coloring-by-numbers-pixel-room.description: Coloring by Numbers: Pixel Room is a relaxing coloring game that combines creativity with design. Transform empty rooms into stunning spaces by coloring furniture and decor, then placing them to build your dream interiors. Match colors to numbers with simple taps, letting the meditative process melt away stress. Bring your vision to life as a designer while soothing music enhances the experience.

the-army.name: Idle Army: Battle for the Lands
the-army.description: Idle Army: Battle for the Lands is a strategic battle game where you lead an army of fighters to claim victory and conquer territories. Upgrade your units' attack, defense, and speed to strengthen your forces. Use tactical decisions to outsmart enemies, earn rewards, and unlock new levels. Prove your skills as a commander in this thrilling adventure!

hot-road-infinite.name: Hot Road Infinite
hot-road-infinite.description: Hot Road Infinite is an idle clicker game where you grow a collection of cars and watch them race along dynamic tracks. Upgrade vehicles, optimize your setup, and maximize earnings as your cars speed through loops and turns. Strategically manage your track to boost performance and unlock even more powerful rides.

bank-heist.name: Bank Heist
bank-heist.description: Bank Heist is an action-packed game filled with thrilling adventures where you rob banks, stores, and more! Strategize, fight, and escape with the loot in this high-stakes crime escapade. Get ready to live the life of a master thief in Bank Heist!

racing-builder.name: Racing Builder
racing-builder.description: Racing Builder is a casual strategy game that combines racing and customization to deliver an exciting and fast-paced experience. In this game, your goal is to adapt your vehicle on the fly by changing wheels, modifying the body, and adding improvements, all for free, while speeding through challenging tracks to outrun your opponent at every level.
racing-builder.faq:
How do you get over hurdles in Racing Builder?

The square or triangular tires with a heavier-weighted car are best for getting over angular hurdles in Racing Builder.

When do I use wings in Racking Builder?

Wings are best for increasing speed in Racing Builder.
racing-builder.controls:
• Use the left mouse button to choose a constructor suitable for obstacles
  • 123 to change selecting the wheel, body, and add-ons
racing-builder.how_to_play:
In Racing Builder, you race against a rival car on a wild obstacle course where every second counts and so does your building capacity! Adapt on the fly by swapping out wheels, body types, and add-ons to match the ever-changing terrain.

Pick from round, triangular, or square wheels, or unlock advanced options like octagonal and star-shaped wheels for even crazier rides. Earn points to upgrade your setup and tackle tougher tracks.

Customize your car’s body to fit the challenge: go lightweight for speed, choose a rugged jeep for stability, or opt for an extended frame when the course demands it.

Supercharge your ride with powerful add-ons! Attach a propeller for lift, wings for gliding, or a turbo boost to blast past the competition.

search-hidden-objects-find-them.name: Search Hidden Objects: Find Them
search-hidden-objects-find-them.description: Search Hidden Objects: Find Them is a captivating hidden object puzzle game designed to entertain and relax while sharpening your observation skills. Explore over 100 exciting levels filled with vibrant images, where you aim to locate cleverly hidden objects within a set time limit. Help a charming girl enhance her style and decorate her space by earning coins through successful searches. This game is perfect for puzzle lovers as it combines relaxation with engaging challenges.

zarcane-a-zombie-apocalypse.name: ZARCANE: A Zombie Apocalypse
zarcane-a-zombie-apocalypse.description: ZARCANE: A Zombie Apocalypse is an electrifying third-person shooter where you face relentless waves of arcane-infused zombies while unraveling the mysteries of a catastrophic invasion. Explore a vast cityscape, battle the undead, and infiltrate sinister labs to halt the outbreak.

chess-clicker-lhi.name: Chess Clicker
chess-clicker-lhi.description: Chess Clicker is a strategic clicker game blending chess mechanics with addictive upgrades. Start small by earning coins and assembling a powerful chess army. Guide your pieces across the board, utilizing classic chess rules to gain rewards. Outsmart challenging enemies, enhance your pieces, and tackle unique tasks. Unleash your strategy and claim prestigious achievements along the way!

monster-makeup-3d.name: Monster Makeup 3D
monster-makeup-3d.description: Monster Makeover is a creative game where you transform monsters into humans to help them blend into society. Use your skills to choose skin tones, eye lenses, teeth, and wigs, ensuring they stay hidden from angry mobs. Protect these creatures by mastering the art of disguise and helping them live peacefully among humans.

zooma-marble-quest-3d.name: Zooma Marble Quest 3D
zooma-marble-quest-3d.description: Zooma Marble Quest 3D is a captivating modern twist on the classic marble shooter genre, delivering hours of addictive fun with its vibrant visuals and engaging gameplay. Master two dynamic game modes, and tackle progressively challenging puzzles that test your reflexes and strategy. This game offers a perfect blend of nostalgia and innovation for fans of marble-shooting adventures!

ball-guys.name: Ball Guys
ball-guys.description: Ball Guys is a fun physics merge game where you drop the ball strategically to merge them together. Watch them bounce and merge together, racking up points with every madcap collision. Try to get big combos and get a high score!

fps-commando-gun-shooting-game.name: FPS Commando Gun Shooting Game
fps-commando-gun-shooting-game.description: FPS Commando Gun Shooting Game is an action game where you take on secret missions as an elite soldier. Use powerful weapons, hack enemy systems, and engage in realistic firefights across detailed battlegrounds. With multiple game modes, thrilling assassination objectives, and smooth controls, every battle tests your skills in high-stakes combat. Prepare for nonstop shooting action!

basketball-superstars.name: Basketball Superstars
basketball-superstars.description: Basketball Superstars is a dynamic basketball experience where you create and train your ultimate player. Customize your gear, enhance your skills, and face intense rivals in fast-paced matches. Whether you are outsmarting opponents or perfecting your strategy, each game delivers action and excitement as you strive to dominate the court and showcase your prowess.
basketball-superstars.faq:
Where can I play Basketball Superstars?

You can play Basketball Superstars online and for free at CrazyGames.

How to play Basketball Superstars on computer?

In Basketball Stars, use Arrow Keys to move, Spacebar to shoot or dunk, steal by tapping Spacebar while close to your opponent, and block shots with precise jumps.
basketball-superstars.controls:
• Move = Use the Arrow Keys to dribble and navigate around the court.
  • Shoot = Press and hold the Spacebar, then release it at just the right moment to score.
  • Dunk = Get close to the hoop and press the Spacebar to slam it home with style!
  • Steal = Get close to your opponent and tap the Spacebar to steal the ball.
  • Block = Tap the Spacebar at just the right time to block your opponent’s shot.
basketball-superstars.how_to_play:
Basketball Stars is a fast-paced, arcade-style basketball game where you compete in one-on-one matches. Use the Arrow Keys to move around the court and dribble past your opponent. Press and hold the Spacebar to shoot, releasing it at the right moment for a perfect shot. If you're close to the hoop, pressing Spacebar will let you perform a slam dunk. On defense, you can steal the ball by getting close to your opponent and tapping Spacebar when they’re dribbling. Time your jumps carefully to block incoming shots.

Aggressive play is key in Basketball Stars! When your opponent is on offense, stay close and look for the perfect moment to steal the ball. Time your movements carefully: when they’re dribbling, tap Spacebar to snatch it away. If they go for a shot, jump at the right moment to block it.

Once you have possession, don’t hesitate, drive toward the hoop and take your shot. Whether you’re aiming for a long-range jumper or a slam dunk, act fast and keep the pressure on. Quick decisions and relentless attacks will keep your opponent on their toes and give you the edge in every match!

As you play, you’ll earn coins scattered around the court and receive rewards for winning matches. You can claim free daily stars and upgrade your coins, stars, and tickets to enhance your gameplay. Special packs are available for purchase, offering different combinations of tickets, stars, and coins.

Packs include:

  • Super Pack 1: 1 ticket, 3 stars, 2,000 coins
  • Super Pack 2 (Most Popular): 1 ticket, 8 stars, 7,500 coins
  • Super Pack 3 (Biggest Boost): 1 ticket, 20 stars, 15,000 coins

Customization is a key part of the experience, allowing you to change your basketball outfit and modify your character’s appearance. Your performance is graded based on defense, shooting, speed, and dunking, so strategize your playstyle to dominate the court!

food-truck-chef.name: Food Truck Chef™: A Fun Cooking Game
food-truck-chef.description: Food Truck Chef is a thrilling casual food game where you travel the globe, cooking iconic dishes from tacos to sushi. Manage your time, upgrade your kitchen, and serve customers to build your food truck empire. With hundreds of levels and vibrant locations, you’ll face exciting challenges that test your skills as a master chef!
food-truck-chef.faq:
Is Food Truck Chef offline?

Food Truck Chef™: A Fun Cooking Game is online and can be played for free at CrazyGames.

How do I make more money in Food Truck Chef?

To make more money, you need to earn more tips. The only way to do this is to cook and serve faster.
food-truck-chef.controls: Use the Left Mouse Button to interact.

towering-trials-div.name: Towering Trials
towering-trials-div.description: Towering Trials is an engaging vertical-scrolling platformer that challenges players to jump, dash, and fly to the finish line across various levels. This game blends creativity with skill, making it a perfect pick for platformer enthusiasts who enjoy challenging gameplay and the freedom to create and share custom content.

rush-hour-cafe.name: Rush Hour Cafe
rush-hour-cafe.description: Step into the fast-paced world of culinary chaos! In this co-op cafe simulator, you and a friend must cook dishes, serve customers, and keep the kitchen spotless. Expand and customize your cafe as you tackle increasingly challenging levels. Time management and teamwork are key - act quickly and stay organized to satisfy hungry visitors before the clock runs out! Perfect for players who thrive on quick decisions and cooperative fun!

bridge-race.name: Bridge Race
bridge-race.description: Bridge Race is a competitive casual collect building game where you gather blocks to construct your bridge while outsmarting rivals. Stay alert as other players may try to steal your progress, adding an exciting twist to the challenge. Strategize and race to complete your bridge first in this thrilling test of skill and speed!
bridge-race.faq:
What is the Bridge Race game about?

Bridge Race is a fast-paced game where you collect blocks, build a bridge, and outsmart rivals to finish first!

Is Bridge Race an online game?

You can play Bridge Race online for free at CrazyGames.

How many levels are there in the Bridge Race?

There are 1000 levels in Bridge Race.
bridge-race.controls: Use WASD / Arrow keys / Joystick to move.
bridge-race.how_to_play:
Bridge Race is an oddly satisfying game where you aim to collect as many blocks of your color as possible and carry them across the board to build a bridge. The objective is to create a path that leads you to the next collection area and, ultimately, to the finish line. Victory is sweet, but the challenge continues as each round gets more difficult.

The game is designed to be both simple and rewarding, with delicate sounds that create a satisfying atmosphere. You'll encounter obstacles like slides and elevators, which add a fun element as you navigate through the level, taking you closer to the next challenge.

But you’re not alone in this race. Other players are also collecting blocks to build their own bridges, and they’re more than happy to challenge you along the way. If you’re not careful, your opponents can sabotage your progress by building over your bridge, undoing all the hard work you’ve done. And if you run out of blocks and need to return to collect more, be prepared for your opponents to steal your blocks, changing their color to match yours and forcing you to start the process over again. You’ll also have to watch out for being knocked down by other players, which causes you to lose all the blocks on your back.

Throughout the game, you’ll encounter rewards scattered across the map. Green rewards multiply the number of blocks you carry, giving you an advantage, while red ones will diminish your collection, so it’s important to avoid them at all costs. Stay vigilant, collect wisely, and you’ll be on your way to victory!

basket-battle-zmg.name: Basket Battle
basket-battle-zmg.description: Basket Battle is a dynamic sports basketball game where you aim to outscore your opponent by skillfully throwing the ball into the basket. Challenge your reflexes as you intercept your rival's shots and maintain control over the game: master timing and precision to dominate the court and secure victory in intense matches.
basket-battle-zmg.faq:
Can you play tournaments in Basket Battle?

Yes, there is a tournament mode available in Basket Battle.

Can I play Basket Battle on my phone?

You can play Basket Battle on your phone or desktop. It is available online and is created for mobile-friendly gameplay.
basket-battle-zmg.controls: Use the Left Mouse Button to interact.
basket-battle-zmg.how_to_play:
Basket Battle is a fast-paced, action-packed game that puts your basketball skills and strategic thinking to the ultimate test. Your objective is simple: shoot the basketball into the hoop before your opponent does. But don’t let this simplicity fool you, this game is packed with twists, surprises, and escalating challenges that will keep you on your toes.

The gameplay starts with intuitive controls that let you tap, aim, and launch your basketball toward the hoop. You want to score, but it's not just about scoring. You’ll need to outmaneuver your opponents, disrupt their shots, and position yourself strategically to stay ahead. Bumping into their basketball mid-air or intercepting their trajectory can give you the edge in tight matches. Each level introduces new obstacles and mechanics, keeping the gameplay fresh and dynamic.

Customization adds another layer of fun to Basket Battle. Unlock unique skins for your basketballs and players, showing off your style as you dominate the court. Power-ups and upgrades let you fine-tune your gameplay, whether it’s enhancing your shooting accuracy, boosting your speed, or adding special effects to your shots. These features keep players engaged as they climb the ranks from beginner to seasoned pro.

For those seeking a more significant challenge, the game offers tournaments where you can test your skills against tougher opponents and earn rare rewards. Advanced techniques, like shooting from tricky angles or bouncing the ball off walls for dramatic shots, allow for creative gameplay that can surprise even seasoned players.

stickman-king.name: Stickman King
stickman-king.description: Stickman King is an action-packed arcade adventure where you guide a brave stickman through four distinct biomes. Face relentless enemies and defeat powerful bosses to prove your strength. Each battle tests your skill and agility as you strive to claim the title of King of Stickmen. Do you have what it takes to reign supreme?
stickman-king.faq:
What is that stickman game called?

There are many Stickman games, one of which includes Stickman King, which begins as a stickman wielding a reliable sword with the ultimate objective of defeating every opponent on the board. Enemies are positioned across various layers in each level, spanning horizontal and vertical planes.

Who is the best Stickman game?

It's hard to choose the best Stickman game, considering how many are available. Stickman King is a popular game, but the only way to choose the "best" is to play them all and decide!
stickman-king.controls:
• Hold the left mouse button/space/tap on the screen to aim.
  • Release the aim to shoot.
stickman-king.how_to_play:
Mastering the basics of Stickman King is straightforward, but perfecting your strategy? That’s a whole different ball game.

You start as a stickman armed with a trusty sword, and your ultimate goal is to eliminate every opponent on the board. Enemies are scattered across multiple layers of each level, both horizontally and vertically.

To throw your weapon, hold down to charge your throw, adjust the depth and angle of your aim depending on where your opponent is, and let go to watch your weapon fly. Precision is key: throw too high, and you’ll overshoot your target; throw too low, and you’ll fall short.

The most interesting part of the gameplay is how you move. Wherever your weapon lands is where you will next be shooting from. This also means you can jump through the air if you keep shooting and have your weapon “land” in the air. Get good at maneuvering from jump to jump; you’ve already won half the battle. It’s the only way you’ll be able to tackle the higher layers of a round.

If you choose to play it safe and land on solid ground, beware! You might end up face-to-face with an enemy you just barely missed, so prepare to act fast.

A round is only won once you’ve eliminated all enemies. Be thorough: your opponents won’t always be easy to spot. If you think you’ve cleared the level, aim higher, some enemies might lurk on the map's farthest reaches.

Rewards

To help you survive the chaos, collect upgrades and rewards along the way. Items like shields can protect you during close encounters, giving you the upper hand when things get dicey.

With careful aiming, strategic movement, and persistence, you’ll reign supreme as the Stickman King!

damn-it-ttl.name: Blast It!
damn-it-ttl.description: Blast It! is a casual jumping adventure where you control a sticky marshmallow that shoots webs to scale walls. Aim carefully, stick to surfaces, and navigate tricky paths to keep climbing higher. Avoid dangerous falls and test your precision as you explore unique skins and strive to conquer the ultimate ascent.
damn-it-ttl.faq:
How do you play the game Blast It!?

In Blast It!, you're a sticky marshmallow on a mission to climb the skies. Shoot webs to latch onto floating objects—whether it's a pizza, a hamburger, or something even wackier.

How do you stop your marshmallow from spinning in Blast It!?

If you want to stop your marshmallow from spinning in Blast It!, you will need to cut some of the webs that are causing the tension.
damn-it-ttl.controls:
• Left Click = Throw the rope
  • Right Click = Break the rope
  • Space = Break all rope
damn-it-ttl.how_to_play:
The premise of Blast It! is simple, yet pretty quirky: you’re a sticky marshmallow with one goal, climb the skies! But you won’t be jumping or flying. Instead, you’ll be shooting webs to latch onto solid objects floating above you, whether it’s a slice of pizza, a hamburger, or something even stranger.

This physics-based adventure demands precision. Every shot you take will either pull you higher or leave you dangling, struggling to regain control. Aim carefully, because one wrong move can send you spinning out of control!

Master the controls. It's pretty much the key to winning this game. Left-click to shoot your web and latch onto solid objects. Right-click to cut your web and reposition yourself.

Strategic web-cutting is key! You’ll need to release at the right moment to swing, adjust your trajectory, and keep climbing. Time your throws back-to-back, chaining them together to gain momentum and propel yourself even higher.

But beware because too much winding might get you spinning wildly. If that happens, cut yourself free before you lose control. Just don’t cut all your webs at once, or you’ll plummet straight down. And once you hit the ground? Game over.

Stay sharp, time your swings, and see how high you can go in Blast It!

grwm-date-night.name: GRWM Date Night
grwm-date-night.description: GRWM Date Night is a stylish beauty fashion game where you help Ellie prepare for her romantic evening. Create the perfect makeup look, pick glamorous outfits, and accessorize to match her vibe. After the date, join Ellie for her relaxing night routine: remove her makeup, choose cozy pajamas, and get her ready for beauty sleep. Romance and self-care await!
grwm-date-night.faq:
What is date night game?

Date Night is a glam-filled game where you prepare for a night out by perfecting your makeup, styling your outfit and hair, and completing a skincare routine, all while aiming to impress with your look and share your stunning results with friends.

Can I save the pictures I take in GRWM Date Night?

Once you take a photo in GRWM Data Night game, you can save it and even share it with friends.
grwm-date-night.controls: Use the left mouse button to play.
grwm-date-night.how_to_play:
Ooh la la, it’s date night, and you’re about to get glam for a fabulous evening out! Let’s kick things off with your beauty routine. Start by perfecting your makeup: apply your foundation and blush, then move on to curling your lashes and adding a swipe of long-lasting mascara. Choose your lipstick: will you go natural or bold? It’s your night, your style!

The better your look, the higher your "heart barometer" will rise, and once it’s high enough, you’ll be ready to move to the next round of prep.

Now, onto the outfit and hairstyle! Choose from a sleek one-piece jumpsuit, a chic off-the-shoulder dress, or a sultry silk mini; there are endless options to experiment with. Complete your ensemble with accessories like jewelry, shoes, handbags, and more. How will you wear your hair? Straight, short, wavy? Try them all and find your perfect look!

After your night out, it’s time to wind down with a skincare routine. Remove your makeup, cleanse, scrub, and apply serum and eye packs to leave your skin glowing.

Finally, get cozy in your PJs: will it be comfy joggers or a chic silk short set? Add fun accessories like a headpiece, eye mask, phone, toothbrush, and some fuzzy slippers for the ultimate night-in vibe.

Don’t forget to snap a photo of your stunning looks, download them, and share them with your friends!

get-to-zero-card-game.name: Get to Zero
get-to-zero-card-game.description: Get To Zero is a strategic card game that challenges players to master their math and tactics. Your goal? Keep your score as close to zero as possible while pushing your opponent further away from the target. With clever decision-making, reserve cards, and power-ups, you can manipulate the game to your advantage!

timewarriors.name: TimeWarriors
timewarriors.description: Time Warriors is a strategy game where you lead your army through history, from the Stone Age to futuristic battles. Upgrade your troops, build powerful bases, and use unique units and tactics to defeat your enemies. Master every era, outsmart your opponents, and rise to become the ultimate commander in this epic war game.
timewarriors.faq:
How can I get more food in TimeWarriors?

You can buy food through points earned in TimeWarriors, but the easiest way to get a quick supply is by watching an ad.

How can I get past level 1 in TimeWarriors?

TimeWarriors is a strategic one-click game. To get past round 1 and all rounds, your objective must focus on destroying your enemy's base and not just individual soldiers. Deploy as many troops as possible straight to your enemy base before they even get a chance to approach yours.
timewarriors.controls: Use the left mouse button to interact.
timewarriors.how_to_play:
In TimeWarriors, your mission is to lead an evolving army through the ages, starting from the Stone Age. Your ability to deploy troops is directly tied to your food supply. For every three pieces of food, you can send out one soldier. This means you’ll need to manage your rations: stockpiling food carefully is your priority. At the start of the game, resources are scarce, but watching ads can give you a helpful boost, allowing you to send out more soldiers and gain an early advantage.

The key to winning battles is timing and strategy. Deploy your troops when you have enough food, overwhelming your opponent before they can strengthen their defenses. Early levels allow you to outpace your enemies by cutting off their stronger units, such as soldiers on horseback, before they even have a chance to leave their base. This tactic works particularly well in Level 1, where the enemy wields essential clubs in the Stone Age.

An example of soldier deployment is based on food at level 1:

  • 1-2 pieces of food: No troops can be sent.
  • 3 pieces of food: Deploy one soldier.
  • 6 pieces of food: Deploy two soldiers, and so on.

As you progress into Level 2, the game shifts into the Farm Age, where your foes are equipped with shovels and better weaponry. To keep up, you’ll need to use the rewards you’ve earned to upgrade your army. Invest in advanced tools and weapons that match the technology of the age, but balance this with maintaining a steady flow of soldiers to ensure you’re not overwhelmed. The longer battles progress, the more critical it becomes to upgrade your troops and your base to increase food production and withstand enemy attacks.

Several upgrades can give you a significant edge in battle. A grindstone sharpens your soldiers’ weapons, allowing them to inflict more damage, while a war banner rallies your troops to fight harder as a unified force. You can also invest in faster food production to deploy soldiers at a quicker pace or increase your base health to hold out against enemy assaults.

Victory in TimeWarriors depends on finding the perfect balance between attacking, defending, and resource management. With each successful battle, you’ll move closer to mastering the game’s historical ages. From the Stone Age(70,000–20,000 BC), where tools and settlements were in their infancy, to the Farm Age (12,000–4,000 BC), where agriculture and domestication laid the foundation for civilizations, every level challenges you to adapt and evolve. Lead your army wisely, and you’ll rewrite history with your conquests!

mechs-rumble-blitz.name: Mechs Rumble Blitz
mechs-rumble-blitz.description: Mechs Rumble Blitz is an adrenaline-pumping action battle arena game that puts you in the pilot seat of a customizable robot! Prepare to test your skills, strategy, and reflexes in a dynamic arena filled with traps, obstacles, and waves of powerful enemies. Upgrade, customize, and fight to prove you’re the best mech pilot in the world!

pet-salon-simulator.name: Pet Salon Simulator
pet-salon-simulator.description: Pet Salon Simulator is a delightful game where you take charge of a grooming salon. Wash, style, and pamper adorable furry friends, creating stunning transformations that bring out their charm. Show off your creativity and grooming expertise to make each pet look their absolute best, leaving them happy and confident after every visit!

magic-princess.name: Magic Princess
magic-princess.description: Magic Princess is a delightful dress-up and character creation game with a charming anime chibi aesthetic, perfect for unleashing your creativity. Step into a world of fashion and fun as you design adorable dolls and stylish avatars. Whether crafting your own version of international icons or gothic princesses, the possibilities are endless.

realderby---crash-day.name: RealDerby - Crash Day
realderby---crash-day.description: RealDerby - Crash Day is the ultimate car battle royale experience where destruction meets speed! With intense racing, realistic physics, and customizable cars, this game delivers heart-pounding action as you battle opponents, crush obstacles, and race to victory in a fully interactive environment.

paper-doll-diary-dress-up-diy.name: Paper Doll Diary: Dress Up DIY
paper-doll-diary-dress-up-diy.description: Paper Doll Diary: Doll DressUp is a delightful fusion of classic paper doll charm and modern fashion fun. Unleash your creativity as you design stunning outfits and style your enchanting paper doll. With endless possibilities, this game invites you to become the ultimate fashion stylist in a world filled with imagination and charm.

boom-karts.name: Boom Karts
boom-karts.description: Boom Karts is a high-speed racing game where you face off against rivals in competitions. You’ll drift through wild tracks, launch powerful boosts, and outmaneuver opponents in thrilling races. Every corner is a new chance to take the lead—so stay sharp, race smart, and aim for the podium with every lap.

fashion-battle.name: Fashion Battle
fashion-battle.description: Fashion Battle is a beauty fashion showdown where you compete to own the runway. Dress your model to match the theme, nailing every detail for the ultimate catwalk moment. Impress the judges with your flair and creativity as you aim to outshine the competition and claim the title of the most stylish contender!
fashion-battle.faq:
Is Fashion Battle free?

Fashion Battle is a free-to-play game that can be found online at CrazyGames.

What age is the Fashion Battle for?

Fashion Battle is a model competition game that is appropriate for ages 12 and older.
fashion-battle.controls: Click or tap the icons to select the outfits you want to dress up your model.
fashion-battle.how_to_play:
Step into the spotlight and unleash your fashion flair! In this stylish game, you’ll dress up models from head to toe as they strut the runway, facing off against a rival in dazzling backdrops and themed competitions.

Each battle starts with a unique theme whether it’s nightclub chic, sporty vibes, or red-carpet formal. As your model walks down the runway side-by-side with your competitor, you’ll need to act fast, choosing the perfect outfits from the prompts that appear along the way. You’ll start in a simple swimsuit, but by the time you reach the end of the runway, your model should be dressed to impress.

Be strategic with your choices: only three items are offered at each stop, so pick wisely. Missing a prompt or skipping a wardrobe item will leave your model incomplete, and the judges won’t be forgiving. If you win the competition, you’ll send your rival packing with style. But if you lose, it’s game over, so time to hit the road and try again.

Remember, the key to victory is dressing for the theme. A sporty battle demands athletic attire, while a formal theme calls for elegance. Nail the look, steal the show, and claim your title as the ultimate runway star!

slime-jumper-cjb.name: Slime Jumper
slime-jumper-cjb.description: Slime Jumper is a casual yet challenging 2D precision platformer that puts your skills to the test. Featuring a unique Jump-Only control system, this game delivers a fresh twist on platforming by limiting the player's input to just two buttons for maximum simplicity and precision.

cat-and-granny-original.name: Cat and Granny
cat-and-granny-original.description: Cat and Granny is a chaotic first-person action where you play as a clever orange cat determined to outsmart the new black cat that Granny brought home! Cause havoc by knocking over flower pots, scattering objects, and scratching up furniture—all while making Granny believe the black cat is to blame.
cat-and-granny-original.faq:
How do I know which objects to break in Cat and Granny?

As you roam around the house in Cat and Granny, you will get prompts letting you know which items you can break. Walk around the house, find and follow the prompts.

Can I play Cat and Granny on my phone?

You can play Cat and Granny on your phone and most mobile devices.
cat-and-granny-original.controls:
PC Controls

  • WASD = move
  • Move the mouse = move the camera view
  • Space = jump
  • F = interact with an object
  • Q = hide in the box
  • Tab = main menu
  • R = hint

Mobile Controls

Use the in-game buttons to play the game.
cat-and-granny-original.how_to_play:
You’re a mischievous orange tabby with a knack for chaos—but you’ve got a plan. Blame it all on the sweet, unsuspecting black cat.

Explore a house filled with destructible items, set up the perfect pranks, and watch as Granny reacts to the growing chaos. Sneak around the house and look for breakable objects—lamps, potted plants, chandeliers, anything that can go crash! Wait for the black cat to wander nearby. Smash! Knock over the object while the black cat is in the area so Granny thinks they did it.

Granny’s watching. If she catches you in the act, she’ll give you a scolding. But if the black cat is close by, she’ll blame them instead—and you’re off the hook. Can you outmaneuver your feline rival and reclaim your rightful place as Granny’s favorite?

Tip

Granny’s house is full of boxes. If she’s getting too close, jump into one and hide! Make it in time and you’ll stay safe. Miss your chance, and prepare for a stern talking-to from good old Granny.

Features

  • Interactive environments packed with breakable objects
  • A unique twist—frame the black cat for your mischievous deeds
  • Hilarious reactions from Granny as she falls for your tricks
  • Simple, fun, and highly addictive gameplay

Unleash your inner troublemaker and take back your territory in Cat and Granny!

survival-rush.name: Survival Rush!
survival-rush.description: Survival Rush is a thrilling multiplayer survival action game packed with dynamic mini-games that test your skills, strategy, and reflexes. Compete in high-stakes challenges, outwit opponents, and embrace the fast-paced excitement. Whether teaming up with friends or meeting new rivals, every round is an electrifying mix of fun and intensity. Do you have what it takes to emerge victorious?
survival-rush.faq:
Is State of Survival and Survival Rush the same game?

There are numerous games with similar titles, but generally Survival Rush is not the same game as State of Survival. Survival Rush is an action survival game packed with dynamic mini-games.

How do I enter a room in Survival Rush?

If you know the name of a particular room you'd like to enter in Survival Rush, go ahead and type it in to enter. If not, leave the room name blank and you will be added to a random room.
survival-rush.controls:
• Right-click / F = use a power-up
  • T = dance
  • WASD / arrow keys = move

dogs-vs-aliens.name: Dogs vs Aliens
dogs-vs-aliens.description: Dogs vs Aliens is a casual cute simulation game where your beloved pets have been kidnapped by evil aliens. It's time to rescue them and fight back! Evolve your dogs to defeat stronger enemies, free new companions, and collect unique resources to power up your furry defenders. To win the game, you need to save all the pets and send the aliens back to the Moon! Can you save all the dogs and defeat the alien invaders?
dogs-vs-aliens.faq:
How do I get upgrade my dog in Dogs vs Aliens?

You can upgrade your dog by collecting rewards and using them to enhance abilities such as attack range, speed, and backpack capacity. As you progress through the levels, you can also unlock group attacks and evolve your dog into more powerful versions to face tougher enemies.

What do I do with the translator agent in Dogs vs Aliens?

In Dogs vs Aliens, with the translator quest, you'll need to capture five aliens and bring them to the translator in order to decode their language. Completing this task will help you understand the aliens' plans and progress further in the storyline.
dogs-vs-aliens.controls:
PC Controls

Use WASD / arrow keys / drag left-click to move around. Your dogs will automatically attack aliens nearby.

Mobile Controls

Use the in-game joystick to move around.
dogs-vs-aliens.how_to_play:
In Dogs vs Aliens, a peaceful day at the park is shattered when aliens invade and steal your beloved dog, along with other pets. Your mission is to rescue your dog and stop the alien menace from taking over. As you set out on your journey, you’ll be joined by your loyal canine companion, who will automatically attack any nearby aliens, ensuring you’re never alone in the fight. To progress through the levels, you'll need to defeat all the aliens in your path to unlock gates and move on to the next area.

The game offers a variety of upgrades to help you and your dog become more effective in battle. Using the rewards you earn, you can enhance your dog's abilities, such as increasing the attack range with a longer leash, improving your running speed, or expanding your backpack to carry more items. Additionally, you can upgrade to unlock a group attack feature, where multiple dogs can team up to take down enemies. As you level up, your dog can evolve into a stronger, more powerful warrior, ready to face the toughest aliens.

Throughout your journey, you'll encounter different quests that add depth to the storyline. One important mission involves helping a translator understand the alien language, which requires capturing five aliens to bring back for translation. The game features a range of alien enemies, each with its own quirks and weaknesses, and you’ll face mighty alien bosses in epic battles.

As you progress, you’ll explore diverse locations like the beach, park, city square, and forest. You’ll also have the opportunity to collect a variety of dog breeds, including German Shepherds, Huskies, and Dobermans, and watch them evolve into powerful animal warriors ready to take on even the most formidable alien forces.

Features

  • Dog Evolution – Watch your puppies transform into powerful animal warriors.
  • Exciting Quests & Storyline – Unravel the island’s mystery and complete fun tasks.
  • Unique Alien Enemies – Face off against a variety of quirky extraterrestrial foes.
  • Mighty Alien Bosses – Prepare for epic battles against powerful bosses.
  • Expansive World – Explore diverse locations like the beach, park, city square, and forest.
  • Huge Variety of Breeds – Collect and evolve German Shepherds, Huskies, Dobermans, and more!

move-match-3d.name: Move Match AR
move-match-3d.description: Move your body to collect identical items and meet the goals in this one-of-a-kind AR Match 3D game. Challenge your puzzle-solving skills and agility as you collect and match objects until every goal is met. It’s not just a puzzle; it’s a test of your strategy and speed!

landlord---real-estate-tycoon.name: LandLord - Real Estate Tycoon
landlord---real-estate-tycoon.description: LandLord - Real Estate Tycoon is a thrilling clicker management game where you build your property empire from scratch. You’ll strategically buy, sell, and manage real estate, all while aiming to dominate the market. Sharpen your entrepreneurial skills, make smart investments, and grow your wealth as you transform into a masterful landlord and a true real estate mogul!
landlord---real-estate-tycoon.faq:
How to play the landLord real estate game?

In Landlord - Real Estate Tycoon you build, upgrade, and manage properties while expanding your real estate empire by renting rooms, improving amenities, and hiring staff to keep guests happy and profits growing.

What is the game where you can buy properties?

In Landlord - Real Estate Tycoon you are the new owner of a property. Manage it well and you can expand your real estate throughout the town.
landlord---real-estate-tycoon.controls: Use the left mouse button to play.
landlord---real-estate-tycoon.how_to_play:
Congratulations! You’ve just inherited a property, and it’s time to turn it into a thriving real estate empire. Upon arrival, you’re greeted by a friendly guide who introduces you to the basics of running your new business.

Start by unlocking your first room. In the beginning, you can only afford to open economy apartments, but don’t worry, luxury suites are in your future once you’ve saved enough rewards. If you’re in a hurry, you can use gems to instantly unlock buildings and expand faster.

After furnishing your first apartment, it’s time to rent it out. To keep things running smoothly, hire a receptionist to handle check-ins. As you escort guests to their rooms, you’ll notice that the space might need a little sprucing up. Upgrade the room with a new bed, a wardrobe, and other furniture to make your guests happier and raise the rent as a result!

Hungry guests need feeding, so why not open a café on the corner? Don’t forget to hire staff to keep the business running efficiently. From there, continue to expand by building gyms, cafés, and more properties across town.

As you progress, you’ll earn rewards to invest in even more upgrades. Keep improving your apartments, adding amenities, and managing your staff to maximize your income. With enough effort and strategy, you’ll grow your business into a bustling real estate empire and become the ultimate landlord tycoon!

madness-car-destroy.name: Madness Cars Destroy
madness-car-destroy.description: Madness Cars Destroy is a high-octane car driving game packed with six thrilling modes. Push rivals off narrowing paths in Funnel, survive the spinning Rotating Cube, or dodge bombs in Deadly Arena. Outsmart opponents in Right Color, evade traps in Deadly Bouncers, and pass the explosive Hot Potato. Choose your ride and jump into intense, fast-paced action!
madness-car-destroy.faq:
What is the car game where you destroy other cars?

Madness Cars Destroy is a driving game with multiple courses that challenge you to destroy or be destroyed.

How do you complete a level in Madness Cars Destroy?

Each level in Madness Cars Destroy has a different challenge to overcome. Follow the mission instructions, complete them, and you will be the winner of that round.
madness-car-destroy.controls:
• WASD = control the car on the ground
  • Space = brake
  • TAB = pause
madness-car-destroy.how_to_play:
Strap in for a wild ride in Madness Cars Destroy, where every race is a test of skill, strategy, and survival! Your car is placed on a Rubik’s Cube-like platform, suspended over an abyss: one wrong move, and you’re sent plummeting into the void.

Your challenges range from navigating checkpoints to knocking rival cars off the edge. As you progress, new landscapes unlock, including a spinning top, a full Rubik’s Cube, a collapsing floor, and more. Customize your car with spoilers, wheels, paint, tint, and suspension upgrades, but you’ll need to earn points before you can trick out your ride.

Some rounds challenge you to touch as many cars as possible by ramming into them before massive spiked balls knock you off the arena. If you get thrown off, you’ll face a brutal penalty: no car collisions for a full five minutes! In another high-stakes mode, you’ll choose between fleeing or attacking. Opt to shoot, and you’ll rain bombs from above, sabotaging the arena floor to send enemy cars tumbling into oblivion. Choose to flee, and you’ll be the one racing for your life!

Other challenges include chaotic bomb-passing rounds, where you must avoid detonation on a board packed with frantic cars. With relentless action and ever-changing obstacles, Madness Cars Destroy keeps you constantly on edge, testing your reflexes and strategy in every round

tavern-simulator.name: Tavern Simulator
tavern-simulator.description: Tavern Simulator is a strategic management game where you run your own tavern. Begin with a modest setup and grow your business by upgrading furniture, expanding your menu, and attracting loyal patrons. Make smart choices to transform your tavern into the bustling heart of the town, where everyone gathers for great food and lively company.

medieval-arena.name: Medieval Arena
medieval-arena.description: Medieval Arena is a thrilling combat game set in a blocky, immersive battlefield. Choose your path as an Archer, Swordsman, or Berserker, and dive into intense matches. Sharpen your tactics, hone your skills, and outwit opponents in fast-paced action. Perfect for those seeking medieval warfare and heart-pounding competition. Claim victory and rise above the rest!

kingdom-solitaire.name: Kingdom Solitaire
kingdom-solitaire.description: Kingdom Solitaire is a captivating journey where you, as Tony the butler, restore a majestic castle by mastering challenging solitaire levels. Delight in vibrant artwork, unique cards, and exciting mechanics while uncovering a heartwarming tale of a queen and her beloved pets. With constant updates introducing fresh surprises, your royal adventure will never grow dull!

nebula-tarot-cat-uee.name: Nébula Tarot Cat
nebula-tarot-cat-uee.description: Nébula Tarot Cat is a mystical journey where you consult a magical AI-powered cat for guidance. Dive into the enchanting world of tarot, ask your burning questions, and uncover the universe’s secrets through Nébula’s intuitive wisdom. With every card drawn, her insights illuminate your path, blending esoteric charm and AI precision to reveal the answers you seek.

pen-dig.name: Pen Dig
pen-dig.description: Pen Dig is a fun and engaging clicker idle game where you start with a simple pencil and dig your way to riches. Upgrade your pens, from basic to extraordinary, as you break stones and earn coins. Build a thriving city by mining resources, constructing buildings, and unlocking new areas. Craft your unique strategy to create a prosperous metropolis!

diy-ugly-christmas-sweater.name: DIY Ugly Christmas Sweater
diy-ugly-christmas-sweater.description: DIY Ugly Christmas Sweater is a festive dress-up game where creativity takes center stage. Team up with three BFFs as they prepare for a holiday party by designing their own unique, cozy, ugly Christmas sweaters. Choose from a variety of sweater colors, then unleash your imagination with decorations like reindeer, Christmas trees, snowmen, lights, and bows. Complete their holiday looks with festive hairstyles and accessories to capture the perfect seasonal vibe. This lighthearted game blends creative design with holiday cheer,. It'sa fun way to celebrate the season and showcase your unique style!, perfectfor anyone looking to immerse themselves in the magic of Christmas.

obby-parkour-race.name: Obby Parkour Race: Multiplayer
obby-parkour-race.description: Obby Parkour Race: Multiplayer is a thrilling parkour competition where you race against others to conquer challenging obstacle courses. Leap, climb, and balance your way through tricky paths while mastering clever tricks to outpace your rivals. Stay focused and agile as you race toward victory in this fast-paced test of skill and speed!

mystery-digger.name: Mystery Digger
mystery-digger.description: Mystery Digger is a clicker idle game in which you explore underground mysteries while upgrading your drilling machine. You uncover hidden notes and intriguing items that piece together a captivating story. With straightforward controls and soothing gameplay, each journey into the depths offers a fresh and relaxing adventure tailored to your curiosity.
mystery-digger.faq:
How do you play the game Mystery Digger?

In Mystery Digger, you are tasked to dig through challenges, collect rewards, and upgrade your machinery to handle tougher obstacles. Manage fuel and tools to keep progressing.

Can I play Mystery Digger on my phone?

Mystery Digger is available to play on mobile or desktop.
mystery-digger.controls: Use the Left Mouse Button to interact.
mystery-digger.how_to_play:
In Mystery Digger, your goal is to dig through layers of challenges, collect rewards, and progress through rounds. Starting with slow and fragile machinery, you’ll need to upgrade your equipment to mine faster and withstand greater resistance. Along the way, you’ll face obstacles like concrete walls, requiring the right tools and strategy to break through. Managing your fuel and tools effectively is key: refuel and prepare your equipment before setting out.

To mine ore, control the disc and use precise shooting to speed up the process. Upgrades are essential to improving performance and include enhancements like disc size, rotation speed, power, and spike count. To maximize efficiency, you can also boost movement speed, reduce fuel consumption, increase ore value, and improve machinery reliability.

Upgrades and their cost:

  • Disc Size: 3.0 – 600
  • Rotation Speed (Max): 13 – 250
  • Power: 1.2 – 280
  • Spike Size: 36 – 8k
  • Spike Count: 4 – 10k
  • Move Speed (Max): 1.0 – 300
  • Fuel Consumption: 50 – 40k
  • Ore Cost: 1.0 – 100k
  • Reliability: 1 – 20k

Completing quests is another way to earn extra profits. Quests include objectives such as driving a certain distance, spending time in the game, or using boosters. As you dig deeper and upgrade your machinery, you’ll uncover new opportunities to refine your skills and claim rewards.

Quests for extra profit available and cost:

  • Drive a distance of 500 – Reward: 500
  • Spend 5 minutes in the game – Reward: 1.3k
  • Use boosters – Reward: 700

The key is patience and upgrades. Keep moving your machinery along and get to the end of the course.

paper-princess---doll-dress-up.name: Paper Princess - Doll Dress Up
paper-princess---doll-dress-up.description: Paper Princess - Doll Dress Up is a game where you design stunning looks for your royal character. Mix and match outfits, accessories, and crowns to create magical styles. Step into a fairy tale world filled with enchanting adventures and fun interactive moments that bring your princess dreams to life.

coin-picker-yqi.name: Coin Picker
coin-picker-yqi.description: Embark on a thrilling treasure-hunting adventure in Coin Picker! Your mission is simple: dig deep, collect valuable resources, and upgrade your tools to become the ultimate treasure hunter. This addictive idle game combines strategy and action in a dynamic, fast-paced experience. Merge your pickaxe parts, send them underground, and watch as they shatter blocks and uncover hidden riches!
coin-picker-yqi.faq:
How do I earn more axes in Coin Picker?

To earn more axes, aim for the golden chute while chiseling through the walls. When your axe hits the golden chute, you’ll gain extra axes, helping you collect coins faster!

What happens when I fill my bounty with coins in Coin Picker?

Once your bounty is full in Coin Picker, your coins are tallied, and you’ll move on to the next challenge. Keep collecting coins to improve your tools and make each round more rewarding!
coin-picker-yqi.controls:
• Hold the left mouse button or Space to increase the speed of the picks.
  • Use the left mouse button to sell resources or the left-right arrow keys to drop resources.
coin-picker-yqi.how_to_play:
You’re deep in a mine filled with coins and rewards, and your job is to collect them by chiseling through the underground. To start, hold down your axe and chisel away at the walls. The axe will bounce off the sides, and if it hits the golden chute, you'll gain extra axes to speed up the process!

As you collect more coins, your bounty will grow, and once it’s full, your coins are tallied up, and you’ll move on to the next challenge.

The more coins you gather, the better your coin-picking equipment gets. New tools like a pitchfork allow you to collect even more coins, making each round even more rewarding.

When your coins are tallied, if they land on x2 markers, your coin count is doubled, so aim carefully!

To speed things up, hold the left mouse button or Space to increase the picking speed. Use the left mouse button to sell resources or the left-right arrow keys to drop resources and keep the process going.

Keep chipping away and see how much you can collect!

microbe-mania---cannon-strike-cub.name: Microbe Mania - Cannon Strike
microbe-mania---cannon-strike-cub.description: Microbe Mania Cannon Strike is a delightful casual game that combines precision and strategy with vibrant visuals. Catapult colorful microbes into floating bubbles, aim for accuracy, and progress through levels filled with charming music and fun!

knee-case-simulator.name: Knee Case Simulator
knee-case-simulator.description: Knee Case Simulator is a delightful beauty and doctor simulation game where you get to showcase your medical skills and fashion sense! Help Tiara recover from her knee injury and give her a stylish makeover once she's feeling better.

street-racer-2.name: Street Racer 2
street-racer-2.description: Street Racer 2 is a driving drag-racing game where your goal is to win races, upgrade, and buy new cars. This game offers an exhilarating mix of play modes, including drag racing, off-road challenges, and arcade-style fun. Each mode delivers a distinct experience, whether chasing high-speed thrills, conquering rugged terrain, or enjoying adrenaline-packed track action.
street-racer-2.faq:
Can I choose the course in Street Racer 2?

Street Racer 2 features over 80 unique racing locations, each with its own challenges. These can be unlocked as players progress and earn their way through the game, keeping each race exciting and fresh.

Can I play Street Racer 2 on my phone?

Street Racer 2 is available on mobile, as well as desktop and tablet so you can race your way through most devices.
street-racer-2.controls:
PC Controls

  • A / left arrow key = reverse
  • D / right arrow key = accelerate
  • W / up arrow key = gear up
  • S / down arrow key = gear down
  • R = restart
  • P = pause
  • Shift = turbo

Mobile Controls

Touch the in-game buttons on the screen to play the game.
street-racer-2.how_to_play:
In Street Car Racer 2, players are tasked with selecting a car from the auto salon, the starting vehicle is the Model ToyGR86, Class A, boasting 295 horsepower, a 2.4L engine, six gears, and a weight of 1.93 tons. Once a car is chosen, it’s time to hit the streets and start racing!

Open the map to select a race, beginning with a 402-meter sprint. Players will need to choose a contender for each race. Be mindful of opponents: without upgrades, it's best to pick a rival of similar strength.

One of the game’s standout features is the variety of over 80 unique racing locations, each filled with its own set of challenges that test driving skills. This diversity ensures that every race is a fresh experience.

Customization plays a significant role in this game, since performance upgrades allow players to fine-tune their cars, improving speed, handling, and overall power. With a wide range of sports cars to unlock, players can craft their ideal racing machine and dominate the competition.

In the race itself, it's crucial to shift gears at the right time and avoid overheating the engine to prevent losing speed or crashing. Players can choose between automatic or manual mode to suit their preferred playstyle.

With these features combined, Street Car Racer 2 provides an exhilarating, customizable racing experience full of thrilling challenges and endless possibilities.

watermelon-puzzle-capy-merge.name: Capy Merge: Animal Drop Puzzle
watermelon-puzzle-capy-merge.description: Capy Merge: Animal Drop Puzzle is a vibrant merging adventure where you combine quirky animals, from cheeky capybaras to adorable kittens, in strategic and entertaining ways. With delightful animations, charming sound effects, and challenging mechanics to keep the container from overflowing, every move brings joy and laughter. Explore, merge, and discover endless amusement with trending creatures!

my-dinoland.name: My Dinoland
my-dinoland.description: My Dinoland is a simulation game where you manage your own dinosaur zoo! Breed and care for prehistoric creatures, upgrade their enclosures and create exciting attractions to draw in visitors. Discover new dinosaur species, design exotic environments, and ensure your dinosaurs are happy to keep your park thriving. Bring the Jurassic era to life and build the ultimate dinosaur zoo today!

stickman-bow.name: Stickman Bow
stickman-bow.description: Stickman Bow is a fun and straightforward archery game where you guide a stickman with a bow and arrow to hit targets across challenging levels.

hair-salon-beauty-salon-game.name: Hair Salon: Beauty Salon Game
hair-salon-beauty-salon-game.description: Hair Salon: Beauty Salon Game is a charming and creative simulation game where you can showcase your hairstyling talents and manage your very own salon!

clash-of-ages-dzl.name: World Conqueror
clash-of-ages-dzl.description: Enter an epic battlefield in World Conqueror, a casual yet strategic game where you lead your army through the ages to conquer the world! Build and evolve your army, moving through historical eras to unlock elite units such as archers, swordsmen, snipers, and infantrymen. React quickly, think strategically, and use your tactics to outwit the enemy. Victory lies in mastering the art of evolution and warfare!

war-groups.name: War Groups
war-groups.description: War Groups is a strategic war game set in the dangerous and mysterious Zone, where your goal is to capture all sectors and eliminate your enemies. Choose from over 10 unique factions, including stalkers, bandits, military forces, and sectarians, and build your army by collecting powerful artifacts.

girls-nail-salon---nail-games.name: Nail Salon
girls-nail-salon---nail-games.description: Nail Salon is a creative and fun nail beauty art experience where you transform clients’ nails into dazzling works of beauty. Step into a vibrant salon, welcome your customers, and unleash your artistic skills to create stunning makeovers. Express your creativity with endless designs and colors, making each client’s nails truly shine. 💅✨
girls-nail-salon---nail-games.faq:
Can I choose my client in Nail Salon game?

You are able to choose your client in Nail Salon game, though choices are limited.

Can I play Nail Salon on my phone?

Nail Salon game is available on your browser or on mobile devices.
girls-nail-salon---nail-games.controls: Use the left mouse button to play.
girls-nail-salon---nail-games.how_to_play:
In Nail Salon, you start by painting nails using a stencil to guide your design. After painting, you’ll file the nails into a perfect shape, and then choose an adhesive jewel to add the final decorative touch. As you progress, you’ll unlock more options, from detailed stencils to marble designs and more.

The stencils include fun and creative designs like anchors, trees, snowflakes, umbrellas, spider webs, whales, funny faces, skeletons, and plenty of others. If you opt for marble designs, you’ll get to choose between circular, heart, star, flower, and infinity-shaped marbles. Simply tap, hold, and dip your nail into the colorful marble polish you create!

You can also pick your clients. Sometimes a VIP client will show up, offering the chance to work with more exclusive nail colors, designs, and shapes. Other times, you’ll cater to more casual customers looking for stylish everyday looks.

There’s also a freestyle mode, where you can create your own custom designs from scratch. To unlock freestyle, you’ll need to watch an ad, but it’s worth it if you want to let your creativity shine. Steady your hand and explore a wide range of gorgeous colors!

When a VIP client visits, it’s your chance to access even more special materials. What cool, eye-catching design will you create for them?

Follow these steps to create dazzling designs:

  • 🖌️ Cut off the broken nail: Begin by trimming any broken or damaged nails to ensure a fresh start
  • 💅 Choose a new nail shape: Select from a variety of shapes to suit your client's style
  • 🎨 Choose a color: Explore a wide palette of colors to find the perfect shade for every mood
  • ✨ Choose your decoration options: Add intricate designs, sparkling gems, and fun patterns to make each nail a masterpiece
  • 👩‍🎨 Try to fulfill the requests of the guests: Listen to your clients' desires and strive to meet their nail art dreams
  • 🌟 Enjoy your final artwork: Admire the beautiful nails you’ve crafted and see the smiles on your clients' faces

atomic-champions.name: Atomic Champions
atomic-champions.description: Atomic Champions is a thrilling brick-breaking game where strategy and action collide. Unleash powerful booster cards to gain unique abilities and conquer each challenge with finesse. Discover fresh mechanics as you progress, keeping every level dynamic and engaging. With intuitive controls and endless depth, this is your chance to dominate the brick-breaking battleground!

mega-makeup-seasons-best.name: Mega Makeup Seasons Best
mega-makeup-seasons-best.description: Mega Makeup Seasons Best is a beauty and makeup game where you unleash your creativity. Design jaw-dropping looks for each month of the year using vibrant colors, dazzling accessories, and endless style options. Whether you’re a budding makeup artist or a seasoned beauty enthusiast, this game is your canvas for all things bold, bright, and beautiful.
mega-makeup-seasons-best.faq:
Can I take photos of my makeovers in Mega Makeup Seasons Best?

In Mega Makeup Seasons Best, after completing your makeover for each month, you can take photos to showcase all your hard work.

Can I skip months in Mega Makeup Seasons Best?

You have to go in order month by month starting in January in Mega Makeup Seasons Best.
mega-makeup-seasons-best.how_to_play:
Ready to refresh your look every month? Mega Makeup Seasons Best lets you explore bold and creative styles for each season!

Start your January journey with eye makeup magic. Pick a striking eyeshadow, line the top and bottom, and choose a unique neck design, like a snowy starry night or a penguin gazing at the aurora borealis. This isn’t your average January makeover!

Move on to the eyebrows: go for green shimmer, blue, or even a rainbow effect. Next, choose a bold lipstick shade like purple, fuchsia, or classic red. Add mascara to give those lashes a lush boost, then accessorize with sparkles, hair clips, earrings, and jewelry to complete the look.

For the final touch, bedazzle your face with dazzling jewels. The bolder your choices, the higher your score on the style barometer, unlocking the next month’s challenge!

February brings Valentine’s Day fun: decorate your face with a giant heart, experiment with different eye colors, and go all-in with bold red lipstick. Match the theme with red eyebrows, a crown of roses, and shimmering jewels.

March celebrates the color green! Go all-out with emerald shades or mix things up with reds. Add dazzling jewelry, and matte lipstick, and get ready to meet the month in style.

Each month offers new choices for mascara, lip color, face makeup, and accessories. You’ll progress month by month, no skipping ahead! When your masterpiece is complete, snap a picture, save it, and share it with friends.

Choose between Pro Mode for advanced styling challenges or Freestyle Mode for limitless creativity. Time to unleash your inner makeup artist!

street-food-simulator.name: Street Food Simulator
street-food-simulator.description: Street Food Simulator is a fast-paced cooking adventure where you run a food truck and serve up sizzling dishes on the go. Take orders, cook delicious meals, and satisfy hungry customers to earn cash and unlock upgrades. With new recipes, ingredients, and time-management challenges, you’ll build your street food empire one meal at a time.

trading-card-store-simulator.name: Trading Card Store Simulator
trading-card-store-simulator.description: Trading Card Store Simulator is a dynamic game where you manage your own card shop, stocking shelves with rare cards and enticing collectors with competitive pricing. Trade, collect, and organize your inventory while building powerful decks for exciting card battles. Grow your store into a hub for enthusiasts and create your legacy in the card trading world!

count-masters-stickman-games.name: Count Masters: Stickman Games
count-masters-stickman-games.description: Count Masters: Stickman Games is a fast-paced running game where you gather a growing army of stickmen to clash against rival crowds. Navigate through obstacles, choose the best paths to multiply your numbers, and lead your team to victory. Battle fierce opponents, defeat the King-stickman, and claim the castle in an action-packed race filled with strategy and excitement!

find-the-vampire.name: Find the Vampire
find-the-vampire.description: Find the Vampire is a fun, casual game where you act as a hunter to stop a vampire uprising. Your mission is to identify bloodsuckers hiding among ordinary people, animals, and even objects, then eliminate them to free the city from danger. Use special exterminator kits and detectors to expose hidden vampires. Unlock new locations, complete challenging levels, and defeat the Vampire Lord to save the citizens.
find-the-vampire.faq:
What is the game where you hunt vampires?

Find the Vampire is a fun, casual game where you hunt down hidden bloodsuckers disguised as people, animals, or objects. Spot them, eliminate them, and save the city from a vampire uprising.

What is the vampire game called?

There are plenty of vampire games, including Find the Vampire, where you try to identify vampires in disguise.
find-the-vampire.controls: Use the mouse to play the game.
find-the-vampire.how_to_play:
In Find the Vampire, you’re equipped with an X-ray vision machine that reveals the truth behind every face, human or vampire. Your mission is simple: find and eliminate the vampires hiding among ordinary people.

Use the scanner to inspect each person. Real humans will show up with clear skeletons, while vampires reveal… nothing. No bones, no organs, sometimes even bat wings, multiple mouths, or other creepy surprises.

Some rounds are straightforward: vampires will arrive in full vampire gear, and there's no need to scan. Just grab your bow and arrow and take them out with precision before they overwhelm you. Other rounds are more deceptive. Vampires might be hiding in plain sight, pretending to be normal. And then there are the bats, who are fast, aggressive, and ready to attack. Shoot them down before they reach you.

Be careful not to harm innocent humans. Your job is to protect them and take out only the real threats. And don’t let your guard down: Dr. Cool, one of the most dangerous vampires is onto you. He’s not happy, and he’ll do everything he can to make sure it gets harder to spot his kind. Stay sharp. Vampires aren’t just hiding in people—they could be anywhere.

Keep your cool, trust your scanner, and save humanity, one round at a time.

Features

  • Vampire Exterminator Kits - Unlock tools to hunt and destroy vampires.
  • Search Among Us - Vampires disguise themselves as people, animals, and even objects.
  • Rescue Citizens - Free people from vampire isolation.
  • New Locations - Explore different areas as you progress.
  • Vampire Tactics - Enemies become smarter and more deceptive with each level.
  • Story Levels - Each location reveals a unique chapter in the vampire hunt.

color-fill-3d.name: Color Fill 3D
color-fill-3d.description: Color Fill 3D is a casual color game where you move a block to spread color across an entire grid. Navigate carefully to avoid obstacles and enemies while planning each move strategically. As levels progress, the challenges grow more intricate, requiring precision and timing. Test your skills in this vibrant, brain-teasing adventure filled with engaging puzzles!
color-fill-3d.faq:
Is Color Fill 3D offline?

Color Fill 3D can be played online for free at CrazyGames.

How to beat the color fill game?

The best way to beat the Color Fill 3D game is to slowly mark your territory and only take risks when time is on your side.
color-fill-3d.controls: Use the WASD or the arrow keys to move the cube in order to fill the level with your color.
color-fill-3d.how_to_play:
Color Fill 3D is a simple yet incredibly satisfying puzzle game where you control one block among a grid of blocks that move across a grid. Your aim is to fill empty spaces with color and the only way to do this is to sprint across the board. Wherever you move across, the blocks underneath get colored. Each move leaves a trail, and the real challenge lies in making sure it doesn’t get cut off before you can complete an enclosed area.

The objective is to cover the entire board while navigating around obstacles and avoiding dangerous missteps.

The game seems simple enough but there are plenty of obstacles, often in the form of rival-colored squares, stand in your way. The one big threat is the moving blocks.

If they collide with you, it’s game over. But you’re not defenseless. By creating enclosed sections, you can eliminate these threats when they cross into your territory. You’re safe if you stay within your enclosed space.

The safest strategy is to trap them piece by piece, but if you’re feeling bold, you can try surrounding them all at once for a quicker win.

planet-life-idle.name: Planet Life Idle
planet-life-idle.description: Planet Life Idle is an incremental idle game where you embark on a cosmic journey to create and grow your very own planet. Start small, collect resources like grass, and gradually bring your planet to life by unlocking amazing new features. From robots to trees and clouds, your planet will evolve into a vibrant world full of life and surprises. Sit back, relax, and watch as your hard work transforms your humble beginnings into a thriving, self-sustaining planet.

memebattle-what-s-that-meme.name: MemeBattle: What's That Meme?
memebattle-what-s-that-meme.description: MemeBattle: What's That Meme? is a hilarious card game where you collect legendary memes, tackle funny scenarios, and compete for laughs. Respond with the perfect meme to win votes and climb the ranks. Build your collection by unlocking epic meme packs and enjoy endless humor with every match. Prove your comedic genius and become the ultimate Meme Master!

knock-and-run.name: Knock and Run: 100 Doors Escape
knock-and-run.description: Knock and Run: 100 Doors Escape is a fast-paced, casual arcade game where you race through hotel corridors, ringing doorbells and pulling off hilarious pranks. But be careful: residents react unpredictably, and trouble is always around the corner. Outsmart everyone, stay on the move, and see if you can become the ultimate trickster without getting caught!
knock-and-run.faq:
What is the game called when you knock on a door and run?
