Knock and Run: 100 Doors Escape is a fast-paced arcade game where you dash through hotel halls, ringing doorbells and causing mischief.

How do you avoid getting trampled in Knock and Run game?

If you don't want to get trampled in Knock and Run, you need to keep moving. If you stop, those following you will surely catch up and trample you. You can also step on the green zig zags, which speeds you up.
knock-and-run.controls:
• Use WASD, the arrow keys, or drag the screen to run
  • Space to start
knock-and-run.how_to_play:
Knock on Doors captures the chaotic thrill of ring-and-run. You race down a long hallway, knocking on as many doors as possible to build up your rage meter. The more doors you hit, the more intense things get—but be ready to sprint. Hesitate for even a second, and furious neighbors will burst out and chase you down.

Along the way, collect rewards scattered through the hall: money trails, loot-filled furniture, and other surprises. Green items usually mean good news, like boosts in strength or speed, while other colors may spell trouble. Watch out for random neighbors standing in the hallway because if you bump into one, it’s game over. Be careful around cleaning tools too, like roaming mops that can send you slipping straight into failure.

Some parts of the hallway feature zig-zag paths. If they’re green, step on them for a burst of speed and the power to plow through obstacles, but the effect is temporary. If they’re another color, you might want to steer clear.

Midway through the run, there’s a break: a wall cuts off the angry mob behind you, giving you a brief chance to catch your breath. At the end of the hall, it all comes down to one final slam. Smash the last door with everything you’ve built up. The stronger your rage, the harder the hit and the farther the person behind the door goes flying into a path of rewards.

Features

  • 🚪 Dynamic gameplay - run, prank, and avoid capture!
  • 😂 Different doors and reactions - someone will get scared, someone will get angry!
  • ⚡ Fun challenges - show agility and speed!
  • 🎨 Bright, minimalistic style is a classic stickman action game!
  • 🎮 Simple controls - addictive gameplay in a couple of clicks!

zombie-mayhem-djc.name: Zombie Mayhem
zombie-mayhem-djc.description: Zombie Mayhem is a high-octane third-person arena shooter where you battle relentless zombie hordes in fast-paced combat. Unlock powerful weapons, collect money to buy deadly firepower, medicine, and ammo, and explore dangerous maps teeming with undead. With each wave, the challenge intensifies. Will you survive the mayhem?

no-limits-drag-racing.name: No Limits: Drag Racing
no-limits-drag-racing.description: No Limits: Drag Racing is the ultimate car racing experience, designed to push your driving skills to the limit! Compete in fast-paced, adrenaline-pumping street races against fierce opponents. Customize your ride with upgrades, fine-tune engine performance, and dominate the track. With realistic physics, stunning graphics, and a variety of tracks, every race is an intense battle for victory. Can you rise to the top and become the drag racing champion?

chakram-master.name: Chakram Master
chakram-master.description: Chakram Master is a casual action game where precision and strategy are key! Aim your chakram, throw it to slice through enemies, and teleport to its location with a second click or when it stops bouncing. Move, dodge, and plan your limited throws carefully to clear out enemies and master the art of the chakram. Can you become the ultimate Chakram Master?

fruit-party.name: Fruit Party
fruit-party.description: Fruit Party is the ultimate basket-dropping challenge! Merge and grow your fruits by dropping them into a basket, combining identical ones to create bigger, juicier fruits, and earning high scores. Every successful merge grants coins for upgrades, but be careful, if your basket overflows, it’s game over! Use power-ups like free upgrades and basket shakes to keep the game going. Grow your fruit empire and reach a high score!
fruit-party.controls: Use the left mouse button to drop the fruit.

limited-kaboom.name: Limited Kaboom
limited-kaboom.description: Limited Kaboom is the ultimate physics-based destruction game! Use your buddies as living projectiles to take down enemy structures and eliminate foes in creative ways. But beware—your hero must survive the chaos!

air-block.name: Air Block
air-block.description: Air Block is a 2D platformer where you must jump, place blocks, and conquer challenging levels! Use quick reflexes and smart block placement to navigate obstacles and defeat enemies, but be mindful that your blocks are limited!

aces-of-the-sky-epic-dogfights.name: Aces of the Sky: Epic Dogfights
aces-of-the-sky-epic-dogfights.description: Aces of the Sky: Epic Dogfights is a thrilling aerial combat game where you take on waves of enemy aircraft in action-packed dogfights. Face escalating challenges as you battle powerful zeppelins and swift helicopters in epic showdowns. Test your skills and strategy in the skies with every heart-pounding encounter.

underwater-hunting.name: Underwater Hunting
underwater-hunting.description: Underwater Hunting is an exciting adventure where you cast your hook to catch a variety of fish. Explore the depths, discover unique species, and test your skills to reel in the most valuable catches. Every fish you catch earns points, challenging you to become the ultimate underwater angler with strategy and precision.

snake-shooter-cbu.name: Snake Shooter: Tower Battle
snake-shooter-cbu.description: Snake Shooter: Tower Battle is a fast-paced casual defense game where you use precise archery skills to take on a massive creeping dragon. Aim, shoot, and upgrade your bow to fend off relentless attacks. Unlock powerful abilities like fire arrows and multi-shot to strengthen your defenses. With vibrant visuals and nonstop action, every battle tests your strategy and reflexes.
snake-shooter-cbu.faq:
How do you win Snake Shooter Tower Battle?

The key to winning Snake Shooter: Tower Battle is to focus on one portion of the snake, deteriorating its strength and shortening the snake. Keep focused on a balanced amount of weak and strong portions of the snake.

Can I play Snake Shooter Tower Battle on my phone?

Snake Shooter Tower Battle is available on mobile and can be played for free on most mobile devices.
snake-shooter-cbu.controls: Use mouse or keyboard arrows for aiming.
snake-shooter-cbu.how_to_play:
An enormous snake is slithering toward you, and the only way to stop it is by shooting its segmented body until each part is destroyed. Each segment has a numeric value representing its durability: keep shooting until the number reaches zero to break that section apart.

To survive, focus your attacks strategically. Aim for the segment closest to you to prevent the snake from advancing, or target weaker segments with lower numbers to shorten its length and buy yourself more time.

As you rack up points, you’ll unlock powerful upgrades:

🏹 Double Arrows – Fire two shots at once for extra damage.

🏹 Critical Hits – Boost your chance to deal devastating blows.

🏹 Explosive Arrows – Blast through segments with high-damage shots.

🏹 Attack Speed Boost – Fire faster to break down tough segments quicker.

🏹 Piercing Arrows – Hit multiple segments in one shot.

The battle intensifies as the snake grows faster and stronger, even gaining the ability to attack from a distance. Equip battle gear and level up to keep pace with its increasing power.

It's important to strategize. Be smart in your approach, strike the front to slow its advance, but take the shot if you see an opportunity to wipe it out entirely! Can you defeat the snake before it reaches you?

zombie-crusher-ooz.name: Zombie Crusher
zombie-crusher-ooz.description: Zombie Crusher is a high-octane action game where you command a weaponized car to crush relentless waves of zombies. Upgrade your vehicle with devastating turrets, explosive mines, and defensive shields to dominate the undead. Level up by destroying enemies and unlock powerful passive skills, like life-steal and enemy-slowing effects, to ensure your survival in the chaotic apocalypse.

idle-craft-drill.name: Craft Drill
idle-craft-drill.description: Craft Drill is a casual arcade game where you command a powerful drill to uncover coal, iron, gold, and diamonds. Upgrade your drill and switch between specialized tools like shovels and pickaxes to maximize your haul. Strategize your resource extraction and adapt to extract hidden treasures efficiently as you delve deeper into the rich underground.
idle-craft-drill.faq:
How do you get more rewards in Idle Craft Drill?

If you want more points in Idle Craft Drill, you need to drill the more precious stones. You can identify these by their brighter colors.

How do you break the harder rocks in Idle Craft Drill?

To break the harder, larger stones in Idle Craft Drill, you need to use either the drill hammer or dynamite.
idle-craft-drill.controls: Use the arrow keys or WASD to move the drill or the character, you can also use the left mouse button to control it.
idle-craft-drill.how_to_play:
Take control of a powerful circular chipper and carve your way through a massive board filled with rocks and precious gems! You can move up, down, and sideways, breaking through obstacles as you mine for valuable resources. Keep an eye out for colorful gems, they're worth the most.

Break apart rocks and send them onto the conveyor belt to clear the board and accumulate wealth. If loose rocks get stuck, push them with your chipper or use a blower tool to clear the way. 🛠

Use your earnings to upgrade your engine, rope length, drill hammer, truck, and more! Each upgrade makes mining faster and more efficient, letting you take on tougher terrain with ease.

Some rocks won’t budge with a standard drill. That’s where dynamite 💥 and the drill hammer come in: use them to smash through the hardest obstacles and keep progressing!

Once you've collected all the stones, load them quickly onto the truck before it drives off. 🚚 As you advance, you can expand your mining empire: hire workers, refine your factory, upgrade your character, and more!

Can you master the drill, mine your way to fortune, and build the ultimate excavation empire? Get digging!

crazy-miners-multiplayer.name: Crazy Miners
crazy-miners-multiplayer.description: Crazy Miners is a fast-paced digging battle where you race to find the diamond hidden deep in the map! Dig through the terrain, avoid traps, collect diamond fragments to unlock new skins and power-ups, throw TNT to clear your path (or sabotage others), and be the first to claim victory!

go-go-market.name: Go!Go! Market
go-go-market.description: Go!Go! Market is a simulation game where you manage a growing marketplace from the ground up. Start by planting seeds, harvesting crops, and crafting simple goods like bread, sauces, and salads. As your market expands, hire workers to boost production, discover new recipes, and unlock advanced tools and machines. Balance stock, meet customer demands, and optimize operations to transform your small stand into a bustling superstore filled with a variety of goods. Can you create the ultimate market?

playground.name: Playground
playground.description: Playground is an action sandbox game where creativity meets destruction in an open-ended cubic sandbox! Whether you’re building grand cities, orchestrating epic battles, or just causing mayhem, the possibilities are endless! What will you build or destroy first?
playground.faq:
How do I kill multiple zombies as once in Playground?

The best way to kill multiple zombies at once in Playground is to use stronger weapons like a granade or dynamite.

What happens if I touch a zombie in Playground?

If you touch a zombie in Playground, you will become a zombie yourself.
playground.controls: Use the left mouse button to interact with sandbox objects.
playground.how_to_play:
You start playing Playground by adding characters to your game. Click on the heart icon to choose from a variety of characters, including male and female zombies, male and female humans, pigs, and even hybrid characters like zombie-pigs. Some special characters can only be unlocked through upgrade rewards.

Next, click on the gun icon to access a wide range of weapons. You'll find everything from handguns and rifles to chainsaws, shovels, machine guns, and more.

For heavier firepower, click on the grenade icon. Here you’ll find high-impact weapons like dynamite, grenades, rockets, and other powerful explosives that can help you survive tougher waves.

Need to set up some defenses? Click on the cement block icon to browse materials for building protective walls. Options include bricks, grass, wood, asphalt, and other building elements.

Click on the shirt icon to gear up. Equip helmets, protective vests, and other armor to boost your survival chances.

The wooden crate icon opens up a collection of useful props like emergency cones, tables, chairs, computers, armoires, and more: perfect for customizing your environment or creating obstacles.

Use the map icon to navigate the playground and plan your strategy.

Gameplay Tip: When zombies touch humans, the humans turn into zombies, so position yourself wisely and keep your weapon ready. Your goal is to eliminate the threat and make your way across the playground as quickly and efficiently as possible.

penguin-restaurant-mge.name: Penguin Restaurant
penguin-restaurant-mge.description: Penguin Restaurant is a charming management game where a group of penguin friends set out to run a successful eatery in Antarctica. Serve customers, expand the restaurant, and attract more visitors as business grows. Earn profits to open new locations and build a thriving franchise. Can you turn this cozy restaurant into a global success?

craft-and-battle.name: Craft and Battle
craft-and-battle.description: Craft and Battle is a strategic battle game where you command an army, build a base, and gather resources to outmaneuver your enemies. Recruit specialized units, exchange prisoners for valuable assets, and capture the enemy general to weaken their forces. Every battle tests your tactics as you fight across diverse maps against an unpredictable enemy army.

traffic-parking.name: Traffic Parking
traffic-parking.description: Traffic Parking is a challenging car puzzle game where you guide a vehicle home by navigating around obstacles like other cars and rocks. Strategize to clear paths and unlock tricks for tricky levels. With 45 levels, customizable car skins, and daily rewards, it’s designed to keep you engaged and entertained as you master each challenge.

raven-estate.name: Raven Estate
raven-estate.description: Raven Estate is a fast-paced shoot-'em-up where you become a fearless crow reclaiming a haunted estate. Blast through waves of monsters with strategically placed weapons that lock in the direction you pick them up. Every choice matters as you dodge, weave, and unleash chaos in this intense bullet-hell adventure. Can you reclaim your home?

pizza-car.name: Pizza Car
pizza-car.description: Pizza Car is a simulation game where you do what it takes to be the city’s ultimate pizza chef on wheels! Get behind the wheel of your pizza car and bring hot, fresh pizzas to hungry customers! From busy city streets to quiet suburban neighborhoods, every order is a chance to prove your skills as both a chef and a driver. Take orders, prepare delicious pizzas, and keep customers happy to grow your business!

traffic-rider-vvq.name: Traffic Rider
traffic-rider-vvq.description: Traffic Rider is a first-person driving bike endless game that puts you on a motorbike for an exhilarating ride. With a full career mode, lifelike bike sounds, and detailed graphics, it redefines arcade racing. Speed through highways, overtake traffic, and upgrade your rides to conquer challenging missions. Embrace the thrill and master the art of smooth racing.
traffic-rider-vvq.faq:
Is Traffic Rider a multiplayer game?

Traffic Rider is a single-player first-person bike riding game.

Can I play Traffic Rider on PC?

Traffic Rider can be played online at CrazyGames on desktop, mobile, or tablet.
traffic-rider-vvq.controls:
• Up arrow = throttle
  • Down arrow = brake
  • Left arrow = left
  • Right arrow = right
  • Horn = H
  • Wheelie = Y
  • Look left = T
  • Look right = U
  • Gear up = R
  • Gear down = F
  • Pause = P or F1
  • You can always change controls in settings menu.
traffic-rider-vvq.how_to_play:
Hit the road and weave through traffic in Traffic Rider, a high-speed motorcycle racing game where you're on the road for an endless road race. The faster you go, the bigger the rewards, so muster up some courage and overtake cars at speeds above 100 km/h to earn bonus points and extra time.

Complete daily rounds to earn in-game currency, which can be used for bike upgrades and new rides. Choose from multiple game modes, including Career, Endless, Time Trial, and Free Ride, each offering unique challenges.

Brace yourself for dynamic weather conditions, as for example riding in the rain adds an extra layer of difficulty, so stay focused and don’t let the thunder throw you off!

Play it safe or push the limits, speeding past traffic earns more rewards, but be careful of oncoming cars! How far can you ride without crashing?

Features

  • First-person camera view
  • 34 motorbikes to choose from
  • Real motor sounds recorded from real bikes
  • Detailed environments with day and night variations
  • Career mode with 90+ missions
  • Online leaderboards and 30+ achievements
  • Support for 19 languages

autorpg-arena-fbu.name: AutoRPG Arena
autorpg-arena-fbu.description: AutoRPG Arena is a turn-based auto-battler RPG where every choice influences the fight. Collect powerful items, upgrade your heroes, and strategize to dominate the battlefield. With each battle, you refine your tactics and strengthen your team, ensuring no two encounters are the same. Victory depends on how well you adapt and optimize your squad.

gravity-crowd.name: Gravity Crowd
gravity-crowd.description: Gravity Crowd is a thrilling platformer where you guide a stickman that transforms into a growing crowd. Flip gravity with a tap to dodge tricky obstacles, navigate challenging paths, and strategically pass through gates. Every decision shapes the size of your crowd, keeping you on your toes in this fast-paced, dynamic adventure!

obby-pull-a-sword.name: Obby: Pull a Sword
obby-pull-a-sword.description: Obby: Pull a Sword is an action-packed clicker incremental game where you train to build strength and draw powerful swords. Face off against mighty bosses, unlock new abilities, and collect unique pets along the way. Each victory brings you closer to becoming the ultimate warrior. Can you master the challenge and prove your strength?
obby-pull-a-sword.faq:
Can I play with other players in Obby: Pull a Sword?

Obby: Pull a Sword is a multiplayer game so you can play against other players.

Is Obby: Pull a Sword free?

Obby: Pull a Sword is a free-to-play online game at CrazyGames.
obby-pull-a-sword.controls:
PC 🖥️

  • WASD / Arrow keys = character movement
  • Left mouse button = draw swords
  • Space = jump
  • Mouse wheel = zoom in/out

Mobile📱

  • Joystick = character movement
  • On-screen controls = draw swords, jump, and zoom in/out
obby-pull-a-sword.how_to_play:
Start small, pick up a sword and swing! Every move, every strike in Obby Pull a Sword brings you closer to greatness. The more you fight, the stronger you become. With each attack, your power grows, filling both your weapon and your soul. Even the longest journey begins with a single swing.

Seek out new swords and test your strength. When you’re ready for more, challenge the ancient blades waiting for a true warrior. But be warned, not every sword will yield easily. Only those worthy can pull a blade of true power from stone. Can you prove yourself?

Explore vast worlds and defeat mighty bosses! Each new land brings fresh challenges, fierce enemies, and powerful foes guarding their domains. They are strong, but you are stronger. Gather your power, strike them down, and unlock new adventures.

Enjoy a dynamic view of the action! See your character from every angle, above, below, or even in first person, making every battle feel immersive and intense.

Features

  • 🏋️ Train - increase your strength for new achievements.
  • 🗡️ Draw Swords - find powerful and unique blades.
  • 🐾 Pets - unlock allies for extra help.
  • 🏆 Victories - compete against other players.
  • 💥 Fight Bosses - test your skills in epic battles.
  • 🌍 New locations - explore unique worlds.

ragdoll-break.name: Playground Man! Ragdoll Show!
ragdoll-break.description: Playground Man! Ragdoll Show! is a casual action 3D game with ragdoll physics where you enter a world of destruction. Get ready to tear apart a wooden stickman! Immerse yourself in a physics-based playground, smash obstacles, and relax while solving engaging puzzles.
ragdoll-break.faq:
What does the term ragdoll mean in gaming?

In gaming, ragdoll refers to a physics simulation technique that creates realistic movements.

Is Ragdoll Break free to play?

You can play Ragdoll Break for free online at CrazyGames.
ragdoll-break.controls: Drag the left mouse button to move the object.

valentine-s-day-proposal.name: Valentine's Day Proposal
valentine-s-day-proposal.description: Valentine’s Day Proposal is a delightful love story where you guide Ellie’s fate. Will she accept Ben’s proposal and plan the wedding of her dreams, or embrace a fabulous glow-up instead? Style Ellie with stunning makeovers and outfits, then help Ben charm her with a romantic date. Your choices shape this heartwarming adventure!

dark-stones-card-battle-rpg.name: Dark Stones: Card Battle RPG
dark-stones-card-battle-rpg.description: Dark Stones: Card Battle RPG is a strategic card-based battle game set in a dark fantasy world of magic and elemental forces. Assemble a team of humans, orcs, mages, elves, and other creatures to defeat powerful foes, capture their souls, and unlock new powers. Explore lands teeming with danger, from snowy valleys to scorched deserts and realms of the dead, while uncovering hidden secrets and facing epic challenges.

pure-farm-fresh-food.name: Pure Farm: Fresh Food
pure-farm-fresh-food.description: Pure Farm: Fresh Food is a relaxing farming simulation where you cultivate exotic crops, craft homemade treats, and build a thriving agricultural community. Embrace a peaceful, self-sufficient lifestyle as you work alongside friendly neighbors to grow fresh produce and create artisanal goods. Nurture your farm, connect with others, and enjoy the rewards of mindful farming.

iron-towers-alliance.name: Iron Towers Alliance
iron-towers-alliance.description: Iron Towers Alliance is a thrilling action defense PvP strategy game where you build and defend your tower against players worldwide. Fortify your structure, install powerful weapons, and lead your squad in battles. Team up for assaults, climb the rankings and earn rewards. Unlock achievements, collect parts, and upgrade your units to dominate the battlefield!
iron-towers-alliance.faq:
How to win at Iron Tower Alliance?

In order to defeat your enemies in Iron Tower Alliance, you need to upgrade your equipment as fast as possible as each level gets more and more challenging.

Can I play Iron Tower Alliance online?

You can play Iron Tower Alliance online for free at CrazyGames.
iron-towers-alliance.controls: Use the left mouse button to play and interact with the in-game UIs.
iron-towers-alliance.how_to_play:
Start with two weapons and embark on a relentless journey to fortify your tower. Build up your defenses, upgrade your arsenal, and hold the line against waves of enemies using powerful cannons and strategic weapon placements.

The key to survival? Earn currency and continuously upgrade your defenses to withstand attacks from foes wielding hammers, trucks, and more. Adapt, strengthen your tower, and turn the tide of battle.

Enhance your characters, expand your inventory, and upgrade your units as you climb the ranks. Face off against real players in intense battles: defend your stronghold or launch coordinated attacks with an ally.

Rise through the leaderboard, complete achievements, and unlock exclusive rewards. Gather valuable parts to develop your squad and build an unstoppable fortress. In Iron Towers Defense, only the most prepared will dominate the battlefield.

More Games Like This

The action doesn't stop here. Explore similar games in our action category, like Battleship or Jacksmith. Are you looking to have a friend join in on the fun? Play Getaway Shootout, a 2-player action-packed adventure.

warrior-clash-pzu.name: Warrior Clash
warrior-clash-pzu.description: Warrior Clash is a thrilling war strategy game where only the strongest prevail. Take command of fearless warriors, train elite units, and engage in high-stakes battles. Outsmart your opponents with clever tactics and assert your dominance on the battlefield. Every decision you make shapes your journey in this epic challenge of strength and strategy!

tile-jumper-3d.name: Tile Jumper 3D
tile-jumper-3d.description: Tile Jumper 3D is a thrilling music game that tests your timing and reflexes. Leap across tiles in sync with the beat, aiming for precise jumps to keep the melody alive. Challenge yourself to reach higher scores while grooving to hit tracks. Compete on the leaderboard and show your rhythm skills: how far can you go?
tile-jumper-3d.faq:
Is Tile Jumper 3D free?

Tile Jumper 3D is a free to play game, along with many other music games which can be found on CrazyGames.

What is the game where you jump on tiles?

Tile Jumper 3D is a game where you bounce on tiles as you follow the rhythm of the beat of background music.
tile-jumper-3d.controls: Hold and drag the left mouse button or use AD or use arrow left-right to move the ball to the left and right
tile-jumper-3d.how_to_play:
Tile Jumper 3D is a high-energy music game where every bounce follows the rhythm of the beat! Guide your ball across floating blocks, timing each jump to match the song. It may seem simple at first, but miss a beat, or a bounce, and you'll plunge into the void!

With a variety of levels and tracks to choose from, there's always a new challenge waiting. Prefer an endless run? Test your endurance in nonstop rhythm-based action!

Choose Your Soundtrack:

Select a song that matches your vibe from a dynamic playlist:

🎵 Bounce!

🎵 Retrowave

🎵 Feel My Heart

🎵 Love Angel

🎵 Happy Birthday

🎵 Retro Dance

🎵 Move It!

🎵 Arabian Night

🎵 Sporty Techno

Rhythm Meets Reflexes

Levels ramp up in speed, intensity, and complexity, keeping you on your toes as the beats drop faster! Watch out for deceptive tiles; lighter-colored blocks are illusions and will send you tumbling if you're not careful.

💎 Collect diamonds along the way, but beware as some may lead you off course!

Want to crank up the difficulty? Try playing without music and discover just how much you rely on the rhythm to stay in sync. Ready to take on the challenge? Let the music guide you!

crazy-colors.name: Crazy Colors
crazy-colors.description: Crazy Colors is a lively multiplayer battle where strategy and chaos collide. Move across the arena to paint the ground in your color while competing to cover 50% of the map first. Use bombs, charges, and traps to gain the upper hand, dodge obstacles, and defend against rivals. Outsmart opponents and dominate the battlefield in this fast-paced challenge!

battlecruisers.name: Battlecruisers
battlecruisers.description: Battlecruisers is a high-intensity strategy game set in a robot-controlled world after humanity’s disappearance. Command a stolen Battlecruiser, build autonomous weapons, and outmaneuver powerful enemy fleets. Progress through a gripping story with 40 levels or test your tactical prowess in endless battles. Upgrade your arsenal, unlock devastating firepower, and master the art of robotic warfare!

planetary-terraformer.name: Planetary Terraformer
planetary-terraformer.description: Planetary Terraformer is a relaxing clicker game where aliens breathe life into barren planets, one upgrade at a time! Start with a lifeless rock and transform it step by step. Build the atmosphere, seed clouds, grow forests, spark civilization, and send satellites into orbit. Every click brings your alien world closer to thriving life.

corn-tycoon.name: Corn Tycoon
corn-tycoon.description: Corn Tycoon is the ultimate farm adventure where you can grow, harvest, and sell delicious corn to become the richest farmer in town! Start by clicking on your fields to plant seeds, water them, and harvest corn. As you grow more crops, you can buy handy machines like seeders, irrigators, and harvesters to do the work faster. Don’t forget to upgrade your silos to store more corn and your water tanks to keep your fields nice and green. The more corn you grow, the more money you make! But that’s not all; Corn Tycoon is full of ways to boost your farm and earn even faster! Upgrade your trucks to transport more corn and sell it quicker at the market. Keep an eye on the sky for the flying piggy bank—click it as fast as you can to get a big money boost! As you harvest more and more corn, you’ll be able to prestige, restarting from scratch but unlocking much more expensive corn! Visit the lab to discover awesome upgrades that make your corn worth more, speed up your machines, and even help your soil grow crops quicker. Your farm becomes bigger, faster, and more profitable with every upgrade. Can you become the ultimate Corn Tycoon and grow the biggest corn empire ever? Get ready to click, plant, and harvest your way to farming fame. Let the corn adventure begin!

cut-in-half-please.name: Cut in Half, Please!
cut-in-half-please.description: Cut in Half, Please! is a precision-based puzzle game that tests your accuracy. Your goal is simple—slice various things exactly in half. Success depends on keeping the volume difference under 5%, so steady hands and sharp focus are key. Challenge yourself with each cut and see if you can master the perfect slice!

johnny-n-tommy---prank-masters.name: Johnny n Tommy - Prank Masters
johnny-n-tommy---prank-masters.description: Johnny n Tommy - Prank Masters is a casual game where you step into the wild and wacky world of Johnny and Tommy, the ultimate prankster duo! Get ready for laugh-out-loud moments as you set up sneaky tricks, hilarious traps, and epic sibling battles! Are you ready to become the ultimate Prank Master? Start plotting, tricking, and laughing now in Johnny n Tommy - Prank Masters!

block-wall-destroyer.name: Block Wall Destroyer
block-wall-destroyer.description: Block Wall Destroyer is an addictive idle destruction game where breaking walls is the key to progress! You start with a simple pickaxe—but don’t be fooled! You can mine, toss, and spin your tools to smash through walls and reach new levels of destruction.

dig-tycoon---idle-game-3d.name: Dig Tycoon
dig-tycoon---idle-game-3d.description: Dig Tycoon - Idle Game 3D is a clicker game where you delve into the depths and build your mining empire in this addictive idle clicker game! Become a legendary mining tycoon as you dig deep to uncover gold, gems, and hidden treasures. Expand your operations, hire skilled miners, and upgrade your equipment to maximize your profits. Can you build the biggest mining empire of all time?

go-escape-nim.name: Go Escape
go-escape-nim.description: Go Escape is a fast-paced one-button arcade game where reflexes and timing are your best allies. Control a rolling ball and guide it through a maze of spikes, moving platforms, and deadly traps. One wrong move, and it's game over! Your goal is to escape each level by jumping at just the right moment and avoiding everything that can destroy you. The game starts off simple but quickly becomes a real test of precision and skill.

treasure-champion---chest-capture.name: Treasure Champion: Chest Capture
treasure-champion---chest-capture.description: Treasure Champion: Chest Capture is an action-packed team game where stickmen compete to seize treasure! Your mission is to capture the chest at the center of the field and work with your team to bring it back to base while dodging traps and outsmarting opponents. Every successfully delivered chest earns points, and the intense gameplay keeps you on edge until the very last second.

trash-cafe.name: Trash Cafe
trash-cafe.description: Trash Cafe is a quirky café simulation where you’re a clever cat running a junkyard café for hungry pigeons. Dive into a world of scraps, strategy, and squawking customers as you turn trash into tasty (well, kind of) treats.

merge-magnat---ideal-store.name: Merge Magnat - Ideal Store
merge-magnat---ideal-store.description: Merge Magnat - IdeaI Store is a merge-and-idle game where you create and manage your own shopping district. Combine small stores to unlock upgraded businesses and attract more customers. Expand your area, improve your premises, and maximize profits. Watch your bustling shopping center grow as you strategically place stores and discover new combinations to dominate the retail world!

draw-climber.name: Draw Climber
draw-climber.description: Draw Climber is a quirky racing casual game where you control your characters by sketching their legs. Create any shape to keep moving, and if you get stuck, simply redraw to overcome obstacles. Experiment with different designs to find the fastest way to the finish line. Can you outdraw and outrun the competition?
draw-climber.faq:
Is Draw Climber free?

Yes, you can play Draw Climber for free online at CrazyGames.

How do you go fast in Draw Climber?

Depending on the challenge at hand, the best way to go faster is to draw legs as long and wide as you can to capture more air and speed beneath you.
draw-climber.controls: Use the Left Mouse Button to draw your legs and win the race.
draw-climber.how_to_play:
In Draw Climber, you start as a simple square block placed on a wild obstacle course filled with everything from deep holes to steep steps, tricky valleys, and towering peaks. Your goal? Outrace your opponent to the finish line—but how you get there is entirely up to your imagination.

To move, you'll need to draw “legs” for your block. A small pad at the bottom center of the screen lets you sketch out any shape you want, and once you do, your block springs to life, moving according to the design. Need speed on flat terrain? Draw wheel-like legs. Climbing a steep wall? Try claws or hooks. Facing wide gaps? Long legs might just do the trick.

The fun part is you’re not locked into one design—you can switch up your leg shapes at any point during the course. But be careful: legs that are too long can get trimmed down in tight spaces, so balance is key.

Tip

Experiment with different shapes and strategies to adapt to the terrain. At the end of each race, your final burst of speed determines how far you’ll launch—and the farther you fly, the more points you’ll rack up. Creativity, timing, and a bit of physics know-how are your best tools to come out on top.

basketball-orbit.name: Basketball Orbit
basketball-orbit.description: Basketball Orbit is an exhilarating sports basketball simulation game in our sports category, where you aim to launch basketballs to unbelievable heights, even beyond Earth’s atmosphere! Take on thrilling one-shot basketball challenges, conquer tricky levels, and perfect your shooting technique. Compete to become the ultimate basketball legend in this fun and unique basketball adventure!
basketball-orbit.faq:
What is the circle in basketball called?

The circle on the court in basketball is called the center circle.

How can I slam dunk the ball in Basketball Orbit?

If you want to get the ball in one shot, you need to carefully hit your colored target. It is more likely you can get your ball straight in the hoop when it is only within sight. All you have to do is position the arc to hit the hoop, and you're sure to get a slam dunk.
basketball-orbit.controls: Use the left mouse button or space to shoot the ball.
basketball-orbit.how_to_play:
Your goal in Basketball Orbit is to sink a basketball into the hoop from over 100 feet away. Don’t worry, you don’t have to make the shot in one go.

Your score is based on strength, speed, and bounce, and those attributes determine your rewards.

This one-click game demands both patience and precision. Watch the color meter in the center of your screen as it flashes red, yellow, orange, and green. Click when the meter hits green for the best shot. A green click sends your ball soaring. Yellow gets you partway, and red? That just keeps the ball bouncing at your feet.

Keep clicking to move forward. Once you're within a few feet of the hoop, you can fine-tune your shot: click and move your mouse to aim directly into the basket.

Head to the locker room to change your character or the game’s background. Some options require upgrades.

Want to boost your skills? Watch ads to earn extra points, then invest those points into strength, speed, or bounce. Max out your stats and aim for the ultimate slam dunk!

puzzle-survivor.name: Puzzle Survivor
puzzle-survivor.description: Puzzle Survivor is a competitive puzzle game that puts your logic and strategy to the test. Solve word and number challenges across multiple game modes, compete in real-time or turn-based battles, and climb the leaderboards. Take on daily challenges, unlock achievements, and sharpen your mind in fast-paced, brain-training duels!

gokarts-io.name: GoKarts.io
gokarts-io.description: GoKarts.io is a wild 3D multiplayer kart combat game where speed and strategy collide in explosive arenas. You’ll race, battle, and outmaneuver rivals using an arsenal of crazy weapons and power-ups. Level up to unlock bold characters, flashy karts, and fresh gear. Dive into seasonal events, collect epic loot, and leave your mark in this nonstop racing brawl.

zombie-space-episode-2-ajp.name: Zombie Space Episode 2
zombie-space-episode-2-ajp.description: Zombie Space Episode 2 is a thrilling action-survival game set aboard a space station overrun by the infected. You’ll fight through waves of zombies, search for lost teammates, and uncover the origins of a deadly virus. Use powerful weapons, unlock hidden gear, and upgrade your heroes as you rely on their unique skills to survive the chaos.

bad-cat---granny-s-return.name: Bad Cat - Granny's Return
bad-cat---granny-s-return.description: Bad Cat - Granny's Return is a delightful casual adventure where you embrace the life of a mischievous feline. Explore a sprawling house filled with interactive objects to climb, scratch, and topple. Each room offers surprises, unique challenges, and exciting mini-games. Unleash your inner chaos-maker as you leave your mark, literally and figuratively, on every piece of furniture and decor!
bad-cat---granny-s-return.faq:
What is the VR game with grandma?

Bad Cat - Granny's Return is a first-person cat perspective game where you get into plenty of trouble, getting Granny angry.

What is the cat game called?

Bad Cat - Granny's Return is a cat game where you have multiple missions to cause mischief, angering your granny along the way.
bad-cat---granny-s-return.how_to_play:
Step into the mischievous paws of a very bad cat causing maximum chaos in Granny's house! Your goal? Wreak havoc, complete tasks, and outsmart Granny to move into the next room.

Start by picking up the photo frame (press E) and throwing it against the wall right through Grandma’s precious picture! Then it’s time to step up the destruction: shoot a rocket to blast a hole in the wall, pop a balloon, and ultimately push Granny over to unlock your path forward.

Along the way, you’ll pull off all kinds of TV antics: steal the TV plug and turn on the TV for even more mayhem. Don’t forget the small touches: knocking over flower vases and other fragile decorations adds to your chaotic checklist.

You’ll have a task list to guide your missions, and if you ever feel stuck, watch for floating hand icons around the room. These handy hints will point you to objects you can interact with (or destroy!).

Use your cat-like agility to jump across furniture, climb shelves, and navigate obstacles. Many of the items you smash on the ground will help you build paths to new areas or objectives, but sometimes you have to cause a little destruction to climb your way to success!

Get ready to cause as much feline chaos as possible: Granny won't know what hit her!

goblin-punk-tower-defense.name: Goblin Punk Tower Defense
goblin-punk-tower-defense.description: Goblin Punk Tower Defense is a fast-paced strategy game where you battle waves of mischievous goblins. Use futuristic towers to fend off relentless enemies, strategically placing and upgrading defenses to alter their paths. Each wave grows stronger, pushing your tactical skills to the limit. Build the ultimate defense and see how long you can survive the invasion!

sneaker-art-rvf.name: Sneaker Art
sneaker-art-rvf.description: Sneaker Art is a creative casual art game where you become a pro sneaker designer. Grab your paintbrush, unleash your imagination, and craft unique shoe designs. Choose from a variety of laces, showcase your artwork, and sell your masterpieces in your sneaker shop. Pack your custom sneakers in stylish boxes and grow your business with every sale!
sneaker-art-rvf.faq:
How do you play the sneaker art game?

The Sneaker Art game is fairly simple but packs a punch in creativity and fun. Follow the prompts to mirror the initial design, and you will soon become a sneaker artist.

Can I play Sneaker Artist online?

Sneaker Artists is a free game you can play online at CrazyGames.
sneaker-art-rvf.controls: Use the left mouse button to play.
sneaker-art-rvf.how_to_play:
In Sneaker Art, you're the creative force behind custom kicks. Start with a blank sneaker and bring each design to life, one brushstroke at a time.

You’ll be shown a reference design, maybe it’s a white sole with a white base and bold blue stripes. Your job is to recreate it as closely as possible. Hold your paintbrush over the areas you want to color and start painting directly onto the grey canvas of the shoe. Made a mistake? No worries, you can always paint over it.

Once your design is complete, lace up the sneakers, box them up, and send them out for display in your store. Then it’s on to the next pair. You’ll get a variety of designs to replicate, and your accuracy will determine how well they sell. The more precise your work, the more money you earn: take your time, get the details right, and build your sneaker empire one stylish pair at a time.

cubecraft-merge-battle-uxw.name: CubeCraft: Merge & Battle
cubecraft-merge-battle-uxw.description: CubeCraft: Merge & Battle is a casual merge game where you step into the world of CubeCraft, where battles, strategy, and powerful merges await! Your mission? Defend the Noob village by merging mobs into unstoppable monsters and crushing invading enemies!
cubecraft-merge-battle-uxw.faq:
What is the game where you merge soldiers?

CubeCraft: Merge & Battle is a game where you merge your fighters to defeat your opponents in the ultimate battle.

How to play merge games?

In merge games, combine matching items to create more powerful or advanced ones, progressing through levels or unlocking new features as you go.
cubecraft-merge-battle-uxw.controls: Use the left mouse button to move the characters and merge them.
cubecraft-merge-battle-uxw.how_to_play:
Step into a vibrant pixelated world where your mission is clear: defend the Noob village from relentless waves of invading enemies. To survive, you’ll need to merge characters pairing identical warriors, animals, and skeletons—to create stronger, tougher fighters. Each round gives you only a limited number of moves to merge and plan your defenses before the battle begins, so every decision matters.

Types of Fighters:

🗡️ Warrior - Brave and bold frontline defenders.

🐾 Animal - Quick and nimble fighters with surprising strength.

💀 Skeleton - Fearless undead who can take a serious beating.

Win battles to earn reward money, then use it to unlock new fighters by choosing from three random options at the bottom of the screen. Merge strategically and position your units wisely—placement is just as important as power. As you advance, enemies will become faster, tougher, and far more relentless, so you’ll need to stay sharp and keep upgrading your army to survive.

Game Tips

  • Placement matters. Line up your fighters smartly to maximize their strength and defense during battle.
  • Keep evolving. Each wave of enemies grows stronger—merging and upgrading is essential to keep pace.
  • Plan ahead. With only a few moves before each fight, every merge and placement counts toward your survival.
  • Think fast, merge smart, and fight with everything you’ve got to protect your village at all costs!

tenkyu-ball.name: Tenkyu Ball
tenkyu-ball.description: Tenkyu Ball is a physics-based puzzle game where you must guide a ball to its target without letting it fall. Use precise timing, clever strategy, and quick reflexes to overcome tricky obstacles. Each level presents new challenges that test your skill and patience. Can you master the path and complete every stage without dropping the ball?

flag-arena---capture-dominate.name: Flag Arena
flag-arena---capture-dominate.description: Flag Arena is a fast-paced, action-packed battle game where you compete in an intense battle royale-style arena where the goal is simple: capture and hold the flag for as long as possible while fending off challengers! Use power-ups, speed, and tactical movement to outplay your rivals and secure victory. Do you have what it takes to dominate the battlefield?

fashion-week-2025.name: Fashion Week 2025
fashion-week-2025.description: Fashion Week 2025 is a beauty dress-up fashion game where you take on the role of a top stylist, preparing for the most glamorous event of the year. Style five stunning models in high-fashion looks, creating jaw-dropping outfits across five unique themes. From Chanel-inspired elegance to punk rock rebellion, mix-and-match couture dresses, bold accessories, and trendy hairstyles make every model shine. Unleash your creativity, perfect your styling skills, and take over the fashion world. Are you ready to rule the runway? Play now and slay the competition!
fashion-week-2025.faq:
What are some good fashion games?

Fashion Week 2025 is a fun beauty dress-up game where you get to dress five women in casual, work, and elegant wear, from shoes to hair.

Is the fashion show game free?

Fashion Week 2025 is free to play online at CrazyGames.
fashion-week-2025.controls: Use your mouse to play the game on a desktop, and tap to play on mobile devices.
fashion-week-2025.how_to_play:
Step into the spotlight with Fashion Week 2025, where each round brings a new style challenge. Start by choosing from five unique fashion themes: glam, casual, office chic, weekend cool, and a night out on the town.

Begin with a full glam makeover: pick a stunning hairstyle like a bun or body wave, match it with a stylish outfit, and finish the look with shoes and accessories. When your heart barometer fills up, you're ready for the next challenge.

Next, dress down for a cozy movie night. Go for a sporty top, like a jersey or T-shirt, and pair it with joggers or sweats. Add colorful sneakers and a hint of jewelry to complete the look.

For the office, go sleek and elegant with a neat ponytail, loafers or heels, and a polished outfit. A pop of color from your handbag will tie it all together.

Weekend brunch calls for relaxed, athletic vibes. Choose a fresh tee or sweatshirt, match it with shorts, leggings, or a tennis skirt, and accessorize with sneakers, sunglasses, and earrings.

Wrap up with a bold day-out ensemble. Try frilled or lace tops, jeans or leather pants, and top it off with a chic handbag and accessories.

Take photos of your completed looks, save them in a group shot, and share your fashion creations with friends. Then jump back in and style again!

thread-master--asmr-embroidery.name: Thread Master: ASMR Embroidery
thread-master--asmr-embroidery.description: Thread Master: ASMR Embroidery is a soothing creative game that lets you unwind as you stitch detailed patterns with precision and care. You’ll craft beautiful designs while enjoying a calming, sensory-rich experience. Let each thread guide your focus, helping you relax and express your artistic side in a peaceful, meditative flow.

tailed-demon-slayer.name: Tailed Demon Slayer
tailed-demon-slayer.description: Tailed Demon Slayer is an action-packed idle RPG where you join a brave hero fighting to reclaim Bestia from undead bosses. You’ll explore dangerous dungeons, unlock powerful skills, and collect unique weapons to sharpen your strength. Train hard, gather epic gear, and rise as the ultimate champion in a world teeming with thrilling battles and endless growth.

crusher-block-jwd.name: Crusher Block
crusher-block-jwd.description: Crusher Block is an idle game where you smash blocks, earn money, and upgrade your tools to create the most powerful crushing machine! Can you build the ultimate resource-crushing machine?

stone-grass-mowing-simulator.name: Stone Grass: Mowing Simulator
stone-grass-mowing-simulator.description: Stone Grass: Mowing Simulator is a relaxing yet addictive game where you take control of a powerful mower and transform wild fields into perfectly trimmed landscapes. Glide smoothly through thick overgrowth, clearing grass with satisfying precision.
stone-grass-mowing-simulator.faq:
How do I earn more money?

Mow grass to fill your storage, then return to the base to sell it. Upgrading your speed and capacity helps you earn faster!

What should I upgrade first?

Focus on upgrading your saws and truck capacity early on to mow more grass quickly and make fewer trips.

How do I unlock new areas?

Keep mowing and selling grass to unlock new areas. As you progress through the level, new zones will become available to explore.

Are there any special types of grass?

Yes! Some patches have denser grass, which provides more resources. Keep an eye out for those spots.

Why is my tractor moving slowly?

You might be overloaded with grass or need a speed upgrade. Head to the upgrade station to improve performance.

merge-siege-ship-jqx.name: Merge: Siege Ship
merge-siege-ship-jqx.description: Merge: Siege Ship is an action-packed naval combat game where you build, upgrade, and battle to dominate the seas. Merge powerful siege weapons, outmaneuver enemies, and hunt for hidden treasures as you forge your path to victory!

space-pizza-ydi.name: Space Pizza
space-pizza-ydi.description: Space Pizza is a lighthearted action game where you build your base, gather space mushrooms, and deal with pesky intruders along the way. Balance base-building with simple combat as you explore the quirky side of outer space and expand your operations, one mushroom at a time.

mojo-match-3d.name: Mojo Match 3D
mojo-match-3d.description: Mojo Match 3D is a vibrant puzzle adventure where color and fun collide! Step into a world full of dazzling visuals and 3D match challenges that will keep you entertained for hours.

crazy-motox-multiplayer.name: Crazy MotoX Multiplayer
crazy-motox-multiplayer.description: Crazy MotoX Multiplayer is a fast-paced 2D multiplayer motocross racing game that throws you into ever-changing tracks. You’ll race against others, navigate wild terrain, and push your reflexes to the limit. Each day brings a brand-new course, so sharpen your skills and aim for the top of the leaderboard with every daring run.

hyperspace---quantum-fracture-fez.name: Hyperspace: Quantum Fracture
hyperspace---quantum-fracture-fez.description: Hyperspace: Quantum Fracture is a sci-fi shoot 'em up blending roguelike progression, bullet hell intensity, and auto-shooter action. You are on a thrilling journey through deep space, facing relentless enemy swarms. Test your survival skills in the vast unknown.

slimecraft.name: Slimecraft
slimecraft.description: Slimecraft is a casual arcade game where you battle against endless waves of slimes and other enemies in ever-changing arenas! Gather resources, craft powerful weapons, and brew potions to enhance your survival. Adapt to the shifting battlefield and see how long you can endure the chaos!

ghetto-fighter.name: Ghetto Fighter
ghetto-fighter.description: Ghetto Fighter is a fast-paced action game where you take control of the streets and battle rival thugs. You’ll chase down vehicles, unlock new rides, and grow your gang to rule the region. With dynamic action, bold visuals, and smooth controls, every moment pushes you to take charge and rise through the ranks.

crazy-dummy-swing-multiplayer.name: Crazy Dummy Swing Multiplayer
crazy-dummy-swing-multiplayer.description: Crazy Dummy Swing Multiplayer is a fast-paced multiplayer game where you swing, launch, and fling your custom-built dummy across wild obstacle maps. You’ll race to escape the factory, grab onto anchor points, and chase the top of the daily leaderboard. With new maps each day, your timing and creativity decide how far you’ll go.

fortzone-battle-royale-xkd.name: Fortzone Battle Royale
fortzone-battle-royale-xkd.description: Fortzone Battle Royale is a high-stakes survival shooter where you face off against rivals in a massive, scenic battleground. Explore forests, cross rivers, and scavenge for resources as the action ramps up quickly. Outsmart enemies, collect powerful bonuses, and fight to be the last one standing in this fast-paced test of skill and strategy.
fortzone-battle-royale-xkd.faq:
What is the number 1 battle royale game?

Fortnite is often considered the number one battle royale game, though there are plenty of action-based runners-up games to choose from.

Where is the best place to land in Fortzone Battle Royale?

You will be able to get to safety from most places you land in Fortzone Battle Royale, but the closer to shelter you get, the better.
fortzone-battle-royale-xkd.controls:
• WASD = movement
  • Space = jump
  • C = crouch
  • M = open map
  • 1–6 = select item
  • Left Mouse Button (LMB) = shoot
  • Right Mouse Button (RMB) = aim
  • R = reload
  • F = use item
  • Drag the mouse = move the vehicle
  • V = exit vehicle
  • Tab = pause menu
  • T = chat
fortzone-battle-royale-xkd.how_to_play:
Begin by choosing a male or female character, then personalize your look with a variety of options for legs, body, and hair. Unlock and equip unique skins to prep for the battlefield.

There are several game modes to choose from, which include:

  • Single Battle Royale: Available from the start
  • Team Battle Royale: Unlocks at Level 4
  • Royale Duel: Unlocks at Level 6
  • Random Mode: Jump into any unlocked mode

Your match begins midair, launched from a flying bus. Choose your landing spot wisely, whether it’s flatland, thick bushes, or water you’ll have to wade through. The storm is closing in fast, so move quickly, gather resources, and head for shelter. Elevated structures on stilts often contain valuable rewards, so scour them.

Scavenge the area for weapons, gear, and supplies. You’ll start with a basic pickaxe, but upgrade to ranged and more powerful weapons as soon as possible to protect yourself. Use the destructible environment to your advantage—build fortifications for cover or smash through obstacles to escape danger.

Need to move fast? Jump into a vehicle and speed through the terrain, but be prepared—enemy skirmishes can break out at any moment.

Complete missions, survive longer, and eliminate opponents to rise through the levels. Play solo or squad up with friends, your approach is your own.

Are you ready to earn your spot among the top fighters? Drop in, gear up, and prove you're the last one standing in Fortzone Battle Royale!

immortal-dark-slayer.name: Immortal: Dark Slayer
immortal-dark-slayer.description: Immortal: Dark Slayer is a top-down action RPG that puts you in the armor of a Fallen Knight, battling to purge the realm of demons, the undead, and creeping chaos. Drawing inspiration from the punishing combat of Dark Souls and Elden Ring, it delivers the same gritty challenge, reimagined with a top-down perspective and streamlined controls. Whether you're a seasoned RPG veteran or a newcomer to the genre, this dark fantasy adventure offers a thrilling, accessible experience.
immortal-dark-slayer.faq:
How do you upgrade your powers in Immortal Dark Slayer?

There are passageways that allow you to choose from an array of upgrades. You can also upgrade powers by befriending allies.

How do you swing your sword in Immortal Dark Slayer?

Stand near your opponent, and your sword will automatically hit enemies in Immortal Dark Slayer.
immortal-dark-slayer.controls:
• WASD or the arrow keys to move
  • Left mouse button to interact with in-game UI
immortal-dark-slayer.how_to_play:
It’s just you, your blade, and your courage—facing off against waves of enemies, including some terrifying monsters from the depths.

You begin armed with a longsword, but as you collect coins and gain power, you’ll unlock stronger weapons to aid your quest. Combat is intuitive: stand near an enemy and your sword will automatically strike. Some foes fall with one hit; others demand persistence and precise timing.

Avoid taking damage. If enemies land too many hits, your health will drain, and you’ll fall. Dodge, retreat, and strike smartly to stay alive.

Each defeated enemy drops coins—grab them to upgrade your stats, including:

  • Damage – Hit harder, destroy faster
  • Health – Increase your resilience
  • Speed – Move and dodge more quickly

Worship one of three gods to gain powerful passive abilities:

  • Dora, Goddess of Light – Heals a small percentage of your health every 0.5 seconds
  • Vlac, God of Death – Regain 7% health each time you kill an enemy
  • Egoism, All for You – Boost all attributes by 10%

There are several doors to unlock, but this can only be done when you have successfully destroyed your enemies. No level is complete until the last enemy falls.

slap-and-run.name: Slap and Run
slap-and-run.description: Slap and Run is a fast-paced arcade game where your goal is simple—slap as many unsuspecting pedestrians as you can and outrun the chaos that follows. Dodge obstacles, weave through streets, and stay just ahead of the growing mob. Every slap adds to the madness, so keep moving if you want to stay in the game!

obby-cards-the-legend-hunt.name: Obby Cards: The Legend Hunt
obby-cards-the-legend-hunt.description: Obby Cards: The Legend Hunt is a battle game where you collect powerful fighter cards, build an unbeatable team, and dominate epic PvP battles and boss arenas. Perfect for fans of Roblox-style gameplay and anime action, this game lets you dive into fast-paced card collecting and strategic combat.

noob-and-zombies.name: Noob and Zombies
noob-and-zombies.description: Noob and Zombies is a 2D survival action game where your only way out is to fix your car and fight your way through waves of the undead. Trapped in a zombie-infested city, you’ll need to repair broken vehicles while fending off relentless hordes. Kill zombies, upgrade your gear, and survive long enough to make your escape.

zombie-car-racing.name: Zombie Car Racing
zombie-car-racing.description: Zombie Car Racing is a high-octane, physics-based racing game set in a monster-infested, post-apocalyptic world. Take the wheel of a rugged monster truck and blaze through swamps, rocky hills, and ruined cities, smashing zombies and obstacles in your path. Crush zombies, earn cash, and upgrade your ride into a beast of destruction. Every level pushes your skills and your vehicle to the limit.

epic-racing---descent-on-cars.name: Epic Racing - Descent on Cars
epic-racing---descent-on-cars.description: Epic Racing - Descent on Cars is a high-speed demolition showdown where racing isn’t just about speed—it’s about survival. Crash, clash, and careen down wild tracks packed with brutal obstacles. Choose your car, master the chaos, and brace for bone-rattling impacts as you race to victory in a metal-twisting frenzy.

runic-curse.name: Runic Curse
runic-curse.description: Runic Curse is an action-adventure game where you step into the boots of Adrian, a shipwreck survivor stranded on a mysterious island. As you explore ancient ruins and cursed lands, uncover the secrets behind the Rune Curse and search for your lost crew. Face danger, solve mysteries, and embrace your fate in a world shrouded in shadows.

sworded-io---spin-and-rub.name: Sworded io - Spin and Rub
sworded-io---spin-and-rub.description: Sworded io - Spin and Rub is a fast-paced arcade sword-fighting game where you’ll test your reflexes, tactics, and timing against waves of fierce opponents. Upgrade your fighter, unleash spells, and conquer battle arenas through pure skill and clever strategy.

hexa-block-2048-idle.name: Hexa Block 2048 Idle
hexa-block-2048-idle.description: Hexa Block 2048 Idle is a merge idle hybrid game where your brain and strategy meet passive income and endless upgrades. Whether you're a puzzle-solving pro or a fan of satisfying idle games, this relaxing hexagon world has something for you. Start merging your way to glory!

archer-shooter-3d-bpu.name: Archer Shooter 3D
archer-shooter-3d-bpu.description: Archer Shooter 3D is a thrilling archery game where precision and strategy are key to survival! Take aim, shoot down enemies, and rescue civilians using a limited number of arrows. Every shot counts! Miss too often, and it’s game over. Master your aim, time your shots, and clear each level with skill and focus.

colojon-2.name: Colojon 2
colojon-2.description: Colojon 2 is a vibrant coloring book experience designed to lift your mood and spark creativity. With a wide variety of images to choose from and the option to create your own. Color by numbers in soothing pixel art style, perfect for all ages. Whether you're looking to relax, concentrate, or simply have fun, This game offers a calming escape into color.

solitaire-the-great-journey.name: Solitaire: The Great Journey
solitaire-the-great-journey.description: Solitaire: The Great Journey is a relaxing card game that blends classic solitaire mechanics with an adventurous twist. Match cards one above or below your stack to clear the table and move forward. With every win, you unlock a new island to explore, turning each round into a step deeper into a vibrant, rewarding journey.

draw-bridge-brain-game.name: Draw Bridge
draw-bridge-brain-game.description: Draw Bridge is a brain-teasing adventure where you design creative pathways to guide a car through obstacles to safety. With each level presenting new challenges, your goal is to draw safe bridges and roads to rescue the stranded vehicle. Sharpen your problem-solving skills and unleash your creativity in this engaging puzzle journey!

4x4-chess.name: 4x4 Chess: Last Man Stand
4x4-chess.description: 4x4 Chess: Last Man Stand is a fast-paced, tactical twist on the classic game, designed for short, intense matches where only one player can be the last piece standing. On a tight 4x4 board, every move matters and the battle for survival is fierce. With its simple mechanics, fast rounds, and deep strategy, This game offers a fresh and exciting challenge for both chess veterans and newcomers alike. Think smart, play bold, and be the last one standing!

oil-mining-3d---petrol-factory.name: Oil Mining 3D: Petrol Factory
oil-mining-3d---petrol-factory.description: Oil Mining 3D: Petrol Factory is an idle simulation game where you step into the oil era and build your own energy empire from the ground up. Drill, refine, upgrade, and expand your way to becoming a powerful tycoon in the global oil industry. Start with a small rig and grow your factory into a massive production empire as you manage operations, optimize output, and invest in cutting-edge tech.

crazy-office-slap-and-smash.name: Crazy Office: Slap and Smash!
crazy-office-slap-and-smash.description: Crazy Office: Slap and Smash! is a slapstick beat-em-up that turns a dull office into a hilarious battlefield. You’ll throw chairs, swing golf clubs, and cause ragdoll mayhem as you fight your way past coworkers and unhinged bosses. Rise through the floors, unleash chaos, and deliver your final smackdown to the CEO in true cubicle-conquering style.

fly-me-hard.name: Fly Me Hard
fly-me-hard.description: Fly Me Hard is a wild medieval action game where you take to the skies as a daring cowboy armed with a jetpack. Flip, fly, and unleash chaos using ragdoll physics to battle skeletons, goblins, and more. Protect villages and defeat enemies in a fast-paced adventure packed with hilarious stunts and explosive action.

emoji-archer---shooting-emoji.name: Emoji Archer - Shooting Emoji
emoji-archer---shooting-emoji.description: Emoji Archer - Shooting Emoji is a lighthearted archery game where your aim meets emoji chaos. You’ll fire arrows at bouncing emoticons, timing each shot with precision to trigger vibrant bursts of color. Tackle moving targets, unlock special arrows, and test your skills across fun, animated levels. Stay sharp, take your shot, and master the emoji battlefield.

mahjong-pet-quest.name: Mahjong Pet Quest
mahjong-pet-quest.description: Mahjong Pet Quest is a charming puzzle adventure where classic Mahjong gets a cute twist with adorable animal-themed tiles. Match pairs of animal tiles to clear the board. You can only match tiles that are free and have no other tiles blocking them! Clear all the tiles to complete the level and move on to the next.

italian-brainrot-clicker-usp.name: Italian Brainrot Clicker Game
italian-brainrot-clicker-usp.description: Italian Brainrot Clicker is a chaotic meme clicker incremental game where you tap your way through the viral Italian Brainrot universe, unlocking all the brainrot characters and upgrades as you progress! You will get the chance to collect Italian Brainrot characters such as: Bombardino Crocodilo, Tung Tung Tung Sahur, Tralalero Tralala, Bombombini Gussini, Cappuccino Assasino, Lirili Larila, Brr Brr Patapim, Burbaloni Luliloli, Bobritto Bandito, Trippi Troppi, Chimpanzini Bananini and more! Can you collect them all?
italian-brainrot-clicker-usp.faq:
What is a brainrot meme?

Several brainrot memes have gone viral on TikTok. Check out Italian Brainrot Clicker game to discover which one you know.

What does brainrot mean?

Brainrot is a concept used to describe when someone repeats a viral trend, but doesn't quite know why they are doing so.

Can I play Italian Brainrot Clicker on my phone?

You can play Italian Brainrot Clicker on your phone or most other devices.
italian-brainrot-clicker-usp.controls: Use the left mouse button to play and interact with the in-game UI.

caveman-life.name: Caveman Life
caveman-life.description: Caveman Life is a simulation game where you play as a stone age chief where you gather, build, hunt, and raise dinos on your way to prehistoric domination!

pro-construction-simulator-3d-swm.name: Pro Construction: Simulation 3D
pro-construction-simulator-3d-swm.description: Pro Construction: Simulator 3D is a creative building game where you shape bricks, transport materials, and construct incredible monuments. You’ll direct trains, merge trollies for faster deliveries, and upgrade tools to tackle massive projects. With soothing gameplay and stunning 3D visuals, you are free to unleash your imagination and build a thriving cityscape.

duck-duck-clicker-ixu.name: Duck Duck Clicker
duck-duck-clicker-ixu.description: Duck Duck Clicker is the ultimate duck-themed clicker game for anyone who just can't stop clicking cute things! Satisfy your irresistible urge to click endlessly on ridiculously adorable ducks. Rack up points, unlock fun customizations, and turn your duck into the most fabulous feathered friend in the galaxy. It's simple, it's silly, and it's dangerously addictive.

drone-io---ai-survivor.name: Drone.io - AI Survivor
drone-io---ai-survivor.description: Drone.io – AI Survivor is a survival game where you command a powerful drone squad in a war against HackGPT’s AI uprising. Build your fleet, adapt fast, and crush relentless robotic threats in real-time tactical combat. You’ll need sharp reflexes, bold strategy, and relentless firepower to stop the apocalypse.

road-battle-gather-the-gang-vvf.name: Road Battle: Gather the Gang
road-battle-gather-the-gang-vvf.description: Road Battles: Gather the Gang is a thrilling running game where you rally a massive crew to conquer wild battles. Dash through obstacle-filled roads, scoop up resources, and earn rewards to build a sprawling city and your lavish villa. Collect hats along the way to give your gang some serious personality.

obby-boxer.name: Obby: Boxer
obby-boxer.description: Obby: Boxer is a casual idle game where you help Obby punch through walls and escape confinement with sheer force. Strengthen his abilities, collect pets, unlock over 30 powerful gauntlets, and explore vibrant new locations. Customize Obby with unique skins and effects, spin for rewards, and rise through the ranks as you smash every barrier.

dungeon-master---cult-craft.name: Dungeon Master - Cult & Craft
dungeon-master---cult-craft.description: Dungeon Master – Cult & Craft is a darkly captivating 3D dungeon management simulator where you reign as the master of an underground empire. Convert simple stickmen into loyal followers, mine precious resources, and grow a powerful cult beneath the surface. Keep faith high or risk losing control of your dominion. The goal of the game is to manage the dungeon, develop your Cult, and maintain power over your followers.

ball-ring-destruction.name: Ball Ring Destruction
ball-ring-destruction.description: Ball Ring Destruction is an idle-clicker game where you control powerful balls that shatter rotating rings with every bounce. Collect cash, unlock new balls like tennis or basketballs, and boost their strength, speed, and critical hit rate. Level up, smash tougher rings, and reset progress through prestige for bigger rewards. How far will your destruction streak go?

tiny-sails.name: Tiny Sails
tiny-sails.description: Tiny Sails is a delightful wind-powered adventure where you guide a miniature boat through wild, hazard-packed waters. Spin your fan to dodge whirlpools, cannonballs, and sneaky pirates while chasing stars and coins. Unlock quirky new vessels, from ocean liners to blimps, and test your steering skills across dozens of charming, obstacle-filled levels.

bounce-heroes.name: Bounce Heroes
bounce-heroes.description: Bounce Heroes is a thrilling blend of idle RPG, merge puzzle, and roguelite action where your hero battles fierce monsters, an evil empire, and ancient beasts, all in pursuit of treasure and victory. Armed with a trusty crossbow and magical bouncy balls dropped by fallen foes, you’ll crush enemies wave after wave.

battlechonk-hig.name: BattleChonk
battlechonk-hig.description: BattleChonk is a charming defense game where you guide adorable creatures in their fight against the mischievous Gloomps. You’ll boost your dice, unleash clever attacks, and guard your town with growing strength. As challenges increase, you unlock new Chonks and upgrades, keeping every chapter fresh, strategic, and full of delightful surprises.

mad-evolution-idle-merge.name: Mad Evolution: Idle Merge
mad-evolution-idle-merge.description: Mad Evolution: Idle Merge is a chaotic creature-combining simulator where you fuse bizarre monsters into even stranger hybrids. Gather coins nonstop, evolve your weirdest creations, and push the limits of logic as you unlock new, surreal worlds. It’s your job to unleash wild upgrades and build the ultimate monster empire in this endlessly quirky experiment.

cubes-crusher.name: Cubes Crusher
cubes-crusher.description: Cubes Crusher is a vibrant clicker game where you slice through colorful blocks with spinning saws to gather gold. Upgrade your tools, boost the block spawn rate, and push your setup to its limits as levels grow more intense. Stay sharp, collect fast, and see how far your crushing power can go!

bar-rumble.name: Bar Rumble
bar-rumble.description: Bar Rumble is a fast-paced arcade game where you run a lively pub packed with action and strategy. You’ll mix signature cocktails, train a stellar team, and handle rowdy patrons as your bar grows from a local joint to a nightlife hotspot. Keep the drinks flowing, the music pumping, and your business booming in this chaotic yet charming experience.

loot-island---treasure-digger.name: Loot Island - Treasure Digger
loot-island---treasure-digger.description: Loot Island - Treasure Digger is a strategic casual game where you hunt for buried treasure across mysterious landscapes. Follow the map, dig at marked spots, and unearth gems, coins, and artifacts. Carefully stack your loot in a Tetris-style backpack to maximize space and profit. Upgrade your tools, unlock new areas, and turn each dig into a rewarding adventure.

samurai-s-shadow-qtn.name: Samurai's Shadow
samurai-s-shadow-qtn.description: Samurai's Shadow is an action-packed adventure set in the heart of the Shogun’s era, where danger lurks around every corner. Step into the shoes of a fearless samurai and unleash swift, soul-like combat to slice through surprise enemies. Discover hidden rewards in chests, upgrade your skills, and become an unstoppable warrior of the shadows!

little-shop.name: Little Shop
little-shop.description: Little Shop is a casual management game where you run your bustling store, handling everything from stocking shelves to serving customers. Grow your business by upgrading interiors, expanding space, and adapting to demand. Visit friends’ shops, trade resources, and discover winning strategies. With full control and creative freedom, you're on the path to building a shopping paradise.

crazy-vikings-life.name: Crazy Vikings Life
crazy-vikings-life.description: Crazy Vikings Life is a wild cartoon-style strategy adventure where you command a fearless Viking clan on a quest for glory. Raid islands for loot, upgrade your scrappy raft into a mighty warship, and grow your base into a thriving Viking stronghold. Recruit warriors, train them for battle, and conquer the seas with humor and chaos.

homesteads-dream-farm-fkk.name: Homesteads: Dream Farm
homesteads-dream-farm-fkk.description: Homesteads: Dream Farm is a simulation game that puts you in charge of a growing frontier town. You’ll manage resources, meet colorful characters, and explore the untamed Wild West. As you build your homestead, forge friendships, and shape your community, every decision you make helps turn the frontier into a thriving settlement full of life.

rolling-balls-space-race.name: Rolling Balls Space Race
rolling-balls-space-race.description: Rolling Balls Space Race is a high-speed sci-fi showdown where glowing tracks wind through the stars and precision is everything. Race solo or with a friend as you control a blazing ball, time your jumps perfectly, and dodge spaceborne obstacles. With dazzling visuals and intense reflex-based action, it’s a cosmic thrill ride to the finish.

cut-in-half.name: Cut In Half
cut-in-half.description: Cut In Half is a fast-paced game where you slice through obstacles using sharp timing and precision. You’ll dodge red blocks, avoid falling into valleys, and aim to collect goods with every clean cut. Each successful run brings you closer to unlocking new characters and mastering the rhythm of this thrilling slicing challenge.

bone-doctor-shoulder-case.name: Bone Doctor Shoulder Case
bone-doctor-shoulder-case.description: Bone Doctor Shoulder Case is a fun and interactive simulation game where you become the doctor on call for a spirited cheerleader who’s taken a tumble. Patch up her injured shoulder with a playful step-by-step surgery, then celebrate her recovery with a fabulous makeover! Dress her up with trendy outfits and accessories so she’s ready to dazzle the squad again!

weapons-ragdoll-arena.name: Weapons Ragdoll Arena
weapons-ragdoll-arena.description: Weapons Ragdoll Arena is a chaotic arcade battle where you hurl wild weapons at your opponent in hilarious ragdoll duels. Choose your arsenal wisely, as each item has its own power and impact. Outsmart, outthrow, and outlast your enemies as you aim for critical hits. Show your skill and rise as the ultimate throw champion!

block-build-destroyer.name: Block Build Destroyer
block-build-destroyer.description: Block Build Destroyer is an idle destruction game where you tear down houses using an expanding lineup of powerful weapons. Begin with basic dynamite and work your way up to swords, pickaxes, and more. Each house brings new challenges, while your auto-attacking arsenal earns resources for upgrades. Reset progress for bonuses and demolish even faster as you chase ultimate destruction!

evolution-factor-1.name: Evolution Factor
evolution-factor-1.description: Evolution Factor is a revamped throwback where you command utility vehicles to rescue and restore a fleet of classic and work machines. Tow broken-down cars to the garage, build stunt zones with forklifts and excavators, and craft your own chaotic playgrounds across two detailed scenes. It’s a creative twist on vehicular problem-solving and action-packed stunts.

happyville-merge-farm-gtu.name: HappyVille Merge Farm
happyville-merge-farm-gtu.description: HappyVille Merge Farm is a cozy casual game where you grow a magical village by hiring masters, producing items, and merging them into advanced creations. Fulfill orders to earn coins and unlock new upgrades for your peaceful kingdom. With gentle pacing and satisfying progress, it's the perfect escape for building, merging, and creating your dream village at your own rhythm.

snake-vs-block.name: Snake VS Block
snake-vs-block.description: Snake VS Block is a fast-paced arcade game where you guide a growing snake to smash through waves of numbered bricks. Collect extra balls to extend your snake and ramp up the destruction. Easy to pick up but tough to master, this game dares you to chase ever-higher scores in an endless test of reflexes and strategy.

zombie-horde-build-survive.name: Zombie Horde: Build & Survive
zombie-horde-build-survive.description: Zombie Horde: Build & Survive is a fast-paced tower defense game where your survival depends on smart strategy and fierce action. You’ll build traps, upgrade your gear, and guide your hero through relentless waves of the undead. Stay sharp, plan ahead, and test your limits against a growing horde determined to break through.

pocketro.name: Pocketro
pocketro.description: Pocketro is a fast-paced roguelike card game that fuses poker mechanics with strategic deck-building. You’ll craft winning hands, collect random power-ups, and face tougher challenges with each round. Every decision shapes your run, making each session unpredictable and rewarding. Test your instincts, take risks, and outsmart the table in a game of clever gambits.

guns-vs-zombies-merge-game-wsr.name: Guns vs Zombies
guns-vs-zombies-merge-game-wsr.description: Guns vs Zombies is a post-apocalyptic survival game where you merge weapons on your tank to battle relentless waves of the undead. You’ll explore dangerous zones, fortify shelters, and team up with survivors to take down over 30 zombie types. Customize your arsenal, conquer tough bosses, and push through 200 levels of nonstop, strategic combat.
