click-to-grill.name: Click To Grill
click-to-grill.description: Click To Grill is a wildly satisfying idle clicker that lets you turn up the heat on the unexpected. You’ll tap your way through an ever-expanding buffet of bizarre barbecue items—from steaks to the totally bizarre. Keep the flames roaring as you earn upgrades and turn every strange item into a perfectly charred masterpiece.

asmr-girl-livestream-mukbang.name: ASMR Girl: Livestream Mukbang
asmr-girl-livestream-mukbang.description: ASMR Girl: Livestream Mukbang is a simulation where you step into the spotlight as an adorable mukbang streamer. Savor mouthwatering dishes, connect with your audience, and build your popularity one bite at a time. Every meal brings you closer to stardom—keep eating, keep engaging, and let your virtual foodie journey unfold.

asteroid-breaker-ezu.name: Asteroid Breaker
asteroid-breaker-ezu.description: Asteroid Breaker is an idle defense game where your auto-firing turret takes on relentless waves of asteroids. Take control manually for precision shots, earn XP to unlock roguelite-style upgrades, and grow stronger with every wave. Use your earnings to advance a permanent skill tree and build a turret so powerful, no asteroid stands a chance.

money-maker-idle.name: Money Maker Idle
money-maker-idle.description: Money Maker Idle is a fast-paced tapping game where you grow a money-printing empire from a humble machine into a financial powerhouse. Upgrade production lanes, unlock slicing bonuses, and trigger cash storms to accelerate your fortune. With every tap, you edge closer to billionaire status in a whirlwind of wealth, strategy, and satisfying money-making chaos.

dragons-merge-battle-games.name: Dragons Merge: Battle Games
dragons-merge-battle-games.description: Dragons Merge: Battle Games is an action-packed strategy adventure where you fuse dragons and warriors to forge an unstoppable army. Combine identical units to unlock powerful transformations, then lead your team into real-time battles bursting with fiery clashes and tactical decisions. Every merge strengthens your path to becoming the ultimate Dragon Master in a world brimming with challenges.

paper-boy-race-running-game.name: Paper Boy Race: Running Game
paper-boy-race-running-game.description: Paper Boy Race: Running Game is a thrilling 3D runner where you speed through bustling city streets on a mission to master the art of newspaper delivery. Dodge traffic, leap over roadblocks, and nail your throws into mailboxes with perfect timing. Upgrade your ride, unlock cool gear, and race to become a true delivery legend.

gaz-to-the-moon.name: Gaz to the Moon
gaz-to-the-moon.description: Gaz to the Moon is a thrilling vertical adventure where you soar skyward on a tank of gaz, dodging obstacles and pushing your limits. Aim higher with every launch, uncover skybound secrets, and chase the ultimate goal—touching the Moon itself. How far will your gaz take you? There’s only one way to find out.

mean-girls-graduation-day.name: Mean Girls Graduation Day
mean-girls-graduation-day.description: Mean Girls Graduation Day is a stylish dress-up adventure where you glam up Ava, Ellie, Selena, and Riri for the fiercest graduation shoot ever. Mix bold looks across trendy styles—from preppy to pastel—then finish each makeover with makeup, robes, and a selfie-worthy photo booth finale. Graduation just got a whole lot more fabulous.

brainrot-idle-clicker.name: Brainrot Idle Clicker
brainrot-idle-clicker.description: Brainrot Idle Clicker is an incremental game where you tap your way through waves of bizarre enemies in a universe overflowing with wild humor. As you level up, you’ll pick clever cards to evolve your character, unlock strange powers, and take on even weirder challenges. Stay sharp—this world only gets stranger.

uncle-hit-punch-the-dummy.name: Uncle Hit: Punch the Dummy
uncle-hit-punch-the-dummy.description: Uncle Hit: Punch the Dummy is a fast-paced action game where you take out your frustration on a relentless, annoying dummy. With quick reflexes and nonstop punches, you’ll unleash a flurry of blows in simple, satisfying bursts. Stay sharp, keep hitting, and enjoy every moment of chaotic stress relief wrapped in hilarious impact.

squish-uwy.name: Squish
squish-uwy.description: Squish is a high-energy local multiplayer brawler packed with retro arcade flair. You’ll bounce, bash, and outmaneuver up to three opponents, or bots, across chaotic arenas. Use power-ups, dodge attacks, and squish your way to victory. Easy to jump into but tough to master, it’s all about fast moves, quick reflexes, and nonstop fun.

asmr-beauty-japanese-spa.name: ASMR Beauty Japanese Spa
asmr-beauty-japanese-spa.description: ASMR Beauty Japanese Spa is a relaxing style game where you guide a charming girl through a soothing Japanese hair spa filled with calming treatments and revitalizing masks. Once refreshed, dress her in elegant kimonos, choose delicate accessories, and personalize her look with stunning hairstyles, makeup, and shoes. It's your peaceful retreat into beauty, fashion, and creative expression.
